1a1(rgyud 'grel): // rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lag len go rim jig pa bzhugs so//
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bid+yA ra nA ma d+ha ra Ni maN+Dal
1b2(rgyud 'grel): drakri ya ya thA kram nA ma/ bidi skad du/ rnam par 'joms
2a1(rgyud 'grel): #pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lag len go rims ji lta ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje
2a2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pA na ye/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i cho gas rang ngam 'gro ba
2a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhon gyi gdon dang nad rnams las grol bar 'dod pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub pa pos/ phyugs lhas sam/ shing gcig dang
2b1(rgyud 'grel): lha khang ngam/ lam gyi gzhi mdo 'am/ khang stong ngam/ nags tshal gang yang rung bar bsam gtan gyi khang par chag chag dang ba'i rnam lnga dang / spos dri zhim pos byug
2b2(rgyud 'grel): ris byas la/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa thams cad rdzogs par bshams nas/ khrus dang 'thor 'thung dang nye reg byas nas/ stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs gtsang zhing sar
2b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gon la/ phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis mchod pa byin gyis brlabs la/ yungs kar lag tu thogs te/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nas bin+d+ha bin+d+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ ces pa'i bar du lan gsum
2b4(rgyud 'grel): mam bcu brjod do// de nas bum pa bca' ste/ gser dang dngul lam ma rnyed na zangs sam sa las byas kyang rung ste/ lto ba che la mgrin pa ring ba zhabs zhu pa kha g.yel ga/ nag po
3a1(rgyud 'grel): ra ri med pa grangs lha grangs dang mthun drug gam/ yang na bdur nam gcig kyang rung ste/ gu gul gyis bdugs pa dang / yungs dkar gyis bgegs bzlog la/ der 'o ma dang chu nyung zad blugs pa der rin po che rnams dang / dri lnga dang /
3a2(rgyud 'grel): sman lnga dang 'bru lngas dgang la mgrin pa gos kyi shing las byung ba'i kha tshar phun tshar ma nyams pa'i mthing shun gyis khaM bsgyur ba 'am/ dkar po gsar zhing gtsang bas mgul ba bcings li/ me tog sngon po dang bcas pas kha brgyan la mgul
3a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ras kyi steng du yungs kar dang / rtsa ngur ba nyag ma bdun dang bcas pa dri zhim pa'i me tog phreng ba bcings la/ mdud pa la hUM bris pa'i ba'i lci bas la ma lhung bas so// gdugs dang ba dan kyang ngo // de nas man+tal kyi steng du bzhag go// yang
3a4(rgyud 'grel): khrus dang 'thor 'thung nye reg byas la/ las kyi rdo rje dang / gsang gdub dang / gdub bu'i tshi ga rnams byas la/ dir rang gi snyi gar nyi ma las sa bon ltas pa des rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas pa dmigs la/ bde bar gshegs
3a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dam pa'i chos// tsho gas tshon bcas la phyag 'tshal lo// gtum po phyag ni rdo rje la// khyad par du yang phyag 'tshal lo// yid 'ong mchod rdzas ji snyed rnams// rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas la dbul// 'kho ba thog ma med pa nas//
3a6(rgyud 'grel): lha sdig pa bgyis pa dang // bgyid du brtsal dang yi rang ba// shin tu 'gyod pas bau shags shing sdom// bdag dang gzhan gyis gang bgyis pa'i// dge ba kun la rjes yi rang // byang chub snying por nyer gnas te// gang yang byang chub mchog rtog pa'i//
3b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis gsol ba rgyal ba kun// 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol// bya ba thams cad byas nas ni// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' ba rnams// bdag gis gsol bas rgyal ba kun// sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' gsol// phyag 'tshal la sogs
3b2(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams gang // ji snyed bdag gis bgyis pa rnams// ji ltar mgon po mkhyen pa ltar// byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo'o// de ltar raM gyis rang ma rtogs pa stong par bsam// a ser pos gser gyis bzhir bsam// de'i steng du paM las 'o ma can
3b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgya mtsho bsam// de nas sum las ri rab de'i steng du bruM las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa rta babs dang bcas pa// dbus dang mtshams bzhir 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dang phyogs bzhi ni gri gug bzhis mtshan pa'o// de'i dbus su raM las stong
3b4(rgyud 'grel): par song ba'i ngang las chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'i sgra byung bar bsam/ oM dz+wa la na ya swA hA/ de las sna tshogs rdo rjes dngos gcig med pa/ de las rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi skur grub/ sku yongasu rdzogs pa ni sku mdog ljang sngon yid tsam khro ba g.yas
3b5(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje rgya glu ma la ngos gcig med pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/ g.yon dkur brten cing 'gying ba/ mgul rgyan dang dpung rgyan la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ bstod g.yogs dar la smad g.yogs tshig gu can mnams pa'o// oM tsu ru tsu ru tsan+da ki lI kI li
3b6(rgyud 'grel): sA hA/ oM tra sa ya trA sa ya badz+ra ki li kI la ya swA hA/ oM ha ra ha ra badz+ra d+ha ro ya swA hA/ oM pra ha ra pra ha ra badz+ra br-i b+ha h+Na na ya~M swA tra~M/ zhes pa las/ dbang ldan dang me deng srin po dang rlung rnams kyi 'khor lo'i snying du go rims bzhin du rdo rje gidangs po dang / rdorje
4a1(rgyud 'grel): ka na ka dang / rdo rje be con dang / rdo rje tho ba rnams so// de rnams la go rims bzhin du rdo rje gtum mo dang / rdo rje ki li kI la dang / rdo rje be con dang / rdo rje tho ba rnams kyi skur grub po// khro bo rdo rje gtum po skug nag bzhin khro gnyer can/ g.yas
4a2(rgyud 'grel): pa khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyar te thogs pa// lha thams cad g.yon bstan nas 'gying pa'o// rdo rje ki li kI la ya mdog ljang nag khro gnyer can// g.yas na rdo rje rtse gcig pa// rdo rje be con mthing nag khro gnyer can// sma ra ser po can/ g.yas na be com
4a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi rtse mo rjes mtshan po/ rdo rje tho ba mdog nag po shin tu khro ba mche gtsigs pa/ g.yas na rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'o// de nas mchod yon lag tu thogs te/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs khro rgyal rnams// bdag gi
4a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon bzhes nas kyang // bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol// oM A ha ra A ha ra sar+b+ba bid+ha d+ha ra swA hA/ zhes pas mchod yon gyis spyan drangs lnga rang la bstims la/ phyag rgya gsum gyis rgyas gdab ste/ gong ma'i sngags lnga brjod cing lag pa
4a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la srin log gnyis nang du bkug la phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad byung bar byas la/ gung mo gshibs pa'i phyi rol nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas la/
4a6(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong gnyis gshibis pa ni rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi'o// g.yon pa ni bsdigs 'dzub snying gar gzhag pa/ g.yas pa sor mo gsum bsgreng la mthe chung gis sen mo mtheb mos mnan pa'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur nang du bcings la/ cung zad bsnol
4b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul du bcug ste/ mthe bong gnyis gyen du gshibs la bsgreng ngo // lag pa thal mo phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba las/ mthe bong gnyis bsgreng te tshogs bar pa bkug nas srin lag gi drung du gzugs so// lag pa gnyis khu tshur
4b2(rgyud 'grel): bcangs te mthe bong gnyis bsgrengs te mthu'u chung gnyis nang du gzhug phyag rgya chen po rnams gong ma bzhin bsgoms pas rgyas gdab/ de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa bya/ de nas bruM las rin po'i bum pa la nang 'o mats+tsha gyi rgya mtsho las pad+ma 'khrungs par
4b3(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba ro de'i steng du bsngags lngas lha lnga bskyed la yaM shes kyi lha rnams mchod yon gyi spyan drangs pa bstims/ phyag rgya gsum gyis rgyas btab nas mchod bstod byas la/ bum pa'i steng du bzhag la/ de la gzungs thag
4b4(rgyud 'grel): btags la/ rang dang lha'i thugs kar sngar gyi sngags lnga po gang bzlos po gsal bar dmigs la/ phreng ba snyim par bcug la gzungs thab nas bzung la/ oM badz+ra a tsin+d+ra ye swA hA/ zhes brjod la phreng ba lag pa g.yas pas bzung la so so'i sngags
4b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pas yi ge phreng ba gzungs thag la 'khril nas ye shes sems dpa' mnyes shing bum par ye shes kyi chu rgyun gyis khengs par bsam/ thun re la glal dang sbrid pa gsang skabs la sogs pa spangs la ma yengs par 'dzab du dbulo// glal la
4b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs byung na khrus sogs byas la bzlas pa bsgyur yang na kun la thun mong du yang snying thun re la brgya rtsa brgyad dam ji ltar nus pa dbul/ de nas mchod bstod byas la/ phyi rol tu dbang bzangs las 'byung ba bzhin gtor ma btang la/ lus ngag gi kun
5a1(rgyud 'grel): // spyod bya// thun gnyis phan tshod rang khrus sogs byas la mchod bskyod bzlas pa bya'o// mthun tha ma la mchod bstod gtor ma btang ba'i rjes la bzod par gsol/ slar yang bdag la nges par ni// rje su bzung bar mdzad nas kyang // mgon
5a2(rgyud 'grel): po rig dang sngags bcos pas// ci bde bar ni gshegasu gsol// zhes thabs kyi ye shes pa gshegs su gsol/ khro bo bzhi po rang la bsdu// rang bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgyur la nyal// yang mtho rangs khrus dang mthor 'thung nye reg dang las kyi rdo rje cho ga nas
5a3(rgyud 'grel): bzung thams cad sngar bzhin byas la/ me long gi ngos ltar mnyam pa la rnam lnga dang dri zhim pos byugs las bzung bya'o// de nas khrus dang 'thor 'thung nye reg byas la/ sa gzung nyi ma nas brtsams te// slob ma dkyil 'khor 'jug gi bar// slob dpon rtogs par
5a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug par bya// dri dang bcas pa'i zas bza' zhing / zhes gsungs pas/ bsnyung ba la gnas pa'am/ yang dkar gsum la dris bsgos pa nyung zad tsam bza'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus sam nub phyogasu ku sha'i stan la 'dug ste/ lha drug gi sgo nas rang lha lngar
5a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed cing yo shes bcug nas rgya gsum gyis btab pa la/ shar phyogs nas slob ma 'am yon gyi bdag pos dbus la sogs pa byas nas gos gtsang zhing gsar pa gon la me tog gi phreng ba dri zhim pas bsgos pa lag tu thogs la cog pur 'dug ste/ mdo
5a6(rgyud 'grel): sde drim pa mnyam par bya// mdo sde 'di yi ga'i brjid kyis// klog sa Na lu po thod seM na pa rba / de ngas / dang me das 'phel bar 'gyur// sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// de bas rdo rje rig mchog gi/ rnam 'joms dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// zhes dang
5b1(rgyud 'grel): bu'i dad pa dang ldan pas lan gsum gsol ba gdab bo// de nas sngags 'chang 'greng ste/ rang gi lha'i 'khor lo na mkha' la bteg la/ bar bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgyur la/ mig la hUM bkod la nyi zla 'bar bya zhing // rkang pa gnyi su hUM la sna tshogs rdo rje kha
5b2(rgyud 'grel): gyes par bsams la// se gol gyi sgra brdabs shing khro bo'i lha phyogs mtshams thams cad blta zhing rdo rje lan gsum du gsor la/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs rje can gyi thabs chen de// zhi yang sems can gdul don du// dri mu med pa'i khro
5b3(rgyud 'grel): bor gyur// bcom ldan bdud rtsi 'khyil ba de la phyag 'tshalo// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags rings brjod// de nas seng ldeng gi phur bu stong bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rnam pa la smad zur gsum par 'dug pa la/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya nas/ kro d+ha kr-i d+ha ki li kI la ya
5b4(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad dam ma nus na lan gsum btab la/ dbus dang mtshams bzhir gdagacod pan dang tsan dmar pos thig le gsum dang gu gul dang / yungs kar dang / dri sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa lnga
5b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / dbu'i gtsug tor rnams rdzogs par bya'o// de nas brtan ma lhag gnas bya ste/ g.yas pa'i srin lag gis haM gis bkug la/ dri sngon du song ba'i rnam lngas mchod la// spros thogs la/ skyob pa sangs rgyas la sogs kyis// mkhyen pa
5b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba lan gsum bya// de nas lha lnga'i sa dang / phyogs skyong gi gnasu dri'i thig le dang / me tog gi tshom bu byas la lha sngu na mkha' nas pheb la bzhugasu gsol/ phyogs skyong rnams yid tsa ma mam// yang na ri rgyal gnya' shing 'dzin gyi tshul
6a1(rgyud 'grel): ltonas// phyogs sbyong 'jog rten spyong ba bzhug su 'tshal// bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du sbrum rloms lags 'i sla du 'dir gshegs shig/ e h+ye nga sha lo kras pa ra bA ra sa ma ya ste zhes brjod do// ngo nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod
6a2(rgyud 'grel): cing bstod pa kun gyis kyang bstod la// bum pa ma tshang po 'dir bca' zhing bum pa la mchod la brgya rtsa brgyad ngam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sde ba ma bzhin du bzlas so// yon bdag dang slob ma yang khrus la sogs byed du bcug la/ gsum la skyabs 'gro sbyin/ gtor
6a3(rgyud 'grel): ma btang la pus myo g.yas pa btsugs la/ dril bu bsil shing rdo rje spros thogs la/ rdo rje rnam 'joms bcom ldan 'das// rigs sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// rig rgyal khro bo'i tsho gos rnams dang // gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams
6a4(rgyud 'grel): dang // 'jig rten skyong ba mthu chen rnams// ma lus bdag la dgongasu gsol// rdo rje rnam 'joms dkyil 'khor ni// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir// khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// yo byang ci 'byor pas 'brin// khyod kyis snang ba mdzad pa
6a5(rgyud 'grel): dang // las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes lan gsum brjod// nyi ma 'char khe sngags 'chang g.yog dang bcas pa thig ji lta ba bzhin sgrubs la/ ye shes kyi thig dang las kyi thig dang / kun la slob dpon kha nub tu lta ba lhag ma'o// seng ldong gi
6a6(rgyud 'grel): phur bus dbus su btab la/ srang bu bstod pas bskor phyogasu/ rnam 'joms kyi gnas cha chen gcig la bskor/ mu khyud cha bran lnga pa bskor/ de nas lha rnams la thug pa la 'khor lo'i mu khyud cha bran gnyis bskor// de nas phyi rol rdo rje ba dang / me ri rta babra
6b1(rgyud 'grel): ma gargyas la bskor/ nganas 'grus tog ga N+Dal 'khor ba n+d+ha byas pa ma thog gad+hag phyogs bsor g+ho glag ro gad nas tshon bsgrungs la/ phyogs tshon la shar dkar/ smr-i ster/ rung dmar// byang ldang / dbus mdzang /
6b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bzhi dang gri gug sngo kyang / pad+ma rA ga dang por sngo// de'i phyi rol ljang / de'i phyi rol dmar/ de'i phyi rol ser/ kun gyi phyi rol dkar po/ de nas 'khor lo'i dbus dang 'dab ma rnams la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bris la/ dbus rdo rje rgya gram ljang
6b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon la dngos gcig meng pa bri/ byang shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje rtse lnga po smug nag/ shar lho'i rtsibs la rdo rje rtse gcig pa ljang nag/ lho nub kyi rtsibs la be con mthing nag/ nub byang gi rtsibs la tho ba nag po bri 'khor lo'i mu khyud dkar po la/ gru chang ljang gu
6b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bum pa bri/ lha'i snam bur phyogs skyong dgod/ de yang gsang ba'i sgo rgyud las// brgya byin gyi ni rdo rjer gsungs// me lha'i phyag mtshan ma thab yin// gshin rje yi ni be con te// bden bral gyi ni ral gri ste// chu bodag gi ni zhags par bya// rlung
6b5(rgyud 'grel): lce'i phyag mtshan rgyal mtshan bsnams// ku pa ra yis dbyug sngomo// dbang phyug gau ni tr-i shul// sa yaM lha mo bum pa'o// nyi zla'i phyag mtshan de nyid do// de rnams gdan byas pa'i steng du dgod par bya'o// de nas sgo bzhir nub kyi sgor dab
6b6(rgyud 'grel): be'u dang 'khor lo// byang gi sgor gdugs dang rgyal mtshan/ shar gyi sgor pad+ma dang bum pa/ lce'i sbyor dung dang nya bri/ de nas rta babs la sogs rdzogs par ro// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas pa'i rna mo lnga dang dri zhim pos nye bar thugs la/
7a1(rgyud 'grel): re dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / ltab lhub kyis dkyil 'khor gyi gnas brgyan cing / me tog gsil la gtor zhing mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad bshams la dra phur bres la/ de nas sngags 'chang bdag nyid khrus la sogs pa tha~Md la/
7a2(rgyud 'grel): nub sgor rtswa ku sha'i stan la 'dug la/ las kyi rdo rje'i cho ga dang gsang gdub dang gdu bu'i cho ga rnams byas la maN+Dal pang la mtshan ma dang sta gon gyi lha bsres la/ me tog sngon po'i phreng ba thogs la rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing / oM badz+ra dz+wa la na ya swA hA/ zhes
7a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing len gsum gsum bskor ba byas la/ me tog rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi dbu la phul/ slar rang gi mgo la bcings la/ nub sgor 'grel la khro do'i bstod pa btang la/ bgegs gang la la zhig sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ dngos
7a4(rgyud 'grel): grung kyi bar chang rtsom pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po drag pos// rdo rje rab tu 'bur bu 'dris mgo bo tshul ba bdun du 'gas so zhes brjod cing / a mo g+hA badz+ra/ e d+he badz+ra/ zhes pa nas/ badz+ra rA ga dz+wa la ya swA hA'i bA ra du lan cig brjod pas mtshams bcang / de nas sngags
7a5(rgyud 'grel): 'chang nab skor ku sha'i gdan nyid la bsdad la/ dril bu bsol zhing spos snod thogs la/ ye shes bskal pa mi ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ ma rig 'dod pa'i bdud khams thams cad bsregs/ zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad 'joms// log 'dren srin
7a6(rgyud 'grel): po ma lus 'dul ba yin// dpa' bo dpa' mtshan stag lpags rlon pa gsol// rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo bzhugs gsol 'tshal// log 'dren 'joms pa'i spyad du spyan 'dren gyis// 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegasu gsol// badz+ra bi d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha sa pa ri b+hA ra
7b1(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod/ de nas mchod yon phul la/ dam tshig la ye shes gzhug pa ni/ ma ha s+thi ra badz+ra/ su ti s+thi ra badz+ra/ pra tis+thi ra badz+ra/ ma hA badz+ra/ a pra ti ha ta badz+ra/ zhes pas gzhugasu gsol// de nas dam tshig chen po de'i phyag rgya bstan
7b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong mthe'u chung mnan la lhag ma rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i tshul du bsgreng ba'o// oM she ka re mahA sa ma ye swA hA zhes brjod pa ni dam tshig chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya gsum gyis gdab// de nas bum pa sngar bzhin bzlas la
7b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug go// dam tshig gso ste lag pa gnyis rgyab tu thal mo sbyar ba'i tshul du byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis so sor 'khyud la lte ba'i thad kar bzhag la/ oM badz+rod b+hA ba ya swA hA/ zhes brjod pa rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig bskor zhing gso ba'o// sku
7b4(rgyud 'grel): khrus gsol/ mchod yon phul/ dri sngon du 'gro ba rnam lnga dbul// 'dod yon dang rin po che sna bdun dang / 'phra mchod dbul/ de nas bstod de/ chos nyid stong pa gnyis med dang nyid las// 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spong ste// thabs la mkhas pa
7b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed skur ston pa// khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yas kyang // sku yi cha lugs za byed rngam stabs can// gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba'i sgra// ma lus dbang du bsdud la phyag 'tshal
7b6(rgyud 'grel): bstod// lnga yi ye shes rol pas rab ston cing // sdigs pa'i mtshon cha mang po phyag na bsnams// nyon mongs dug chen sna tshogs 'joms mdzad pa// dug sbrul rgyan gyis brgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// hU~M gtum chen 'bar ba bskal pa
8a1(rgyud 'grel): me ltar 'bar// khro gnyer klog stong 'od zer 'gyu ba bzhin// rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong bzhin du sgrogs// khro rgyal bgegs tshogs 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i glong dkyil nas// dpa' bo
8a2(rgyud 'grel): stangs stabs brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// nyi zla 'bru bI spyan gyi sdang mig gis// bgegs dpung bsreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas dpung bzangs nas 'byung ba bzhin// shar phyogs rdo rje can de lha tshogs bcas// zhes bya ba la/
8a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang / dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha zhes pa la sogs kyis phyogs skyong la gtor ma dang bstod pa bya/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas la sogs kyis 'byung po'i gtor ma btang // de nas gang zag de khrus dang 'thor 'thung dang nye reg byed du
8a4(rgyud 'grel): bcug la gos gtsang ma gon du bcug/ dkyil 'khor dang sngags 'chang gnyis la phyag byed du btsug lo/ lag tu me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pas/ rigs sngags 'chang chen dgongs su gsol// bdag ni sdug bsngal las thar phyir// rdo rje 'dzin de
8a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas la// bdag ni gus par skyabasu mchi// zhes lan gsum du brjod do// de nas sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod par bya ste/ ji ltar sngon tshe bde gshegs po brang du// gdug pa 'dul phyir rdo rje can gyis ni// rjes mthun 'phrin las
8a6(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gang sgo ba// dam bcas phrin las de ni grub par mdzod// de slang bgegs dang log 'dren tshar bcad ltar// 'gro ba nyam thag 'di ni gzung ba'i phyir// sdug bsngal nges bsal bde mchog la sbyar ba'i// khro rgyal byed kyis deng 'dir byin brlabs gsol// /
8b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'gro ba de rtswa ku sha'i steng du bzhag la/ gdugs pa'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad de/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya nas hUM phaT kyi bar du brjod// de nas lus bum gyis bkru zhing sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ zhes pa nas/ sdig pa kun las rnam par thar zhes
8b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bar du khrus kyi phan yon brjod cing bkru'o// de nas khrus sa'i stegs bu gsum pa la khru do stong par dbus bzhag la/ khru phyed lha rnams la phyogs skyong rnams bkod la khru gang la rta babs med pa'i sgo bzhi bris te/ dbusu rtswa ku sha bting bar 'gro ba der
8b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa 'am/ khrus sa'i stegs bu ma 'byor na/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha lnga bum par yid kyis spyan drangs la/ rma bya'i sgro la sogs pa mtshan ma lnga po phyis la/ de rtsa ku sha 'am ras dkar po bting la/ 'gro ba der bzhag la bum pa rnams thogs te/ gang la ser
8b4(rgyud 'grel): sna rnams chags pa'i// rnam 'joms dri med madz+ra pa yi// thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des// khyod la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du sdung mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyed la bde legs
8b5(rgyud 'grel): byed par 'gyur// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gi bde ba mnga' mdzad des// khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur// skyob pa gang gis byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du brtags
8b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyangs des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang gis 'khor ba 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten// brgya byin bcas pa'i lha
9a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu byin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kun gyi bsams pa yis// khyed kyi 'dod don gang yin pa// don de de ring grub 'gyur cig/ khyed cag lam 'gro/
9a2(rgyud 'grel): bde legs shog/ phyir bong dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde lags mtshan bde lags// nyi ma'i gung la bde lags shog/ ces brjod la/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya nas na maHtsan+d+ra badz+rA pA na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pA ta ya/ oM dz+wa la na ma ya/ shAn
9a3(rgyud 'grel): taM ku ru swA hA/ zhes khro bo bzhi'i sngags dang 'bru sbrel la bkru/ sdig pa dang nad dang gdon la sogs pa dag par bsams la/ shar sgo nas gton la gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byin la snying gar rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi phyag mtshan bskyed cing bcug la bzhag/
9a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob ma rdo rje'i rwa 'dzin du bcug la/ ya ga tsog nas slob dpon gyis bzung la/ 'gro ba 'di la nga yis bsrung zin gyis// nga ni 'di la su yang gnod mi byed// gal te 'di la gnod pa byas gyur na// mgo bo tshal ba brgyar ni 'gas par 'gyur// zhes brjod
9a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo 'am bsrung skud gdags/ nyi ma gza' las grol bzhin du che ge mo 'di yang nad dang gdon la sogs pa las grol bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig mang du brjod tsang rol mo mang du rdung du gzhug go/ de nas ras dkar po gtsang ma'i
9a6(rgyud 'grel): steng du bkra shis kyi rdzas rnams bzhag ste/ yungs kar dang / ngur ba dang / bil ba dang / gi wa dang / laM khre dang / zho dang / me long dang / dung gas su 'khyil ba dang / brgya byin te/ yungs kar rje rjebo rigs te thams cad du// bo ge gos rnams ma lus 'joms par byed pa'o//
9b1(rgyud 'grel): mthu stobs yon tan phun sum tshogs 'gyur bar// bkra shis des kyang thams cad zhi bar 'gog/ dur bas tshe ni 'phel bar byed pas ste// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ni rab grub nas// nyon mongs skye shi rgyun chad gyur pa yi// bkra shis des kyang tshe ni 'phel bar sh+log/
9b2(rgyud 'grel): bil bas rgyu rkyen 'bras bur gyur pa'i chos// 'jig rten pa las 'das pa'i spyod pa kun// byang chub snying po mchog tu gyur pa yi// bkra shis des kyang mchog tu grub gyur / gi wang dug gsum 'joms pa'i nad kyi sman// chos kyi chos nyid rab tu rtogs nas ni// nyon
9b3(rgyud 'grel): mongs zug nu med par gyur pa yi// bkra shis des kyang sdug bsngal bral gyur cig/ l-i khri dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin te// chos rnams ma lus dbang du bsdus nas kyang // chos kyi rgyal sring rab brtan gyur pa ste// bkra shis nges kyang khyod srid brtan gyur cig/ zho ni
9b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi snying por gyur pa sten// snying po rnam dag ye shes rnami rtogs nas// yon tan chos kyi dbyings su gyur pa yi// bkra shis des kyang dug gsum zhi bar 'o nag/ me long ye shes chen po'i rgya mtsho yis// ye shes rgya mtsho mchog tu bdag gyur te// rnam dag chos
9b5(rgyud 'grel): la thogs med longs spyod pa'i// bkra shis des kyang deng khyod dga' gyur cig/ dung ni chos kyi sgra rnams sgrogs pa'i tshul// ye shes rgya mtsho nyid du bdag gyur te// chos rnams ma lus yongasu ston pa yi// bkra shis des kyang tshig la dbang thob shog/ ces blangs la slob
9b6(rgyud 'grel): ma la kIn no// de ma 'byor na dkar gsum tsam mam 'bras can la bkra shis brjod la sbyin/ slob mas kyang 'byor tshad kyis mchod sbyin bya/ de nas slar bum pa'i lha dang dkyil 'khor dang bum pa'i lha la gang yang bdag blo gti mug la sogs kyis bshags//
10a1(rgyud 'grel): oM khyod rjes sems can don kun mdzad// la sogs kyis ye shes pa gshegs su gsol la/ dam tshig rnams rang la bsdus la rang bdud rtsil khyil bar bya'o// de nas chos thams cad na gdong ma nas dag bya'o//
10a2(rgyud 'grel): rarlung bzhin gyis zhi ba'o// zhes brjod cing rdul tshun phyags la bum pa dang / dman pa rnams chu bo 'am gnas mthon por bsngal lo// dam pa rnams kyi gzhung bzung nas// sna tshogs rgyud la rab brten te// rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa
10a3(rgyud 'grel): yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga ldan pa yi// khrus kyi cho ga brtsams pa las// dri med dge ba gang thob des// 'gro kun sdug bsngal zhi nas kyang // lam mchog rnams la zhugs gyur cig/ rig sngags 'chang gi slob dpon rat+na shI las
10a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga gzhan la phan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra b+ho d+hi dang /
10a5(rgyud 'grel): lo pa tshul dgo rim chen gyis bsgyur ba'o// / @ /
11a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi dA ra d+hA ra ni sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// ma shigs kun 'joms rdo rje 'dzin// khros sha
11a2(rgyud 'grel): gtum pa'i sku mnga' ba// rdo rje yon tan rdzogs btud de// de nyid bsgrub pa'i rim pa bshad// dang brtan g.yo dang nga rgyal med// ser sna chung zhing bla ma gus// 'di la lhag par che dad pas// sgrub pa 'di 'bad bde legs shog/ dang por yid 'ong
11a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su'ang // 'gro ba bsgral ba'i bsam pa yis// rtag tu 'di la brtson par bya// maN+Dal mchod dang gtor ma dang // lus dang po yis rnal 'byor pas// dmigs pa'i rten yang bri bar bya// rade nyid phyi nang khrus byas te// khyad par du ni lus kyi khrus//
11a4(rgyud 'grel): dri yi chu yis rtag tu bya// bde ba'i bstan la 'dug nas ni// rang nyid zla ba sa bon bsam// de yi 'od kyi bla ma sogs// nam mkha'i phyogasu dmigs nas ni// byin gyis brlabs par gsol pa btab// de nas sems can thams cad la// lhag par byams pa bskyed
11a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de bzhin snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms tshul bzhin bsgom par bya// de rjes rnam par mi rtog pa'i// rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom par bya// de la cung zad dmigs nas ni// rnam pa rtog par ldang bar bya// gzugs la sogs pa mi dmigs kyang //
11a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi sgra ru bsgoms par bya// de rjes rang gi shes pas ni// sngags kyi phreng bar bsgom par bya// gsung gi rnam par rdzogs pa yi// phra zhing gsol ba'i rnam par ro// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de// gsal zhing cha ma 'dres par bsam// de yi 'od kyi 'gro ba
11b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// rnam par 'joms par byas nas ni// tshur la bsdu ba'i tshul rgyas ni// rang skyong rnam par 'joms par bsgom// zhabs gnyis chu 'dzin dag la ni// g.yon brdung ba ni rnam par zhugs// sU ni in+d+ran+d+ri ya dang // rdo rje'i snyid+mo dang yang mtshungs// mche ba rnam
11b2(rgyud 'grel): par gtsigs pa ste// spyan dmor 'bral ba khro gnyer ba ni/ mgo skyes dmar ser gyen 'greng b+ha// gsus pa che zhing sbrul gyis brgyan// smad ni ba tis mnan pa ste// sku stod dar la yis dkris// rin po che oM bu rgyan nan// rang gi bdag po dbu la gnas/
11b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pargya gram phyogs sum bsnams// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin// sro zhing mkhregs pa'i sku dang ldan// 'jab ltar gsal ba'i bdag nyid du// bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya// dam tshig phyag rgya btsang bar bya// sngags 'dis byin
11b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab bya zhing // gnas lnga rig tu bdug par bya// oM badz+ra dz+wa lAn yu swA hA/ de nas rang mdog phyag mtshan dang // blo yis gsal bar bsgom par bya// gus la bsgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya// de los skyon sngags bzlas pa/
11b5(rgyud 'grel): doni byi dang nong gi'o// de la nang gI ba shad byA ste// rang nyid zla ba rangs pom// do ya~M tha ma gsang sngags rgyol// mu tig 'ja' dang mar me ltar// tsA ba de ldan zla bor bsgom// de rol cung zhig dmigs nas ni// yang ni gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas// de dag ni na mo
11b6(rgyud 'grel): rA tro sA ya zhes pa nas/ amr-i te hU~M thos pa'i bar du'o// de ni sgra dang bcas pa'o// rang snong tshwa ba tshigs spros te// kun kyang gas sngags rgyal po bzlos// sngags kyi 'brug gro sda bcas// phyogs rnams kun du rnam par s+ho// gdug can rnams
12a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin spro zhing bsdu ba ni// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo drag spyod la// zhi la 'od zer dkar po ste// dbang la lcags kyu dmar po'o// rgyas pa la ni ser po ste// de ltar las dang rjes mthun par// 'od zer dag
12a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang spro bar bya// phyi ni na mkha'i zla dkyil du// yi ge'i 'phreng ba bsams byas te// rgyud las ji skad bshad pa bzhin// sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya// de ltar bsam gtan 'bum gyi bar// sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'o// de ltar
12a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ni// las rnams kun tu sbyang bur bya// de dag rab tu bshod pa ni// rig sngags bcad dang bcing ba dang // phur bus gdang cing mnan pa bya// de bzhin nor sogs rgyas pa dang // sdig sogs bzhi dang dbang du bya// de la
12a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang du byu ba ni// b+hu ru dmar 'dra'is gzhi laM// mo mo pad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra ba'i// thab khung dag ni bca' zhing bsam// de nas sbyar bu'i me bus te// me mo lhoni bdag po nyid// dmar po ljags kyu thogs bsams nas// mngon byas nas ni 'o
12a5(rgyud 'grel): ra s+ho// gsang sdigs 'jug la lus sun gdags// skyur bu'i 'bru dang mo tog dam // phungs dgun bAn+d+ha stong bsngag de yis gli 'dod de bzhin no// ba skur dkar ba'i sa ba la// rbargyas dra dza'i thAg drung du// can
12a6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'i me sbyar te// rang lha dkar po bdud rtsir ldan// de la skad cig dmigs byas la// tsan dan dkar ba'i 'o ma skrag/ de bzhin dkar po'i rdzas rnams la// de bzhin yang ni sngags bzlas te// ji tsam nus pa'i sbyin bsreg bya// sa rba
12b1(rgyud 'grel): ser zhing 'phos pa na// dbang chen lta bu'i dbyibs su bya// mkhas pas thabasan+ni bca' bya zhing // star ka a ru ra'i me/ cho ga dang bcas sbyar bya ste// 'bras bur bcas pa'i yam shing la// de bzhin pa ru la sogs kyis// dbang chen
12b2(rgyud 'grel): la gnas bcom ldan 'das// gser mdog 'dra zhing dbang chen 'phro// de la sbyin bskye gau stong byas la// gang dag 'dod pa rgyas par bya// de dag las kyi rim pa ste// rang nyid bsnyen pa rdzogs pas su// gsang sngags rgyal po rjes dran
12b3(rgyud 'grel): bya// gang dag gdon gyis nyen pa yi// cho ga la sogs bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor legs par byas nas ni// bum pa rdza sogs ljon par bri// gsang sngags brgyad gcig bzlas te// bsgrub bya dkyil 'khor steng bzhag ste// de
12b4(rgyud 'grel): la khrus ni lan gsum bya// bsrung skud mdud pa gsum pa ni// dpung po 'am srin lag ngag la bcing // des ni grol bar the tshom med// 'khor lo dag gis bsrung bya ni// rtsibs bzhi'i mtsham su mtshon tshor ldan// mu khyung me ri rdo rje s+ya bskor
12b5(rgyud 'grel): gur kum gi waM dag la bris nas nA~M// snga dro chog ldan par bsrung bar bya// de ltar 'di ni bsrung ba'i rgyal po ste// 'gro ba rnams la gsang sngags rgyal pos brlab// de rgyud de dang gzhan las gsungs pa'o// oM badz+ra dz+wa lA na ya swA hA/ oM tsur+ya
12b6(rgyud 'grel): tsu ru tsan+d+ra ki li kI la ya swA hA// oM pra ma ya badz+ra ko li kI la yA swA hU~M/ oM ha ra ha ra badz+ra da ra ya swA hA// oM pra ha ra pra ha re badz+ra pra bAny+dza na ye swA hA/ bsrung ba yi'o// ni mo rata na tra yA ya// na mash+tsaN+Da badz+ra pa Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha sa na pa tA tre/
13a1(rgyud 'grel): tad+ya thA/ oM sarba bya ti sarba bag+nin/ sarba dur sa ma ni/ sarba dur mi ti/ sarba gra he/ sarba dza re/ sarba ka ya la smri du/ sarba u pa tre be bya sarba sha hUM/ sarba pA paM shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes khrus kyi'o// oM sarba pus ta ye baSh+TiM ku ru ye swA hA/
13a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa yi'o// oM badz+ra bA shaM ku ru swA hA/ zhes dbang du bya'o// 'di rnams las dang mthun pa'i sngags kha las kyang shes par bya'o// 'di ni rdo rje rnam par 'joms kyi sbubs thabs rgyud dang 'brel pa'i las dang bcas par shes par bya'o// gzhan yang
13a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ma bkod pa rnams bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// 'di ni sgrub thabs kun gyi rgyal// rang sems mos pa'i rjes 'brel ba'i// rtog pa dang bcas sgrub pa thibs// rnal 'byor rnams la phan byed yin// 'di byas bsod nams dri med pa// zla ba
13a4(rgyud 'grel): yar ngo bzhin du 'phel gyur pa'i// 'gro rnams mos po'i bye brag 'grub 'gyur te// rnam par 'joms pa'i skur 'gyur te// rnam par 'joms pa'i skur 'grub shog/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs las dang bcas pa slob dpon ye
13a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga/ chos nyid mnyam po nyid la rab gnas kyang // thugs rjes gtan du mya ngan mi 'da' zhing // 'dod don grub ma thAhA
13a6(rgyud 'grel): yas gzugs mnga' ba// dpa' brtan rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshalo// de la dang por bum pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas/ nor bu yungs kar ngur ba dang // rin chen rma med can dan bcas// shel dang rdo rje me tog dang // chu yi gser
13b1(rgyud 'grel): yang na ni// dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung // gtsang ma'i gos kyi dkri zhing dgang // zhes gsungs pas/ gser ram dngul lam zangs las byas kyang rung zhabs kyi gdub kor ni 'phang du sor gcig gi tshad du byas la gdags so// dbus kyi dbyings
13b2(rgyud 'grel): ni lhung bzed 'dra bar bya'o// mgrin pa'i 'phang du sor bzhi'i tshang du bya'o// mgrin pa'i nang gi tshad kyang sor bzhi pa'i sbubs su bya'o// mgrin pa'i kha khyer phyir bskyed pa ni sor gnyis kyi tshad du byas la// kha'i cha ga'i bshal ka sor
13b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig gi tshad du bya'o// dbul po rnams kyi dbul po rnams kyi dngul dang gser la sogs pa las bya ba mi rnyed pas de'i phyir rgyu gzhan la bya bar gsungs te// bum pa pad+ma dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar zhing byu ru dang li khri dang mtshal gyi
13b4(rgyud 'grel): mdog ltar dmar ba dang / so btang nges pa'i nag por ri med par bya'o// lhor ni chu phul lnga yan mchod nas bcu shong po'i tshad gar nus pa'i tshad byas te/ de nas lug pa byug spos kyis byugs te/ dri zhim po shin tu bkra shis pa'i
13b5(rgyud 'grel): bdug pas bdug la/ gu gul la/ oM a mr-i te hUM phaT ces bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags kyis lan bdun du bzlas pas bum pa'i nang du bdugs yoM/ chu gtsang ma srog chags med par btsags pas bkang ste/ de'i nang du tsan+dan
13b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / ya pUr dang / gur kum dang / dzA ti dang / gla rtsi lnga po bsres pa'i chu yong blugs nas der rin po che lnga zhes bya ba nor bu rin po che dang / byu ru dang / gser lce sbram dang / mu tig dang / shel dag dang / sman lnga zhes bya ba/ bya kri dang /
14a1(rgyud 'grel): seng kri dang / gi bri kar ni dang / sa hA dang / sa ha de ba dang / 'bru lnga zhes bya ba/ nas dang / so ba dang / til dang / mon sran gre'u rnams kying bcug la bum pa'i khar gser ram dngul phor ram/ kham phor
14a2(rgyud 'grel): gtsang ma'i nang du yungs kar blugs pa'i snod bzhag ste/ ras gtsang ma kha tshur mo gong paso bum pa'i kha dang / yungs kAr gyi snod dang bcas pa dak+Shi zhing g.yogs la bcing ste/ mdud pa'i steng du ba'i lci brgyas gdab pa'i tshul du
14a3(rgyud 'grel): blan la rtswa dur ba'i nyag ma bdun btsugs te phyag rdo rje la dbul bar 'os pa'i me tog dmar po dri zhim po 'am/ yang na me tog dri zhim po gang yang rung ba'i phreng bas kyang bum pa'i mgron pa bskor ba'i don no// dkyil 'khor med par bum pa
14a4(rgyud 'grel): 'ba' zhog gis 'dod bya'i las mi 'grub pas thog mar dkyil 'khor bri nas brtag dgos pas spyi'i rgyud dpung bzang gis zhus pa las 'dir sbyar bar bya ste/ phyugs lhas shing gcig lha'i khang pa 'am// lam gyi bzhi mdo khang stong nags
14a5(rgyud 'grel): tshal du// zhes gsung so// dkyil 'khor b+ha bar bstan pa yang de nyid las/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa gru bzhi'i tshang // tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bri// phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongasu bzung // sgo bzhi pa la phyogs kyi rtswa yang
14a6(rgyud 'grel): dgram zhes gsungs te/ de yang sa gzhi shin tu sbyangs shing shin tu mthas par bcags pa'i rnam lnga zhes bya bar/ 'o ma dang / mar dang / zho dang / gcin dang lci ba rnams dang / spos rnams bsres pa rnams kyis bskus la thig gdab
14b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// gru bzhi'i tshad khru bzhi par byas la phur bus legs par gdab bo// de'i dbus su gsang sngags 'chang khrus byed pa'i sa khru do bzhag go// de'i phyi rom khru gung khyon yod pa la cha gsum du bgos te/ dang por 'jig rten skyong
14b2(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams kyi gnas su bya'o// gnyis pa ni sgo khyung mu khyud mu tig gi phreng ba dag bri'o// gsum pa la ni mchod pa dag bri'o// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dgod pa yang // spyi'i rgyud gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ 'di skad du/ brgya byin gyi ni
14b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lor gsungs// me lha'i phyag rgya me thA ba yin// grwa shin rje'i phyag rgya be con to// bden bral gyi ni ral grir bstan// chu bdag gi ni zhags par bstan// rlung gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin// ku be ra yi dbyug to yin// dbang phyug gau ni rtse
14b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsungs// sa'i phyag rgya bum pa yin// nyi zla'i phyag rgya zlum por bya zhes gsungaso// dkyil 'khor ni sgo bzhir stod cing // bkra shis brgyad po'o dpal ba dang / 'khor lo dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / pad+ma dang / bum
14b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / dung dang / nywa dag bris pas mdzes par bya'o// dbus su ni ku shA go ding zhing phyi rol thog dag tu yang ku sha dgram mo// steng du yang bla res lags par dgab cing me tog gi phreng ba dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / me long gis
14b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan na khrus kyi cho ga bkra shis par 'gyur ro// de nas bum pa yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ grwa bzhir seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags gong du smos pa bzlas shing btsugs nas/ tshon sna lnga yis
15a1(rgyud 'grel): skud ba la yang gsang sngags de nyid bzlas shing bskor bas mtshams bcad par bya'o// bshos dang gtor ma dgod pa yang // dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las// bza' dang sha chang la phug la sogs bcas// 'bras chan
15a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin zhes gsungs te/ ma phye ba yang 'os bos su phye ste/ sha chang la phug dag ni gshin rje dang bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba bdag nyid phyi nang gi dri ma dag par byas la//
15a3(rgyud 'grel): gos sar pa bgos te/ cho ga brtsams pa'i dbang du mdzad nas/ des ni rab khrus gtsang ma yin// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing // gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo sde
15a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni nyan byed na zhes gsungs te// de'i don ni rang gi rgyud dag pa de dkyil 'khor gyi nub skor 'greng la/ lag pa byug spos kyis byugs nas// rang gi lha ji ltar mnos pa bzhin du bsgoms la// mig gnyis su yi ge hU~M 'bor bar bsams la
15a5(rgyud 'grel): se gol gyi sgra phyung zhing / phyogs su bltas pas mtsha mas bcad bgegs bskrad nas/ slar bstan bde ba la 'dug nas dkyil 'khor de yang rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i lha'i gnas bzang po dpe med par dmigs shing / bum pa de yang
15a6(rgyud 'grel): yi bzhin gyi mo tsho'i bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar dmigs te/ lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las/ kha phye ste pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni pad+ma gdan gyi phyag rgya yin to/ de'i sngags la/ oM pad+ma ka ma la ye swA hA/ zhes brjod nas yid
15b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyi mtsho'i dbus su pad+ma'i sdong po dang lo ma dang 'dab ma dang ze ba dang / snying por bcas pa dpe med par bzang zhing che ba zhig bsams te/ mchod yon gyi snod blangs la sbreng zhing 'di skad du/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// bdag la mchod yon
15b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhes su gsol// mchod yon bzhes nas de nyid du// mched pas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// A ha ra A ha ra/ sarba bi d+ya d+ha ra pU dzi te swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ 'phags pa mdun gyi na mkha' la 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs par rig
15b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / bar 'dir phyir 'breng ba'i bgegs bskrang / a mr-i tas bsang / yang na rtsa sngags snum bskrad sngags kyis so// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung gi sen mos mthe bong mnan te/ lhag ma gsum nas do tsam gyis ma reg par byas te/
15b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i tshul du byas nas bstan pa ni dam tshug chen po'i phyag rgyu yin te/ de'i sngags le/ oM shU kai re mAd+g+ha sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes brjod nas/ gdan de la 'phags pa khro bo yi rgyal po phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kyi khyad par las byung ba/ rdo rje
15b5(rgyud 'grel): r+ya mdzon sto ba zhes bya le dog sngon po yod namatsho bo/ sgeg ga rdo rje rje bram las ra phyogs gcig med pa bsems pa phyag+sa g.yon pa pa ban cing 'byung gA/ dAts+l-idz+nyAn ldan tsam rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
15b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod g.yogs dma'o sdang g.yogs tshig su bsdams po/ 'khor tshogs kyi snang bag tu song pa dang gshegs pa ri rims mo shing / rgya bas phyag rgya lag pa gnyis thal mo tshong stong du sgyu 'i srin lag gnyis nang du bzhug sde/
16a1(rgyud 'grel): tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo mtho bong dang 'dzub mo'i drung du cung zad 'byung bar byas la/ gung mo gzhibs pa'i phyi rol nas 'dzub mo bkug la nas gang tsaM g+ha mya reg par byas te/ mtho bong gnyis dang mtho'u chung gnyis kyang
16a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhibs pa ni rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las thams cad byed do// de'i sngags lo/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la na ye swA hA/ de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga rim bzhin du dbul te/ dang por byug spros dbul te/ gtsang zhing gtsang mar sbyang ba yi// lha rdzas
16a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'i byug spos 'di// bdag ga dang bas dbul logs kyi// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// A hA ra AM ha ra sarba bid d+hA d+ha ra~M budz+dzi te swA hA/ de nas mo tog dbul te/ gtsang zhing gtsang mar skyes pa yi// lha rdzas dam pa'i me tog 'ad//
16a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags / bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// de nas bdug pa dbul te/ shing gi khu ba yid du 'ong // dri yis rgyas pa bdug pa'i mchog/ bdag gi dad pas 'bul logs kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes
16a5(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod// bshes dbul te/ rnams khu ba yi gar bong // dI yis rgyas pa lha yi zas// bdag gis drad pas dbul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// 'di yan chad kyi sngags ni gong mar smos pa bzhin du sbya ro// de'i 'og
16a6(rgyud 'grel): tu mar me dbul te// gnod rnams 'joms shing bkra shis la// dge zhing mun pa rnams la ba// lha rdzas bzang po'i zhugs mar 'di// bdag gis ngad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// A lo ke A lo ki sorba bad bya d+ha ra bu
16b1(rgyud 'grel): dzaM Ne swA hA// de nas gdon rnams la gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul// nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po// dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang // gang dag sa gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bdag gis pus mos
16b2(rgyud 'grel): la btsugs nas su// thal sbyar de dag la ni gsol ba 'debs// bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa rnams// gsan nas phran gdags slad du 'dir gshegs shig/ sen gang dag ring sa steng gnas dang / dga' dri ma la dang lta bu la gang gnapa dang / gang dag shar nub nyi ma'i khyim
16b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang // chu bo kun dang chu'i ngogs rnams dang // rin chen gnas su'ang gnas ni bcas pa dang // rdzing dang mtsho dang lum ltang lteng dang // khron pa dang ni ma grog chu mig dang // grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer nags tshal dang // khang stong dag dang lha dang /
16b4(rgyud 'grel): lha yi gnas dag dang // lha khang mchod rten 'dug gnas bsti gnas dang // mu stegs gnas dang glang chen khang pa dang // gang dag rgyal po'i dkor khang gnas pa dang // srang dang khyams dang lam kha'i bzhi mdo dang // gang dag shing gcig po dang lam
16b5(rgyud 'grel): po che// dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang // gang dag seng ge glang chen drod kyi gnas// 'jigs pa'i sa dang 'brog na gnas pa dang // gling bzangs rnams su gnas ni bcas pa dang // gang dag lhun po dur khrod gnas pa rnams// rab tu thugs
16b6(rgyud 'grel): dgyes dri dang phreng ba dang // 'dug pa gtor ma mar me bstod gus 'bal// 'di dag bzhes nas bsdams dang gsol mdzod la// bdag gis las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba las kha phye ste/ bkan pa ni
17a1(rgyud 'grel): // gto ba ston pa'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags la srin po rnams la// krang kai r-i/ sha za rnams la/ mo tsi mi tsi/ 'byung po rnams la/ gung gung / thams cad la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+r-i/ bo sh+yA mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarbaHtata khaM ud gA to/ s+pha ra Na hau mo/ ga ga na//
17a2(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ de ltar gdon rnams la gtor ma byin nas ni phyogs skyong rnams la mchod pa/ lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las/ sor mo dbus ma gsum bkyed de/ pad mi'i tshul du bya'o// de'i sngags la/ dbang ldan phyogs su ru tA yA swA hA/ dbang
17a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i phyogasu shag kra ya swA hA/ me'i phyogs su a ga ne ye swA hA/ gshin rje'i phyogs su be ba sa ta ye swA hA/ bden bral phyog su rak+Sha sa a ti pa ta ye swA hA/ chu lha'i phyogs su me ga a sha na ya swA hA/ rlung lha'i 'og gi phyogs su pa~M ya be ye swA hA/ ku ba
17a4(rgyud 'grel): ra'i phyogasu yag sha b+hid d+ha re swA hA/ steng gi phyogasu a ding dwe ye swA hA/ nyi ma'i 'o// zla ba'i tsan+d+ra ye swA hA/ 'og gi phyogasu pri thi bya ye swA hA/ sa'i lha mo yi'o// de ltar phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod de// bzlas brjod bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas// lam grang
17a5(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad// rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas su// rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig/ ces 'byung ba'i don ni de ltar 'phags pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang // 'jig rten skyong ba dang // 'byung po thams cad la
17a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa byas nas/ bum pa'i nang du 'phags pa spyan drangs pa de nyid kyang srog dang bcas pa lta bu dmigs te/ de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa la yi ge'i phreng ba T+wAM bkodade bzla so// lha'i sku dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / yi ge'i
17b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba la dus gcig tu dmogs pa na 'jug rtenan za 'og la sogs pa'i gdong ba wa ro lta bu dang 'drag// zla ba dkyil 'khor chung ngu nang du mga' thong ba ji ltar mang ba ji ltar bkong can/ sems goms pa rnams la mi rung ba med de/
17b2(rgyud 'grel): chu nyung ngu shin tu dang ba'i nang du nyi zla dang / gza' skar la sogs pas brgyan pa'i nam mkha' thams cad snang ba bzhin no// rgyal po zhes pas 'dzin du zad de/ gzhan yang khrus kyi sbyor ba bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas/ mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid
17b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis// srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi// mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kun// de dag thams cad zhi bar blta// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// sdig pa kun las rnam par thar zhes gsungs te/ de ltar bzlas brjod kyi grangs tshang nas
17b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i lha rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshigasu bcad pa yang bsgrag par bya ste/ dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// me ste
17b5(rgyud 'grel): sreg bya za ba'i lha// 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// gshin rje be tson 'chang ba'i lha// ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs bcwa tsa/
17b6(rgyud 'grel): la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha// srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ sna tshogs bcas kyi tshogs bcas pa// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha// bden pa bsrung
18a1(rgyud 'grel): ba gdon gyi bdag/ nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha// tshig bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste// rlung gi tshogs kyi gdon bcas la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang
18a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// gnod sbyin lag na be con thogs// nor bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste// tang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha// bsregs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon
18a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// 'og gi klu ste sa yaM lha// so 'dzin lag pa chen po ste// dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// steng gi lha tshigs thams cad dang // zla ba nyi mo gza' chen dang //
18a4(rgyud 'grel): gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// de nas shu ti dang ba'i rnam lha chu dang sbyar ba la bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags gong du smos pa btab ste/ khrus byed pa'i lus bkrus te dril nas khrus byas te gos sar pa bgos nas
18a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil gyi sgor 'dug ste/ de la bsrung ba chen po bya'o// de nas gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa byin te/ dkyil 'khor bskor du bcug la/ gus pas phyag byas la/ cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rtsa ku sha bkram pa'i steng
18a6(rgyud 'grel): du bde bar 'dug la/ gsang sngags bzlos pas bum pa blangs te/ gzungs sngags bzlas shing khrus byed du bcug la phyi nang gi dri ma thams cad ma lus par dag par bsam mo// shin tu bde legs dang bkra shis dang / rgyal bar gyur cig bya ba'i
18b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga dang rol mo'i sgra skad rab tu snyan pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur// yungs kar dang / zho dang / dur ba dang mo khri dang / mo long dang / dung nga dril ba'i 'bras bu dang 'go wang rnams kyang slob ma'i nang du rab wA ru
18b2(rgyud 'grel): bting ba'i nang du bzhag ste/ dris bak+ku shis 'don pa'i lag tu bzhag nas rdzas de rnams re re nas blangs shing sbyin no// de nas byu ba pa bya ste/ rma bya'i steng du zla ba'i ste hUM gzungs rings bsams la/ des bya ba cing gi zungs
18b3(rgyud 'grel): rings brjod pas pa shams la che ge mo'i sarba bya te la sogs pa sbyar ro// de nas bsrung ba bya ste/ skud pa la bsrung ba byas la gdugaso gzungs ring so bris la de la rab gi nis byas pa gdags so// de nas yang bsrung ba bya
18b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phyed de'i lag tu byin nas zhi ba dang dga' pa'i sems kyis long zhig cis bya bo'i tshig kyang brjod par bya'o// rdo rje phyeng po de la 'thung nas gdon thams cad las thar na b+hU / zla ba sna gcan 'dzin gyis gtsung
18b5(rgyud 'grel): baM las thar po bzhin du lus sdig pa dang bral ba'i dbang du mdzad nas sdig pa thams cad byang byas nasasdug bsngal thams cad med par byed/ rgyud do cog gi rtsub ste/ dpal kun gyis ni
18b6(rgyud 'grel): legs pa sems can dbang po nyams pa dang // tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang/ phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo
19a1(rgyud 'grel): bya nga/ dram ze la sogs gcos pa dang / rdzun tshun mthun pa ma yin dang / nor 'gribs pas na gnod pa dang / myu dun ngal las gnong ba dang // 'jigs pa dang du
19a2(rgyud 'grel): 'ongs pa dang / gza' dang rgyu sgyur byung sems dang / mi bzang gdon gyis ts+tshin pa da / ma dran mang la las byung ba y-i/ rmi la mo sdig pa mthong na yang / tshig
19a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di yi phan yon gyis/ de dgo las ni thar bar 'gyur/ zhes dgongs pa'o// de nas 'byor na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o// yang gzhan du na 'di ltar bya'o// bya
19a4(rgyud 'grel): pra dang snyi rje ni/ mnyam pa ldan par byas kyang rungade yang ni du shes bya ste/ nang gi skyon sreg dam li yin/ 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga
19a5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// dge zhal go/ bkra shis / sarba
20a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
20b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar spyad du/ badz+rA bai dA ra Na mAn+ta la shrI bi d+hin maHbod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo// sdug bsngal la sogs
20b2(rgyud 'grel): dag par mdzad pa ste// rnam par 'joms pa khro bo rnams kyi rje btsan nyid// dpal ldan yid khros log lta gcod pa'i dpal// rdo rje bsnams pa las 'joms 'jig byed pa'i// le'u yi grangs las nges pa'i snying po ste// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rtsa bar 'di
20b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs thog ma'o// de nyid dkyil 'khor cho ga las kyi rim pa nyid// 'di nyid du ni rnam par bshad par bya'o// sa yi cho ga go rims ltar// gzhan gyi las kyi rim par dbye// sa stegs 'dom gang gru bzhi la// phyogs mtshams ma nor
20b4(rgyud 'grel): legs par mnyam// ge brul ba med pa'i blo yis bya// dbangs su chug glang brtsegs par bya// srad bu mnyam ldan gsum bsgril las// byin gyis brlab te g.yas nas go ba// mtshan tshwa bran mkhas pas dbye// tshon+da sna lnga yi phye ma la// byin
20b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab la legs par dgod// dang po pad+ma 'dabo brgyad la// gnyis pa'i cha la 'khor lo brgyad// mu khyud rdo rje rA pa dang // gru chad snam bu gnyis pa dang // ske dang sgo khyud ldan par bri// de nyid kha dog nges par ni// pad+ma dkar po 'khor
20b6(rgyud 'grel): lor dmar// mu khyud gzhi ma dkar po la// rdo rje rnams ni lcags dang mtshungs// gru chad gnyis ni ljang gu la// snam bu dang po ser po spro// de bzhin gnyis pa dkar po che// sgo bzhi so so'i rigs dang sbyar// lha rnams so so'i phyag mtshanan//
21a1(rgyud 'grel): so so'i gan su dgod par bya// de nas slob ma dbang bskur ba'i// dgos pa dag ni chang ba la// dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rtas nyid ni// seng ldeng phur ba sor brgyad pa// bzhi pa phyogs kyi bzlas pa bya// dkyil
21a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyis ni ngos bzhir gdab// tshon sna lnga yi skud pas spel// gser dngul zangs lcags bum pa nyid// tshad dang ldan pa dag pa yi// gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkris shing dgang // 'bras bu 'dab mar ldan pa yi// kha~M brgyan ldan pa
21a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga nyid la// so so'i mtshan ma btab la bzhag/ las kyi bum pa sna tshogs pa'o// rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no// sgrub pa bdag nyid mdun du yang // mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor bsham// nya dang bu ram spyan chung 'bras// khre dang tshe la sogs
21a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// gtor ma gsum ni g.yas nas bzhag/ de nas phyi nang khrus byas te// gtsang ma'i gos ni rab kon la// dri zhim rdza sta ni mur bzhin du// sems bskyod pas ni gzhan don mchog/ bdun po yongs su dag par bya'o// de nas bsrub
21a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'khor lo nyid// ji ltar dmigs pa mkhas pas bsgom// dri chub byin gyis brlabs la bzhag/ hUM hUM zhes rdo ba dang // oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha d+hI hUM zhes pas/ grayas brkyang ba'i gar gyis ni// g.yon brkyang stabs kyis g.yon nas bskor//
21a6(rgyud 'grel): bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i sbyor ba bya// phyogs bcu'i khro bo ti ra yis// nga rgyal ldan pas bsrung dang bcings// mtshams la sogs pa mkhri mo pas gtsang // de nas lce rnams bskyed pa ni// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba'i ste// hUM yig
21b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon po'i 'phro 'du las// mchod dang don gnyis rdzogs par byas// 'dus pas gtso bo'i phyag mtshan ni// sna tshogs rdo rje'i ngos gcig med// dbus su rnam par bsam par bya// de rjes sngags 'di rnam par brjod// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nu maHsarba/
21b2(rgyud 'grel): tA thA ga ta/ b+ha ku la bi sho d+ha na ya swA hA/ zhes pa lan gsum brjod pa yis// rnam 'joms nyid kyi sku ru 'gyur// de nyid dam tshig phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa las// gung mo gnyis ni bsgribs nas bsgreng // gshin rje gshed
21b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag rgya ste// gsang sngags 'di yi legs par ni// byang shar mtsham su gshin rje'o// oM ya man tA ka ya swA hA/ yang snying lag gnyis sor mo dgod// snying gar rtse mo spyad pa yang // oM a nan te swA hA// zhes par shar du mtha'
21b4(rgyud 'grel): yas bskyed// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bsten pa// g.yas pa nu ma'i thad kar bzung // oM a mr-i te a mr-i te// ba ri hUM zhes pas shar lhor bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yon pa'i mthe bong sbrel
21b5(rgyud 'grel): byas la// oM suM b+hA ni kI ra ban d+ha ri swA hA/ zhes pas lho ru gnod mdzes bskyed// lag gnyis khu tshur bcing s+tha las// mdzu blo gnyis kyis srin log man no// gung mo sor mo mthe'u chung bsgreng // oM b+hi nat+ne badz+ra kro d+ha na kro d+ha swA hA// zhes/
21b6(rgyud 'grel): pos lho nub sngon mthon bskyed// snga ma'i phyag rgya lta bu la// oM ha ya grI ba swA hA/ zhes pas nub du rta mgrin bskyed// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcings pa las// g.yas pa'i khu tshur gnyis skrangs la// oM a pa ra dzi ta sa ti swA hA// zhes pas nub byang //
22a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis mo thub bstod// lag gnyis khu tshur bcings pa las// mthe bong mtho'u chung gung mon// ga shibs te so sor bsnyungs byas la// oM badz+ra pA Ni b+han pa ti swA hA// zhes byas byab tu gtum pa'o//
22a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas so so'i phyag rgya bskyed// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa dang // g.yos pa bcangs te spyi bor bzhag/ lag gnyis khu tshur snying garA rtseg/ g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung g.yon pas bya cang // lag gnyis rdebs pa'i tshul du
22a3(rgyud 'grel): bya// de ltar rim pa nges po yis// gru chad la nau go rims bzhin// sngags 'di rgyal chen pozhi rim par gsal bar bskyed par bya'o// oM D+hi Ta ra Ta ye swA hA/ oM bi ru D+ha ka ya swA hA/ oM bai ru b+hak+Sha ye swAhA/ oM bi ra ye swA hA/ zhes pa
22a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po bzhi ru bskyed// de'i phyi rim snam bu la// bkra shis lha mo brgyad po'o// de'i phyi rim snam bu la// phyogs skyong ba ni de bzhin no// sgo bzhir sgom gzhan dang mthun// de dge sku mdog phyag mtshan ni// gtso bo'i sku mdog
22a5(rgyud 'grel): ljang ser la// g.yos pa rgyu gram phyogs de ni// thugs kar bzung ste g.yon pa yang // bum pa sku la brtan pa'o// yang ni phyag gnyis bum pa ni// sna tshogs rdo rjes kha bcad la// phyag gnyis bzung ste thugs kar 'dzin// mtha' yas
22a6(rgyud 'grel): zhelas gsum sgra mdog mthong // phyog drug nges mod mtshon ma'o// g.yon gyi 'og ma rtse dgu ni// thugs kar 'dzin la nges pa'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sku mdog dmar// zhal dang phyag gnyis snga raM 'dra la// 'og ma rdo rje rgya gram
22b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// gnod mdzes mdog gser sngar bzhin la// 'og mas tho ba thugs kar 'dzin// mi g.yo ba ni ljang gu la// rdo rje dbyug tho thugs kyur 'dzin// rta mgrin dmar po pad+ma 'dzin// gzhan gyis mi thub ston po la// ron chen
22b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba thugs klur 'dzin// gtum po smyug nug rtse dgu 'dzin// gshin rje sngonag zhal gsum pa// thig drug nges med mtshon cha la// 'og ma gnyis pos be con 'dzin// de nas gru chang rgyal po bzhi// dkar ser dmar dang ljang
22b3(rgyud 'grel): gu la// bai tsin pi bang chu sbyin dang // rin po che'i dong rtsa'o// lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog ni// gsal byed ma nA sngon mo la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dpal be'u 'dzin// dbyangs can ma ni dkar mo la// rang rtags g.yas pa 'khor
22b4(rgyud 'grel): lo'o// mdangs rgyan ser mo pad+ma'o// 'od ldan mthing ga rgyal mtshan no// skyes chen dmar mo gdub bu 'dzan// dri med mu ya dmar mo la// rang rta Da g.yas pa bu 'dzin// yid bzong ljang gu bud dung 'dzin// yid gzhungs ljang sde ga tu phung 'dzin// phyoT skyong
22b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi sku mdog ni// bar+g+ga bri ni dkar la rdo rje gdengs// me lha dmar po roni chen phreng // gshin rje mthing gA dbyug tho bsnams// bden bral ljang gu ral gri'o// chu lha dmar po klu zhabs bsnams// rlung lha dud kha be con 'dzin//
22b6(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin ser po rin chen 'dzin// dbang ldan dkar ser tri shu la// nyi zla dkar po u dum 'bar// sa yi lha mo ser mo la// phyag na rin chen bum pa bsnams// sgo ma'i phyag mtshan sku mdog ni// lcags kyu dkar la lcags kyu
23a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// zhags pa sngo la de bzhin zhags// lcags sgrogs dmar mo lcags sgrogs 'dzin// dril bu ljang ser dril bu nyid// de ltar sku mdog gsal snyoms la// ye shes dbang bskur dgug gzhum stem// de ltar
23a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas gsal dmigs la// snying po rgyas dang bsdus pa dang // shin tu bsdus pa gang mos la// brgya rtsa brgyad du dbul bar bya// de rjes mchod pa lnga yang dbul// bsnyen pa'i dus su dmigs pa gcig po gsum// legs par
23a3(rgyud 'grel): brtags te mnyes par bya// sgrub pa bum pa nyid la'o// de nas bstod pa dbul ba'i phyir// chos kyi dbyings nas lha rnams ni// spyan drangs bum pa'i nang du bstim// bskul tshig 'di skad brjod par bya// na mo sems ni rgya che mchog tu rab bskyed//
23a4(rgyud 'grel): ma lus 'khor dang bcas te gshegs su gsol// chos dbyings mngon 'gyur ye shes sku brnyes te// sku gsung thugs su legs par 'byung ba'i gnas// gsung rab bcu gnyis 'phags lam rgyal ba'i bka'// bcom ldan shes
23a5(rgyud 'grel): rab pha rol phyin la sogs// rnam dag dbyings kyi dam chos gshegasu gsol// sna bcu'i rgyal tshab chos la mnga' brnyas shing // snying rje chen pos brtson 'grus go gyon pa// shes rab thabs kyis mkhams gsum 'dren mdzad pa//
23a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' gshegasu gsol// mi mjed 'jig rten 'dzam gling 'dir// dpal tshogs bkra shis gzhal yas khang // bla med mchod pa brgyan bshams te// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan bsha mos nas// spyan 'dren
23b1(rgyud 'grel): shegs su gsol ba ni// bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// rnams kyang rdo rje lta bu'i sgra mnga' ba'o// lus ngag yod gsum nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// 'gro 'dul thugs rdzun byin brlabs bsam mi khyag//
23b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yang // 'dir gshegaso 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhis// sems can nyon mongs gshin rje'i dra ba la// ye shes thugs kyi gshed dang dra ba 'joms// sgo gsung thugs kyi sprul pa
23b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba yis// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed po yang // 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes// na mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas thug pa bzhin// 'gro ba'i las drang nyon mongs mtha' yas lnga// thugs rje'i byin
23b4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs sprul pa mtha' yas kyis// ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'joms mdzad pa// khro bo'i rgyal po yon tan mtha' yas kyang // 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i phyir mchod pa bzhes// sems can dug gsum nad kyis gdungs pa la// thugs/
23b5(rgyud 'grel): rje'i byin parlabs bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa// thabs la mkhas pa mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can ma lus dbyingasu sbyor mdzad pa// khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rtsi thabs sbyor yang // 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes//
23b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam thor gsum gyi mnga' mdzad ye shes stobs// nyon mongs dug gsum ma lus gnod mdzad phyir// phyag mtshan rdo rje tho ba 'bar ba bsnams// mdzes pa'i sku mdog gdul thabs cir yang ston// khro bo'i rgyal po gnod
24a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes stobs po che// 'di gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes// dbyings las mi g.yo 'khor ba'i mtha' mi g.yo// mtha' la mi gnas thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor bar/
24a2(rgyud 'grel): mtha' gcod cing // sems can rnams kyi dpal dang mgon gyur po// khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo mgon po yang // 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes// ye shes thugs kyi 'khor ba'i mtha' yi bar//
24a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje myur bas rta gdong 'phrin las mdzod// 'gro don mdzad pa'i ngo mtshar mnga' ba yang // rtag tu rta mgrin rgyal po gsung du sprul// khro bo'i rgyal po dbang gi rta gdong yang // 'dir gshegs 'gro bI don phyir mchod pa
24a4(rgyud 'grel): byazhes// bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sku// mtha' gnyis ma yengs dbyings la dbang basbyor zhing // thugs rje'i 'phrin las dbyings su 'dus mdzad// sku yi yon tan rdzogs pas dbang phyug che// khyo
24a5(rgyud 'grel): bro'i rgyal po dbang phyug gtum po yang // 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhos// rin chen lo sa grub ri rab ngos bzhi nas// bsod nams tshogs ldan dpal ldan rgyal chen bzhi// gling bzhi gnas pa'i
24a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad la// ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du don mdzad pa'i// dpal ldan rgyal po chen po 'khor bcas kyang // 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes// dus bzhi tshad med bzhi dang mnyam sbyor
24b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// mi 'jigs bzhi ldan ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// mchod pa mang po'i sprin dang bcas nas ni// mchod pa'i lha mo mang po gshegs su gsol// rdo rje dang ni rin chen pad+ma dang // sna tshogs las grub rdo rje rgyu gram 'bar// phyag rgya
24b2(rgyud 'grel): chen pos bdud bzhi g+hi wi mnon// phyogs bzhi'i phyag rgya chen po gshegs su gsol// zhi ba dkar po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma dkar po phyag na dpal be'u bsnams// 'joms byed dkar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams//
24b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs su gsol// lho phyogs rgyas pa ser mo'i dkyil 'khor nas// rgyas pa sngon mo phyag na pad+ma bsnams// 'od ldan mthing ga phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams// gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs su
24b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol// nub phyogs pad+ma dbang gi dkyil 'khor nas// dkar sham du mar mo phyag na gdub bu bsnams// mdangs can dmyar mo phyag na bum pa bsnams// gnyis med/ 'gre'o// byang phyogs phrin las drag po'i dkyil 'khor nas//
24b5(rgyud 'grel): yid gzhungs ljang gu phyag na bud dung bsnams// yid bzangs ljang ser phyag na g.yung drung bsnams// gnyis med6/ phyogs skyong bcud 'jig rten dbang ldan dang // thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam dgyes par che// brgya byin
24b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa yang // 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol// sbyin sreg bdag po dka' thub ral po can// drang srong brtul zhugs spyod pa kun gyi rje// me'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang // bstan po bsrung
25a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i slad du spyan 'dron na// 'gro ba'i don du mchod cod gsheg su gsol// bdud gcod bdud las mnga' mdzad bdud kyi rje// bdud gcod 'chi bdag mang po kun gyi gtso// gshin rje'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang
25a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na// 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegasu gsol// thod rgal 'jigs pa chen po'i skyangs mdzad pa// nad gtong mdangs 'phrog srin po kun gyi rje// srin po'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang //
25a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa/ 'gro ba'i6/ charo sprin lo tog chu la dbang byed pa// lha chen chu lha snyem pa kun gyi rje// chu lha'i rgyal poH/ bstan pa/ 'gro ba'i Ta/ srog 'chang dbugs kyi bdag po dbugs kyi gzungs// srog 'chang rlung lha rigs 'dzin kun gyi
25a4(rgyud 'grel): rjerlung lha rigs 'dzin// bstan pas// 'gro ba'i// nor gyi dbang phyug rin chen gter mnga' ba// gnod sbyin gter 'chang mang po kun gyi rje// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po// bstan pa// 'gro ba'i// bgags la mnga' mdzad dngos grub mchog
25a5(rgyud 'grel): sten pa// log 'dren tshar gcod lha rnams kun gyi rje// bgegs kyi rgyal po// bstan pa// 'gro ba'i// 'od chen 'jig rten gling bzhir snang mdzad pa// gza' skar stong gi lha mang kun gyi rje// lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi rje// bstan pa/
25a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i// sa la mnga' mdzad sa bdag kun gyi rje// sa'i lha mo bstan ma yang // bstan pa/ 'gro ba'i// gnyis med don la rig pa shir mdzad cing // thugs dam rgyud bskul lcags kyu phyogs bcur 'bar// zhi ba bdud bzhi
25b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dul mdzad dkar mo'i sku// 'gro ba'i yon tan rgyas pa gser 'od bod ser 'phro// log 'dren bgegs 'ching zhags pa phyogs bcur 'phen// yon tan tshogs rgyas 'ching byed zhags bla ma// 'gro ba'i// thams cad dbang sdud dmar mo sbya
25b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrog sdom// grub pa bdud cing 'byung po'i tshogs rnams sdom// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i lcags sgrog ma// 'gro ba'i/ sna tshogs las la grub pa'i ljang gu dgyeso// bde gshegs mchod pa'i tshogs mnyes mchod pa'i dril
25b3(rgyud 'grel): bu 'bar// las dang nyon mongs bdud 'dul thal byed ma// 'gro ba'i/ dzaHhUM baM hoHa h+ya hi b+haM ga b+hAn/ ma hA kA ru Na~M ka ya dr-i sh+ya ho// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ badz+ra a~M gu sha dza badz+ra pA sha hUM/ badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ badz+ra g+haN+De ho// de nas gnyis
25b4(rgyud 'grel): su med par bstim pa dang / ye shes dkyil 'khor dbyer med bsres// brten par bzhugasu gsol ba ni/ hUM rin chen sna bzhi grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// ma chags pad+ma 'bum gyi gdan bting ste// rin chen khri dang nyi zla gsal ba'i
25b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan// dngos su 'byor dang yid kyi rnam sprul te// bdag cag dang pa'i yid kyis skyon sprul te// rim bzhin bdi yangs nyid du bzhugasu gsol// badz+ra tiSh+Tha/ phyag btsal ba nA~M/ e ma'o phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thugs ni rab tu rgya che ste//
25b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba kun la khyob mdzad rdo rje rnam 'a joms nyid la phyag 'tshalo// e ma'o// phyogs bcu'i khro bo rgyal ba rnams// nyon mongs dug gsum sdug bsngal gyis// gzir ba'i 'gro ba ma lus pa// phrin las drag po'i dregs pas
26a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dul mdzad pa// phyogs bcu'i khro rgyal rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma'i phyogs bzhi dpal ldan rgyal chen bzhi// srang rtse rin chen mtha' yas nas// dri med bdud rtsis char 'bebs pa'i// phyogs bzhi yon tan/
26a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs la bya'o// e ma'o// phyogs kyi lha mo bkra shis brgyad rnams kyis// thugs mchog 'gro don ma lus bdud las rgyal// thugs rjes dbang bskur chos sgra shes rab thabs// mi mthun phyogs la yon tan bkra shis pa// bkra shrI
26a3(rgyud 'grel): lha mo brgyad la phyag 'tshalo// e ma'o// phyogs bcu 'dul ba'i dbang phyug sku sprul pa// phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams mang po tshar gcod cing // mtho ris gnas nas 'khor lo sgyur mdzad pa// phyogs skyong chen po rnams la phyag 'tshalo//
26a4(rgyud 'grel): e ma'o// tshad med bzhi po mthar phyin lhun grub rtags// phyag rgya bzhi yi ngang du thugs rjes sprul// 'gro drug sems can gnas nas sbrul mdzad pa'i// sgo skyong 'khor dang bcos la phyag 'tshalo// de nas mchod pa lnga phul te/ slob
26a5(rgyud 'grel): ma dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid// cho ga ji ltar 'dod bzhin brtsam// de rjes dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la// bstod pa nyid ni 'di skad dbul// hUM bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms// thugs rje nyi zla'i 'od pas 'tsher// ngan song thams
26a6(rgyud 'grel): cad rnam par sbyong // de nyid sgrib pa sel mdzad pa// pad+ma 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la// shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs ma brgyad// nang gi snying po rdo rje gtso// dpa' bo thub pa bzhugs pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs dang //
26b1(rgyud 'grel): phrin las bzhi yi khyad byar gyi// pad+ma 'khor lor bcas pa la// rol mo'i sil snyan rnams kyis mchod// rol ma' sal snyan rnams kyis mtshang // rin chen stegs bu 'di dag ni// gru bzhir ldan zhing sgo bzhi 'dong // dbus kyi
26b2(rgyud 'grel): pad ma ge sar la// bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms// sku mdog ljang ser 'od zer 'bar// rgya gram phyogs med thugs kar 'dzin// de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul// shAr phyogs gtso bo mtha' yas ni// sku mdog
26b3(rgyud 'grel): mthing kha 'bar ba'i 'od// phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te// rdo rje rtse dgu thugs kar 'dzin// de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul// shar lho khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar// phyag drug mtshon cha sna
26b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs te// rdo rje rgya gram thugs kAr 'dzin// de la 'gre'o// lho phyogs khro bo gnod mdzes ni// sku mdog ser po 'bar ba'i 'od// phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te// rdo rje thob thugs kar 'dzin// do la/ lho nub khro bo mi g.yo
26b5(rgyud 'grel): mgon// sku mdog ljang ku 'bar ba'i 'od// phyag drug/ rdo rje dbyug tho thugs kar 'dzin// de la/ nub phyogs khro bo rta mgrin ni// sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar// pad ma rtsegs pa thugs kar 'dzin// de la/ byang
26b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs gtum po dbang phyug ni// sku mdog smyug nag 'bar ba'i 'od// phyugs// rdo rje rtse dgu thugs kar 'dzin// de la// byang shar gshin rje bshed po ni// sku mdog sngonag 'bar ba'i 'od// phyag/ be con 'bar ba thugs kar
27a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// de la shar phyogs rgyal po yul 'khor srung // sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag mtshan phyag na ne le bsdams// de la// lho phyogs rgyal po phags skyes po// sku mdog ser la 'od zer
27a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar// phyag mtshan phyag na pi wang bsnams// de la// nub phyogs rgyal po spyan mig bzang // sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar// phyag mtshan phyag na chu srin bsnams// de la/ byang phyogs rgyal po rnam thos sras// sku mdog
27a3(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu 'ong 'bar ba// phyag mtshan phyag ni dong tse brtsegs// de l-i// shar phyogs lha mo dkar shAm ma// sku mdog mthing gA 'ong 'bar ma// phyag na bkra shis gdugs 'dzin cang // de la/ shar smad lha mo dbyangs ma ban ma//
27a4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag na bkra shis 'khor lo bsnams// de la// lto stod lha mo mdungs con ma// sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar// phyag na pad ma 'dab brgyad bsnams// de la// lho smad lha mo 'od ldan ma//
27a5(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar// phyag na bkra shis rgyal mtshan bsnams// de la// nub stong lha mo skyes chen ma// sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag na bak+Sha shis bum pa bsnams// de la// nub spyad lha mo dri ma
27a6(rgyud 'grel): med// sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag na yid bzhin nor bu pi snams// de la// byang spyod lha mo yid bzangs ma// sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar// phyag na bkris bung dung bsnams// de la// byang sbrad lha mo yid gzhungs
27b1(rgyud 'grel): ma// sku mdog ljang la 'od zer 'bar// phyag na gser gyi nya mo bsnams// de la// shar phyogs dbang ldan brgya byin ni// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag rdo rje gdengs pa bsnams// de la/ shar lho drang srong me lha ni// sku
27b2(rgyud 'grel): dog dmar la 'od zer 'bar// phya gau na rin chen phreng ba bsnams// de la// lho phyogs gshin rje'i rgyal po ni// sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar// phyag na gshin rje'i dbyug tho bsnams// de la// lho nub srin po badren bral ni// sku
27b3(rgyud 'grel): mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar// phyagra na ral gri rnon po bsnams// de la/ nub phyogs chu lha'i bdag po ni// sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag na klu yi zhugs pa bsnams// de la// nub byang rlung lha dbang ldan ni// sku mdog dud
27b4(rgyud 'grel): kha 'od zer 'bar// phyag na rin chen be tson bsnams// de la// byang phyogs gnod sbyin ku be ra// sku mdog ser po 'od zer 'bar// phyag na gnod sbyin dbyug pa 'dzin// de la// nibyang shar gnod sbyin bge gas kyi bdag/ sku mdog dkar
27b5(rgyud 'grel): ser 'od zer 'bar// phyag na gnod sbyin dbyug pa 'jani// de la/ byang shar dbang ldan bgegs kyi bdag/ sku mdog dkar ser 'od zer 'bar// phyag na tri shul rtse gsum bsnams// steng phyogs nyi zla tshangs pa ni// sku mdog dkar
27b6(rgyud 'grel): la 'od zer 'bar// phyag na ut+pal 'bar ba bsnams// de la// 'og phyogs sa yi lha mo ni// sku mdog ser la 'od zer 'bar// phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams// de la/ shar sgo'i rdo rje lcags kyu ma// sku mdog dkar la 'od
28a1(rgyud 'grel): zer 'bar// phyag mtshan phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// de la// lho sgo rdo rje zhags pa ma// sgyu mdo sngon me 'od zer 'dar// phyag mtshan phyag na zhags pa bsnams// de la/ nub phyogs rdo rje lcags sgrog ma// sku
28a2(rgyud 'grel): mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag mtshan phyag na lcags sgrogs bsnams// de la// byang phyogs rdo rje dz+wal bu ma// sku mchog snang ser 'od zer 'baro// phyag mtshan phyag na dril bu bsnams// de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul//
28a3(rgyud 'grel): de las dbang bskur cho sha las// ji ltar gsungs pa'i dbang rnams sbyin// bzod gsol smon la mau gdab pa nyid// de nas lha rnams so ma yi// thugs ka'i sa bon las bsdus te// gshegs gsol dmigs med rgyas btab la//
28a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas dga' ston dbugs byung ste// rig pa'i las dang gzengs kyang bstod// de nas gtor ma byin brlabs te// mgon po'i kA tor ma btang ba ni// sngags kyi spyan drangs ye shes bzhug/ baM las 'byung ba so so yi// sku mdog phyag mtshan
28a5(rgyud 'grel): so sor dmigs// de nas 'dzab dang bsnyen pa dbul// de yi sngags 'di dag bzlas// rdo rje lce lA y-i dag phyung // e h+ya hi ha na ha na b+hin+da d+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye haM badz+ra na la d+hin+na na maN+Dal bud+d+ha sarba b+hasmi ku ru sarba duSh+TiM hUM phaT/ oM
28a6(rgyud 'grel): e h+ye hi badz+ra sA la dar+dz+dza ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM e t+yai badz+ra ki ri ti staM rak+Sha sa d+he pa ta ye swA hA/ oM e h+ye hi nA ga badz+ra A na ya sarba d+ha na d+ha n+ya/ sarba na ma ni/ mu ga ta laM ka ra d+ha sarba nA ga na ra ni tsa/ badz+ra d+ha ra ya/ sa ma yA ma nu sma ra a ga d+ha a ga/
28b1(rgyud 'grel): d+he/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hA ra hA ra/ sran Na mahAts+tshed hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hI badz+rA a ni la ma hA be ga/ A na ya sar+b+ba dush+tsa hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hI ku be ra yak+ShAM d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ oM e h+ye hi d+hI d+hA b+hin badz+ra shU la swA hA/ oM h+ye hi na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA rna oM prad+ha/
28b2(rgyud 'grel): b+hU swA hA/ oM e h+ye hi nA maHsa mAn+ta bud+d+ha naM/ he shor+ya pra to dz+yo ti ra ma ya swA hA// lha rnams so so'i phyag rgya yis// mchod yon la sogs gtor ma la// sngags ni bdud tsam ga cig dag gis// nges par dbul dang btab par
28b3(rgyud 'grel): byo'o// de nas mgon po mnyes pa yi// tshig 'di rnams kyang brjod par bya'o// hUM lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul// nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po// dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang // gang dag sa la
28b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas po yang // bdag gi pus mo sau la btsugs nas su// thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol ba 'debs// gsan nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir spyon cig/ dbang
28b5(rgyud 'grel): po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshalo// me ste sreg bya za ba'i lha/ 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shar lho/ mchod par/
28b6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje be con 'chung ba'i lha// ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdog/ lho phyogs// mchod par/ bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha// srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ lho nub/ mchod par/ zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha// klu yi
29a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ nub/ mchod par/ rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha// rigs 'dzin rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ nub byang / mchod par/ gnod sbyin lag na dbyug tho thogs// nor srung rgyal po gdon gyi bdag//
29a2(rgyud 'grel): byung / mchod par/ dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha// bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ byang shur/ mchod par/ steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang / nyi ma zla ba gze' chen po// gza' dang rgyu skar bcas bya la// mchod par
29a3(rgyud 'grel): 'og gi klu ste sa yi lha// sa 'dzin lag pa chen po ste// dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la// mchod par/ shar gyi phyogs nas brgya byin 'khor dang bcas// gtor ma phul ba 'di dag baM zhes su gsol// me dang
29a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje bden bral sran po'i bdag/ chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang // dbang ldan 'byung po'i bdag po lha dang ni// steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang // lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang // ri yi lha rnams
29a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin tshegs dang bcas// so so so sor phul ba 'di drug kun// so so so so'i phyog su bzhis nas kyang // sde dang dpung btsas bu smad 'khor dang bcas dang // gtor ma bdug pa me tog bdug spos rnams// rab tu
29a6(rgyud 'grel): dgyes nas bzhes te bsnams nas gsol// de nas 'byung po bgegs la yang // gtor ma dag ni sbyin par bya// hUM 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng na gnas pa dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi yul gnas dang // shar
29b1(rgyud 'grel): nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim gnas dang // ri rnams kun la gang dag gnas pa dang // chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang // rin chen gnas na gang dag gnas pa dang // rdzing dang mtsho dang lu ma lteng ka dang // khron pa dang ni
29b2(rgyud 'grel): ngam 'brog chu mig dang // grong dang phyugs lngas grong khyer nags tshal dang // khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang // gang dag gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten dang // mu stegs spyi gnas drang srong sde gnas dang // gtsug
29b3(rgyud 'grel): lag khang chu glang chen khang pa dang // rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang // srang dang khyams dang grong gi mdun sa dang // gang dag lam chen dang ne shI gcig dang // dur khrod dag dang nags tshal chen po dang //
29b4(rgyud 'grel): steng ge glang chen dred kyi gnas rnams dang // dgron pa nags chen rab tu 'jigs pa dang // gling ma bzang po dag na gang gnas dang // rab tu dgyes shing go go gnas rnams su// me tog phreng ba byug spos bdug pa dang /
29b5(rgyud 'grel): stod dang mar me gtor ma gus 'bul bas// 'di dag bzhes nas so sor gnas nas gsol// bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de nas rig drug so so'i gtor ma btang // dbang rdzogs bkru shis smon laM
29b6(rgyud 'grel): gdab// dkyil 'khor bsdu ba mkhas pas brtsam// khrus kyi cho ga ji lta bar// khrus byas rol mo'i las bya'o// rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
30a1(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu mchi// sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rje yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyi bzung // sangs rgyas chos dang
30a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mchog la// byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi// rang gzhan de na ni rab sgrub phyir// byang chub sems ni bsnyed bgyis nas// sems can thams cad bdag gi mgron du gnyer// byang chub spyod mchog dag gis spyad par
30a3(rgyud 'grel): bgyis// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ bum pa slob ma lhag gnas byi// maN+Dal dgra la rnam lngas byugs// de nas me tog rnam lnga dgod// mchod dang 'byung po gter ma baM shom// rin chen bum pa bco lnga
30a4(rgyud 'grel): blugs// gang yin mtshan bris ras mgul cing // dri zhim 'bras bcas shing gis brgyano// baM las rin chen bum pa bsam// de mgron nyi zla rang sngags bsam// de las 'od 'phros bdud rtsi gzhug/ de nas ci rigs par ni ban+d+ha/
30a5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma khrus byas bshags sogs bya// de ni lhag par gnas pa'o// zhag gi don ni 'di lta ste// maN+Dal byugs la mchod pa dang // gtor ma bsham pa snga ma bzhin// de nas maN+Dal dag la ni// lha gang yin pa'i mtshan ma dgod//
