30a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid bskyed nas dkyil 'khor mtshon// gang yin lha ru bskyed par bya// de la mchod dang bstod pa bya// de nas sngags kyang ci rigs bzlas// de nas bum pa gong bzhin no// de nas slob ma khrus byas la// rigs mthun dar gyi gdong yang gdag
30b1(rgyud 'grel): slob pon la ni phyag kyang bya// yol ba'i nang du rdo rje dang // de la me tog gtor du gzhug/ gdong g.yogs dkrol la chu dbang bskur// de nas sngags dang bsgom pa'i lung // byin la mchod dang gtor ma btang // lha gshegs mtshan
30b2(rgyud 'grel): ma bsdu bar bya// de ni sku yi dbang bskuro// pad+ma badz+ra bdag gis mdzad/ rdzogs so// / rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo// dam tshig spyod pa'i nges pas ni// mi smra ba dang mi bya nyid//
30b3(rgyud 'grel): smra ba dang ni de bzhin mchod// tshim bya yid la rnam par bsgom// mkhas pas bsad bya rmongs bya nyid// brgyad po 'di dag bsrung byas na// dam tshig tu ni yongasu grogs// ci zhig smra zhe na ni// sngags dang rgyud kyi rang bzhin dang // dam
30b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig spyod dang 'dre ba dang // brdzun du smyo ba rtsub pa'i tshig/ 'khyal tshig gang yang sgyu mi bya// ci zhig mi bya zhe na/ phra ma srog chags 'tshe ba dang // gtam gzhan rnams ni brnyas pa dang // rgyu dang phrag dog nga rgyal dang // rku dang g.yo ni bya ba
30b5(rgyud 'grel): yin// ci zhig smra bar bya zhe na// rang sdigs sngags kyi nor bu dang // chang dang rdzas kyi 'dra ba dang // bdon dngos spyod dang grolnga dang // dngos grub mtshan ma sba bar bya// ci zhig mchod par bya zhe ni// byis pa nad pa nad med rgyun// dman dang mgron
30b6(rgyud 'grel): me dasnad pa dang // bsnyen gnas dka' thub kyis nyon mongs// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dag kyang mchod// ci zhig tshim par bya zhe na// skyob dpon med dang pha ma dang // lnga dang zhing gi bdag po dang // dur khrod pa mi 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro/
31a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams tshim par bya// ci zhig bsgom par bya zhe na// dkon mchog gsum dang de bzhin bdag/ phyag rgya ye shes rang gi ngos// cha bcas pa dang cha med pa// bla ma sngags kyang bsgom par bya// ci zhig gzhom par bya zhe na//
31a2(rgyud 'grel): chags dang gti mug de bzhin sman// le lo de bzhin mi dga' dang // dad pa med dang de bzhin brkam// dbang po'i gdon yang gzhom par bya// ci zhig rmongs par bya zhe na// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang // sdang dang blo ma can
31a3(rgyud 'grel): dang gdug// rgyal po 'khor dang sdig can dang // mi bsrun dag kyang rmongs par bya// dam tshig 'di dag bsrung bar bya// bsrungs nas dngos grub gter bar byed// dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa ni// khyod kyi rtag tu bsrung bar bya// rdo rje dril bu'i
31a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang // byang chub sems kyang btang mi bya// gnod par byed la byang sems bskyed// rdo rje'i dbun la bsnyen bkur bya// dad pa med pa rab tu rmod// slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya// zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te// bla ma la ni yang
31a5(rgyud 'grel): yang 'bul// dngos po'i khyad par gang dang gang // mnyes phyir dri la dbul bar bya// de bzhin bza' ba'i bye brag rnams// 'phangs pa med par dbul bar bya// gal te de la brnyas gyur na// sangs rgyas thams cad brnyas dang mtshungs//
31a6(rgyud 'grel): dus min 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni// glen pa dgra dang rkun po dang // de bzhin gdon dong rims kyis thebs// rgyal po'i tshad dang phra man dang // me dang chu dang stag dang dug/ bsad nas sems can dmyal bar ltung // sems ni khro bar mi bya zhing //
31b1(rgyud 'grel): nam yang shes rab nyams mi bya// rtag tu khyod ni da ltar bsrungs// zhes brjod par bya'o// slob dpon pad+mas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo// khro ba
31b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par dkyil 'khor bzhengs te/ thog mar sa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin rdzogs par byas la/ de nas sta gon gyi cho ga ji ltar
31b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs par byas la// de nas thig dang tshon gyi cho ga ma nor bar// rdzogs par byas la bum pa dgu la lha so so'i mtshan ma gdab/ dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa ser po bri/ lte ba ljang gu/ rtsibs 'chan dmar po mu khyud dkar po la
31b4(rgyud 'grel): rdorje ra ba nag por bya'o// gru chang ljang gur bya// sgo rigs dang 'dra ba la me ri dang // rdo rje'i ra ba mdzes pas bskor ba bri bar bya'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i mtshan ma bI// rtsibs la khro bo brgyad kyi mtshan
31b5(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// gro rims mi nor bar bri bar bya'o// de nas bum pa rnams lha so so'i gnas su bzhag/ ste mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// so so'i bum pa la khro bo so so'i phyag rgya bcing / spyan drungs la sngags kyi gnyisu med par bstims la//
31b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas ye shes sems dpa' dang gonyi su med par bsre bar byas la de dag gi sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan dkyil 'khor gyi bi d+hi nas 'byung ba bzhin gsal bar bya'o// lha so so'i thugs ka nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng na
32a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyi bar na sngags so so'i rang sgra dang bcas pas dmigs la dbus kyi gtso bo rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa/ shar mtha' yas/ shar lho bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/ lho gnang
32a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ lho nub du khro bo mngon mtho/ nub du rta mgrin/ nub byung du gzhan+ti myi thub pa/ byang du gtum po/ byang shar du gshIn rje/ sgo rnamasu sgom gzhan dang 'dra'o// de ltar so sor bum pa'i nang du gsal bar bskyed la// sgrub pa
32a3(rgyud 'grel): bo bdag nyid kyis khrus byas gos sar pa gyon la nye reg dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa byas la bzlas pa la 'jog par bya'o// lha so so'i thugs ki'i nyi zla'i bar gyi sngags kyi rang sgra dang // bdag nyid kyis brjod pa'i sgo dang 'khor bar
32a4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs te bzlaso// na mau rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA ba ta ye/ oM ma tha ma tha badz+ra hUM phaT/ A~M d+hu na d+hu na badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM da hA da hA badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa ba tsa badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM d+hA ra d+hA ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM d+ha ra ya d+ha/
32a5(rgyud 'grel): ra ya badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM d+hA ru na d+ha ru na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM ts+tshin dats+tshin da badz+ra hUM phaT/ tse buM pa re re la stong phrag re bzlas te/ brgya brgya'i bar du pU dza lnga lnga dbu'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi lha 'od du zhu chu dang gnyis su med pa re bsre bar bya'i// de nyid las 'od
32a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas rang gzhan gyi don rdzogs pa'o// de nas dbang bskur ba'i cho ga nas 'byung ba bzhin du bskur ro// bkra shis gsol/ bgegs rnams las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir chus brab pa dang / rma bya'i sgros byab pa dang / me long gis phye ba dang /
32b1(rgyud 'grel): dur bas brdeg par bya'o// sarba gra he swA hA/ sarba dung sra ba swA hA/ sarba dz+wA ra swA hA/ sarba b+hi kalpa swA hA/ sarba dz+wa re swA hA/ de ltar 'di dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur nas nad dang gdon la sogs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyu ro// khro bo brgyad kyi
32b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad kyi rgyud la brten nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur
32b3(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dod pas sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par lha mo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te/ sa mchog dang sta gon la sogs pa rdzogs par bya ste/ stegs bu gru bzhi tshad dang ldan pa la thig btab la// tshon dargya
32b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po la lte ba sngon po pad ma bcas pa mu khyud ser po la// a dkar po bskor ba khyams dang / sgo rigs dang 'dra ba bri ba'o// bum pa dgu rgyan rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa la gtso bo nas brtsams te/
32b5(rgyud 'grel): lha so so'i phyag mtshan gur kum dang mtshal bsres la gdab bo// sgo bzhi la seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi btsugs la dar leb rgan gyi cod pan gdag so// de nas lha mo dang gtso bo dang de dag so so'i sngags dang / phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
32b6(rgyud 'grel): nas 'byung ba bzhin/ spyan drangs la so so'i bum pa'i nang du bzhugasu gsol te/ lte ba'i bum pa las rdo rje rnam 'joms sku mdog sngon po phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar bum pa 'dzin pa/ bum pa'i kha sna tshogs rdo rjes bcad pa/ sku
33a1(rgyud 'grel): la rat+na'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ dbu la don yod grub pas brgyan par bsgom/ shar du pad+ma la mu tig dkar pos phyag gnyis thugs kar dpal be'u 'dzin pa'o// shar lhor 'joms byed dkar mo 'khor
33a2(rgyud 'grel): lo bsnams pa'o// lhor rgyas po sngon mo phyag gnyis pad+ma bsnams pa'o// lho nub tu rnam rgyal sngon po phyag gnyis stag gi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// nub tu lha mo dkar sham dmar mo phyag gnyis gdugs 'dzin pa'o// nub byang du
33a3(rgyud 'grel): mdangs can dmar mo phyag gnyis gser gyi bum pa 'dzin pa'o// byang du yid gzhungs ma ldangs ser phyag na dung bsnams pa'o// byang shar du yid bzangs ma ljang ser phyag gnyis na g.yung drung 'khyil pa bsnams pa'o// lha mo de dag kyang
33a4(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa'o// dbu la don yod grub pa 'am rnam 'joms kyis brgyan pa'o// las dang rdo rje nges par rdzogs pa rnams rnam par bsgom par bya'o// de nas de dag gi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du A li'i
33a5(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba las so so'i sngags kyi rang sgras drag par dmigs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin du so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa la
33a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa byas la// de nas bdag nyid khrus byas la/ gos sar pa gyon te bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o// de yang bum par lha so so'i thugs ka'i sngags kyi rang sgra dang / phyi rol du 'byung ba sna tshogs pa'i rang sgra dang / bdag nyid kyis brjod
33b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang sgra dang gsum la dmigs la// oM ma ti s+thi ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM su ti s+thi ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM pra tis+thi ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM a pra ti badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM a mo g+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM e hi badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM shI g+h+raM badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM d+ha sa byA badz+ra hUM phaT/
33b2(rgyud 'grel): ces bum pa re la brgya rtsa brgyad phul te/ mchod pa lnga'i rdzas rdo rje'i chus bsang gtor byas te dbul ba dang / gtso bo dang lha mo brgyad spyan drang ba dang / bzhugs su gsol ba dang / phyag pa tsal ba dang / bstod pa bya'o// de ltar rdzogs nas
33b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyong rnams dang bgegs rnams kyi gtor ma btang bstod par bya ste/ rnam par rjes su dran par bya'o// de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / rdo rje dril bu dang / chu dang / cod pan la sogs pa'i dbang skur la/ bA li sgra sna tsho
33b4(rgyud 'grel): pas btang ngo // de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu/ bkra shis gsol/ bla mr-i la yon dbul lo// lha mo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
33b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po/ dam tshig dang ldan pas sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bya/
33b6(rgyud 'grel): sa stegs gru gsum me long gi ngos ltar byas la/ thig gdab ste dbus lte ba mu khyud kyis bskor la lte ba ljang gu mu khyud dmar po sna tshogs pad+mas bskor ba/ gru chad ljang gu bar khyams gnyis pa dkar ser sgo dang / sgo khyad du
34a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bris la/ mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa ldan pa'i bum pa la sbyin haM gi mtshan rdo rje rgyu gram phyogs gcig med pa btab la las thams cad pa'i bum pa lha sku dkar gyi sna tshogs rdo rje bris la byang du bzhag
34a2(rgyud 'grel): pU dza ji ltar 'byor pa dang bA li ba sham/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje btsongs la mthe bong bsgrengs la srin lag sbyar te mdzub mo phyis nas/ nas gang gi ma reg pa byas la mthe'u chung blang la// oM badz+ra dz+wa lA na ye hUM phaT/ ces pa brgya rtswa brgyad
34a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pas bum pa'i nang du baM dang maM las pad ma nyi ma brtseg pa'i steng du hUM las rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang ser phyag gnyis kyi gser gyi bu mo pa rdo rje rgya gram phyogs gcig med pas kha bcad pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/ sku
34a4(rgyud 'grel): la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa/ zhal yid tsam khro ba yan lag sbrul rigs bzhis brgyan pa bskyed do// de'i thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas nas/ oM badz+ra dz+nyA na
34a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA hUM zhes brjod pas ye shes sems dpa' ci 'dra ba zla ba'i gdun lo bskyed pa de nyid la mchod pa dang gtor ma bya'o// de'i thugs ka'i hUM la dmyigs te/ bdag nyid khrus bya ba dang / gos rje ba la sogs pa bya ste/ snying po brgya rtsa brgyad
34a6(rgyud 'grel): baMs+t+waMs pi la stong phrag gcig shin tu bsdus pa la stong phrag bzlas te/ slob mo la bsrung skud gdags pa dang / dam tshig sdom po 'bogs pa la sogs pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug/ gzungs nyi shu rtsa gcig klag tu gzhug/ de nas
34b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ dbugs 'byung / gzengs bstod/ dbang bskur/ lag tu rdo rje dang dril bu'i sgras dkyil 'khor bskor/ dbang rdzogs par byin la gos rje zas kyi rnal 'byor bya'o// de yang mchod pa dbul ba dang gtor ma btang / dkyil 'khor bsdu/
34b2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis gsol/ slob ma la chos bshad/ slob mas bla ma la yon dbul/ bden pa'i tshig brjod do// dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i bdud rtsi bum pa'i cho ga dpal mer me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
34b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yab yum gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par sa'i cho ga la
34b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa sngon du song bas dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yab yum gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te/ sa stegs gru bzhi pa me long gi ngos ltar byas la thig btab la tshon dgye ste/ dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa dkar po// mu khyud ser po
34b5(rgyud 'grel): mdung rtse gsum pas bskor ba de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug pa dmar po mu khyud ser po/ phur bus bskor ba gru ched ljang gu mu khyud dang bcas pa thA moM me ris bskor ba/ grwa rnams su bum pa bzang po bri bar bya'o// de ltar bris la dkyil 'khor
34b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi tha ma rnam su shu gu brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bskor ba gzugaso// de dag kyang ras kyi skud pa sgril mas sbrel lo// mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa gnyis la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'khor lo dang pad+ma'i steng du bzhag go//
35a1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa gnyis la yang dar tshon sna lngas sbrel lo// ku khyor gyi kha ra khor yug tu r+dz+dza ku sha gsar pa bting ba'i steng du spos chu dang ma'i chus bsang bar bya'o// de nas khrus kyi cho ga nas byung ba bzhin du nye reg dang
35a2(rgyud 'grel): 'thor 'thung la sogs pa byas bdag nyid lag pa ge k+sha/ dz+dza skyong du sbyar mthe bong gnyis bslang la mthi'u chung nang du bsgyu ma la/ oM madz+dza yak+Sha sa~M nA pA t+yA ye badz+nyA pa Ni hUM phaT/ ces brgyad brjod pas rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog
35a3(rgyud 'grel): ser po rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa dar gyi cod pan dang / mu ta~M bas brgyan pa/ dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi sa brgyan pa/ thugs khi nas khro chung mo ltar 'bar ba/ dpag tu med pa 'phro ba yib zhal bskyung ljags 'gyub
35a4(rgyud 'grel): drug g.yas bum pa'i steng na khro bo'i zhal gnyis phyung ba/ g.yon rdo rje dang lcags kyu lhan cig tu 'dzin pa bskyed do// de nas log pa'i sor mo bsnol srin lag gnyis bsgrengs la mthe bong dang / mdzub mo gnyis sbyar la/
35a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra dA ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT ces brjod pas yum lu gu rgyud ma sku mdog dmar mo rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa g.yas lcags sgrog rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa bsnams te yab la 'khyud pa/ g.yon bdud rtsi'i bum pas
35a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyuD+yan+ya 'bebs bi yab kyi bum pa dang gnyis med du bskyed do// de nis sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pa bzhis phyogs bzhi nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas pa bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i don du gtor ma re re btang / de nas yab yum
35b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi ye shes sems dpa' la dmigs la shug pa re la rgyud re bstan la/ g.yas nas gcig gcig la bskor la de ltar bzhi rdzogs pa dang re re la dbang du gyur pa'i spyan sreg bya'o// de'i du ba la slob ma bdugs te khrus re yang bya'o// de nas
35b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang lugs bzhin bskur ro// gtor ma btang dkyil 'khor bsdu/ bkra shis gso/ khrus re yang bya'o// slob mas bla ma la yon dbul lo// yab yum gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba bde sbyin dam pa zhes bya ba dpal maur me mdzad kyi
35b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs kyi khro bo bdag bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i gang zag sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid
35b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun par rigs kyi khro bo bzhi'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas/ dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa rab tu mnyam pa la thig dang tshon gyi lugs bzhin byas la/ dbus su gru gsum nag po la zla gam dmar po mu khyud
35b5(rgyud 'grel): ljang gus bskor ba 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi pa ser po 'chan dmar po mu khyud dkar po sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra bas bskor ba/ sgo bzhi rigs dang mthun pa/ khyams dang 'dod yon gyis mdzes par byas la mu khyud dang me ri dang / thod skam dang rdo rje'i ra bas
35b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par byas pa bris la/ lha so so'i mtshan ma gdab bo// de nas 'am pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa lnga la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi phyag rgya bsangs la gtso bo dang khro bo bzhi'i mtshan mas btab la lha so so'i gnasu bzhag go// shing
36a1(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa can la byas pa'i phur bu bzhi la dang mthing nag gi cod pan gdags/ oM trA sa ya trA sa ya badz+ra kI li kI la yA swA hA/ zhes shar sgor btsugs la rdo rje rigs kyi las thams cad pa'i khro bor bskyed do// oM ts+tshin
36a2(rgyud 'grel): dats+tshin da ma hA ki li kI la ya swA hA/ zhes pas phur bu gcig lho sgor 'dzugs la rin po che'i rigs kyi las thams cad pa'i khro bor bskyed do// oM tsu ru tsu ru tsan dA li kI li kI la ya swA hA zhes pas pad+ma'i rigs kyi las thams cad po'i khro bor
36a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa nub sgor gzugaso// oM b+han d+ha b+han d+ha kro d+ha kI li kI la swA hA/ bang sgor btsugs la las kyi rigs thams cad pa'i khro bor bskyed do// dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhi la gtor ma sha sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa bzhi bzhag/ gzhan yang
36a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i bye brag ji ltar 'byor pa bsham/ phyogs skyong ba dang bgegs la sogs pa'i gtor ma btang zhing bar chad bsal ba'i sbyor ba bya'o// de nas sngags pa bdag nyid kyis bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor bsangs
36a5(rgyud 'grel): te lag pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa ltar bya ste/ g.yon 'khor lo'i snod thugs kar 'dzin par byas la shar gyi bum pa la dmigs te/ oM trA sa ya trA sa ya badz+ra kI li kI la ya swA hA/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas/ khro bo badz+ra kI li kI la ya
36a6(rgyud 'grel): mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa gdengs pa 'phyar po/ g.yon pa 'khor los mtshan pa'i thod pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/ ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil ba thod pa dang sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ rigs lngas
36b1(rgyud 'grel): dbu brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa zhal bskrad pa/ zhing chen gyi yol bas bskor ba la dar nag gi 'phur lces brgyan pa/ stag dang gzigs dang gcan zan sna tshogs pas sku smad brgyan pa bum par bskyed do// lho phyogs kyi bum pa la dmi
36b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ oM tshin nga tshonA da ma hA kI li kI la ye swA hA/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas kI la ya ser nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gA yas rin po che'i snye ma 'adz+rI ga g.yon phur bu thugs kar 'gril ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa snga ma bzhi
36b3(rgyud 'grel): du bskyed do// nub kyi bum pa dmigs la g.yas pa sdong po ltar byas la g.yon phu ra pa ltar byas la/ oM tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da li kI li kI la ya swA hA/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas dmar po kI li kI la ya dmar nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis
36b4(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yos me 'bar ba/ g.yon phur bu thugs kar 'grel ba/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa snga ma bzhin du bskyod do// byang du g.yas rin po che'i dbyug tho 'phyar ba ltar byas la g.yon phur pa ltar byas la/ oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha kro d+ha kI la~M kI la
36b5(rgyud 'grel): ya swA hA/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas gtum po kI la ya mdog ljang nag g.yas rin po che'i dbyug to thod pas mtshan pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon phur bu thugs kAr 'dzin pa snga ma dang 'dra ba bskyed do// dbus suM rdo rje rnam par 'jom
36b6(rgyud 'grel): pa sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas 'khor lo g.yon phur bu bsnams pa// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ oM na ma sh+tsAN+Da badz+ra kro d+hA ya swA hA bskyed do// de nas smr-i so so'i sems dpa' spyan drangs te/
37a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par bstims la ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje kha gyes pa'i buM pa hUM/ de la so so'i sngags kyis bskor ba'i rang sgra la dmigs la bzlas pa tsam par bya'o//
37a2(rgyud 'grel): oM na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hUM phaT tsas bum pa rer-I la stong phrag gsum bzlas te/ brgya bi n+ya'i bar du pu dza dbul lo// de ltar rdzogs nas slob ma la las kyi bum pa'i khrus nas bton/
37a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ gos gsar pa gon la phreng ba dang me tog bzung la dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / me tog gang la phog pa'i lha ngos bstan pa dang / dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas gtor ma sil snyan sna tshogs pa dang bcas pas nags tshal gyi
37a4(rgyud 'grel): gling du bsgral lo// de nas slob ma'i don du drag shul spyod pa'i sbyin sreg lan bdun bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu/ bkra shis gsol/ sbyin sreg thal bas mnan las byas la sbyar/ bla ma la yon dbul tshogs ji ltar rig pa bas Da/
37a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa ji ltar bya ba'i lung bstan pa bzlas pa la dus thams cad du brtson par bya/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo yang mgul du gdugs so// bdud rtsi thabs sbyor zhes bya ba khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dpung bskur ba'i cho ga zab mo dpal
37a6(rgyud 'grel): mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / da la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo// sgo ma bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gnas yid
37b1(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun par sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas sgom bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs te/ sa stegs dkyil 'khor gru gsum mnyam zhing chags kyis 'thas par byas te thig btab la tshon dgye ste/ dbus pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa ste/
37b2(rgyud 'grel): lte ba ljang gu pad+ma rigs kyi mdog lte ba'i mu khyud nag po rdo rje ra byA dkar pos bskor ba/ gong ras dmar po mu khyud ser po sna tshogs pad mas mtshan pa/ sgo bzhi rta babs su yod pa bris la/ mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum bA lU la
37b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lha so so'i mtshan ma btab la so'i gnas su bzhag/ sgo bzhir phur bu bzhi la dar leb rgan gyi cod pan btags la gzugs/ de yang ras kyi skud pa la rma bya'i mdongs kyis sbrel lo// pU dza'i bye
37b4(rgyud 'grel): brag lnga lnga bsham phyogs sbyong ba'i gtor ma'i tshogs legs par bshams la/ de nas dbus kyi bum pa la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sku mdog ljang gu rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de nyid kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs
37b5(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs su gsol pa dang / de nas lcags kyu dang zhugs pa dang / lcags sgrog dang dril bu'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badz+ra aM ku sha swA hA/ oM badz+ra pA shaM swA hA/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta swA hA/ oM badz+ra g+haNAM swA hA/ zhes so so'i bum pa
37b6(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod pas shar phyogs kyi bum par pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du/ dza las lha mo mdog dkar mo'i lag na lcags kyu thogs pa zhal bag tsam khro ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa skra ser po gyen la rjes pa/
38a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan dmar ba bskyed do// sbyor hUM las lham skyer mo rgyun sna tshags pas brgyan pa/ phyag na rdo rje zhags pa rtse gsum pas mtshan pa rdzogs pas brgyan pa bskyed do// nub tu baM las lha mo dmar mo phyag na
38a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog nyi zlas mtshon pa bskyed do// byang du hoHlas lha mo ljang ser la gI na dril bu dkrol ba bskyed la de dag gi snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du so so'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ ye shes sems
38a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i snying gar so so'i sa bon la so so'i sngags kyi phreng bas bskor ba'i sngags kyi rang sgra la dmigs te/ bdag nyid kyis khrus byas la bzlas pa bya'o// oM dzi ye swA hA/ bi dza ye swA hA/ oM a dzi to swA hA/ oM dz+wa la swA hA/ zhes so so'i
38a4(rgyud 'grel): bum pa la dmigs te/ khri phrag re bzlas te stong gi mchod pa dbul/ spyan drang ba dang bzhugs su gsol pa dang / phyag btsal ba dang bstod par bya/ de ltar bzlas pa byas la lha so so'i 'od du bzhu/ chu bdud tsar gyur pa las lha grangs med pa
38a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pa las/ phyi nang gi dbang bdag la bskur ba las de dmigs la de nas slob ma bskyed pa la sogs pa byas la dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas pa li btang / bkra shis gsol/ dkyil 'khor bsdu// slob
38a6(rgyud 'grel): mas bla ma la yon dbul/ sgom bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bsgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ rin po che dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dpal mor mi mdzad kyis mdzad po rdzogs so//
38b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gnas khang yid dang mthun par sa'i cho ga rnams rdzogs par byas la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi
38b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzhengs la/ sa stegs gru gsum mnyam zhing chags kyis 'thas par bya zhing / de nas thig le rtse dgur btab la ling rtse lnga pa gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ dbus kyi ling tse dkar po shar ljang lho nag po/ nu bo dmar po byang ser po de'i bar
38b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsig pa sngon po la gser gyi dong tse brtsegs pa/ grwa rnams su bum pa dmar po dpag bsam gyi shing dang / nor bu'i nang na chu bab pa bri gru'i dum bu ljang gur bya/ sgo rigs dang 'dra ba bris li bum pa lnga la sogs sku mdog mthun pa'i
38b4(rgyud 'grel): tshon gyis bsgyur la/ so so'i phyag mtshan btab la so so'i gnas su bzhag lA skud bya ston dmar gyis sgyel la/ phyogs mchim su me long gi phreng ba dang / dar stu dang / dril bu g.yer ga'i dra bas bres so// steng nas ras dkar po'i gdu
38b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bkab la/ rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan par bya'o// shog bu la rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gzugs bris la mdo' la btaDa la gsu gzugs so// de nas bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas la dbus kyi bum pa la dpal rdo rje rnam
38b6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms sku mdog dkar por bsgyur te bum pa'i phyag rgyas spyan drangs te sngogs brgya rtsa brgyad brjod la pU dza la sogs rdzogs par dbul/ de nas shar phyogs kyi bum par rA dza yul 'khor bsrung spyan drangs te/ lag pa g.yon pa pi
39a1(rgyud 'grel): thang len pa ltar byas la oM d+hi swA hA/ zhes brgya brjod pas bum pa'i nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du/ yul 'khor srungs ljang gu rin po che'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa/ dar gyi
39a2(rgyud 'grel): lta ba lbu ba dang bse'i rlog zhu gsol ba/ phyag g.yas pa pi wang 'dzani pa g.yon gyis len pa bskyed do// lho'i bum par 'phags skas po spyan drangs te/ bskyed pa ni lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gung mo dang sbyar to bsgrengs la/
39a3(rgyud 'grel): oM bI swA hA/ zhes brgya brjod pas 'phags skye sgo sku mdog nag po dar gyi lhab lhub dang rin po che dang bse'i rmog zhu gsol ba/ phyag na ral gri bsnams pa snga ma bzhin du bskyed do// nub kyi bum par spyan mi bzong spyan drangs te bskyed
39a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni g.yon pa'i mdzub mo zhags pa ltar bya ste/ oM rak+Sha swA hA/ zhes pa brgya brjod pas spyan mi bzang sku mdog dmar po dar la sogs pas brgyan pa/ sbrul mgro bdun gyis bskor ba la spyan dmar ba la 'bur ba// phyag na chu
39a5(rgyud 'grel): srin dang zhags pa bsnams pa bskyed do// byang gi bum pa la rnam thos sras spyan drangs te bskyed pa ni/ lag pa gnyis kyis mthe bong gze mo'i rna ba ltar byas la/ oM bai swA hA/ zhes brgya brjod pas rnam sras mdog ser po gser bco
39a6(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dra ba dar la sogs pas brgyan pa phyag na ne'u le'i brgyal pa gser gyi dong tses bskang po bskyed do// de nas sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyis khrus byas la/ gos gsar pa gyon te/ bzlas pa bya ba ni lha de dag gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor
39b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi sngags kyi rang sgra la sogs pa dmigs shing / oM tsa ra ni tsa ra/ oM hA ra ha ra/ oM sa ra sa ra swA hA/ oM mA ra ya swA hA/ oM bi dA ra ya swA hA/ zhes bum pa re la khri phrag re so so'i las kyi sngags bzlas shing de nyid mchod pa la
39b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bya ste dbang bskur ba ltar dbang bskuro// gtor ma btang ba la sogs pa spyir 'dra'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
39b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs skyong bcu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par phyogs skyong ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bzhed te/
39b4(rgyud 'grel): sa'i cho ga la sogs pa dbang bskur ba bzhin byas la dkyil 'khor gru gsum shin tu mnyam zhing legs par bcas la thAg btab ste dbus su gru bzhi pa dmar por bya'o// de'i phyi rol du snam bu gru bzhi pa rin po che'i khang bu bcu dang
39b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bri'o// sgo ni rigs dang mthun par bris la bum pa bcu gcig rgyan rnams kyis brgyanA la lha so so'i gnasu bzhag ste/ bcu po'i mgul par dar sna tshogs pas sbrel rma bya dang me long gis blo'o// gtso bo'i bum pa la gzungs
39b6(rgyud 'grel): thag bzhi btags la/ dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi rdo rje bzhi la stod la bzhag go// dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rnams su ho bcu btsugs la bgegs rnams kyi ming byang dang bcas pa bya ste/ ci rigs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// mchod pa'i bye brag
40a1(rgyud 'grel): ci 'byor pa dang / rab tu gtsang ma'i byA ling chen po bcu gcig dkyil 'khor gyi thA mA bskor la bzha go// tor ma de dag re re la lbu ba shos dang mar me dang spos dang / shog shog gi gdugs re dang / dar dmar po'i bdun
40a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / rma bya'i rgyal mtshon dang / seng ge re gzugs so// zhi ba dang rgyas pa dbang dang drag shul gyi snying po ltar rigs bya mtha' brten par bya ste/ de nas bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas la dbus su rdo rje rnam 'jom
40a3(rgyud 'grel): b+hu mdog dmar por bsgyur la ba'o// de yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis spyan drang ngo // de nas phyog skyong ba so so'i t+yab rdzas po sa dzum par spyan drangs te go rims kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM I swA hA/ oM a~M swA hA/ oM sa
40a4(rgyud 'grel): oM ri swA hA/ oM ya~M swA hA/ oM b+hu rA dA/ a b+h+ya swA hA/ oM idi swA d+hA/ oM oM swA hA/ de dag gi mtha' sang dza dang duM dong phaT dang s+thA/ de bzhi ni rgyas kyi dbye'o// de ltar so so'i bum pa'i nang du pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du ban+d+ha byin ser po lcag
40a5(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje thogs pa btsun mo dang lhan cig tu glang po che zhon bu bskyed do// me lha ni drang skyong gi cha lugs dang dbyug gu dang / ril po spyi blugs dang / bgrang phreng dang blugs gzar thogs pa mdog dmyur por la zhon pa bskyed do// gshin rje mdog
40a6(rgyud 'grel): nag po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa be con thogs pa ma he la zhon pa bskyod do// lho nub kyi bum par bdeni bral mdog dmar po mo che ba gtsigs pa lag na ral gro thogs pa mi la zhon pa bskyed do// nub du chu lha mdog dkar po brgyan thams
40b1(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs pa bum pa sngon po'i steng na 'dug pa bskyed do// nub byang du rlung lha mdog dud kha bsil yab thogs pa 'khor lo la zhon pa bskyed do// byang du ku bai ra mdog sna tshogs pa dbyug to thogs pa
40b2(rgyud 'grel): rta la zhon pa bskyed do// byang shar du dbang ldan mdog dkar po la mgrin pa sngo ba glang mchog sngon po la zhon pa lag pa bzhi la sbrul se ral khar thogs pa gcig gis ral gri/ gcig na mdung rtse gsum pa/ g.yas yum dka' thub
40b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlog ma la 'khyod pa lagau gcig gis dam pa sbyin pa bskyed do// steng du zla ba ni mdog dkar po pad+ma thogs pa dang pa la zhon pa mdun du bud med rnga ma'i bsil yab thogs par bskyed do// de nyid kyi bum par nyi ma mdog dmar bar
40b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed do// lag pa na pad+ma thogs pa bskyed do// yang dbang ldan gyi 'og ste/ 'og gi phyogs su si'i lha mo lte ba man chad dmar mo yan chad gser las grub pa rin po che sna tshogs pas brgyan pa lag na rin po che gter gyi bum pa
40b5(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa sbrul la zhon pa bskyed do// de ltar bskyed la a las byung ba'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ so so'i snying po thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhugs pa ste/ de kun gyi snying ga nas so so'i sngags kyi phreng ba
40b6(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs la bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o// na mash+tsaN+Da badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha / ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha naM/ a mr-i te hUM phaT/ be ga ra na a dzi te/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ ti Ti ti Ti/ ting ga le/ da ha da ha te dzA bA ti/ ti li ti li/
41a1(rgyud 'grel): ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA zhes bum pa re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ mchod pa dang / phyogs skyong dang gtso bo la bstod pa la sogs pa ci rigs par byas la rol mo dang / sil snyan rnams kyis rab tu mnyes par bya zhing spos dang 'o ma
41a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas mchod pa 'am sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas slob ma las thams cad pa'i bum pas khrus chu nas bton nas gos gsar pa gyon te/ maN+Dal dbul la sogs pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang / me togau gtor ba dang / gang
41a3(rgyud 'grel): la phog pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan bstan cing / de nyid kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad zlos su gzhugo/ de nas sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dang bcas pas dbang bskur bar bya'o// dbang bskur ba bzhin du cho ga'i lhag ma ma lus par bya'o//
41a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas yang mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas gtor ma'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o// de nas byin gyis brlab pa yang tshul bzhin du byas la gtor ma de dag la der sna tshogs dang gdugs dang bcas pas snang gsal spangs stengs ri
41a5(rgyud 'grel): mthon po'am/ nags tshal stug por bskyalo// dung la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / sgrub pa po rnams kyang rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa la/ lag pa dang rkang pa'i gar dang ldan pas/ nyi ma rtse shAr la bskyal/
41a6(rgyud 'grel): nang du log la bgegs mnan pa'i cho go bya/ de nas bkra shis gsol/ dkyil 'khor bsdu/ bla ma la yon dbul lo// bsod nams rdzogs pa'i don du ston mo bya/ cho ga'i lhag chad kha bkang pa'i don du yi ge brgya po bzlas/
41b1(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams slob ma dang gnyis su med par bstim// snying pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i nang du bzhugs par bya'o// slob mas bla ma la yon phul la dga' ba dang yi rangs par bya'o// phyogs skyong bcu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga
41b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam
41b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig dang ldan pas gnas yid dang mthun par gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas sa stegs gru bzhi pa la shin tu mnyam par bya ste/ thig btab la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis dkyil
41b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor li tse dgu pa la so so'i mdog dang mthun pa sgo bzhi dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// de nas bum pa dgu la so so'i mtshan ma btab la gnas su bzhag par bya'o// grwa rnamasu phur bu dang rdo rje skud pas sbrel la mkhas pas gzugaso//
41b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bres pa so so'i gnas su mtshan ma bris te/ ngos bzhi rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / rgya grom bri'o// dbus su rnam 'joms/ shar du ba ba sangs// nub zla ba'i mtshan ma/ phur bu/ byang du lhag bA/ shAr s+t+rai r+ya
41b6(rgyud 'grel): mig dmar// snro na ba dra sgra gcan 'dzin/ nub kyang dru khyi mra/ byang shar du sbyin pa'i mtshan ma bri'o// blo rnams su lcags kyu zhugs pa lcags zlog dril gyi bye'o// de nas sa skye bro sngags drang phyag rgyas sman drungs te/ lca gro bye gnyis 'a
42a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar byas la/ oM na mo tsaN+Da badz+ra ba na ye hUM zhes brjod pas/ dbus su rnam 'joms sku mdog dkar po g.yas 'khor lo g.yon bum pa 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed do// lag pa g.yas pa bkan la pad+maH/
42a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bstan la/ na mo ra ti pi ya sarba swa ta lha lnga na ya ka Da ne rgya nan ta ka ra hi hi ka swA hA/ zhes brjod pas shar gyi bum pa la pa sangs mdog dmar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed do// lag pa g.yon pa khu chur bcangs la
42a3(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong dang mdzub mo sbyar te zla gam kyi tshul du bstan la/ na mash+tsaN+Da ya shi ta ha pra b+ha ba ma li ni swA hA/ zhes brjod pas nub du zla ba mdo ga dkar po dang pa la zhon pa lag pa na pad+ma thogs pa drang na bud med rnga yab thogs pa bskyed do// lag pa
42a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i khu tshur btsongs la lag pa g.yas pa dam pa sbyin pa'i tshul du byas la/ na mo daM ba gu ru b+ha ki sha ya sa ra s+ya t+yai na ho ga ri ri swA hA/ zhes brjod pas lhor phur bu sku mdog dkar po zla ba'i steng na 'dug pa dar ser po'i stod g.yogs gyon
42a5(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon no glegs pa ma thogs pa/ g.yas chos ston pa 'dra ba bskyed do// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la na mo yu pA raNAM la sarba satwa pa tsa la ya swA hA/ zhes brjod pas byang du gza' lag pa mdog ser po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
42a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yon ut+pal/ g.yas dam pa sbyin pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la 'dug pa bskyed do// g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo'i mtshan mo'i tshul du byas la/ na mo b+hu su ta ma bya sri ya ga ra ta a ba ra na ya swA hA/
42b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas shar lhor mig dmar mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas ral gri g.yon chan gri thogs pa bskyed do// lag pa g.yon bkan la snod kyi tshul du bstan la/ na mo b+hi sha ma ge smra shi dza li ta a tsa sha swA hA/
42b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas lho nub tu sgra gcan mdog dud kha ma'i mugo la ro smad sbrul du 'khyil pa lus mig gis khengs pa/ g.yas mnga' gzhu g.yon rin po che'i snod 'dzin pa bskyed do// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u
42b3(rgyud 'grel): chung gnyis bskyangs te/ na mkha'i tshul bya ste/ oM ma ka shi pa ya swA hA/ zhes brjod pas nub byang du nyi ma mdog dmar po rta la zhon pa lag pa gnyis pad+ma thogs pa bskyed do// g.yas thal mo'i tshul du byas la na mo b+ha ting ga ma ma hA ya
42b4(rgyud 'grel): na ka sa swA d+hu/ zhes brjod pas byang shar du spen pa mdog nag po gos dmar po gyon pa g.yas rol gri g.yon zhags pa thogs pa bskyed do// sgo rnamasu gzhan dang mthun pa'i sgom bskyed do// khyams rnamasu rgyu skar rnams bskyed/ de dag
42b5(rgyud 'grel): la dzAHhUM baM hoHye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / gnyis su med par bstim par byas la/ ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor zla bo'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs te bsnyen po bsgyel ba ni/ oM shu swA
42b6(rgyud 'grel): hA/ oM si swA hA/ oM bri swA hA/ oM bu swA hA/ oM aM swA hA/ oM ra swA hA/ oM a swA hA/ oM sa swA hA/ de dag re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste/ gza' brgyad rgyu skar dang bcas pa'i gtor ma la yang bstod//
43a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchog gi bzlas pa tsam par bya'o// so so'i bzlas pa bum pa la dmigs te/ oM ma hA kA le be ga ra na a tsi te dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ti Ti ti Ti ting ga le/ da ha da ha/ te dzA ba ti/ ti li ti li hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa re re la
43a2(rgyud 'grel): stong phrag re re bzlas so// gtso bo ni so so'i las dang sbyor las su byed na gong ma'i so so'i snying po la khri phrag re bskyal la yang sbyar ro// dbang bskur na tha ma rnams kyis bya'o// brgya brgya'i bar du gza' rnams la pU dzi bya'o// dkar gsum
43a3(rgyud 'grel): mngar gsum gyis gza' rnams mnyes par bya'o// de nas slob ma rnams kyis khrus byas te/ gos gsar ba gyon la bskyed pa la sogs pa sngon du byas/ dkyil 'khor du bcug ste me tog dor ba la sogs pa dang / dbang bskur bar bya'o//
43a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas khrus byas la gza' chen po brgyad kyi ba lo btang ngo // de'i 'og tu phyogs skyong dang bgegs kyi gtor ma sgra sna tshogs pa dang ldan pas btang lo/ dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang bkra shis gsol ba la sogs pa bya'o// gza' chen po brgyad
43a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga nyi ma bcud len bya ba dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'jims pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor
43a6(rgyud 'grel): du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par/ me tog sil ma bkram la sa cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas rgyu skar rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te dbus pad+ma ma 'dab brgyad la dkaR+Ya
43b1(rgyud 'grel): lte ba sngon po// mu khyud pad+ma'i phreng bas mdzes par bskor ba/ khyams dmar po la shar nas brtsams nas sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i khang bu bdun bdun gyis bskor ba sgo bzhi mu khyud sna tshogs skar ma'i 'od 'khrug pa bri'o// de nas
43b2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i mtshan ma dang / pad+ma rnams la gza' brgyad kyi mtshan ma dang / khang bu rnams su shAr nas brtsams pa ste/ mdung dang mda' bo che dang / 'khor lo dang gtun shing dang / phub dang ral gri dang / rnga yab dang / me dang chu dang /
43b3(rgyud 'grel): sa dang rlung dang / rgyal mtshan dang sbyang ba dang / rdo ldong dang me long dang / bse kha sbyar dang / dngul gyi phreng ba dang / zhags pa dang / mda' dang lcags kyu dang / sin d+hu ra'i sol ba dang / seng+ge dang wa dang / byi la dang / glang po dang / bya rgod
43b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / ri skyegs dang / rma bya rnams bri bar bya'o// de nas bum pa nyi shu rtsa dgu la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ so so'i mtshan ma dri sna tshogs pas btab la phyogasu bzhag go// phyogs mtshams rnamasu phur bus 'khor bar
43b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go// dri dag gi bar bor du'ang tshon sna tshogs pa'i skud pas sbrel lo// bdug spos la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor bsham mo// de nas gza' rgyu skar gyi gtor ma dang / phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma tshul bzhin
43b6(rgyud 'grel): du bsham mo// de nas yan lag bdun pa sngon du song bas so so'i bum par sngags dang phyag rgyas bskyed do// shar gyi bum pa dang po nas brtsams te dkar po zhal gcig phyag stong ldan pa phyag rnams na mdung bsnams pa/ zhal nas
44a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'a'abru ba/ kyi dkar la zhon pa bskyed do// de'i 'og sku mdog 'dra ba la snar ma mdog ser ljang phyag na mda' bo che ny+dzal zhon pa/ mgo mdog dkar smug 'khor lo bre mo la zhon pa/ lag mdog dkar ba gtun shang
44a2(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa glang la zhen pa/ nabs so mdog dkar seraru phyug na phul khyung la zhon pa/ rgyal ral gri/ sgeg rngu yab bsnams po rta la zhon pa bskyed do// lho phyogs su mchu mgo ser ba/ lag pa brgya stong grangs med pa/ rin po che'i rgyan rnams kyis
44a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ phyag rnams na me bsnams pa bya la zhon pa bskyod do// gre mdog sngo sgyu phyag rnams na chu glang la zhon pa/ sku mdog dmar skya phyag rnams nas/ stag la zhon pa/ me bzhi mdog dkar po phyag na rlung / rin po che sna bzhi'i khri la gnas pa
44a4(rgyud 'grel): nag pa mdog nag pa phyag rnams na rgyal mtshan/ g.yag la zhon pa/ sa ri mdog ser po/ phyag na sdud pa/ gser gyi ba dran la bzhugs pa/ sa ga mdog dud kha phyag rnams na rdo ldong gdengs pa/ sbrul la zhon pa bskyed do// nub tu gzi
44a5(rgyud 'grel): brjid chen mo mdog do mar/ phyag rnams na me long grog la zhon pa'o// snron mdog ser skya phyag rnams na bse kha sbyar dred la zhon pa/ khrums sku mdog dmar ser phyag rnams na dngul gyi phreng ba rlung la zhon pa/ chu stod mdog sngon mo
44a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rnams na zhags pa 'brug la zhon pa'o// chu smad mdog ljang sngon phyag rnams na ba dan bsnams pa/ ce spyang la zhon po/ gro bzhin mdog smug po phyag rnams na lcagasau kyu bsnams pa/ seng ge la zhen pa'o// bye bzhin mdog dmar skya phyag
44b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams na/ sin d+hA ra'i sol b+ha wa la zhon pa/ byung du mon gru mdog snang gu phyag rnams na seng ge dkar mo dom la zhon pa'o// mon dwe mdog mthing ga phyag rnams na bed mo sprin la zhon pa'o// khrums stong mdog ljang ser phyug rnams na b+hi la khwa mo
44b2(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa ngang pa la zhon pa'o// khrums smad ma dog ljang sngon phyag rnams na glang sngon po bsnams pa ra la zhon pa/ nam gru mdog mthing ga phyag rnams na bya rgod ser po bum pa la zhon pa'o// Tha skar mdog ldang dmar phyag na ri skegs khwa mo rnga mo la zhon
44b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// bla nye mdog dung ser rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ phyag brgya stong na rmA bye sngon mo bsnams pa/ zhal gcig pa zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab par rus sbrul zhon pa bskyed// de dag kyang sa bon kun las byung ba 'od zer brgya stong
44b4(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med bya 'phro ba bskyed do// sngags ni oM sa swAhA/ oM laM swA hA/ oM rta swAhA/ oM pa swA hA/ oM kaM swA hA/ oM maM swA hA/ oM b+hu swA hA/ oM khaM swA hA/ oM nye swA hA/ oM si swA hA/ oM ye swA hA/ oM 'u swA hA/ oM ai swA hA/ oM gi swA hA/
44b5(rgyud 'grel): oM ra swA hA/ oM ru swA hA/ oM b+ha swA hA/ oM te swA hA/ oM raM swA hA/ oM ri swA hA/ oM da~M swA hA/ oM khri swA hA/ oM sma swA hA/ oM laM swA hA/ oM shaM swA hA/ oM d+ha swA hA/ oM na swA hA/ oM nya swA hA/ zhes go rims kyis so so'i ye shes sems/
44b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams bstims la/ bum pa zhal gyi bdud rtsi chu bo'i rang bzhin du dmigs so// de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa'i bye brag ci rigs par byas la/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab/ de nas slob ma gos sar pa gyon la khrus nas ston la
45a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du gzug pa dang / me tog phog pa'i las b+h+rUM lta ngo bskrun pa dang dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas gtor ma'i chog rgyas par bya'o// gtor ma chu klung chen por bskul lo// dkyil 'khor brdzu zhung slob mdu rba nA/
45a2(rgyud 'grel): chu yis khrus bya zhing bkra shis gsol ba dang / tshogs ji ltar rigs par bsag go// rgyu skar ny+tsi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdo rje go cha mo zhes bya ba/ dpel mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
45a3(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can gang dag stobs dang yon tan 'phel bar 'dod pas/ lha chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par sems bskyed
45a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / tshogs bsag pa ci rigs par byas la/ sa'i cho ga dang sta gon ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du byas la sa stegs 'dom gang ba las chags la sogs pa legs par byas la thig btab la cho ga rdzogs par bya ste/ lte ba ston pa/
45a5(rgyud 'grel): mu khyud ser pos bskor la pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyud pa mu khyud pad ma sna tshogs pa/ gru chang ljang gu khyams dang sgo rnam su ldan pa bris la dbus su gtso bo'i mtshan ma'o// shar du tri shU la rtse gsum pa/ nub du pad+ma/ byang du 'khor lo/ lhor rdo
45a6(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum pa/ shar lhor mida'/ lho nungab du glang po che'i mchi ba/ nub byed du zhags po/ byang shar du mdung thung blo'o// sgo rnams su sgo ma'i mtshan ma legs par bris la bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dgu laM lha so so'i mtshan ma beta/
45b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ mgul chings la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan la/ gu gul la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis btab la gdugs la bzhag go/ grwa dang ngos rnams su seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa la dur sna tshogs kyi cod pan btags la
45b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs so// de nas mchod pa'i bye brag dang / lha brgyad la gtor ma brgyad la sogs pa bshams la/ de nas tshogs bsags pa'i rten na mkha' la sbrul la sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i dge sbyor gyi yan lag rnams byas la/ gtso
45b3(rgyud 'grel): bo la sogs pa lha so so'i bum por spyan drangs la/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bum pa'i ngo bor gnyis su med par dmigs la/ gtso bo'i sngags dang phyag rgya snga ma rnams dang 'dra'o// de nas 'khor gyi lha rnams man tra dang mu dras spyan drang ba ni/
45b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa ma gos thod pa thogs pa ltar byas la/ g.yas pa'i sor mo gsum mdud pa rtse gsum pa ltar byas la/ oM ru swA hA/ zhes pas ma hA de ba mdog sngo skye zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas tri shu la rtse gsum pa g.yon thod pa
45b5(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa/ skra rdzas shing mig 'bru tshugs su blta ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa bskyed do// yang lag pa g.yon pa kho'i thad tra pad ma ltar byas la/ g.yas pa mthe bong bkan pa snying gar bzhag la
45b6(rgyud 'grel): oM oM swA hA/ zhes pas tshangs pa dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yon pad+ma 'dzin pa g.yas dung bsnams pa/ skra rdzes shing mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs pa'i nga ro can bskyed do// lag pa g.yon pa 'khor lo ltar byas te/ g.yas
46a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dbyug tho 'phyar ba ltar byas nas/ oM b+hi swA hA/ zhes brjod pas khyab 'jug dud kha zhal dgu mche ba gtsigs pa/ dbu skra thor tshugs gcig tu mkhyil ba lte ba man chod sbrul du mkhyil ba lus kun spyan
46a2(rgyud 'grel): mig gis khengs pa zhal gdangs pa/ steng ma lha zhol dkar po yod pa/ g.yon 'khor lo g.yas rin po che'i dbyug tho 'phyar ba bskyed do// lag pa g.yas kyi mthe bong dang / mdzub mo gnyis rtse sbed lo lhag ma gsum nas gang gis ma
46a3(rgyud 'grel): reg par byas la/ oM i swA hA/ zhes brjod pas brgya byin ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas rdo rje rtse gsum pa/ g.yon phreng 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed do// lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong gnyis dang gung mo gnyis
46a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba bkug la lhag ma mdo' ltar byas la/ oM kaM swA hA/ zhes brjod pas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mdog smug po/ zhal dang phyag gnyis pa g.yas mda' g.yon gzhu bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed do// lag pa gnyis
46a5(rgyud 'grel): tshur bcangs la 'dzub mo gnyis glang po che'i mche ba lter byas la/ oM ga swA hA/ zhes brjod pas tshogs kyi dgro mdog nag po sgrol ma rungs pa rnams kyis lus brgyan pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa glang po che'i mche ba/ g.yon glang po che'i ko ba
46a6(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa rab tu 'jigs pa sna glang po'i sna dang mtshungs pa rab tu bskyed do// lag pa gnyis rab tu brkyang ba oM b+hi swAhA/ zhes brjod pas nag po chen po mdog nag la yan lag rags pa/ skra g.yengs la so rno ba/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
46b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon zhags pa thogs pa bskrad do// lag pa gnyis mdung gsor ba ltar byas la oM ga swA hA/ zhes brjod pas smin drug gi bu mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis kyis mdung 'dzin pa bskyed do// de ltar bskyed pa ya
46b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga phul ye shes sems dpa'i dgug gzhug gi las bya'o// de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa ci rigs par dbul lo// lha chen po brgyad la bstod cing gsol ba gdab bo// de nas lha chen po brgyad kyi so so'i sngags so'i bum pa
46b3(rgyud 'grel): la khyi phrag re bzlas la ye shes sems dpa' dang / 'phro 'du rdzogs par byas la/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas slob ma dkyil 'khor du bzhug ste/ oM pra tIts+tsha d+h+waM ma hA sa badz+ra d+hA ra aM dz+nyA pA ya ha ha ho/ gdong g.yogs te me tog
46b4(rgyud 'grel): dor ro// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol la so so'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ro// de nas lha chen po brgyad la bstod pas bstod la gtor ma btang / slob ma khrus nas ston la 'jig rten pa'i lha rgyub kyis phyogs pa las 'dod pa'i don
46b5(rgyud 'grel): ster bar gsol ba gdab/ de nas mchod pa lnga phul te/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ya hi ga dza zhes gshegasu gsol// dkyil 'khor bsdu bkra shis gsol/ lha chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba legs pa'i lam
46b6(rgyud 'grel): ston par byed pa/ zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// klu chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar
47a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i snab+hA ba bodam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khyang yid dang mthun par me tog sngon po la sogasu pa 'phagasmra pa rnams ston par mchod nas sa'i cho ga la sogs pa rnams sngon du song nas/ sa stegs kyu gsu
47a2(rgyud 'grel): legs par byas la cho ga bzhin du thig legs par btab la/ de nas tshon btang ste/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dkar po lte ba sngon po/ mu khyud sna tshogs pad+ma'i phreng ba khyams dmar po sgo bzhi'i rigs dang 'dra ba/ phyi'i mu khyud sbrul 'bar
47a3(rgyud 'grel): ba rab tu 'khyil pas 'khor byar bris la bum pa brgyad gtso bo'i bum pa dang dgu la so so'i mtshan ma bris la/ dz+nyAn sna tshogs pas brtun pa bzhag go// de nas mchod pa'i yo byung ci 'byor ba dang / klu gtor la sogs pa yang bsha
47a4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bshams la tshogs sog pa'i rten na mkha' lo sbrul la sogs bsag/ de nas so so'i mtshan ma dang ldan pas bum pa'i nang du gtso bo snga ma dang 'dra bar bskyed/ 'khor g+h+r-i klu rnams ni lag pa rnams sbrul mgo gdengs pa ltar byas
47a5(rgyud 'grel): oM phuHswA hU/ zhes brjod pas mtha' yas mdog ser po zhal gcig phyug gnyis pa smang sbrul du 'khyil pa dbu la rin po che dang / sbrel mgo bdun gyi gdeng smu ka yod do// rin po che'i rgyuni byams cad kyis brnyan pa/ gas
47a6(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa g.yon pad+ma bsnam sde bskyed do// de dag kyang gdan pad ma'i sdong po'i steng na nyi ma dang zla ba'i steng du bskyed do// phyag rgya snga ma dang 'dra ba la lho phyogasu oM ba swA hA/ zhes brjod pas 'jog po mdog dkar po g.yas
47b1(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa g.yon pad+ma thogs pa snga ma dang 'dra ba bskyed do// nub tu oM b+h+rUM swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ ka ru ko tra dmyur po phyag mtshan sgyu ma dang 'dra ba bskyed do// byung du oM pha swA hA/ zhes brjod pas u lci ka mdog dmar skya snga mya dang 'dra bar
47b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed do// shar lhor oM paM swA hA/ zhes brjod pas nor rgyus mdog se rbaM smre snga ma bzhin du bskyed do// lho nub tu oM phe swA hA/ zhes brjod pas dung skyong sngo sgra bskyed do// nub byang du/ oM pheM swA hA zhes brjod pas/ byang shar du oM phe'u swA hA/ nas
47b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas ba na mdog dmar sde snga ma bzhin du bskyed do// de dag kyang sa bon phu las yang dag par 'byung ba rab tu mdzes par bskyed do// de nas de dag la mchod pa lnga lnga dbulo// de nas so so'i ye shes sems dpa' dzaHhUM baM hoHdgu
47b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhug byas la bum chu klu'i ngo bor zhu bas chu bdud rtsir dmigs la so so'i yum gyi mgul nas 'khyud pa'i thugs ka'i yi ge phuHzhes 'od ldan pa la dmigs la snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos pa la brgya phrag gcig/ klu'i snying
47b5(rgyud 'grel): po re re la khri phrag re re bzlaso// de nas mchod pa dang bstod par bya'o// de nas slob ma bsnyung bar gnas par byas la 'o mas gdung bkrus la lag tu klu shing 'bras bu dang bcas pa thogs la dkyil 'khor du bcug la dam tshig dang sdom pa
47b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bog/ de nas bum chu bdud rtsi'i ngo bo dang ldan pas dbang bskur ro// de nas gtor ma btang / maN+Dal bsngo/ bkra shis gsolo// klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dug las rgyal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis
48a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga buM bsgrub pa 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas
48a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas khang yid dang mthun par sa gzhi rnams legs par ma nyams te/ byug spos la sogs pa rnams kyi chag chag btab la dkyil 'khor lo brten pa dang maN+Dal la brten pa gnyis gang mos su bya'o// dkyil 'khor la brten na
48a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bzhin bya'o// maN+Dal la brtan na khru gang gi maN+Dal sngon po zlum zhing dbus yid tsam mtho ba la chags legs par bya zhing mnyam pa'i steng du bum pa gser ram dngul la ma zangs sam/
48a4(rgyud 'grel): lcags la sgrub pa po 'byor pa'i khyad par gyis bya'o// de yang pad+ma dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar zhing byu ru dang / mtshal bzang po'i mdog ltar dmar zhing nag po ra ri med cing shin tu 'jam par bya'o// de yang tshang dang ldan par bya ste/
48a5(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyi rngub krol dbangs su sor gcig gi tshang du bya/ stegs la sor gnyis/ lto ba lhung bzed dang 'dra bar bya/ mgrin pa ni dpangs su sor bzhi phyir byed pa kha khyer gyi 'dab ma la sor gnyis/ mar bcal ba la nas gang dbangs de grang
48a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam/ kha'i bu ga ni sor bzhi'i tshang du bya'o// lto ba'i tshang ni rab la phul nyi shu rtsa gcig/ 'bring po rnamasu bcu gcig dang / bdun dang bre gang shong bar bya'o// tha ma ni phul bzhi dang phul gang khyor bzhi shong bar bya'o// de lta bu'i
48b1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa chag pa dang / zhom pa dang gas pa dang / nag po ra ri dang / thag thug med pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni dbang bskur 'jug pa'i rkyen dang byin brlabasu nges pa'o// de lta bu'i bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i nang du chu rab tu gtsang ma
48b2(rgyud 'grel): srog chags med pas bkang ste/ dung dang nor bu dang / mu tig mig ma phug pa dang / byu ru dang gser dang rin po che lnga dang / gi ri ga ni dang / sing hA dang / byi gri dang / sa hA dang / sa hA de ba la sogs te smen lnga dang / nas dang / 'bras dang / mon
48b3(rgyud 'grel): spyan gre'u dang / gro dang til te 'bru lnga dang / tsan dan dang / gA pur dang / gu gul dang / gla rtsi dang / spos sbyar ma ste dri lnga/ ka ra dang / bu ramya dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / lan tshwa la sogs te snying po lnga dang / man shel dang rdo rje dang / me
48b4(rgyud 'grel): tog dmar po rab tu dri zhim pa rnams kyang blugs la/ de nas dri dang ldan pa'i chu la sngags bzlas la bum bsangs te/ tsan dan dmar po la sogs pa'i dri zhim zhing bkra shis pa'i rdzas gang yang rung bas lha rnams kyi mtshan ma legs par
48b5(rgyud 'grel): bris la ras dmar po dri ma med pa mgul po bcing ngo // ku shwa dang shug pa la sogs pa'i shing lo ma can me tog dang 'bras bur ldan pa kha brgyan la tshon sna lnga'i ras skud dril te mdud pa byas la de'i steng du ba dmar mo'i lci bas rgyas btab
48b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ rtsa dur ba nyag ma bdun dang rma bya bdun bzhugo// de dag gi steng du rin po che'i snod chung zhing mdzes pa'i nang du yungs kar dang til dkar po dang / a la ka'i phye ma rnams blugs la bzhag go/ de dag ma blugs pa'i gong du ni gu gul
49a1(rgyud 'grel): la bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags oM a mr-i tI hUM phaT ces brjod la bdug par bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyis gos gsam gyon te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du chu gtsang ma blugs la de nyid a yongs su
49a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du dmigs la g.yas pa'i sor mo gsum rdo rje rtse gsum par dmigs te/ oM sho dan te oM sha ta nA ye swA hA/ zhes brjod pas g.yas dang g.yon dang / dbus su gtor la de nas g.yas pa'i
49a3(rgyud 'grel): srin lag chu nang du bcug la/ de nyid la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du dmigs la bdag nyid kyis rkub gsum btung ngo // de ltar nye reg dang 'thor 'thung byas la bdag nyid khro bo tr-i rin ti ra'i gzungs kyis langs la hUM hUM zhes brjod pas rkang
49a4(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa phur par dmigs pa dang / mig g.yas pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM sngon po 'phreng la nyal ba dmigs g.yon pa ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM dmigs la rab tu sdang ba'i mig gis bgegs
49a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la dbang ldan nas brtsams te/ phyogs bcur khyab par bltas te/ hUM zhes brjod pas rdo rje'i rtsog pa dang / ra ba dang dra ba dang / gu ra dang / sa gzhi'i dmigs par byas la phur bu dang tho ba thogs pas kyang / mtshams gcad par bya
49a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas phur bu'i yungs kar blangs te/ oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha kro d+ha kI li kI li ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod pa dang bgegs bskrad yang bdud rtsi thabs sbyor du dmigs te/ hUM hUM/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ mngag gzhug pho nya'i las
49b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa// khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// yungs kar dag la mngon par sngags/ phyogs rnams kun du gtor byas na/ bgegs kyi sbyor ba rgyun chod cig/ de nas bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyis sngags brjod cing / phyogs mtshams kyi sngags
49b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing gtor lu bskrad do// nad pa la byed na gong gi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa dang ljon pa'i sa nyid la dbus su khru do khrus byed pa'i so sna tshogs pas bkang la bzhag go// de nas sngags pa bdag nyid kyis khrus bya ste/ bum pa'i nang du
49b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs te/ de nas lag pa'i sor mo'i nang du bsnol te khu tshur bcings la mthe bong dang gung mo dang mthe'u chung rnams bshibs te bsgrengs la nas re re las ma reg por byas la/ na mo rat+na
49b4(rgyud 'grel): tra yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pa Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha sau na pa ta ye badz+ra bi d+ha ra na ya swA hA/ zhes pas rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan gsal bar dmigs la/ bum pa'i nang du paM yongasu gyur pa las/ bdud rtsi ldi'i chu rgyun dag las
49b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar po'i ze 'bru dang / sdong por bcas pa dmigs la de nyid kyi lte ba la nyi ma dang zla ba dang pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par dmigs la de nas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du lha so so'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / sngags
49b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing spyan drang ngo // de nas mchod yon lan bdun nam lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gam sum cu rtsa lnga dbul lo// yang lha re re'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas spyan drangs sngags brjod cing de dag re re la yang mchod pa lnga lnga dbu'o// de nas phyogs
50a1(rgyud 'grel): skyong rnams kyi phyag rgyas spyan drang ba ni/ langs te rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan te/ g.yas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya sta zur du bzhag par bya sngags ni/ oM ha na ha na
50a2(rgyud 'grel): b+hi ta badz+ra hUM phaT/ yang g.yas g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul gyis lag pa g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo lcags kyu ltar bskyed do// g.yas pa brgya byin gyi'o// yang me'i phyogs su bltas te/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang la rkang pa gnyis
50a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par byas la mdzub mo bkug ste/ rtse mo gung mo'i tshogs gsum par gzugaso// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra na la ma hA bu ta dz+wa la sarba b+hasmi ku ru sarba duSh+TA naM hUM phaT/ mthe bong mthil du sbyar te brtan por bzhag la g.yabs
50a4(rgyud 'grel): ni spyan drang ba'o// mdzub mo mthe bong btsugs te phyir drag tu brkyang pa ni slar btang ba'o// gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas te bsgrengs la bstims pa mdun du bzhag la sor mo phan tshun bsnol te khu tshur dam du bcangs la srin
50a5(rgyud 'grel): lago ba shibs te bsgrengs la snying gar bzhag par bya'o// sngags ni oM badz+ra ki la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ srin lag gnyis pa shibs g.yas pas nang du bzlog pa ni spyan drang ba'o// nang du bzlog pa de las phyir byung ste
50a6(rgyud 'grel): bshibs pa de ni slar btang ba'o// bden bral gyi phyogasu bltas te rkang pa mnyam par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis ral gri 'dra bar bshibs te bsgrengs/ lag pa
50b1(rgyud 'grel): yon pa yang de lta bu'i tshul gyis shugs 'dra bar sta zur g.yon du bzhag par bya'o// sngags ni ri te rak+Sha tI pa ta ye swA hA/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste g.yas pas spyan drang ba'o// phyir bskyod de slar bkrol bar gshegs/
50b2(rgyud 'grel): sagasol ba'o// chu lha'i phyogs su bltas te rkang pa mnyam par bzhag la// yos pa khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong dang mdzub mo zhags mi ltar bya/ g.yon kyang de ltar bya ste snying gar bzha go/ sngags ni oM na ga badz+ra a/
50b3(rgyud 'grel): na sa/ sarba d+ha na byA badz+ra ti ra N+ya sarba na ra sma ni mug ta la ka ra d+hi ni sarba gA ra Na ni tsa/ dza d+ha ra sa ma ya/ ma nu sma ra/ a gad+hA a gad+d+ha/ bar+N+Na n+tu/ raha ra naun mya hA ts+tshe ta hUM phaT/ go yin pa'i 'dzub mo'i lcags kyu g.yabs pa ni spyan
50b4(rgyud 'grel): drang ba'o// phyir bskyod de skar bkrol ba ni slar btang ba'o// rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te rkang pa bshibs tAM bsgrengs la g.yon pa'i khu tshuraraM bcings la/ gung mo bsgyings pa'i tshigs dang por mdzub mo bkug pa thing tho gtsugs
50b5(rgyud 'grel): pa de ltar bya ste sta zur g.ya su bzhag go/ sngags ni/ oM badz+ra a na li ma hA ba~M ga a na ya sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ mdzub mo de nyid spyan drangs pa dang slar btang bar bya'o// ku be rA'i phyogasu bltas te rdo rje bcings pa nang du bzlog nas
50b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'u chung ba shibs te brkyang ba'i skabs su so so'i srin lag sbyar bar bya'o// sngags ni/ oM gu bai ra yak+She Di pa ha ye swA hA/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bkug ste g.yabs pa ni spyan drang ba'o// de nyid kyis bskyod pa ni sIr btang
51a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// dbang ldan phyogs su bltas te/ bsgreng la snyim pa bkan la srin lag mthe chung bkug ste bsnol la gung mo gnyis bshibs te bsgrengs pa'i rgyab pa'i rgyu ba logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bya/
51a2(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong gnyis bar du bshibs te bzhag go/ sngags ni/ oM d+ha hUM bin d+ha badz+ra shu la swA hA/ mdzub mo gnyis sen mo ma~M sbrid par nang du g.yabs pa ni spyan drang ba'o// phyir bskyod de bkrol ba ni slar gshegs pa'o// 'og tu bltas
51a3(rgyud 'grel): te lag pa gnyis pad+ma ltar bya ste/ spyan drang ba dang / slar btang ba yang ning du g.yabs pa dang phyir bkrol ba'o// sngags ni/ na ma sa man+ta bud d+ha nan/ oM pri ti bya swA hA/ steng gi snying po lag pa khong stong du sbyar la mthe bong
51a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bshibs te spyi bor bzhag par bya'o// spyan drang ba dang slar btang ba nang du dang phyir bkrol ba'o// sngags ni/ na ma sa man+ta b+hU ta nan/ he shwa N+ya pra ta dz+nyo tir ma yaM swA hA/ de nas me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa
51a5(rgyud 'grel): dbul lo// gtor ma ni 'bras chan zho dang sbyar ba dang / dri bsung dang ldan pa'i shing tog khur ba la sogs pas mchod do// chang dang sha dang khrag gis ni mi yin no// de dag gis 'khor gyi gdon rnams la ni sha chang dang 'byung
51a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i kha zas su sbyin no// de nas tshon sna lnga yi skud pa gsar pa shin tu mnyam pa la dri dang ldan pa'i gu gul la sogs pa gtor ma bya ste/ bum pa'i mgul pa la btags la rdo rje la bstod la bzhag go// de nas shugs pa la
51b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dri dang ldan pa'i shing la sbyin sreg kyang bya/ de nas bdag nyid kyis khrus bya ste/ gos gsar brtson pa la dpral ba la dri'i thig le byas la sngags pa g.yog bzhi dang ldan pas gzungs thag bzhi phyogs bzhir 'then la rgyud rdo
51b2(rgyud 'grel): ba brgya klags te lnga bcu'i bar du mchod pa lnga dbul/ brgya rdzogs pa la zhi ba'i sbyini sreg bya'o// de nas bzlas pa bya ste bum pa'i lha la ye shes sems dpa' bstim ste/ lha so so'i thugs ka nas rdo rje sngon po nas tsam pa kha med pa'i lte
51b3(rgyud 'grel): bsngags brgyas gang mos kyi 'khor bar dmigs la bdag nyid snying po bsdus pa la bzlas pa byas pas/ de nyid las 'od 'phros pas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas lha 'od du zhu/ de nyid la sngags kyi sku
51b4(rgyud 'grel): byung bas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi babs pa gnyis su med par bstim/ bdag gi lce'i ste du yang yaM shes kyi rdo rje nas tsam gyi sdug ma nas/ sngags kyi rang sgra byung bas bdag dang sems can gyi don byas phyi rol gyi snang ba rnams kyang sngags kyi rang
51b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra byung bas gdug pa'i tshogs rnams tshar bcad par byas pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa gsum dang mi 'bral bar byas pas bdag dang sgra'i dngos po thams cad sgra'i bsam gtan dang mi 'bral ba ni don gyi min ngag go// yungs kAkar la
51b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas te bum par blugs pas/ lha rnams kyi steng gi rdo rje la ye shes kyi bdud rtsi babs la dmigaso ba dang / yang na me tog rab tu dri zhim pa la sngags bzlas pa bum par blugs la lha rnams kyi spyan lam du mchod bI
52a1(rgyud 'grel): sprin rab tu mdzes shing rgya che bar dmigs pas/ dngos grub thams cad bdag la ster bar dmigs so// de ltar snying po bsdus pa la brgya 'am stong ngam khri 'am 'bum mam rang ji ltar dmigs par bzlas la/
52a2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma khrus byas te gos gsar pa dri ma med pa gyon te gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / sems bskyed pa la sogs pa bya ste/ na mo dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la skya bsu mchi// dkon mchog la
52a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa 'bul// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba 'tshal// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// don dam kun rdzob rang bzhin gyis// sdom pa ma lus bdag gis bzung // ma bsgral pa T+wAM bsgral bgyis
52a4(rgyud 'grel): nas// ma rgal ba rnams brgal byas te// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ste// sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// 'gro ba'i dge la rje yi rang // kun kyang sems can don du bsngo// zhes brjod la rdo rje lag tu byin la dbugs dbyung ste/
52a5(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan gon la gzengs bstod la dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo nas sbrang lebA k+Shi steng nas lam ston la dbus su khrus byas te/ ye shes kyi lha mo bdud rtsi'i bum pa chu thogs pa mang por sprus na mkha' nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun bab bas kyai
52a6(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi sdug bsngal dang / nang sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / mi mthun pa'i rmi lam sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa rmis pa dang / mya ngan dang sems las su mi rung ba'i mi bde ba rnam par dag par dmigs par byos la/ tshig suM
52b1(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa 'di dag kyang brjod par bya'o// e ma'o// khrus mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// rdo rje'i khrus ni bla na med// rdo rje ye shes khrus 'di yis// bkra shis bum pa la brten nas// sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed// bde ba phun
52b2(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs par gnas// ma grub pa rnams grub par byed// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin// dpal ldan ye shes mchog gi khrus// rgyal mchog dam pa sbyin par bya'o// zhesna pas kyang khrus bya'o// de nas bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad
52b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis slob ma bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir yungs kar dang zho dang / rtswa dur ba dang / li khri dang // dung dang / bil ba'i 'bras bu dang / me long dang / 'gi wang rnams rim pas sbyin no// brab pa dang / byab pa dang / dril ba dang /
52b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba dang / rdeg pa la sogs pa yang bya'o// de ltar khrus rtag tu byas na rgyal po rnams bsod nams rgyas pa dang / gdon zhi ba dang / pha rol gyi sde rnams dbang du gyur pa dang / rgol ba rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur la de bzhin du blon po
52b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / bu 'dod pa dang / byang stems kyis 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmug gis 'jigs pa dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nad dang mu ges 'jigs pa dang / de bzhin 'jigs pa chen po brgyad dang / nor 'grib pa dang longs spyod
52b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa dang / 'khor dang tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / dbang thang rgyas par 'dod pa dang / skrag dang gzi mdangs 'dod pa dang / stobs dang nus pa dang grags pa dang / dpal dang dbang phyug dang / gzugs 'dod pa dang / nor 'dod pa dang //
53a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bru 'dod pa dang / zas 'dod pa dang / gos dang rgyan dang / bzhon pa dang / lha nye bar 'dod pa dang / gdon brlag par 'dod pa dang / sdig pa ma lus pa dag par 'dod pa rnam kyis rtag tu khrus byas na 'dod pa
53a2(rgyud 'grel): don ni ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub par nges so// de'i phyir na mi mthun pa'i phyogs mtha' dag las thar bar byed pas na sngon byung du rgyal po la smon pa dang / yang na rgyal po bsod nams che ba'i phyir smos te/ rgyal po rtag tu khrus
53a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis shig ces 'gro ba mi'i dpon yin pas smos so// snga ma dang da ltar dang phyi ma'i sdig pa ma lus pa las thar par byed pa 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa khrus kyi cho ga/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyis
53a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rnam par 'joms pa'i sgo nas rab tu gnas pa byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pa/
53a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas khang yid mthun par dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nas 'byung bzhin du dkyil 'khor bzhengs te/ mchod pa'i yo byad ji ltar 'byor pa bshams te/ mgon po dang 'byung po rnams la gtor ma'i bye brag rab tu bzang po
53a6(rgyud 'grel): yang bsham/ chos skyong la gtor ma chen po bshams la bdag nyid kyis bsnyen pa ci rigs par bya/ de nas rab tu gnas par byed pa'i rten sku'i rten ras ris su bris pa dang / 'bur du bstod pa dang / lugasu blugs pa dang /
53b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung pu ti la sogs pa/ thugs rdo rje dang dril bu la sogs pa gang yin pa de khrus nas bton la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su shing leb la sogs pa'i steng du khri'i steng du ras ser po dri ma med pas dril la bzhago/
53b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas yon bdag gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa sdig pa bshags pa dang sems bskyed pa bya'o// de nas bdag nyid kyang khrus bya ste/ gos gsar pa gyon la bum pa re re la snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos pa brgya
53b3(rgyud 'grel): rtswa brgyad bzlas la/ sku rten khro ba~M yin na rigs nges pa'i sa bon snying gar bcug ste/ gser gyi thur mas spyan sprul pa dang / shangs dang zhal bkru ba la sogs pa bya ste/ khro bo'i dur khrod kyi brgyan brgyad gradab/ so so'i
53b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi gtso bos dbu brgyan la snying ga'i sa bon la ye shes sems dpa' bzhug par byas la/ rab tu brtan par bzhugasu gsol/ lha so so'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad brjod la yon bdag dang gnyis su med par bstim/
53b5(rgyud 'grel): chos skyong la gtad de mnga' gsol zhi ba'i sku nyan thos kyi cha lugs yin na/ yang so so'i sa bon bzhugs pa la sogs pa byas la/ de nas zhal bsil ba dang / dbu skra gzhar ba la sogs pa bya ste/ chos gos dang
53b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams gdags/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' bcug ste/ de'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad brjod la brtan par bya/ de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul la yon bdag dang gnyisu med par bstim mo// byang chub sems dpa'i cha lugs/
54a1(rgyud 'grel): yin na/ yang gong ltar byas la byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun do shal la sogs pa rgyun gdags/ de nas yon bdag gi don du bstim pa la sogs pa bya/ mchod pa dbul/ chos stong la gtad/ gsol ba gdag
54a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du bcug la bum pa'i dbang bskuro// gsung gi brtan rnams la spyan dbye ba dang / zhal bkru ba la sogs pa byas ljags spel ba la sogs byas la dam chos bdud rtsi'i cha dbab/ hrI las byung ba'i lha mo rnams
54a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas me long gi nang du bum pa'i chus baikru/ mchod pa lnga dbul/ rab tu dgyes shing bstan par bya'o// chos sbyong la gtad/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab bo// thugs kyi rten la byed ni 'di nyid kyi dkyil 'khor/
54a4(rgyud 'grel): du dbang bskur/ khrus nas kyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi ye shes sems dpa' rnams spyan drangs te gnyi su med par bstim par bya/ mchod pa dbul/ chos skyong la gad+hA/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba ga ba/ so so'i snying po gsal
54a5(rgyud 'grel): bi me na rdo rje rnam 'dzums kyi sku dpag tu med pa sprul te/ de nyid kyi snying po shin tu bsdus pa brgya d+hA brgyad bzlas lnga de nyid dang gnyis smra med par byas la ra de bzhin gyi don rdzogs par bya'o// de la ma mos na/ de bzhin gshegs
54a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rigs yin na oM/ rdo rje'i rigs yin na hU~M/ rin po che swA/ pad+ma'i rigs la ai/ las kyi rigs la he ci rigs par bzlas so// gsung gi rten rnams la gcig gi rgyud stong phrag gcig bklag/ de nyid brgya brgya'i bar du
54b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga rdzogs par dbul/ grug zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ci rigs par 'grub par bya/ phyogs skyong ba dang 'byung po la sogs pa la gtor ma gus par btang / bdag nyid bzlas pa la zhugs pa'i dus su khrus dang gtsang sbral so/
54b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bya zhing / sha dang nya dang sgog pa la sogs pa/ btsong dang chang dang / bud med dang / phyi dro'i kha zas bdun spangs la zas dkar chos la brten cing zhag gsum mam lnga 'am bdun nam/ bsnyung bar gnas par bya ba ni bzlas pa 'bum
54b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gtso bo'i dus na nges par yin no// de ltar sku gsung thugs kyi rten la dbang bskur rdzogs nas mchod pa'i las ji ltar 'grub par byas la dben pa'i sar bzhugasu gsol/ de nas yon bdag gi don du sbyin srog ji ltar rigs par
54b4(rgyud 'grel): byas la dbang ci rigs par bskur// de nas dbang rdzogs nas yon bdag gi mchod po ji ltar 'byor pa yi dam de dag la mchod/ chos skyong la gtor ma chen po gcig btang la/ bdag gi yi dam gyi lha 'od rab tu bkra shis pa dang byin
54b5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs che ba dang / bstan pa ji srid du gnas pa'i bar la bsrung ba dang / mchod pa mdzad du gsol zhes gtor ma btang / de nas phyogs la sogs pa'i gtor ma rab tu rgya che bar btang // dung dang rnga dang cha lang dang / dril bu la sogs
54b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs pa yang bsgag go// de nas bkra shis gsol te/ yon bdag kyang khrus nas gdon/ bsrung skud gdags/ brab pa dang bab pa la sogs pa bya/ tshe 'phel ba'i don du dur ba sbyin par bya/ de ltar cho ga'i gzhung
55a1(rgyud 'grel): ma nor bar rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor bsdu/ sman pa dor/ bla ma la yon rab tu gus pa dang ldan pas dbu'o// de nas yon bdag gi longs spyod dang tshe 'phel ba dang / tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i don du ston mo ji ltar
55a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa bya'o// chos dang zang zing gi 'byor pa yang ci 'byor pas btab par bya'o// mdor na cho ga gtso bos sems bskyed sngon du byas pa las mi 'da' bar bya'o// 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga/ slob
55a3(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad bzong pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// don rnams ma lus sgrub byed pa'i// don sgrub rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi// bsgrub pa'i
55a4(rgyud 'grel): thabs ni bshad par bya// 'byung po ro langs sha za dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang brjed byed ma// smyo byed srin po la sogs pa'i// mi ma yin gyi sprul pa las// rnam par thar bar byed pa yi// gzungs kyi cho ga legs pa ni// rgyud la brtan
55a5(rgyud 'grel): nas bshad par bya// / 'dir 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la bya rton pa'i rang rtags kyi las bdun gyi cho ga dang por bshad par bya'o// rnal 'byor pa dam tshig dang ldan pas sngon du phyag ni rdo rje 'am/ 'di
55a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi snying po rgyas bsdus la bsnyen pa tshad du phyin pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par ba ye la sogs pas chags legs par bya la srog chags med pa'i me tog sngon po'i gcal legs par bkram la rin po che'i maN+Dal gyi stengadu
55b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga dbul bar bya'o// de nas rang gi bla ma dang yi dam la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun gyi na mkha' la spyan drangs la/ skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dang bdun rnam par dag pa bya'o// de nas
55b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid stong pa'i nga rgyal du bya ste/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang / bgegs rnams la bsgo ba la sogs pa bya ste/ trAM zhes mig byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya'o// de nas bsrung ba chen mo'i sngags lon bcur brjod
55b3(rgyud 'grel): la phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa bya'o// de'i rjes la bdag dang dngos po thams cad stong par mos par bya/ de nas sgrub pa po khrus sngon du song bas/ nye reg dang 'thor 'thud la sogs pa byas la tshad med pa bzhi bsgom/ de rjes stong
55b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ngang las hUM las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje/ de'i lte ba las bruM las rin po che'i gzhal yas khang rab tu rgya che zhing kha dog gsal ba rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ye shes bzhi 'bor byed pa'i sa gzhi dang bcas pa'o// de'i dbus
55b5(rgyud 'grel): ma dang a las byung ba'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi steng du hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje sngon po nas tsam kha gyes la de nyid 'phros 'dus pa las badz+ra hUM zhes pas lan bdun brjod pas hUM las byung ba'i stobs po che sku mdog mthing ga
55b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal cig phyag bzhi pa dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pas dbu brgya ni pa/ tho ba dang zhags pa dang / thod pa dang / bsdigs mdzub me 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa rnam par bsgom mo// de nas ye shes sems dpa' gzhug
56a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gnyis su med par brtan par bya ba dang / mchod pa lnga dbul/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la bstod pa/ bdag nyid tha mal pa'i lus su slar langs la/ 'dod pa'i don yid la byas te ye
56a2(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi 'khor lo las bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun phab ste/ bdag nyid las mgo 'jug tu bstims pas las dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnam par dag par byas la/ de'i rjes la bdag dang gang bsrung ba'i lus dang yon lag thams
56a3(rgyud 'grel): cad rdo rje mi chod pa'i go cha dang ldan par bya'o// de nas maN+Dal gyi steng du snying po lnga dang ldan pa'i bum pa'i nang du chu gtsang ma srog chags med pas bkang / dri dang 'bru la sogs bum pa la shis pa'i rdzas rnams kyis legs
56a4(rgyud 'grel): par gtams la kha brgyan dang mgul tshangs la sogs pa'i bum rgyan rnams mdzes par byas la rab tu dri dang ldan pa'i snying po bris la hUM yongs su gyur pa las stobs po cher rnam par blta'o// gzhan gyis longs ma
56a5(rgyud 'grel): spyad pa'i kham phor kha sbyar yungs kar gyis bkang la bsgrub bya'i ming rus gro ga la bris l-i gi wang gis dril la bzhag go// de nas bdag nyid kyi srin lag g.yon pa la gzungs thag btags te/ kha bshal cing
56a6(rgyud 'grel): khros dang gtsang sbra la gnas par byas la bzlas pa bya ste sgrib pa po'i lce'i steng du rdo rje sngon po nas tsam gyis sbubs ma nas/ sngags kyi rang sgra rdzogs par byas la snang ba rnams kyang rdo rje lta bur gsang sngags kyi rang sgra
56b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan par dmigs la bdag dang stobs po che gnyis su med par byas la/ oM sarba bid+ya badz+ra badz+ra da ra da ra badz+ra hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags la/ bsgrub bya'i ming rus la gu gul gyi chus bkru
56b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing nges par blos byas pas/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te/ sngags kyi rjes la bdag la nad dang dug dang mtshon la sogs pa rnams kyi mi chod par mdzad du gsol zhes gr-i ga la 'khor lo bris tAM mgul du yungs
56b3(rgyud 'grel): kar dang / btags la tshon la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa dag par 'dod na chu gtsang ma la sngags te ltor btang na bskal pa bdun gyi sdig pa ma lus par zad par byed do// de ltar 'dir byung ba'i tshe
56b4(rgyud 'grel): ga las lan gsum gyi nyi ma re re la rdzogs par byas nas sdig pa mi dge ba thams cad las thar bar nges so// de bzhin du sbrul gyis zin pa dang rma dang 'bras la sogs pa la ba ser mo'i 'o mos smras pa'i 'jim pa la nyin
56b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gsum du bzlas te byugs na de nyid las grol bar 'gyuraro// de ltar na rlung dang chu chen po dang ser ba drag po 'bab cing gzhan gyis chod pa dka' ba rnams la yungs kar la bsngags nas gtor na gzhan gyis mi chod pa rnams
56b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang chod par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang bdag nyid kyi rigs sngags kyi las ma grub pa rnams kyang 'di nyid kyi cho ga zhag bdun 'bad na gzhan gyis spyad par dka' ba'i las 'grub par nges so// spyir gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i
