84b4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bum phrag bdun bskyal nas/ de nas n+ya gro d+ha'i lo ma la brgya rtsa brgyad sngags nas ce spyang gi khrag dang bsres nas bsgrub bya'i lus la reg par gtor na nges pa rengs par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad rengs
84b5(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'i las dzag tshangs 'phrul yig ces bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrub pa po la tsha ba'i gnod pa sna tshe
84b6(rgyud 'grel): rengs par byed de/ lus kyi gnod pa'i nus pa dang bral bar 'dod na/ sarba ku len a ban+d+ha ya hUM hUM zhes 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas ci spyang gi khrag la sngags nas gtor na ma mo'i gdon rnams rangs par 'gyur ro//
85a1(rgyud 'grel): sarba a tsa le hU~M hU~M zhes 'bum phrag bdun bzlas nas zangs phyi lA brgya rtsa brgyud bsngags la gtor na gcan zan khro bo rnams nges par 'gyuraro// sarba nA sha ya phu hU~M hU~M zhes 'bum phrag lnga bzlas nas
85a2(rgyud 'grel): gla rtsi brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas gtor na sbrul rengs par nges so// sarba duSh+TAn badz+ra aM ka dz+wA la ya~M hUM hUM zhes bsnyen pa 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas sa dang chu la sogs pa la bcu rtsa brgya de bsngags nas gtor na 'byung po'i
85a3(rgyud 'grel): gdon rnams rengs par 'gyuraro// sarba ma hA mi ni du ru du ru hUM hUM zhes 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas yungs kar dang yungs nag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags nas gtor nu gdon thams cad rengs par 'gyur/ sar+b+ba a
85a4(rgyud 'grel): mu ka mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT zhes 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas nos rkun ma'i rjes la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas gtor na rkun ma rnams rengs par 'gyur ro// bsgrub bya rengs pa'i las sna tshogs pa bstan pa rlung gi
85a5(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogaso// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo// bsgrub bya k+Sha rnams kyi byang du gzhug par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam
85a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig dang ldan pas/ klu gdug pa dang ldan pa'i sa gang na gnas pa'i sa nas/ sa dang rdo dang shing dang chu la sogs pa blangs la stegs bu khru gang ba gcig byas la de la snga ma bzhin du klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bris la/
85b1(rgyud 'grel): tha ma klu shing sna tshogs pas bskor la bzhag go/ de'i byang du dur khrod kyi sa la gru gsum nag po byas te/ de'i steng du mdze thod kyi nang du bsgrub bya'i gos dum bu 'am dri chen dri chu rjes sa la sogs pa gang rnyed pa dang / bag zan
85b2(rgyud 'grel): bsres la de'i khong du ra'i khrag gis bsgrub bya'i ming dang rus dang yul dang sa khyim dang / pha tshan dang du ra ming bris la dur khrod kyi ras ma la sna tshogs rdo rje dur khrag gis bris pas dril la yugs sa me'i skra skud phyin ka log gis rgya gri
85b3(rgyud 'grel): sgril la bzhag go/ de'i nang du spre'u'i khrag dang / mdze khrag dang / ra rog po'i khrag btag/ lcags phye dang dur khrod kyi rdo phye dang / yungs nagri dang / dug sne tshogs la klu brgyad kyi snying po 'bum phrag bdun bzlas shing brub/ skabasu
85b4(rgyud 'grel): klu rnams la bstod cing gtor maM sbyin/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab bo// klu'i snying po'i gzhug l-i a mu kau mA ra ya phaT ces ga dwagaso// de nas rgyud rdzogs pa brgya bklags la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la klu'i pho brang du
85b5(rgyud 'grel): me non pa byas na sgrib bya de zla ba lnga nas gdon mi za bar brlag par nges so// de yang rgyal rigs la gtan na mdze thod kyis bya/ rje'u rigs la glang dmar po'i rA g.yas pa/ bram ze la rabs chad kyi thod pa/ rmang rig sa la sbal
85b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lus por bya/ rdol ba la phag nag po'i thod par bya/ blud dang chu gtor ci mang du btang ngo // bsgrub bya rnams kyi byang du gzhug pa'i cho ga srog gcod kyi spu gri zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa
86a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / dpral rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bsgrub bya rnams cha ba'i rims kyis rmugs shing myus byar byed par 'dod pa'i sgra ba bo dam tshig dang ldan pas/
86a2(rgyud 'grel): man+ta sum bar ra dmar po'i khrag gis byugs pa'i steng du bum pa tshad ldan la khra go sna tshogs byugs la/ de'i nang du tsha ba'i sman sna tshogs dang / dugo sna tshogos blugs la gtso bo la mchod pa la sogs pa
86a3(rgyud 'grel): byas la dzum podzin pasgrub bya de bkug cing tsha ba~M sna tshogs la bsdigs 'di 'bum phrag bdun bzlas la bum par thug go// nA mAHtsaN+DA dz+ra pA Ni a mu kaM mA r+ye saces las sbyor rgya dus na 'am pa'i khrug dang /
86a4(rgyud 'grel): tshu la sogs pa ste/ byo'i khang la gtor ni tsha ba'i rims bebs te/ bsgrub byam rungs par 'gyur bar nges// tsha ba'i rims kyis dgra bsad pa'i ral gri'i la zhes bya ba/ sras rdo rjes
86a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa lnga phyag 'tshal lo// bsgrub kyi myos pa'i las rmugs shing dran pa nyims par 'dod na/ shi ri kha dz+ha'o khu ba la b+h+r-ing per sdus pa song phyug lta
86a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas nas/ datu ra brdungs pa'i khar ba'i khu ba dang sbyar nas snying po'i go sham la che ge mo myos bor gyis shig ces bza' btung gang yang rung ba la sbyar nas byin na/ byis par 'gyur ba la the tshom bya mi kris so//
86b1(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer tsam myos shing rmugs par 'dod na/ bsnyen pa snga ma ltar byas la bil ba'i shing la me sbar la/ grong khyer g+hi mtha' ma bskor cing grong khyer che ge mo'i mi rnams myos par gyur cig swA hA/ zhes bzlas pas
86b2(rgyud 'grel): nyin zhog bdun du rmugs shing dran pa nyams pa la the tshome byar myed do// yul khams tsam rmugs par 'dod no shing sna bcu bdun gyi du bas mtha' ma bskor cing yul che ge mo'o mi rnams rmugs par gyur cig
86b3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes bzlas pas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du rmugs pa la the tshom med do// sems can thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' gzi mdangs chen mo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa
86b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo// dpal bskyed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs la/ bum pa kha dog
86b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar por byas la mtshal lAm sA ni d+hu ra'i mtshan mas btab la/ rdo rje rnam 'joms rang yang kha dog dkar por bsgom/ gnas khung gi nang thams cad kyang dkar por byas la/ dar dkar po'i yol ba bya/ de nas
86b6(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'i nang du baM las ye shes kyi mtsho/ de las 'od 'phros pas paM dkar po yongs su gyur pa las pad ma'i snying po dkar po/ 'od zer dkar po dang / ser po'i tshogs dpog tu med pa 'phro ba/ de'i steng du nyi ma dang
87a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba de nyid bar du A li dang kA lI g.yas bskor dang g.yon bskor gyi bar nas sngags rnams kyi rang sgra de'i 'od la hUM/ rdo rje rnam 'joms de la dzaHdgug/ bAM gi gzhug/ hUM
87a2(rgyud 'grel): gis bcing / hoHdgyes shing mnyes par byas/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i nyi zla bar gyi yi ge'i phreng ba gnyis po la dmigs la sngags bzlas so// de nas bum pa 'od kyi mer gsal ba lnga blo
87a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pas sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan/ de nas dmigs pa gsum rang dag pa ni sgra mtha' dag gis bsam gtan/ de ltar rdzogs pa la dmigs nas sngags rdzogs pa'i tshe bud med bu 'dod pa ste//
87a4(rgyud 'grel): zhag gcig gam zhag gsum bskung bar gnas par byas la/ gos gsar pa byin la khrus nas bton la sems bskyed pa la sogs pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor du bcug la dbang bskur la de'i rjes lnga rgyas pa'i sbyin//
87a5(rgyud 'grel): sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bsrung skud gdags so// de ltar byas na dpal nges par bskyed do// dpal bskyed pa bkra shis bskyed pa/ nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba dpal kun gyis ni brgyan pa'i mtha'// slob dpon ye shes
87a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes mdzod pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tsholo// dbang po nyams pa gso bar byed pa'i las kyi bye brag ni/ dang po mig gi nang las grol bar 'dod pa'i
87b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ khrus kyi cho ga nas ji ltar 'byung ba'i khrus bya ste/ gos gsar gyon pa dang bsnyung bar gnas pa la sogs pa byas nas khrus lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ de nas bdag nyid lha'i
87b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor du byas te/ bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon las gzugs lha dpag tu med pa smos te/ 'phags pa mchod la sems can gyi don bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma lus par byas nas bdag gi
87b3(rgyud 'grel): mig l-i thi mo bas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan dri ma med pa thob cing yongs su dag par mkhyen pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dmigs shing / ut+pa la sngon po dang / skyer khaN+Da la snying po rgyus bsdus kyi sngags ci
87b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs par bzlas shing byug go/ tshag pa la ni spangs ma la na zlas shing byug go/ ra po ri bi can rnams la ni a ru ra'i dbu ba la sngags te byug go/ lang thog can rnams la mtshal dang tsong zi'i khu ba la bsngags la
87b5(rgyud 'grel): byug go/ sha mdzer drang zug che ba rnams la ka ra dang mi'i 'o ma la bzlas la byug go/ de ltar byas pas gdon dang nang gang yin yang zhi bar nges so// mig gi dbang po nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga gsal ba'i snang ba
87b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rna ba'i dbang po nyams shing rna ba gso bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam
88a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig dang ldan pas/ zhag gsum bsnyung bar gnas shing gos gsar pa gyon la khrus kyi cho ga brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ de'i rjes la bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang gur dmi Da
88a2(rgyud 'grel): la bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod sems can gyi don byas pas/ 'phrin las bzhi'i 'dod pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byas pas/ de nas yang 'od 'phros pas sngar dang 'dra/ de
88a3(rgyud 'grel): nas 'od 'phros sgra'i lha mo grangs med pa 'phros te/ de dag re re las kyang sprul pa'i lha mo dpag tu med pa 'phros te/ snang ba thams cad sgra'i lha mo zhal nas sgra snyan pa sna tshogs pa brjod pas/ phyag na sgra snyan pa'i 'byung
88a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung khungs pa wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa bsnams shing de nyid kyi sgras sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad du mchod pa'i bye brag sprin rnam par byed pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub
88a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rnams mchod nas/ slar ye shes kyi 'od phung po chen po gcig tu gyur nas bdag nyid la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la thim nas de nyid thim pas lus ngag khro bo rdo rje rnaM
88a6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms kyi nga rgyal du dmigs la tshogs rdzogs par bya/ de nas yang 'od 'phros pas lha mo de dag gis gong ltar sems can gyi don byas nas/ yang ye shes kyi 'od phung po gcig tu gyur nas/ bdag gi snying ga'i
88b1(rgyud 'grel): na la bstim pa snga ma dang 'dra'o// de nas lan gcig 'phros nas don gnyis rdzogs par byas nas bdag gi rna ba la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyan rnam par dag pa dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba ye shes kyi
88b2(rgyud 'grel): man pa rdzogs par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs par bzlas so// rna ba na ba rnams la khug chos chen po che'i phye ma dang rtsi mar la bzlas te b+h+r-ig/ 'on zhing sgyu mi thos pa rnams la 'bru mar dang ruN+Da
88b3(rgyud 'grel): sa te byug go// zug che zhing gzer ba rnams la mir sna tshogs dang sbrang rtsil bzlas la rtsa rnams la byugs te nyi ma la bsreg go// rna ba'i dbang po nyams pa dang de'i gso bo'i cho ga/ s+thi las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
88b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sna'i nang gso bar byed pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ khrus kyi tshe
88b5(rgyud 'grel): ga lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ de nas rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du gnas pa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od sgyu mo ltar 'phros pa las don gnyis byas pa'i tha mo dri'i lha mo rnams bdag nyid kyi sna la thim pas
88b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shangs dri ma med pa yongs su dag pa ye shes tshogs pa'i phung po las grub pa mkhyen pa'i go ma 'gags pa sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa dang ldan par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci
89a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs par bzlas so// de ltar sna chub pa rnams la 'bru mar la bzlas la b+hu go/ khrag 'bab cing dbugs stong pa bkab na tsan dkar po la bzla so// zug che ba na pa rnams la gi wang 'o ma la
89a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba la bzlas shing sna phug du blug go// sna'i dbang po nyams pa dang na pa gso ba dri ma dang bral ba'i sbyong byed ces bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// // dpal
89a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lce'i dbang po nyams shing na ba gso bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gos gsar pa gon te/ bsnyung bar gnas par byas pa khrus kyi cho ga lan nyi shu
89a4(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig byas te/ de nas rnyong nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ skyong gA'i sa bon las 'od snga ma ltar na gsum du 'phags pa mchod pa dang / sems can gyi don byas pa'i gzhug kha ro'i lha ma 'jig rten dang
89a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ro sna tshogs 'dzin po rnams bdag nyid lce la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lcags ring zhing spangs pa ye shes 'dus pa las byung ba mkhyen pa ma 'gags par gsal bar dmigs
89a6(rgyud 'grel): shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs par bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar yang skrangs pa rnams la rgya tshol bzlas pa bya ste byug go// brda mi shes pa rnams la shing kun la bzlaso// che zhing zug dang ldan pa rnam la 'bras bu gtsu
89b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbu ba dang ga pur gyi chu la bzlas so// grang zhing ser ka dang ldan pa rnams la tsha ba gsum dang tsan dan gyi chu la bzlaso// lce'i dbang po nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga pad+ma rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes
89b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lus kyi dbang po nyams shing na ba gso ba'i cho ga byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gos
89b3(rgyud 'grel): gsar pa dri ma med pa bgos te zhag gsum bsnyung bar gnas te/ lus kyi dbang po gang la yang khrus lan grangs bdun nam bcu gcig gam/ nyer gcig gam sum cu rtsa gnyis sum brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong
89b4(rgyud 'grel): phrag gcig gam khri phrag gcig la sogs pa na ba'i rigs dang sbyar la bya'o// de nas de'i 'og tu rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i nga rgyal du byas te/ rang gi snying ga'i se bin las 'od 'phrin las bzhi gang mos
89b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i kha dog tu 'phros pas reg bya'i lha mo kha dog 'od zer dang mthun po/ phyag na reg bya'i lha mo bye brag dpag tu med pa 'phros pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dpag tu med par mchod pa'i sprin gyis bstibs nas
89b6(rgyud 'grel): lanyes par bya ste/ ye shes kyi 'od phung po chen po gcig tu gyur nas slar bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs bsdus/ de nas yang 'phros nas lha mor gyur pas sems
90a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi don byas nas yang snying gar 'od du gyur nas thim mo// de lha mo spras nas lha mo de dag yang bdag gi lus la thim pas/ yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa'i ye shes
90a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi lus su song ste/ sangs rgyas sku'i mkhyen pa rdzogs par dri migs shing snying po rgyas bsdus la ci rigs par bzlaso// de yang lus kyi stong na na chu la bzla so// smad nan dri chu la bzla so// che na 'gi haM la bzla so// brang
90a3(rgyud 'grel): na na pu ram+bi gyi khu ba la bzlaso// mgo no nA rdo rgyus la bzlaso// ske dang mjing pa na na nya'i mkhris pa la bzlaso// lag pa na na stag tshir ra la bzlaso// pho mchin na ma bden bca' sga la bzlas so// blo snying mi bden bcu
90a4(rgyud 'grel): gang rgya mtsho gser gyi bye ma la bzlaso// yi ge 'chus na se 'bru dang gur kum la bzlaso// spos na rgya ma che la bya'o// ba shang gci che chung 'dom na sdig srin la bya'o// sgyu ma nu na sbyar ba'i lan d+ha la bya'o// mkhal ma
90a5(rgyud 'grel): nA na gser gyi phud pu l-i bya'o// pus mo na na tsan dan 'de gu lu bya'o// rkang pa na na li shi la bya'o// 'khru na sbyong rtsi dang ut+pal la bya'o// skyug na na le sham gyis bya'o// gzer ba la chu dkyil gyi rdo ba grang mo la bya'o//
90a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs logs na ba le la go mthil ge yon pa la bsngags shing blon no// gye ba na ba rgun 'bru mo la bzla so// chu son na dong kho dang lano tshwa la ba zlas shing dugs bya'o// rims la chu dang tsan dan dkar po la bzlas nas
90b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// 'brum bu la ga pur dang seng ldeng gi khu ba la bzlaso// glang gzer la a ka la'i khu bA la bzlaso// mdzes zin pa la ni gu gul dang b+ha sa li dang 'bras kyi thal ba la bzlaso// gdon drag pos zin pa rnams la
90b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrog shad kyi lcug ma dang / bal po se'u'i lca ma dang klu shing gi lcug ma la bya'o// 'bras la tshil chen gyi khu ba bsres la bya'o// mtshon gyis btab pa rnams la pa la sha'i lo mas bya'o// skrangs pa la tsha sna dang lum
90b3(rgyud 'grel): bu'i phye mas byi'o// shu ba dang dur byid dang / shu dag le bya'o// zha 'brum dang chur po la seng 'phro ma dang tsha ba'i yungs mo la bya'o// lhog pa dang pol la rab gnas byas pa'i tsha tsha rnying pa'i sa da / dug sna tshogs la
90b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlasau so// chu rgyus kyi nad la mar sna tshogs pa la bzlas tau sku mnye bya'o// snying rlung dang 'dar ba rnams la ta ma la'i 'bras bu la bzlas so// lba ba la seng ldeng gi phur pa la bzlas la bya'o// sbrid cing rengs pa'i nang la tsha ba
90b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum la bzlas pa bya'o// yan lag gi tshogs na pA rnams le khragau sna tshogs la bzlas pa bya'o// dbugs mi bde bo rnams la A li kA li'i 'bras bu la bzlas la bya'o// khrig nad la glang po'i shes bya'o// so nad la bra
90b6(rgyud 'grel): ma dkar mo'i rtsa ba las bzlaso// mchu nang la ni a ru ri'i pags pa la bzlaso// skal pa na ba liM 'bru mar la bzlaso// lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dang lus na ba gso ba'i cho ga rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes
91a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can tshe zad pa bsrings pa'i cho ga/ sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor
91a2(rgyud 'grel): snga ma ltar bzhengs la/ bum pa gcig la dpa' bo chen po'i phyag mtshan btab la der rdo rje mig gis bltos te bgegs bskrad la rang lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can a dkar po/
91a3(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la de nyid las 'od 'phros pas lha mo dkar mo lag na tshe'i bum pa thog pa grangs med pa spos la de la mchod pas mchod la 'chi ba'i ltas byung ba'i 'gro ba de la bstims pas mdangs nges par 'jug go// de lta bu byas
91a4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni lo gcig tu tshe bsnang bar nges so// tshe zad pa bsting ba'i cho ba rgyun g+hi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'dzums pa la phyog
91a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// se na tshe 'das pa'i sdig pa kun las thar par 'dod pas/ sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas so'i cho ga la sogs pa rdzogs par byas la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhed
91a6(rgyud 'grel): bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa kha dog tshon gyis bsgyur la/ lha so so'i phyag mtshan btab la lha rnams kyi nang du bzhag go// lha bshos dang mchod pa lnga lha'i grangs dang mnyam par bsham/
91b1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma yang de dang 'dra'o// phyogs skyong rnams dang bgegs rnams kyi gtor ma yang ba shram mo// de nas ro de khrus nas bton la rgyan cha lngas brgyan la khro bo tshol ba'i gar bya'o// de nas yam shing dbus su bcug ste/
91b2(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba dang / g.yon brkyang mnyam pa'i gar gsum hUM sgra dang bcas pa'i bskor ro// sbyin sreg nas byung ba ltar me lha spyan drang ba dang / dgug gzhug byas la cho ga'i las rim pa ltar spyan drangs pa dang / bstod pa la sogs
91b3(rgyud 'grel): pa sngags dang phyag rgya dang / tshigs bcang rnams kyis rgyas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar zer te lho phyogs su ngan song rnam par dag par byed pa'i maN+Dal le'u tshe drug pa legs par bkod la/ rigs drug nas
91b4(rgyud 'grel): drung ba'i cho ga ni dri ma le tshe nag por bzhag ste/ hUM mnar med las kyi mnar ba'i sems can khyod// ston nas sbyangs pa bral mnar med 'khor// sdug bsngal chen po bzod par dka' bas na// sdug bsngal bzod med tsha grang
91b5(rgyud 'grel): bor gyis la// bzod chen ye shes chu rgyun 'di long la// yid ldan sgo lnga longs spyod gnas 'dir spyon// bum tshus dbang bsku ro// oM na rA ga sa man+ta hU~M/ de nas yang / 'dod pa rang rgyud bcad pa'i sems can khyod// rku 'breg lnga
91b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsags pa'i 'bras bu las// yid 'dod ngoms mang 'bras bu sdug bsngal los// yid 'gyur 'dod chen spyod pa'i las bor la// yid bzhin gter dang ldan pa 'di long la// rmugs spyod dran rig 'tshol ba'i gnas
92a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dir sbyor// oM pre ta pre tsa pA ti hUM/ de nas dud 'gro'i gnas su drang ba ni/ hUM shes rab ma rig par mnar sems can khyod// thos bsam bral bas sems las log par mthong // rmugs pa ma mthun
92a2(rgyud 'grel): bag chags ma yal bas// mun pa rang rig bral ba'i ga nas bor lo// shes rab dge ba'i dri med 'di long la// bde sdug bsags pa 'khor ba'i gnas 'dir spyon// oM tiR+Ya ka ma hA bi le hUM/ de nas mi'i gnasu drang ba ni//
92a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM pade sdug 'chol bar sbyangs pa dor ba khyod// rang sems ma rtogs 'khor byar 'khyams pa yi// dug gsum lam brten thar pa'i skas dang bral// sems rgyad zhen po gcod pa'i gnas bor la// dri ma med pa'i 'dod bral
92a4(rgyud 'grel): khrims long la// rtsub 'gyur 'jigs su rung ba'i gnas 'dir spyon// oM pa laM d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ de nas lha mun gnas su drang ba ni/ hUM rtsub 'gyur las kyi skatsho ba'i sems can khyod// 'jigs spyod go mtshon zhe sdang lam la
92a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// 'dod pa'i rkyen lon rags pa'i dug bor nas// bsam gton mi mchog chu bo 'di long la// longs spyod dga' bde ldan pa'i gnas 'dir spyon// oM pra b+he sa ma ya li na ma sa man+ta hUM/ de nas lha'i gnas nas spyan drangs
92a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// hU~M dga' bde las kyis bcings pa'i sems can khyod// bde 'dod sems kyi li los g.yengs pa ste// rang rgyud chags pas bcings pa'i gnas bor la// mi 'jigs dpung dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus chu long la//
92b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin med skye shi med pa'i shar sgor spyon// oM de pA pa tsa sarba at+ma ya hUM/ de nas skabs 'dir zas gtad pa'i cho ga bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi gnas dang / mtshan nas bton la der song zhig ces lam
92b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan to// de nas mgal ma'i 'khor lo bskor te/ phung po'i gnas lnga ram mes la shes kyi me 'bar bar dmigs la/ mau sbar te dgang gzar dang blugs gzar thogs la sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o// hUM ye shes klong yangs
92b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil pa'i ha~M khung nas// rnam dag ye shes lnga rdzogs yam shing las// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyi me byung bas// tshe 'das bdag tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dz+ha la raM// srid pa rgyun gcong 'khor lo'i ho khung nas// rnam drag phung lnga
92b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyang ba'i yam shing las// khro brgyad phyogs na gnas pa'i ma byung bas// tshe 'das rnam shes brgyad la dz+wa la raM// bar khyams rin chen mnyam pa'i haM khung nas// mi mthun rkyen rnams yaM shing las// bkra shis lha mo
92b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyi me byung bas// tshe 'das rnam shes brgyad la dza la raM// gru char rang bzhin dag pa'i hom bung nas// gnyis med yang shes bzhi'i yam dang las// rgyal chen stobs ldan bzhi'i me byung bas// tshe 'das 'byung ba
92b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po dz+wa la raM// sna tshogs 'od ldan 'dod pa'i hi khung nas// khams gsum 'dod pas grol ba'i yam shing las// phyogs skyong shugs ldan bcu yi mo byung bas// tshe 'das phyin ci log bzhi dz+wa la raM// sgo bzhi rang
93a1(rgyud 'grel): gdangs dgyes pa'i ho khung nas// log lta 'joms byed tshogs rdzogs yam shing las// sgo skyong sgo ma bzhi yi me byung bas// tshe 'das phyin ci log bzhi dzA la raM// zhes nyon mongs pa dang bag chags
93a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sa bon rnams bsregs te/ sa bon gyi cha tsam yang ma lus par byaso// tshig de dag brjod la lha so so'i sngags nas brjod cing dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyis bkang zhing dbul lo// rdzas ni zhi rgyas gang la mos
93a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la sbyin sreg gi cho ga ltar bya'o// shi ba'i sems can sdig pa las thar byed pa'i ro bsreg pa'i cho ga dug sbyongs gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogaso//
93a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar sdig pa sbyangs pa byas nas/ lhag ma'i rus pa la tshe tsha 'debs par 'dod pas sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pasna/ dang po stong pa nyid kyi ngang nas raM zhes yongasu
93a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las sa'i nyes pa'i skyon rnams ye shes kyi mes sbyangs/ de nas baM yongs su gyur pa las ye shes kyi chu rgyun dbab/ de nas yaM zhes pa gyur pa las/ ye shes kyi rlung gis bskyod/ saM zhes pa gyur pa las/ ye shes
93a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'dus pa'i sar dmigaso la skabs der bdun rnam pararo dag pa'i las bya'o// tshogs rdzogs par byas la/ 'bi 'bi bya ba'i sngags ni/ oM ma hA ba le be ga ra na hU~M zhes brjod cing / ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang gi
93b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyur byin gyis brlab bo// de nas tsha tsha gdab pa ni snying po rgyas bsdus gang la mos pa bzlas shing gdab bo// de ni sa la 'debs pa'i lugs so// me la 'debs na raM gyi sa bon la bskyed la/ chu la baM rlung la yaM/ na mkha' la
93b2(rgyud 'grel): e lasna mchod rten du bskyed do// mchod rten de dag kyang sa la kha dog ser po// chu dkar po/ me dmar po/ rlung ljang gu/ nam mkha' mthing khar dmigaso// de ltar btab la ye shes kyi mchod rten spyan drangs la gnyisu med
93b3(rgyud 'grel): par bstim mo// de nas bskal pa ji srid gnas pa'i yun la rigs lnga'i mchod rten du dmigs la/ rab tu gnas pa byas la mchod pa lnga phul la bzhugasu gsol ba 'am/ yang na chu bo la bskuro// mchod rten la gdab
93b4(rgyud 'grel): pa shaM ba'i sdig pa byang bar byed pa/ rang byung 'jigs bral zhes bya ba/ dpal mar mi mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tsha lo// tshe dang dpal bskyed
93b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po mo tshig dang ldan pas/ gnas khang yid dang mthun par dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa kha dog ser po lte d+hA ts+tshin+yo mu khyud ljang gu sgo bzhi'i rigs dang 'dra ba bris la de la lha'i mtshan ma
93b6(rgyud 'grel): btab la/ bum po tshad dang ldan pa la lha lnga'i mtshan mas btab la/ 'bru gtsang ma'i phye ma che ba shos zla gam pa la mar la sogs pa'i ro mchog rnams kyis brgyan la sna tshon sna lnga'i skud pas gzungs thab
94a1(rgyud 'grel): btags/ snying po brgyas bsdus gung la mos pa'i gzhug la/ oM badz+rA d+hU 'bruM/ oM bud+d+ha A~M 'ab+h+rUM/ rat+na s+yA b+hUM/ byAd+d+ha AHbruM/ kar+m+ma hA b+h+rUM/ zhes bzlas la rdo rje rnam+b+ha par 'joms pa sku mdog dkar po
94a2(rgyud 'grel): tshe'i rgyun 'bebs pa/ khams gsum gyi tshe nyams pa gso bar byed pa/ ye shes tshe la longs spyod par skyed la/ de'i thugs ka'i zla ba dmigs la sngags bzlaso// khams gsum tshe'i bcud bum par bsdus par dmigs
94a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ lha lnga'i mtshan nas brjod cing tsha ge mo'i khug zhes brjod cing bstims la dbang bskuro// sems can tshe zad pa bsring ba'i cho ga bsgrub pa pad+ma dbyig sgrub ces bya ba/ slob dpon yau shes rdo rjes mdzad pa
94a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byor pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ ril pa spyi blugs kyi nang du
94a5(rgyud 'grel): chu dang 'o mas bkrung la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i lugs ma'i spyi bo nus sbeng cing gong ltar shin tu snying po bsdus pa la brgya phrag bzlas ri shing skya rengs dang po ra shar ba'i dus na byas pas rang gi 'dod pa dngo'i byor pa thams
94a6(rgyud 'grel): cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i hU~M mdog dkar por dmigs la yi dam du byas te/ gzhan gyis ma mthong bar ra res byas na nyin ro la gser gyi ngong tse bdun brgya bdun brgya sbyin pa/
94b1(rgyud 'grel): byed do// gtso bo'i mdun du rnam thos sras mdog dang cha luT len par dmigs la bya'o// dal 'byor chen po'i sgrub pa bcud kyi len pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogaso//
94b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon gyi lan chags kyi dbang gis tshe 'di la phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba rnams ni/ gtor ma'i las byed par 'dod pas rin po che'i snod rgya che la gting zab
94b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dag cing dri ma med pa chag pa dang gos pa dang zhom pa la sogs pa med pa/ 'bras chan nam/ 'bru phye ma rab tu gtsang bas btams la/ shwa dang mar dang 'o ma dang khur ba la sogs pas bran la chu rab tu gtsang zhing dri ma me
94b4(rgyud 'grel): pas blan la/ sngon du stong pa nyid sgom de nas tshad med pa bzhi sgom/ de'i ngang las bdag nyid kyis baM zhes brjod pas bdag gis mdun du sdong po shin tu rgya che ba spangs mtho ba sum brtsegs pa gcig la/ de yang steng gi pad+ma
94b5(rgyud 'grel): la kha dog dkar po 'dab ma dpag tu med pa dbus dmar po 'dab ma dpag tu med pa 'og sngon po dpag tu med pa dmig so// de'i rjes laM pi ke la hUM dza zhes brjod pas/ khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams ca
94b6(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can thams cad steng gi pad ma'i steng du 'dus shing 'khod par bsam/ dbus su gzugs khams 'og tu 'dod pa khams kyi sems can 'dus shing 'khod par
95a1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs la/ de nas 'og tu gtor ma'i snod de ci yin kyang rin po che'i snod rgyu khyon dpag tu med par dmigs so// de'i 'og tu hUM las rdo rje phyed chung gi rgyad po// de'i 'og tu yaM las rlung gi dkyil
95a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zla gam gcig bsgreng / de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa/ de'i steng du rgyud po'i steng du bruM las rin po che'i snod kho ra khor yug tu bcas po dmigs shing de'i nang du khaM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho/
95a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag nyid kyi yaM yaM yaM zhes brjod pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las rlung g.yos// re raM r-i zhes brjod pas/ rlung g.yos pas me'i dkyil 'khor las me sbar/ bruM bruM bruM zhes brjod pas 'og tu me 'bar bas snod rin
95a4(rgyud 'grel): po che'i snod du zhu/ khaM khaM khaM zhes brjod pas mi 'bar bas snod dros pas rdzas rnams zhu bas/ bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor 'khyil/ de nas oM zhes brjod pas snod kyi nang dam tshig gi bdud rtsi de skya'i bdud
95a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ I zhes brjod pas gsung gi bdud rtsir gyur/ hUM zhes brjod pas thugs kyi bdud rtsir gyur/ de nas yang raM zhes brjod pas dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i nyes pa rnams bsregs/ yi gris ge tor khams kyis bkrus na
95a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas sku gsung thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i bdud rtsir gyur pa'o// de nas bsrung ba chen po'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrang / de nas badz+ra zhes brjod pas zla phyed rdo rje las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi babs te/ rnam par dag po'i
95b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi chen po'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur te/ de nas oM ba ling b+hu dza b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha i daM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA naM ad+ya nud pan+d+ha na tAng / oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pas gzugs med pa rnams la yang
95b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bus dbul// gzugs khams rnams la dpag bsam gyi shing / 'dod pa rnams la rang rang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du thob par mos par bya'o// de nas chog bcad kyang 'di skad brjod do// rang bzhin rnam pa
95b3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i gtor ma 'dis/ dkon mchog mchod gnas bla'i zhing gyur dang / gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pas bsdus pa yi// mgon btsun grogs byed tshe skyo srungs ma dang // rang bzhin yon tan ldan pa'i rigs rnams
95b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // lan chags 'dod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang // gnod byed 'phral gyi rkyen du byed la bsngo// lan chags dang bral bar byed pa gtor ma'i las dpag bsam gyi sdong po zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes
95b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa phun sum tshogs par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ bdag nyid kyi
95b6(rgyud 'grel): mdun du zangs la sogs pa'i snod bre bco brgyad shong ba gcig bzhag la/ de'i nang du rin po che'i sna gang yang rung ba las byas pa'i dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa mtsho na gang pa 'am/ mtho gang pa 'am/ khru gang pa
96a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ji ltar 'grub pa'i lugs ma byas la bzhugs su gsol/ zangs la sogs pa'i snod khyor ba gang shong pa gcig tu chu gtsang ma srog chags myed pas bkang ste/ 'bru 'am thun
96a2(rgyud 'grel): 'theb skya re bcug la/ na maHtsan DaM badz+ra kr-i d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu tiMSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+taM/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hUM phaT/ ces lan bdun bdun brjod la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog gser btso ma lta bu la dmig
96a3(rgyud 'grel): la dbul lo// mchod sbyin gyi phyag se gol gyi sgra dang ldan pas snong chen po khengs kyis dbul/ 'bul dus su khaM dang yan lag bshal la dbul lo// de ltar phul bas nyi ma re l-i kAr sha pa na lnga stong lnga stong thob par
96a4(rgyud 'grel): nges so// de ltar ma chago par nyi ma ri rtse la shar ba phan chad dang / lto ba'i god du rdzogs par bya'o// de ltar nyi ma re la yi dam du byas pas 'dod pa'i phun sum tshogs par nges so// longs spyod dang ldan par nges pa'i
96a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal tshogs kyi gtor ma rin po che legs phreng zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ya shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phun sum tshogs pa'i las nye
96a6(rgyud 'grel): bar sgrub par byed pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ mchod pa'i rgya mtsho chen po rnam par rol par bya'o// dbus su 'bru sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bzhag go// shar phyogasu khams blud sor bzhi pa brgya la gdugs
96b1(rgyud 'grel): brgya/ lhor ba dan brgya/ nub tu rgyal mtshan brgya/ byang du dar dbyangs brgya/ de dag lan bdun bdun byas na 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par nges so// phun+da sum tshogs pa'i las nye bar bsgrub par byed pa las tshegs
96b2(rgyud 'grel): stong rgyas zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten gyi lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa la lha chen po brgyad kyi tsho gas
96b3(rgyud 'grel): lha mnyes par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la gtor ma la sogs pa snga ma ltar bshams la/ lha chen po brgyad kyi gzugs brnyan byas la/ de re re la ngar byung sor
96b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis theskor la/ tshon gyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsgyur la dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' mar bzhag go// de nas lha chen po rnams spyan drangs pa ni/ hUM ri rab chen po'i yang stengs nas/ 'jig rten stobs
96b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan lha chen rnams// drag shul ldan zhing rdzu 'phruldan/ dbang phyug grags pa rnams bskyed pa// legs pa'i lam yang ston pa ste// lha chen drag po 'khor dang bcas// 'dir spyon legs pa'i lam ston cig/ sa ma ya dzaH
96b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas bstod cing gtor ma dngul ba ni// hU~M shararaM phyogs lha tshon dbang phyug ni// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// sku mdog sngo sgyu 'jigs byed pa// sgra rjes spyan yang 'bru tshugs lnga// dur khrod 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan
97a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na tri shul rtse gsum bsnams// g.yon na thod pa khrag 'dren pa// de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul// lho phyogs lha chen rgyal chen ni// sku mdog ser la zhal gcig pa// 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag
97a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa// g.yas pa rdo rje gsum pa bsnams// g.yon pa rus pa'i phreng ba 'dzin// de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul// nub phyogs lha dbong tshangs pa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// sgra brdzes mtsho ba gtsigs po la/
97a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i nga ro 'brug ltar sgrog/ g.yas pa dung chen g.yas 'khyil bsnams// g.yon pa pad+ma mdzes pa 'dzin// de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul// byang phyogs lha chen khyabo 'jug ni// zhal dgu phyag gnyis sku mdog
97a4(rgyud 'grel): dud// mgo lus spyan gyis khengs pa ste// ro smad sbrul nag 'khyil pa li// g.yas pa phyag na dbyug tho 'phyar// g.yon bI phyag na 'khor lo bsnams// de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul// shar lho 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ni// zhal
97a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis sku mngag smag/ dur khrod 'jigs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// ha ha hiM hI cher sgrogs po// g.yas pa mda' ste g.yon pa gzhu// de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul// lho nub tshogs kyi pa dag po ni// zhal
97a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis ste mdog ni ga/ sbrul gyi lus brgyan 'jigs rung ba// rab 'jigs dbang can kun gyi gtso// glang sngon sna la mche ba gtsigs// g.yas pa glang chen mche ba bsnams// g.yon pa glad+ho rlon pa 'ad+hi/
97b1(rgyud 'grel): de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul// nub byang nag po chen po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ skra g.yengs so mnan khrag gis brlan// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin// g.yon pa'i phyag na zhags pa bsnam//
97b2(rgyud 'grel): de la stong pa gtor ma 'bul// byang shar smin drug dbang phyug bu// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang // 'jigs byed chen po'i zhal gdengs nas// rab tu rngam pa'i nga ro can// phya go gnyis mdung thung
97b3(rgyud 'grel): gsor byed cing // de la bstod de gau tor ma 'bul// lha chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas// mchod dang gtor ma 'phul ba yiso// 'jig rten lha rnams mnyes byas te// bdag dang 'dod pa'i don rnams ni// nges par
97b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gra ba por mdzad du gsol// zhes gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la// ri'i rtse mo la sil snyan sna tshogs pa'i sgra dang ldan par byas la bskyal la/ dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing bkra shis gsol// 'jig rten gyi lha mnyes
97b5(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa/ dron grub pa zhes bya ba dpal mar mo mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bsgrub bya la mdza' bo dang ces pa dang / so so'i skye
97b6(rgyud 'grel): bo rnams kyi lce 'bib par 'dod na/ sa sna bdun nam bcu gcig la bsgrub bya'i gzugs khru gang ba byas te/ snying gar gro ga la ra khrag gis ming rus bris te gzhug go// de'i spyi bor e gru gsum brus la/ tshe
98a1(rgyud 'grel): ma sna tshogs pa nyag ma re gzugs so// mgo la lngas ngan sra tshogs smos brgyan/ lus la gze ma mang po btsugs la dur khab kyis btur/ de bdag gi mdun du bzhag la gtso bo la mchod
98a2(rgyud 'grel): bstod ce rigs par byas li spyan ma rnams dang sgrog skya dang / bra ma'i 'brum bu dang / kye ba dang / bse shing gi 'bras bu la sarba sha tI hUM phaT ces 'bum phrag gcig bzlas te/ thun gyi skyabs su brabs te/ mi chen po
98a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi lce nyams po 'di la phob cig ces brjod cing / ri gsum 'dus pa'i rtsel sran ma'i sbyin sreg lan nyer gcig byas la thal ba de rlung la skur te/ bsgrub bya'i khad pa la khrag gis gtor na nges par mdzu'
98a4(rgyud 'grel): sdug rnams kyis lce 'bab par nges so// skye bo sdang ba'i las myur byed chen mo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo//
98a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi lce 'babs pa dang / sdang ba bzlog par 'dod pa'i sgrib pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs te cho ga rdzogs par byas la/ bdag nyid sdig pa ma lus pa yongasu
98a6(rgyud 'grel): dag par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ gtor ma re re'i nang sdang ba rnams ya hi gardza zhes gro ga la bris la gzhug/ snying po shin tu
98b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa'i sngags brgya phrag sum cu so lU// sgra dang mkhan pa dang glang ma dang shug pa'i lo ma la bzlas la gzhan gyi du bas ma sleb par yul kun tu du ba chen po btang / tshon rtsi lnga'i phye ma la bsngags bzlas la rlung chen
98b2(rgyud 'grel): po pye dus su yul kun khyab par gtor ro// de sa ni gzhan gyi lce 'bab pa rgyun 'chad do// gzhan gyi lce 'bab pa zlo gra pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
98b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mdza' bo bdag la sdang ne ma rungs par byed pa'i las ni dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bris la/ lte bar che ge mo mA ra ya dza zhes pa bri/ mu khyud
98b4(rgyud 'grel): la kA li/ rtsibs la khro bo lnga'i sngagos bris la cho ga rdzogs par byas nas dur khrod du mnan mdzo' bo sdang ba ma rungs par 'gyur ro// sdug gu bdag la sdang ba dbang du bsdu bar 'dod na/ snying po bsdus pa la stong phrag lnga
98b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas la dpral bar tsan dan gyi lcags kyu bri/ lag mthil du gi wang gi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa re b+his la/ che ge mo'i nor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur cig swA hA/ zhes badz+rI pas dbang du 'gyuraro// skye bo gang sdang ba dur
98b6(rgyud 'grel): brod du gsang ba'i sbyor ba lan bdun brjod na 'chi bar nges so// sdang ba gsum gyi las thor bu slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyog 'tshal lo//
99a1(rgyud 'grel): bran dang bza' mi bsrung bar 'dod pas sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dur khrod kyi shing leb kyi steng du dkyil 'khor bzhengs la khri'i steng du bzhag la/ 'og tu chu'i snod chen po bzhag go//
99a2(rgyud 'grel): de'i shar du gang bsrung ba de rnams khrus nas bton pa bzhag la/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la mdud pa bor la mgul du gdagaso// rgya shig la 'khor lo rtsibs lnga pa la shin tu bsdus pas
99a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ge wang gis bris la/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu gdags so// shar du khaM bltos la phyag btsal ba dang / de ltar lho dang nub dang byang rnamasu phyag 'tshal du bcug la dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi chus brab pa dang / bajig pa
99a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'thor 'thung byas la dkyil 'khor gyi 'og nas shar nas nub tu bton cing ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de 'od kyi phung po zhi bar 'dod na dkor po/ rgyas par 'dod na ser po/ dbang du 'dod na dmar po/ tshar bcad par
99a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod na ljang gur bzhu/ lha rnams gshegs su gsol la 'od zer de gang bsrung ba'i spyi gtsug tu bstims la/ de nyid kyang 'od kyi kha dog ci 'dra bar bzhu bar dmigs la/ phyogs skyong dang sgo ma rnams de nyid la
99a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod par dmig so// de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi gzhir 'gyuraro// bran dang gza' mi gdon gyis gtses pa bsrung ba'i cho ga chen mo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon
99b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mthun pa'i 'thab pa dang rtsod pa rnams zhi bar 'dod pas nags stug po'i khrod du song ste/ dkyil 'khor
99b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rtsibs bzhi pa zhi ba'i kha dog tu bzhengs la lha rnams spyan drangs pa dang / bzhugs su gsol ba la sogs pa bya ste/ bkra shis bum pa la lha rnams dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bya ste/ bum pa nyid la mchod cing
99b3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa byas la snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la zhag bdun nam bcu cig tu bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas bdag nyid lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa skra brdzes la stong g.yogs gzar la/ sdigs mdzub bsgreng la g.yul 'gyed
99b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khrod de'i bar du phyin na g.yul 'gyes so// mi mthun pa'i sems can rnams la yungs kar la bzlas nas bton na mthun par 'gyur ro// bdag dang mthun pa'i sems can la gnod par sems pa las ka ra bai ri'i me
99b5(rgyud 'grel): tog la bzlas nas/ de'i gdong du gtor na gnod pa byas pa dang / bsam pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// rtswa dur ba la dur khrod kyi thul po la bzlas nas gtor na 'phrog ma'i sems zhi bar 'gyur// mdza' bshes dang mdza' bo mi
99b6(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa la ni go la 'am shing gang yang rung ba la bzlos nas byin na mdza' zhing bcugs par 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'am yon tan can dang / mi mthun pa la ni bya nag mo'i sgo nga dang / mu zi la bzlas la me byas la rlung phyogs su 'phyar
100a1(rgyud 'grel): pa tsam gyis mthun sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mi mthun pa zhi bar byed pa'i rtsi sbyor dbyig gi nor bu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
100a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nor 'grib par 'gyur ba slar 'gugs par 'dod pa'i sgrib pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ shin tu ma phongs pa'i khyim nas blangs la zhing bzang po'i sa dang
100a3(rgyud 'grel): sa la stegs pu ba ste thig bta la de nas mtshon dgye ba ni/ dbus pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po khyams gnyis dang sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bya'o// lta bar rdo rje ram par ngolas pa'i mtshan ma gdab bo// shar
100a4(rgyud 'grel): du rigs na pa ma sor / sa kyi be con/ nub tu mtshon chen gyi bsre kha sbyor// byang du rnam thos sras kyi dong tse bris la/ shos gtsang me bzhi/ 'du 'i me tog bzhi/
100a5(rgyud 'grel): dr-idri du sapan sgo/ rab sa me tog gi phreng bas s+thi // tha ma r+ya rin po che sna tshogs pa pa rnatshogs pa ma bu dang de'i phyi rim lo pa
100a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dang ldan pa rnags pa bcugs te/ dkyil 'khor mi mthong bar bya'o// de'i phyi rim rnams su dri sna tshogs pa'i tshig chag gdab ste/ rtswa ku shas 'khor bar dgram mo// steng du dar sna tshogs pa'i yol ba
100b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'phyang ma 'phyang gis khebs par byas so// logs rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ris su bris pa dang / 'bur du bstod pa dang lugs su blugs pa la sogs 'khor bgram mo// de nas
100b2(rgyud 'grel): bza' ba dang btung ba dang myang ba dang / bldog pa la sogs pa kha zas kyi bye brag ji ltar 'byor pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' mar bzhag la/ mchod g.yog pa gnyis sam gsum gyis mchod pa rgyun ma chad par
100b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// slob dpon bdag bstod g.yogs pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang / dbu rgyan la sogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la ku sha'i steng du khrus bya/ rgyan sna tshugs pas brgyan la 'khor dang /
100b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas te bzhag go/ de'i phyi logs na g.yas brkyang ba'i stobs kyis g.yas skor du hUM zhes bgegs bskyed de nas log ste/ byed shar nas g.yon brkyang ba'i stobs kyis g.yon bskor du oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM hUM zhes
100b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas/ bdag dang yono bdag gi nor 'grib par byed pa'i bgegs de dpag tshad brjod kyis mi lang bar byar zhing dengs par bya'o// de nas mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga zhag gsum du rgyun mim chad par bya/ bdag nyid
100b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la ci nus su bzlas/ yon bdag gi sems bskyed pa dang / sdig pa bshags po dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / 'dod pa'i don la sogs pa la gsol ba ci nus su byed du gzhug go/ de nas nub
101a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi tha ma kha zas longs spyod pa dang / yon bdag gza' bran 'khor dang bcas pa la dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams gsal la dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing dbang bskuro// rnam thos
101a2(rgyud 'grel): sras la gtor ma chen po gcig byin la nor gyi bdag por mnga' gsol/ yon bdag 'khor dang bcas pas kyang / byang phyogs kyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi bu 'khor dang bcas pas de nub nas bzung
101a3(rgyud 'grel): pa phan chod nor gyi bdag po mdzod l-i bdag cag gi nor dang zas mi 'grib par 'phel bar mdzad du gsol zhes dus la brjod do// de nas gtor ma btang sil snyan sna tshogs pa'i sgra dang ldan pas btang ngo //
101a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu/ bkra shis gsol/ bsod nams kyi tshogs ji ltar 'byor pa bsags cing bla ma la yon dbul lo// nor 'grib pa dgang ba'i cho ga dpag bsam shing rgyas pa zhes bya ba/
101a5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpalo rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo// cho gasti bdag po'i las 'dod pa'i don thams cad rab tu sbyin pa longs spyod
101a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par maN+Dal zlum po shin tu mnyam pa me long gi ngos lta bur byas te/ kha dog sngon po khru do'i tshad tsam byas la de'i bar pu sngon
101b1(rgyud 'grel): po gtso ba'i yi ges 'khor ba nang du tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po gser las bris pa dang / ras sngon po la tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs bris la rab tu gnas pa byas la dang sna tshogs pas dril la de'i nang du
101b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhag go/ spre'u'i snying gi nang du gser sa byung ma dang / rin po che rnyed tshad dang / sha sna rnyed tshad de maN+Dal gyi steng du bzhugs la/ glang po che'i spu dang / spre'u'i spu bsgril ba'i gzungs thag gdags/ de'i steng
101b3(rgyud 'grel): du tshogs kyi bdag po sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan gsal bar bsgom/ bdag nyid rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du rgyas du byas la gzungs thag bzung la/ na mo rata na t+yA yA ya/ oM ga swA hA/ zhes stong stong gzhan gyis/
101b4(rgyud 'grel): bar ma chod par zlas shing tshogs bdag gis bdag nyid la longs spyod ji ltar 'dod pa byin par bsam mo// yar ngo'i brgyad pa 'am/ yang na mar ngo'i brgyud pa la tshogs kyi bdag po'i gtor ma shin tu bzang po
101b5(rgyud 'grel): sha sna tshogs dang / mar dang / bur ba dang / ro mchog sna tshogs dang ldan pas mchod cing 'dod pa'i don la gsol pa gdabo/ gzhan gyis mthong du mi rung ngo // tshogs bdag gi bsgrub pa dbul ba'i gter sbyin zhes
101b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa nor dang zas 'dod pa rnams kyi dam pa rdzogs so// / dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las thar par 'dod pa'i
102a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la stong phrag lnga bzlas nas bye ma la bzlas nas rgyal po'i gdong du gtor na rgyal po'i chad pa las thur bar 'gyuraro// me'i 'jigs
102a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bar 'dod na shing gcig gi drung du song ste/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa rdzogs par byas la snying po rgyas bsdus la snga ma ltar bzlas nas/ rke tshe la bzlas nas me la gtor na zhi bar 'gyu ro// chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa
102a3(rgyud 'grel): las se byi'i shi phye mar btags pa las bzlas te phog par gtor na zhi bar 'gyuraro// gtsan zan khro bos 'jigs pa rnams la stag gi sgra la bzung na zhi bar 'gyuraro// mkha' 'gro mas 'jigs na ce spyang gi
102a4(rgyud 'grel): khrag dang bsres nas bdag gi lus mgo 'jug du byugs na zhi bar 'gyuraro// sbrul gdugs pas 'dzin na/ mu thi dang gla rtsil bzlasan+damagul du btags na zhi bar 'gyur ro// dug gis 'jigs na rma bya'i khris+tha dang /
102a5(rgyud 'grel): gu khye'u'i ro mtshan dang stsal pa byas ru'i sha la bzlas nas lto stong la spu zos na/ de'i 'og tu rang gi dri chu 'thungs pas zhi bar 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa brgyud las thar pa'i sgrub pa skal ba'i gla'u zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye
102a6(rgyud 'grel): shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyaga'i tshal lo// gang zag gza' ngan pa'i dus las zlog par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas dkyil
102b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor snga ma bzhin du bris la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ kha dog sngon po gtso bo'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bzhag la/ de la gtso bo'i bsnyen pa brgya phul la bzhago// dkyil 'khor gyi
102b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs mtsham su phur pa brgyad la dar dmar po'i cod pa Na btags la khro bo brgyad du bskyed la bzhag go/ mar me la sogs pas gtso bo dang gza' brgyad mchod do// gza'i gtor ma gtsang ma brgyad phyogs gtor dang
102b3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs gtor yang bsham mo// dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas rnamasu bag zan la gza'i gzugs byas la tshon gyis bsgyur la bzhag/ de dag re ro'i mdun du sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma la sogs spyan gzigs kyis kyang 'khor ba
102b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go/ khyams rnams su rgyu skur gyi gzugs byas la bzha go/ de nas gtso bo la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la/ gzu'o rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs te/ tshigs bcad kyis kyang spyan drang ba 'di skad do// hUM
102b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM rnam dag ri rab legs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// gza' brgyad rgyu skar 'khor dang bcas pa spyan 'dren na// sngon gyi dam tshig dbang gis ge shegasau su gosolo// e he hi dzaH/ rang bzhin mi mnyam rnam dag gzhal yas
102b6(rgyud 'grel): lo// mnyes par bris shing spras pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gza' tshon 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugasu gsol// sa ma yA hUM zhes so// so so'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlaso// sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams gsal bar bsgoms/
103a1(rgyud 'grel): la// mchod pa 'bul ba ni/ hUM phyogs bcu kun nas rnam drag rdzas kyi mchog/ mdzes par bltams pa'i yon chab 'di// gza' rnams 'khor dang bcas lnga dbul// dam tshig dbang gis bzhes su
103a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol// phyogs bcu mdzes par bltams pa'i me tog 'di// snang gsal 'di/ gza' rnams/ gdug/ spos/ gshos gtsang / sil snyan/ gza' rnams dam tshig dbang gis bzhesu gsol// de nas gza' rnams/
103a3(rgyud 'grel): la bstod cing gtor ma dbul ba ni// hUM shar phyoms bzal chen pi ba sangs// sku mdog dmar po mdzes pa la// na bza' dar dkar stod g.yog can// rin chen sna tshogs rgyun gyis brgyan// phyag mtshan phyag na s+phu gr-i
103a4(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// de la bstod cing gtor ma 'dul/ sa bza' chen phur bu ni/ chu ga kyi ngas pa / srog brem 'chong 'o// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// ser po dar gyi stod g.yogs can// phyag mtshon phyag ni gleT
103a5(rgyud 'grel): ba mi bsnams// zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa la// da lo bstod cing gtor ma 'bul// nub phyogs gza' chen zla ba ni// sku mdog dkar po mdzes pa la// nu bza' dar dmar stong g.yogs can// rin tshan sna tshogs rgyan
103a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan// phyag mtshan phyag na pad+ma bsnams// ngang pa dag la zhon pa la// de la wa stong de gtor ma 'bul// byang phyogs gza' tshan lag pa ni// sku mdog ser po mdzes pa la// na bza' zangs kyi thor cog gsol//
103b1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sna tshogs rgyun gyis brgyan// phyag mtshan phyag na chan gri bsnams// sbrul gyi steng na bzhugs pa la// de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul// lha chen gza' chen sgra gcan 'dzin// sku mdog dung kha mdzes pa la/
103b2(rgyud 'grel): na bza' sbrul gyi bskyed bcings nas// mgo lus thams cad mig gis khengs// phyag mtshan phyag na mnga' gzhu 'gyengs// ro smad sbrul du 'khyil pa la// de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul// nub byang gza' chen nyi ma
103b3(rgyud 'grel): ni// sku mdogra dmar po mdzes pa la// na bza' thog lcags gu zu can// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// phyag mtshan phyag ni pad+ma bsnams// rta'i steng na zhon pa la// de la bstod de gtwor ma 'bul// byang shar
103b4(rgyud 'grel): gza' tshan spen pa ni// sku mdog nag po 'jigs pa la// na bza' dar dmar thul pi gsel// rin chen mdzes po'i rgyan gyis brgyan// phyag mtshan phyag na ral gri bsnams// 'brug gi steng na bzhugs pa la// de
103b5(rgyud 'grel): la bstod de gtor ma 'bul// gza' chen 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te/ so so'i rgyu skar 'khor bcas la// me tog gtor ma gus pas 'bul// 'di dag so sor bstims nas ni// las 'di'i 'bras bu grub par
103b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// ces gtor ma dbul/ phyogs sbyong dang bgegs rnams la yang bstod cing gtor ma dbul lo// gza' ngan pa bzlog pa'i cho ga rgya mtsho sprin zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa
104a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la 'tshal lo// gang dag gza' rnams kyi zin pa las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma
104a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar bris la/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su chu dang khrag dang 'o ma bsres pas snod zungs la sogs pa bkang la/ gza' grang gis zin pa'i gzugs bag zin la zhi dkar sa'i phye me bsres pa la khru gang ba tshon
104a3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pas ri mo dang / thig ler byis la bzhag go/ de'i lus rnams ltas nga ni sna tshogs pa'i spu dang / stag gzigs gi ras dang / stug ma gtsang ma la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan kyang phyir ro// de
104a4(rgyud 'grel): nas gzugs de chu'i steng du khri byas lo dar dmar po'i yol ba bres la bzhag go// dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su gtor ma gtsang ma brgyad/ spyos dang mar me dang bshos dang ldan pa bashra mo mo// stag
104a5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am shug pa khru gang pa gcig la khram nyi shu rtsa gcig bstod la/ rla bya'i sgo dang bal tshon dang / dar tshon lnga yis byas pas gzas zin pa'i lus mgo 'jug byab ste/ chu dang gzugs la bstim mo// sngags
104a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gtsang sbra ldan pas dmar po'i gos gyon mgo la dmar po'i thod bcings lo// me ling lnga btsugs la gza' gang gis zin pa'i snying po la 'bum phrag gcig khram shing laM btab la khram phyis byang dkrol shod gtor
104b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing nad pa'i lus las gza'i sgo'i ngos su bya ste/ gzugs la bstim/ gtor ma tshar gyin gza' la mchod pa dang / bstod pa bya/ lhag ma bdun pa'i snying po la snying po stong phrag re chu la bzlas shing
104b2(rgyud 'grel): gzas zin pa'i lus la byab po// dpung shig tshogs khyed+mar brtul/ dmag song zhes brjod brab bo// de nas 'bru mar dang rtsi mar la sogs pa rnyed tshad la snying po rgyas bsdus gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/
104b3(rgyud 'grel): nad pa'i lus mgo 'jug tu bsku bste bya'o// de ltar lhan cig las ma grol na gnyis dang gsum dang bdun byas ni gzas zin pa las mi grol mi srid do// de nas chu rungs su bcas pa de rgya mtsho chen po'i gling ngam/ ri
104b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad 'dus pa'i rtse mo la pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs dang ldan pas bskyal lo// gtor ma brgyad po l-i yang phyogs mtshams ma nor bar btang / da ltar phyogs ma nor bar btang / de ltar cho ga rdzogs par
104b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas gzas zin pa la yang gong gi gza' brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur na/ dus thams cad du gza' rnams kyi dmag dpon du 'gyur ro// gal te gauza' gang gis zin pa'i dus ma phye na gza' brgyad
104b6(rgyud 'grel): car gyi gzugs byas la bsnyen pa 'bum phrag re bisgyel lo snga ma ltar bya'o// gza'i gdon las grol bar byed pa'i cho ga rin po che grol byed ces bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
105a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gza' rnams kyi las grub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bris la seng ldeng gi phur bu
105a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad la gza' brgyad kyi snying po so sor bris la/ rtse mo la dug khrag gis byugs la so so'i gnas su gzugs so// gtor ma brgyad sha sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs kyi bsham mo// dbus su gtso bo'i bum
105a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la yab yum gyi mtshon ma btab la snying po bsdus pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la sku mdog phyag 'tshan gsal bar bskyed pa'i thugs ka nas 'od zer lcags kyu'i gzugs 'dra ba byung ste/ gza' so so'i snying
105a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas bzung ste rnal 'byor pa'i las kyi mtha' grub par gyis shig bar mnga' gsol/ de nos gza' las chu 'grol ba la sogs pa gang byed pa la bsnyen pa brgya bzlas/ mchod pa stong bya/ de nas sngags pa
105a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi nas rgyud rdzogs pa sum brgyu klag ste/ brgya tshogs kyi mchod bya zhing / gtso bo yab yum la bdug nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdag/ de nas gza' brgyad
105a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi las ji ltar byed pa'i don khas blangs la gtor ma btang zhing rang gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzhung gi las la sbyar na 'grub par gdon mi za'o// gza' brgyad kyi las ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'o/
105b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga/ 'dod pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba/ dpalA mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu skar ngan pa zlog par 'dod pa'i
105b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gnas khang yid dang mthun par dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la/ rgyu skar rnams thang la dbab pa'i cho ga ni/ gtor ma dang mchod pa'i bye brag lhar grangs dang mnyam par bsham
105b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ra bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi gru bzhi dar dmar po'i gdugs dbub/ de'i nang du gza' brgyad kyi gzugs gnyis gnyis bzhag/ bag zan la rgyu skar rnams kyi gzugs te/ so so'i sku mdog dang mthun pa'i tshon gyis
105b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ rgyu skar re re la ngar blud 'thob gang ba bcu gsum bcu gsum gyis bskor/ de nas kyang tshon sna tshogs pas bsgyuraro// gtor ma re re'i nang du lha ba shos re bya'o// de ltar byas la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sngags dang
105b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas gong ltar spyan drangs la ye shes sems dpa' dang gnyis su med par bstims la/ gtso la mchod bstod ci rigs par byas la de nas gza' rnams la bstod/ mchod pa lnga dbul de nas rgyu skar rnams ri rab kyi
105b6(rgyud 'grel): ngos la spyan drangs te/ hU~M ri rab chen po'i ngos dag nas// dus tshod kun la dbang sgyur ba'i// rgyu skar tshogs dang dmag dpung bcas// btsun mo g.yog 'khor bcas pa rnams// spyan 'dren mchod kyis 'dir gshegs shig/
106a1(rgyud 'grel): a pra ti ha tA hUM/ de nas rgyu skur re re lnga mchod pa lnga lnga phul la/ brtan par bzhug par bya'o// de nas rgyu skar gyi tshogs la bstod de/ gtor ma dbul lo// 'dir sngags ci rigs par bzlas
106a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas bskyod pa ni/ hU~M shar phyogs skar ma smi na drug ni// zhal gcig pa la spyan yang drug/ phyag stong 'od zer mtha' yas pa// sku mdog dkar la rin chen brgyan// phyag stong phyag na mdung dmar rnams// zhal nas
106a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa// tsha bos su khyi dkar mdzes pa chi bas// de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul// skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod// snar ma las kyi lha skar ni// zhal gcig pa la phyag steng pa// sku mdog ljang ser
106a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'khrug/ phyag stong phyag ni mda' mo che// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa// chibasu nyal bcibs pa la// tshigs gnyis 'gre// chu 'dog rgyu skar mgo bo ni// zhal
106a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa la phyag stong pa// sku mdog dkar smug 'od zer 'khrug/ phyag stong phyag na 'khor lo bsnams// rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su sre mo// de la/ skar ngan/ lag pa kun tu rgyu ba ni// zhal gcig sku mdog
106a6(rgyud 'grel): // phyogs phyog // na/ no/ chos sumasal/ dag / pra tsas mnam tshan// nas gcin// rgyu mdog gar sa phyog nga byagan nug na/
106b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal nas/ chibs su ba lang / de la/ skar ngan/ nyes pa spangs pa'i bkra shis rgyal// zhal gcig/ sku mdog dkar ser/ phyag stong phyag na ral gri/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibasu khyud la/ de la/ skar
106b2(rgyud 'grel): ngan/ shar smad rgyu skar skrag ces pa/ zhal gcig/ sku mdog sngo la/ phyag stong phyug na rnga yab/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su rta la/ daM la/ skar ngan/ lho stong ngos kyi skaR+Ya ma chu/ zhal gcig/ phyag stong
106b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag na me dpung / rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su bya dkar/ de la/ skar ngan/ dre nau ma rungs las ston pa// zhal cig/ sku mdog sngo sgra/ phyag stong phyag na chu rgyun 'bebs// rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su
106b4(rgyud 'grel): glang po che la/ da la/ skar ngan/ spo ni mi sdug cho 'phrul can/ zhal gcig/ sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag stong phyag nas dkyil/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ tshibs su sta ga la/ dwe la/ skar ngan/ tsha ba las spyod me bzhi ni/
106b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig/ sku mdog dkar la/ phyag stong phyag na rlung 'dzin pa// rin chen/ zhal nas/ rin tshon khri stengs bzhugs pa la/ de la/ skar ngan/ 'jigs pa chen po'i nag pa ni/ zhal gcig/ sku mdog gnag la/
106b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag stong phyag na rgyal mtshan/ rin tshon/ zhal nas/ chibs su g.yag rog/ da la/ skar ngan/ dregs chen 'joms pa'i sa ri ni/ zhal gcig/ sku mdog ser la/ phyag stong phyag na sdud pa/ rin chen zhal nas/
107a1(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi gdan la bzhugs pa la// de la/ skar ngan/ kun tu nyul ba'i sa ga nI// zhal gcig sku mdog dudaka/ phyag stong phyag na rdo ldong / rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su sbrul la/ de la/ skur
107a2(rgyud 'grel): ngan/ nub stong lha mtshams gzi brjid 'bar// zhal gcig sku mdog dmar la/ phyag stong phyag na rin chen/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chi bos su glog la/ de la/ skar ngan/ sa 'og dbang po khron skyes ni/ zhal gcig/
107a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar sgra/ phyag stong phyug nu ba se'i ga'u bsnams// rin chen/ zhal nas/ tshibs su dreng la/ de la/ skar ngan/ pho ny+ra'i las tshogs bsrungs chen ni/ zhal gcig/ sku mdog dmar sor/ phyag stong phyag
107a4(rgyud 'grel): na dngul phreng / rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibasu rlung la/ de la/ skar ngan/ skyob po chen mo'i chu stod ni/ zhal gcig/ sku mdog sngon po/ phyag stong phyag na zhags pa/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su 'brug la/ de la/
107a5(rgyud 'grel): skar ngan/ chu smad khyab pa chen po ni// zhal gtsog/ sku mdog ljang sngon/ phyag stong phyag na pa dan/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ tshabs su ce spyang / de la/ skar ngan/ sa 'og dbang ba khron skyes pa ni/ zhal gcig/ sku
107a6(rgyud 'grel): mdog smug po/ phyag stong phyag na lcags kyu/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ tshobs su seng gi/ de la/ skar ngan/ srod la rku mkhas byi zhun ni/ zhal gcig/ sku mdog dmar ljang / phyag stong phyag na yol ba 'dzin/ rin
107b1(rgyud 'grel): chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su wa/ de ya/ skar ngan/ byang stong dbang ba mon gru ni// zhal gcig/ sku mdog ljang khu la// phyag stong phyag na seng ge/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su dom la/ de la/ skar ngan/ stong 'joms pa
107b2(rgyud 'grel): ste mon dre ni/ zhal gcig/ sku mdog mthing kha 'od zer 'khrug/ phyag steng phyag na wa seng / rin chen/ zhal nas/ tshabs su sprin la/ de la/ skar ngan/ 'jigs pa'i las mkhan khrums stod ni/ zhal gcig/ sku
107b3(rgyud 'grel): mdog ljang ser/ phyag stong phyag na byi la/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su ngang pa dag la bcibs/ de la/ skar ngan/ bstan pa'i las byed khrums smad ni/ zhal gcig/ sku mdog ljang sngon/ phyag stong phyag na wa
107b4(rgyud 'grel): glang sngon/ rin tshon/ zhal nos/ chibs su ra la/ de la/ skar ngan/ bar snang dbang ba'i naM kru ni// zhal gcig/ sku mdog mthing skya la// phyag stong phyag na bya rgod/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su bum pa/ dau la/ skor
107b5(rgyud 'grel): ngan/ dpung ldan rags pa tha skar ni// zhal gcig/ sku mdog ljang dmar/ phyag stong phyag na ro skegs/ rin chen/ zhal nas/ chibs su rnga mo bcibs// de la/ skar ngan/ nyes pa ston pa'i pra nye ni// zhal gcig pa
107b6(rgyud 'grel): la phyag stong pa// sku mdog dud ser 'od zer 'khrug/ phyag stong phyag na rma bya bsnams// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa// chibs su sbal pa khra bo btsabs// de la bstod de gtor
108a1(rgyud 'grel): ma 'bul// skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod// / phyogs dang mtshams su 'gro ba la// 'od dang kha dog yang dgra ldan// 'gro ba'i 'phel 'grib byed pa ste// rgyu skar
108a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po dpal ldan 'jigs// so so'i g.yog 'khor bcas pa la// gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// ces gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la gzugs dang bcas pa'i ri rtsi lo bskul
108a3(rgyud 'grel): lo// bsod names kyi tshogs ji ltar 'byor pa bsag/ dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing / yon bdag bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir lha mo brgyad kyi 'akris sam// rigs lnga'i 'am/ lha mo bzhi'i bkra shis sam// gsum gyi bkra shr-i
108a4(rgyud 'grel): gang mos pas bkra shis gsol// bgegs dang phyogs skyong gi gtor ma btang la/ bgegs dang dbul po'i cho ga bya'o// las dang las kyi bya phyag gang 'dod pa'i dbye bar bya'o// de nas yi ge brgya pas bshagaso//
108a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa'i tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba'i cho ga/ bdud rtsi'i sprin zhes bya ba rgyas bsdus gang mos la bya'o// de nas yon bdag rnams khrus nas gdon no// rgyu skar ngan pa bzlog par byed pa'i cho ga/ dpal mar me mdzad
108a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// skar ma rgyu ba rnams kyi las sna tshogs sgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dom tshig dang ldan pas/ dpal rdo rje
108b1(rgyud 'grel): ma par 'joms bya'i du song bas zhi ba'i las byedadod pas kyi bzhi sa dums sna dag shul sna tshogs kyi las byed par 'dod pas nag pa la
108b2(rgyud 'grel): 'o// bskrad par 'dod bas la'adod pas sa ri la/ bkar bar 'dod pas the rdzun la/ gas par 'dod pas min de rengs pa'i 'dod pas na bas so li/ skyug par 'dod pa so smin drug la/ 'gugs
108b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pas bya thun la/ 'a la dad pa par 'dod pas pra nye la/ rgyal @ lta masal/ dpung dang ldan par 'dod pas/ sa'i las byed par 'dod pas khrums stong la/ chu'i las byed
108b4(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dod pas chu ny-id la/ me'i las byed par 'dod pas ma ba rlung gi las byed par 'dod pas pa k+kul/ sa'i sde pham par 'dod na khrims ye/ chu'i sde pham par 'dod na chu smad la/ me yi sde 'pham par 'dod na spo lo//
108b5(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi sde 'pham par 'dod na sa ga la/ ma grab pa grub par 'dod pa mon gru la/ grub pa chung mi za bar te dag tha skar la/ 'dod pa'i don rab tu sbyin par 'dod pas brel bya'o// bsgrub bya phung bar byed pas 'dod pas skrag la/
108b6(rgyud 'grel): nar sgrub par 'dod pas snron la bya'o// gzhan 'jig rten pa'i legs pa sna tshogs sgrub par 'dod pas rgyal la bya'o// pha rol la nyams pa sna tshogs btang bar 'dod pas bra nye la bya'o// de ltar dmag drang bar 'dod pa dang /
109a1(rgyud 'grel): nor rnyed par 'dod pa dang / tshong rgyal bar 'dod pas snabs la bya'o// rtsar dang rkun ma'i las grub par 'dod pas tha skar la bya'o// 'jigs pa brgyad las thar par 'dod na mon gru la bya'o// bgegs
109a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa dang mi mthong ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung bzlog par 'dod pas lha mtshams la bya'o// skra bkru ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / dpal dbang phyug dang / rgyal sar 'don pa dang / tshong bzang bar 'dod pas rgyal lo/ bag ma btang
109a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / skra bkru ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / gos dang sa bon 'debs par 'dod pas lag la/ ston mo dang / 'du ba sdud pa dang / mdun ma dang / gros legs par 'dod pas nam so la bya'o// gzhan gnyen sbyor dang mkhar lan dang /
109a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / mkha ba'i las gang yang grub par 'dod pas ma bzhi la bya'o// de ltar na nye ba ston pa'i las sna tshogs la yang mkhas par spyad par bya'o// de ltar rgyu skar rnams dus nges pa las ma 'khrul bar byas na gdon mi za bar
109a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub pa la the tshom med do// de'i phyir na rgyu skar rnams ni bzang po yi ni zhes bya'o// de nas so so'i phyogs kyi gza' rnams dang btub por nges par 'grub pa yin no// de ltar rgyu skar 'di dag gis ni legs pa dang nyes pa dang /
109a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi 'khrul 'khor sna tshogs ston pas gtso che'o// rgyu skar rnams kyi las sna tshogs po sgrub par byed pa dus 'dzin bzang po zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
109b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gyi byad stems las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dur khrod kyi ras la khyi nag po'i khrags 'khor lo rtsibs sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris te/ lte bar
109b2(rgyud 'grel): che ge staM b+ha ya bri/ rtsibs rnams la khro bo bcu'i sngags nang du bstan pa bri/ mu khyud nang ma la A li mgo nang du bstan pa bri/ phyi ma la kA li mgo nang du bstan pa bris la bdag nyid kha lho phyogs su bstan pa bris la/ bdag nyid
109b3(rgyud 'grel): kha lho phyogs bltas la/ 'khor lo rab tu gnas pa byas la/ khro bo bcu'i sngags la stong phrag lnga bzlas la/ de nas g.yul gyes pa'i sa dang / dur khrod kyi sa dang / grog mkhar gyi sa dang / phung shul gyi sa la mchod rten
109b4(rgyud 'grel): khru gang pa raM ba lnga byas la/ de'i nang du yang yang gro kha l-i ling ga bris la lce phyir phyung la lce la dug gi phur pa rgya mdud nub par btab la/ che ge mo'i byang kha rnams bzlog/ byol staM ba ya hUM hUM hUM zhes pas mtha' ma bskor// mchod
109b5(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi bre'i nang du bo zhag go/ bdag nyid kyi mal 'og tu dong gru gsum pa brus la nang dur khrod kyi stsol bas byugs la/ 'khor lo de phur bu bcu gsum gyis brgyangs la de'i steng du nas nog mo dang / sran ma dang / yungs nag
109b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams bkram la/ de'i ste mchod rten mgo 'jug zlog la bzhag go// de nas nang rnams su dug shing gis tsher mas dgang ngo // kha dur khrod kyi g.yam pa la ri rab gling bzhi dang bcas pas mnan no// de nas lham 'bog dang /
110a1(rgyud 'grel): yugs sa mo'i zhabs ma bting las bdag la sa bdag gi zhal dbyung ngo // bdag nyid nyal ba'i tshe/ oM ha ra ha ra badz+ra che ge mo'i byang stems shwa trAM hUM hUM zhes khro bo bcu'i sngags la btags la/
110a2(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'grub pa 'am/ ma chog par bzlas so// dus bzhi gtor ma chung ba bcu phyogs btsur 'phang zhing khro bo bcu la smod btsugs cung mnyes pa'i rabs brjod/ 'jig rten gyi lha 'dre rnams la dam bdar zhing dbang
110a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la/ phyogs rnams su seng ldeng phur bu raM la khro bo bcu'i sngags bris la dpal che ge mo'i byang stems mA ra yau bzlog sod byol/ zhes bris la bdag nyid kyi gnas khang go phyogs mtshams dang / steng 'og tu
110a4(rgyud 'grel): gdab bo// phur bu de dag kyang khro bo bcur mnga' gsol la gtor ma re btang / nya stong la phur bu gzi brjid bskyed do// gtor mo btang ba'i dus su yungs kar dang dug sna la sngags bzlas la phyogs mtsham su
110a5(rgyud 'grel): gtor ro// dur khrod du yang skabs su mnan pa bya'o// skabs su gtor ma dang bsgrub bya'i lang ga chu la bsku ro// skabs su me la bsreg go// de ltar byas pas gdon thams cing kha 'ching bar 'gyu ro// byad stems tha~Md
110a6(rgyud 'grel): rborgod gtong byed pa de nyid ring la nges par bzlog par nge so// byang stems thams cad gcod po dang / phur kha thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzog so//
110b1(rgyud 'grel): dpalta rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// maM bzang gdon gyis nyen pa'i sems can la phan thogs par 'dod pa'i skud pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ klu chen po brgyad mchod par 'dod pa'i dkyi
110b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sde ma bzhin du bzhengs la ral gri dang / mda' rnams kyi tha ma bskor la dbusu gtso bo'i bum pa btsugs la gzungs thag gos gdags/ pad+ma'i 'deb ma rnams kyi steng du klu so so'i gzugs brnyan bkod
110b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / so so'i gtor ma dkar gsum mngar gsum dang / rtsi sman sna tshogs dang ldan pa yang bsha ma/ dkon mchog dang klu rnams mchod pa'i lta ba shos dang / mar me la sogs pa mchod pa'i bye brag ci 'byor
110b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsha mo// phyogs skyong dang bgegs rnams la gtor ma bsham zhing btang ngo // de nas klu chen po rnams so so'i gnas su spyan drang ba ni/ hUM rgya mtsho yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// mtha' yas 'jog po
110b5(rgyud 'grel): karno Ta/ A li ka dang nor rgyas dang // padad+ma ma dang ni pA su na// klu chen brgyad po 'khro dang bcas// btsun mo rnams kyi mgul nas 'khyud// yab yum sros dang bcas pa rnams// 'dir gshegs spyan 'dren mchod par
110b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bul/ oM phu na swA hA sa ma yA/ de nas bstod cing gtor ma 'bul ba ni/ hUM shar phyogs klu rgyal mtha' yas ni// sku mdog sir la 'od zer 'bar// phyag mtshan pad ma zhags pa bsnams// spyi gtsug yid
111a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu dang // sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can// sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi'o// lho phyogs klu rgyal 'jog po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis
111a2(rgyud 'grel): smad sbrul// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag mtshan pad+ma zhags pa bsnams// spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang // sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs kha can// sbrul deng rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// de lo mchod cing
111a3(rgyud 'grel): bstong par bgyi// nub phyogs klu dbang karko Ta// zhal gcig/ sku mdog dmar li/ phyag/ spyi gtsug/ sbrul mgo/ de la/ byang phyogs u li ka/ zhal gcig/ sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag/ spyi gtsug/ sbrul mgo//
111a4(rgyud 'grel): sbrul dang / de la/ shor lhor klu rgyal nor rgyas ni/ zhal gcig/ sku mdog/ ser skya/ phyog/ spyi gtsug/ sbrul mgo/ sgrol dang / de la/ lho nub klu rgyal dung skyong ni// zhal gcig/ sku mdog sngo skye// phya gA/ spyi
111a5(rgyud 'grel): gA tsug/ sbrul dang / byung sha ra k+She rgyal ba su na// zhal gcig/ sku mdog dmar sngo/ phyag/ spyi gtsug/ sbrul mgo/ sbrul dang / de lA/ so so'i yu mau gyi sku mdog ni/ rang rung ya ba dang mthun pa la// rin chen phreng
111a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ngo shal can// g.yas g.yo ni yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud// kha rlangs dug tu 'khyil bar byed// de la/ de dag so'i sras rnams ni/ sku mdog 'di 'dra ma nges te/ mdzes shing sdug gu 'od 'bar ga la la
111b1(rgyud 'grel): chu srin kha nas 'byung // de bzhin sbrul dang sbal pa dang // chu glang chu rta kha nas 'byung // sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i gzugs rnams la// mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod par bgyid// gzhan yang klu bran 'bum gyi tshogs//
111b2(rgyud 'grel): byol song gzugs brnyan sna tshogs ston// 'dab chags dang ni ltos 'gro dang // rkang ming dang nI rkang med dang // sdig srin gzugs brnyan ston pa la// mchod cing bstod nas gtor ma 'bul// bdag gi las
111b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'bras bu rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa ji bzhin du// khyed kyi 'dod don grub mdzod/ ces klu brgyad kyi snying po brgya rtsa bzlas la/ gtor ma btang zhing snying po rgyas bsdus kyi bum pa'i khrus bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor
111b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdu zhing bkra shis gsol lo// klu chen po brgyad mchod pas/ mi bzad pa'i nad yams drag po las thar bar byed pa/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
111b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo// klu chen po rnams bsgrubs te mi bzad pa tsi tsA dz+wa la'i nad las thar bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bris la mchod pa
111b6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'byor pa bzhin bshams lo/ gtso bo'i bsnyen pa ci rigs par bzlas la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa bya/ de nas klu chen po rang bzhin gyi gnas nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du spyan drangs la/ de la mchod
112a1(rgyud 'grel): dbul lo// de nas klu brgyad kyi gtor ma la baM las ye shes kyi chu rgyun babs te snga ma ltar phul la/ de nas klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor de bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par 'joms kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas lag
112a2(rgyud 'grel): mthil gnyis su bsgoms pas/ de nas khu sbyar te phud ces pa lan 'bum bzlas te/ klu rnams la 'o ma rtsi sman sna tshogs pas mchod cing / dug thams cad phyug zhig ces sman gyis mchod pa rgyas pas dbul lo// de ltar
112a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa rdzogs nas sgrub pa dngos ni klu chen po brgyad la sogs pa bag zan la klu'i gzugs sna tshogs pa byis te/ btsag rams la sogs pas bsgyur la/ kham phor kha sbyar du bcug ste/ rtsi sman dang / 'o ma dang ldan pas/
112a4(rgyud 'grel): klu brgyad kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas bstod pa ci rigs par byas la/ gang 'dod pa'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa sa'i gting du sba'o// de ltar byas pas klu rnams kyus legs par ster bar 'gyur ro// klu
112a5(rgyud 'grel): sgring rin po che dbyig sgrub ces bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// klu rnams kyi gdon las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po
112a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bris la/ gtso bo'i bum pa la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsangs la/ dkyil 'khor gyis dbus su bzhag/ de nas bag zan la klu chen po brgyad kyi gzu
112b1(rgyud 'grel): sor bzhi pa thal mo sbyar ba tshon gyis bsgyur te/ so so'i gnas su bum pa la kha bstan la bzhag go// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnamasu sbrul nag po brgyad/ rtsangs pa dmar po brgyad/ sbal pa ser po
112b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ sdig pa sngon po brgyad/ nya ljang gu brgyad/ lcong mo dmar po brgyud/ rngo ma nag po brgyad/ bya dkar mo brgyad/ glang dmar po brgyad/ chu srin sngon po brgyad/ ra dkar mo brgyud/ sram sngo sgyu brgyad/ rta stug po
112b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ sgo bzhir/ shar du stag skye'o// lho ror-i seng ge mgo can/ nub tu ba khang gi mgo can/ byang du byi la'i mgo can phyogs kyi kha dog mthun pa'o// mu khyud kyi steng klu brgyad kyi chung ma ral pa can/ mdog khro bo brgyad
112b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go// mu ran rnams su byol song gi gzugs sna tshogs pas bsgyur la bzhag go// srog chags de dag ni gtso bo lo bka' nyan pa'i tshul gyis blta'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su kham phor
112b5(rgyud 'grel): gtsang ma 'am/ rin po che'i snod du ba dmar mo'i 'o ma spring rtsi dang / kar dbong bu ram la sogs te/ mang rnams dang / na gA ge sar la sogs pa'i klu sman sna tshig blugs te/ dar ljang khus phub la bzhag go/ klu'i gtor
112b6(rgyud 'grel): ma nyi shu rtsa gcig phyogs ga tor dang / bgegs gtor kyang gzhan dang mthun par bsag go// rin po che dang bal tshon sna tshogs pa yang sogs su dbul lo// de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHklu rnams gzugs brnyan la bcug
113a1(rgyud 'grel): ste de dag mchod par bya'o// me long gi nang du gzugs brnyan gsal bar byas la nad pa'i lus la rma byas byabs te/ me long gi gzugs brnyan dang dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas la 'o ma
113a2(rgyud 'grel): steng zhing skabs su dug 'don pa'i cho ga bya'o// snga ma bzhin bstod cing snying po shin tu bsdus pa'i gtsog ma la/ klu brgyad kyi snying po bzlas so// de ltar brgya song zhing klu rnams la sman dbul ba ni// kA ye klu tshon brgyad po tshur
113a3(rgyud 'grel): nyon dang / nga ni rdo rje rnam 'joms te// rig sngags grub pas yas dor ste// kla rnams nga yi bka' la nyon// nga yi bka' la mi nyan na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'dis// klu yi snying la me sbar nas// mgo bus bye mas bsreg
113a4(rgyud 'grel): byed// de bas nga yi bka' nyon cika/ hUM/ gdug pa'i nang pa'i nad rnams gdon pa'i phyir// klu rgyal rnams la mchod par 'bul/ na ge gesar gung rdzi su kun gsus kyi ud kyi lus/ rgya mtsho sbu ba'i bdud rtsi 'bul// gla gau ra zho sha'i bdud
113a5(rgyud 'grel): tso 'dul// mkhal ma zho sha'i bdud rtsi 'bul// snying zho sha yi bdud rtsi 'bul// bu shol rtse yi bdud rtsi 'bul// kaN+Da ka ri'i bdud rtsi 'bul// mkhal spyan bre'i bdud rtsi 'bul// bcu gang dkar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul// gur
113a6(rgyud 'grel): kum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul// 'on bu dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul// dbang po lag pa'i bdud rtsi 'bul// chu srin sder mo'i bdud rtsi 'bul// rdo rgyus dkar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul// thal ka rdo rje'i bdud rtsi 'bul// dkar gsum
113b1(rgyud 'grel): ngag gi bdud rtsi 'bul// mngar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul// zhes brjod cing klu rnams kyi snying po brgya tshwar re bzlas/ de nas klu gso ba'i cho ga ni// hUM na ga ge sar sman 'bul bas// ku li grang nad sos gyur cig/
113b2(rgyud 'grel): klu yaM glo nad sos gyur cig/ nA ga smras pa'i sman phul bas// klu yi mchin nad sos g+hur cig/ rmyi mtsho smra ba'i sman phul b+ha ste// klu yi dbugs nad seMs gyur cig/ glu gor zho sha'i spyan phul bas// klu yi klang rnyed sos
113b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ mkhal ma zho sha'i bdud rtsi yis// klu yi mkhal nid sos gyur cig/ snying zho sha yi sman phul bas// klu yI snying nad sos gyur cig/ spu zhal rtse yi sman phul byas// klu yi sbyangs nad sos gyur cig/
113b4(rgyud 'grel): kaN+Da ka ri'i sman phul bas// klu yi rkang nad sos gyur cig/ mkhan sran khra bo'i sman phul bas// klu yi kha nad sos gyur cig/ bcu gang dkar po'i sman phul bas// klu yi so nad sos gyur cig/ gur kum dag gi
