195a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs byas spyir bkan la/ mtha' yig bzlas te brgyan bkye na// nam yang 'pham par mi 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba/ skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par arka dkar mo'i rtsa ba blangs te// tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs
195a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi pa gsus pa 'phyang ba// klu'i mchod phyir thogs can dang // phyag bzhin che ba dang // dgra sta dang / zhugs po dang / bgrang phreng ba bsnams pa/ mthe bo'i tshad tsam byas la/ de lag pas bzung ste de nyid kyi sbyor ba 'am/
195a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lha'i sbyor bas sngags 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas te/ de nas de'i sbyor bas bcings la tshe lo la sogs pa'i rgyan btses na pham par mi 'gyur te rgyal bar 'gyu ro// mtha'i yi ge zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa
195a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i mthar gnas pa'i yi ge ste/ oM gA swA hA zhes bya ba'o// a ma ra ni dzI bon tI ye/ phyag 'tshal swA h+ma kha sbyar bya// rma bya chen po'i snying po 'di// bzlas na las kun byed par 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ sngags nI/ a ma ra Ni
195a5(rgyud 'grel): dzI ban tI ye swA hA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di shin tu bzlas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ de la nor kun ti dang po tsu ma rti'i rtsa ba dang cod pan khyi bya kham pa tsan gyi mjug ste gcig tu sbyor la sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad
195a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas te/ rims nad kyis zin po la bdugs na/ rims nad thams cad sel bar byed do// glad gzer la ni mar nag la mngon par bzlas te bskus na/ mgo bo'i zug gzer 'joms so// 'bras dang 'brum la ni bzlas
195b1(rgyud 'grel): shing byabs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro// phol mig dang / 'brum bu la sogs pa ni tsan ngan gyi chu la lan bdun bzlas te blang na zhe bar 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi las byas na gdon thams cad 'tshe ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang
195b2(rgyud 'grel): su yang rung ba'i skra bzung la gcer bu skra grol ba dang ldan pas kha lhor bltas te/ sgo'i them pa la 'dug nas sgrub pa po khros bzhin du sngags zlos shing lag pa gnyis kyi sku mnye'o// de ltar dus gsum du byas na/ zha
195b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis dpa' bo nyid kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro// e hA nI markA hI ha nI ga ma ni phaT/ kr-i ShA sa pa pa ra NAM/ lo ma can gyi bsgrub bya la// klu nor zhes bya'i sngags 'bum bzlas// btsun mo'i skye gnas phyogs su ni// sang ldeng
195b4(rgyud 'grel): las byas phur pa la// brgya bzlas dmar po byugs nas ni// sbyar na de mod 'gugs par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ sngags ni/ oM na ma skriSh+To sa ba ra No/ A nA nI ma hA nAM hi nA ga ma ni phaT/ sngags 'di'i sbyor ba ni 'od yin te/
195b5(rgyud 'grel): dang por gcer bus rtsu ba dang 'bras bu dag za zhing 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas bsnyen par bya'o// de nas spra tshil las mtho gang tsam gyi bud med kyi gzugs brnyan yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas
195b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ de'i dpral bar ni de nyid kyi dang po'i ming bri'o// snying gar ni sngags bri ste/ de yang go ro tsa na dang / rang gi srin lag gi khrag dang bsros la grog la ming spel ba dang bcas par bri ste de'i snying gar gzhug go// de nas bdag
196a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid lo ma can gyi gzugs mig dmar ba rma bya'i cod pan gyi bam po mgo la bcings pa/ glang po che'i phru gu'i mche ba'i rtse mo'i rna rgyan can/ shing a sho ka'i lo ma'i phreng bas rked pa dkris pa/ lha
196a2(rgyud 'grel): kyu dang zhags pa lag na thogs par bsgoms la/ bsgrub bya la kho bltas te za bzhin bsams nas/ bsgrub bya'i phyogasu gzugs brnyan gyi mgo bston te/ gan rkyal du bzhag la steng ldeng gi phur bu mtheb sor gyi tshad ce
196a3(rgyud 'grel): la sngags lan brgya bzlas te gdab par bya'o// phur bu de yang gru gsum pa rgya skyegs kyi khu bas byug par rgya'o// brgya zhes bya ba ni brgya rtsa brgyad de/ phur bu des skye go nas zhes bya ba mo mtshan du btab pa la 'od 'bar ba
196a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o// de nas mchod pa'i yo byad dmar po rnams kyis de la mchod lo/ dus gsum du sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ zhag bdun gyis brgya byin gyi chung ma yin yang 'ong bar 'gyur na bud med gzhan lta smos kyang
196a5(rgyud 'grel): ci dgos/ tsho bi ra li hUM phaT bzlas/ gro go gdong gi sgro ru gzhug/ ri mo khrag gi mtshan mos mtshwa/ mkhar gnas btsun mo 'gugs par 'gyur// gzhan yang rgyu zhabs ngag tu bzhog ces bya ba la/ oM tsha bai ra l-i hUM
196a6(rgyud 'grel): phaT bya'o// sngags 'di'i sbyor ba ni 'di yin te/ dang por mdun du yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor mdun gyi na mkha' la bskyed de bsams la/ der bsgrub bya bzhug ste/ bdag nyid rig pa mdog dmar zhing sngo ba phya gnyis
196b1(rgyud 'grel): nA lcags kyu dang zhags pa thogs par bsdams te/ lcags kyus bsgrub bya'i snying gar phug cing / mgrin pa zhags pas bcings pa gsal por gyur gyi bar du bsgom mo// de nas gnas dben par sngags 'bum phrag gcig
196b2(rgyud 'grel): gi bar bzlas la sgrub po// ji ltar bsgrub ce na/ gro ga la ri bong gi khrig gis yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris la/ de'i dpral bar de nyid kyi dang po'i ming bri ste/ spra tshul gyi nang du gtums la/ spra tshil
196b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi r-i lu khar bcug nas sngags bzlas na de 'gugs par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba gzhan gnyis pa yang gro ga le ri bong gi khrag gis bsgrub bya dang / bsgrub pa po'i gzugs gnyis so sor bris la/ bsgrub bya'i ming ni sgrub
196b4(rgyud 'grel): pa po'i dpral byar byi'o// sgrub pa po'i ming ni sgrub bya'i dpral ba ra ste/ 'khrul 'khor de gnyis ji ltar dpral ba dang dpral ba/ khwa dang kha/ gsang ba dang gsang ba phrad par 'gyur ba de ltar kha sbyar te dril nas rang gi chu zhabs
196b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag ste/ khro bo'i rdul gyis gdung zhing dpon po'i gnas su sngags bzlas na zhag gsum gyis 'gugs par 'gyur ro// he tiSh+Tha ban d+ha d+ha ra ya ne ru na d+ha/ dang por slar yang sbyar bar bya/ ur+Na ma Ni swA hA mtha'// mcho
196b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dis mgrin par cho ga bri/ zhes bya ba'i sngags ni/ oM he tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha bar d+ha ban d+ha d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya ni run+d+ha ni run+d+ha ur+Na ma Ni swA hA/ 'di'i sbyor ba ni 'di yin te/ sngags 'di thal ba la mngon par bzlas la mdzub mos thel ba de'i ri mo
197a1(rgyud 'grel): gang gi mgul par bris na/ de'i skyug pa'i nang zhi bar byed do// yang tA la'i 'dab ma la dgra bo'i ming dang spel ba'i ming bris nas/ kaR+Sha'i tshad bcug na kha bcings par 'gyu ro// de bzhin du thod
197a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la ste rU ba la sogs pa dag kyang bcings par 'gyur// dAn de laM mtha' me da dbus// mu tsa khi ni thog mar bstan// kun mtha' swAhA sbyar sngags nis// rmi lam bram ze phru gu ston zhes bya ba la sngags ni/ a
197a3(rgyud 'grel): li swA hA/ mo d+ha ni swA hA/ ngan te laM swA hA/ zhes bya ba'o// 'dir cho ga ni 'di yin te/ 'phags pa spyan gas dbang phyug bla ma'i spyan lam da po'i lci bI sa la ma ltung bas mAN+Dal byas le/ me tog lo sogs pas mchong ngo //
197a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di nyid kyis len bdun du bzlas pa'i lag pas gdong byugs la/ de nyid snam bu gtsang mi gdan du bti don la dmigs nas nyel ni/ rmi lam du bden pa ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chu la mngon par
197a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas te 'thungs nas mar nag la mngon par bzlas pas gdong byugs te nyal na yang / yang dag pa'i rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur ro// oM tsun+da de tsu le tsa le zhes bya ba/ bzlog pa lugs bzhin bzung byas na// dus gsum
197a6(rgyud 'grel): byi ni dngos po rnams// me long gnas nas ston par byed// ces bya ba la sngags ni/ oM tsa le tsun de dang sha ya sarba swA hA/ zhes bya ba yin no// sbyor ba ni 'di yin te/ cho ga bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa stong phrag bcur
197b1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa'o// de nas khye'u dang bu mo grong gi chos kyis ma nyams pa bzung la khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bskon nas/ thig le la sogs pa'i rgyun gyi chas su gsal la/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas
197b2(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ngo // yang dag par mchod do// oM tsan+d+ra ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ ces bya ba ni sngags so// rdo rje bsngags pa na byas la mdzub mo bsgreng ste lho sbyar la the bong gnyis so sbyor bsgreng ba ni phyag rgya'o// sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis
197b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dang mtshams dang / steng 'og kyang bcing bar bya'o// de nas maN+Dal gyi dbus su bum pa gos sar pa dkar pos bcings la dri zhim po'i chus bkang ba shing lo yid du 'ong bas kha rgyan byas te/ me tog dang bdug
197b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pas mchod nas/ sngar snyan pa'i khye'u dang bu mo kha shar du bstan te bzhag la/ mig gnyis su yi ge oM bkod // snying gar yi ge hUM bkod/ oM gnyis kyi dbus su yaM de 'od 'bar ba bsams mo//
197b5(rgyud 'grel): de na mkha'i phyogs su yang tsuM las bskyed pa'i lha mo sku la byed ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ phyag dang po gnyis na lhung bzed bsnams shing gzhan gnyis kyis pad+ma dang ral gri bsnams pa'i phyag bzhi
197b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sku mdog zla ba ltar dkar zhing 'tsher ba bsams la/ de nyid la ar+g+ha dbul te/ mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod maM/ bdag nyid kyi sngags kyis sam rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bstod la/ sngags 'di khye'u
198a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bu mo'i snying gar gzhug pAr bya'o// oM tsa le tsu le pe sha a tra ku ma dra ku ma dA ku ma ri ka yo sha ri rai pra bi sh+ya d+ha ra sha ya/ sarba ya thA b+hU taM ya thA da d+haM/ bud d+hA d+harma saM g+ha sad d+ye na ti ma bI laM ba ma ma
198a2(rgyud 'grel): a sha pra bu ra ya swA hA/ de nas me long ngam/ ral gri 'am/ dri ma med pa'i tho ba 'am/ mar ma 'am/ chu'i snod dag la sngags yongs su bzlas te/ khye'u dang bu mo la bstan la bde ba ji lta ba bzhin ston par 'gyur ro// de nas
198a3(rgyud 'grel): gshe gsu gsol te ldang bar bya'o// ba ra da ka swA hA drug/ phyag 'tshal dang ldan tshegs bdag dgyes// gzugs brnyan maN+Dal gru bzhir bzhag/ zla bo drug tu mchod par bya// zhes bya ba la sngags ni/ oM bai ra da ga swA hA/
198a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'o// sbyor ba ni 'di yin to// gnas dben par ba'i gtso ba'i maN+Dal gru ba'i byas la/ de'i dbus su tshogs bdag gi gzugs sam/ bris sku bzhag nas bdag nyid kyis log 'dren gyi gzugs kyis yang dag par
198a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod de gcer bur gyur pas zla ba drug gi bar du nyin dus gsum du sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ yid la re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyu ro// b+hU ma ke shi b+hU ma ma te/ b+h+ra me bi b+hU mus N+ye mo hU~M swA hA/ dang por b+h+ra ma
198a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang ldan/ de nas rim brjod u ra ner bcas/ zhes bya ba ni sngags te/ dang por b+h+ra ma gnyis dang ldan/ zhes bya ba ni b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma zhes lan gnyis brjod pa'o// rim brjod ces bya ba ni lhag ma phreng ba'i rim pa bzhin du
198b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'o// ur ner bcas zhes bya ba ni mthar ur ne brjod pa ste/ oM b+hU ma b+hU ma ke shi d+hA r+the d+ham bi b+hU ma mus dz+ye mo he ya uR+She swA hA/ zhes bya ba ste/ mi bsgrubs par yang las thams cad byed pa'o// 'dir sbyor ba ni 'ong yin te/ yungs
198b2(rgyud 'grel): kar khyor gang tsam sa la reg pa'i bar snang la bzhag la/ sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas so// de nas de la cung zad cig blangs la/ gcer bu skra lhag pas khyim gyi them pa'i phyi nas yungs kar gtor na/ yungs kAr la 'goms
198b3(rgyud 'grel): pa tsam gyi ji srid nyi ma shar gyi bar du dus ma yin pI gnyid 'thug pos non par 'gyuraro// gnyis bskyed pa'i sbyor ba'o// k+Shi ni ki nI g+haN+Da ka ra Na naM sha ya swA hA/ sngags bzlas pa'i chu 'thungs na/ rmi lam bden pa ston par 'gyur
198b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba las/ sbyor ba ni 'di yin te/ rang gi lha'i sbyor ba 'am/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ rdo rje'i mtshon ches dri'i tshogs dgug par bya'o// de yang dri mchog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/ phyag na mdung rtsi gsum dang
198b5(rgyud 'grel): dgra sti dang / zhags pa dang / thod pa bsnams pa/ rno ba gnyis dril bu'i sgra dang ldan pa bltas la lag pa g.yon pa mdung rtse gsum par byas pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de la sngags stong phrag bcur bzlas te mchod pa bya'o//
198b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas chu la mngon par bzlas te 'thungs ni gdon mi za bar rmi lam du bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo la// dzA ti me tog 'bum bskur bya/ oM bAkye daM na maHid do daM b+ha ra dang / 'jam dpal gyi snying po 'di rje
199a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sbyor ba ni 'di yin te/ dzA ti'i me tog khu bye ba 'bum bzung la rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa'i chu bor ske man chad chu'i nang du zhugs la/ me tog re re zhing sngags zlos shing chu la bsgyuro//
199a2(rgyud 'grel): de ji ste me tog chu dang bcas pa gyen du rgyun la bzlog ste 'beb pa na/ me togA chu dang bcas par blangs te so ma reg par 'thungs na/ thos pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro// oM ku ru ku ru l+le swA hA/ khams
199a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum 'gugs par byed par bstan/ sgron ma yi ni snying po 'di/ mgur nor bcings pa'i cho gar gsungs/ zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das ha la ha la'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas la/ sgrol ma'i sngags 'di bsnyen pa bya'o// de nas
199a4(rgyud 'grel): tshes dang skar ma dang nyi mo bzang po la mchod pa byas nas/ gro ga la ut+pa la'i 'dab ma lta bu'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bris la/ rtsibs bcu drug la a bri'o// lte ba la bsgrub bya'i ming ku ru kul+le zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhis
199a5(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba bri'o// de'i phyi rol tu oM las byung ba'i ri mo gsum gyis bskor ro// de nas 'khor lo gnyis pa de dang 'dra ba las bsgrub bya'i ming ma gtogs pa bris la/ nges 'khor lo snga ma'i steng du bkab ste/ bcom ldan 'das
199a6(rgyud 'grel): ma spyan drangs te yang dag par mchod nis 'khor lo der bstims la/ yi ge las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgrub bya bkug ste/ shing rtsad nas bcad pa ltar bcom ldan 'das me'i zhabs drung na 'gyel nas 'dug par
199b1(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ nyi ma bdun du dus gsum du sngags brgya stong du bzlas na brgya byin nyid kyang dbang du 'gyu ro// sngags ni/ oM ku ru kul+le hriHche ge mo a naM swA hA/ d+ha na pa ri ba re na tsa sa man ta swA hA/ zhes bya ba yin no//
199b2(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma bdun bzlas nas 'khor lo zho dad mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du bzhag go/ dga' bde ma myong bu mo'i yi ge dang po ni/ gsum drug 'bum gcig bzlas ne dAr ni rnyed par 'gyur// nyi ma dkar po'i me tog sbyin sreg bya
199b3(rgyud 'grel): ba 'am/ yang nA prA yaM ku yi me tog sbyin sregu bya zhes bya ba la/ sngar dga' ba dang bde ba ma myong ba'i bu mo gang yin pa de'i yi ge ni dga' bad ma myong ba'i yi ge ste/ yi ge'i tshogs de las dang por a dang / gsum par di
199b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / drug par po ti rnams bzung bar bya'o// de yang bsnyen pa'i dus su chang dang // sha la sogs pa bcad do// dkar gsum la sogs pa'i zas zla zhing // gos dang bcas par chu'i nang du zhugs te// mi smra bar 'bum
199b5(rgyud 'grel): phrag gcig bzlas badz+rod byA// stug s+t+ra nAM/ oM a di tI A mu kaM kan di m+me dwe hi d+he d+ha ba yA sAt+ma/ zhes bya ba'o// bsnyen pa thon+da nas arka dkar po'i mye tog gam+b+ha/ pri yaM ku'i mi tig la sngags re re zhing sbyin sregA tAH
199b6(rgyud 'grel): phrag gcig bya'o// de yang gro ga la bu mo'i ming dang rang gi ming du kha sbyar ba bris la/ rang gi rgyu zhabs su bzhag ste/ de ltar sbyin sreg byas na/ bu mo de bdag gir 'gyur te/ su la yang ster bar mi 'gyur ro// bai tsi
200a1(rgyud 'grel): mo hi swA hA/ oM dang bcas la grags bdun yin// gnod sbyin yug sa mo yi sngags// ro la g.yogs pa'i ras la ni// de yis sen rtsis rgyan med bri// de yi gzugs lu me trog ni// ser pos
200a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod na de 'grub 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum gyi yugs sa mo// thams cad bka' nyin du ni 'gyur// mon sran gre'u kha zas kyis// yugs sa mo yi sngags bzlas 'grub// sngags ni/ oM bi tse ma haM swAhA/ zhes
200a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ste/ sngon du bsten pa 'bum phrag bdun bzlas so// de nas bram ze mo la g.yogs pa'i ras ma'i dum bu khru gang glu bzhi pa la ro de nyid kyi sen rtsis bram ze mo de nyid kyi gzugs med par bris la gnas dben par
200a4(rgyud 'grel): bris sku makram ste/ bdag nyid gcig pus shing sa la ser po'i me tog gis mchod nas zla ba drug gi bar du mtshan mo mun pa la brgyad brgya brgyad bzlas na zla ba drug gi mthur 'ong bar 'gyu ro// 'ongs nas mi smra bar
200a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa spyad nA bar+g+haM sbyong ri ba'i mu tig gi phreng ba dkrol nas 'jog par 'gyur ro// de ltar zla be drug gi bar du ts+tshin re zhing bzhag nas 'gro bar 'gyuraro// zla ba drug yongs su rdzogs nas ci blangs pa'i dngos grub ster bar
200a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyu ro// oM g+ho g+ho ri ru tra di tsi da~M yo gI shwa ri mu kha hUM phaT swA hA/ g+ho g+hi ri dang ne mu khaM yang // ri dbang bu mo'i snying po yin// brla g.yon la ni mang bris te// lag pa g.yon pas bkab nas su// bzlas na bu mo mod la
200b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gugs// skyes pa la ni g.yas pa sbyar// zhes bya ba la ni/ oM ru tri di bi de yo gI shwa ri mu kha hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'o// 'dir gser btsag dang go ro tsA na dang / ldong ros gang yang ba la bsgrubs te/ de yang zla ba
200b2(rgyud 'grel): gazlas zin pa'i dus su lha mo g+ho g+ho ro la mchod pa byas la/ a shwadwa thA'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du gra sor ba tsa ge la sogaspa bzhag ste/ yang lo ma bdun gyi steng nas bkab nas/ de'i steng du lag pa g.yon pas mnan nas
200b3(rgyud 'grel): ji srid zla ba gzas gzung ba ma grel gyi bar du bzlaso// nges brlagayon pa'i dbus su bu mo'i ming bris la/ lag pa g.yon pas bkab ste bzlas na/ 'ching bas bcings pa ma gtogs pa rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro// skyes
200b4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'gugs pa la ni brla g.yas pa'i dbus su de nyid kyis de'i ming bris la lag pa gauy+Ya pra bkab ste/ ji srid 'ong gi bar du bzlaso// rkang pas dgug pa'o// dang por phyag 'tshal ldan par s+t+wak+Sha/ bi da ri ku ru hU~M phaT
200b5(rgyud 'grel): yid ches pa'i phyin yig lhas// gdon ni tsher gcod byed pa ste// yongs bzlas phyag rgyas btab sta snying zhes bya ba la/ sngags ni/ oM bI da ri ku ru hUM phaT ces bya'o// 'dir 'phags pa mi g.yo ba yi 'am/ khro bo
200b6(rgyud 'grel): gang yang rung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ sngags phrin yig dang bcas pa byang bu la bris te/ dril nas phyag rgyas btab ste gdon gyis zin pa la bskor te de'i legs par btags na ngu bzhin du 'bros par 'gyur//
201a1(rgyud 'grel): oM ba tra bi dA ra bi da ri swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge bcu pa'i rig pa ste/ mi dbang gi btsun mo yang / bzlas pa tsam gyis dbang du byed// oM ma li nI kin+ti kin+ni// dang por arka swA hA ldan// de nas dbyangs
201a2(rgyud 'grel): can skyes bu ni// dbyangs can ngag ni 'thob par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la sngags ni/ oM arka ma li nI ki ni ki ni swA hA/ zhes bya ba ste/ dbyangs can mdun du 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas bsnyen pa bya'o// de nas zla ba gcig
201a3(rgyud 'grel): gi bar du dbyangs can ma'i sman mar khyor ba re la la sngags lon bdun bzlas te 'thungs na ngagi dngos grub ster bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du zla ba gcig tu tshul bzlas te btung ba 'am// mar 'ba' zhig la bzlas te/ zla ba drug
201a4(rgyud 'grel): 'thungs nAM dog gi dngos grub 'thob bo// mun de shrI ba na pa sha tsi zhes bya ba la/ 'brar dang bcas sngags sgrogs pa ste// rna ba g.yon par sgrogs byed pa// 'bring ba 'di ni bzlog par bya// oM shri ba na pi shA tsi ni mun dr-i swA hA/
201a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di ru N+Da la lan bdun bzlas te/ rkang pa gdong la byugs te nyal na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba sgrogs par gdon mi za'o// zla phyed 'beb pa zo byed cing // ri'i bu mo'i cho ga yis// mar la bsgres pa'i bil ba bsreg/
201a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal srid ster 'gyur gdon mi za'o// sngags ni/ oM gi ri ku ma ri ga ma he ra dz+ya satwa ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba yin no// dur+m+me bi dur+m+me zhes bya ba 'o ma yam shing bsreg cing / skyes bu'i mtshan ma lan brgyar bsreg/ sngon du bsnyen pa
201b1(rgyud 'grel): med par yang // grong khyer ster 'gyur gdon mi zla// sngags ni/ oM dur+m+me bi dur+b+be ni swA hA/ sngags n+ya gro d+hA dang / a shwad tha la sogs pa'i yaM shing la be'u dang kha dog 'dra ba'i 'o mas grong khyer gyi ming nas bzung
201b2(rgyud 'grel): ste sprin sreg byas na grong khyer rnyed par 'gyur ro// e g+ho ul ka swAhA au dang btsas// 'odi phreng can gyi snying po yin// pa lA sha shing gis bsregs na// gser srang 'bum ni ster bar 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM me g+ho u
201b3(rgyud 'grel): kaM yau swAhA/ tshags k+Sha bdag pa'o// tshogs kyi bdag po'o// oM ga sho u la ka ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba yang 'od phreng can gyi ste/ 'bras bu ni snga ma bzhin no// kA ra nA mo ti bzlas par bya// hUM phaT ldan pa 'bum
201b4(rgyud 'grel): phrag bzhes// skye tshe bsregs pas sa gsum yang // nyi ma gcig gis 'gugs par 'gyur// raka te rag ti ni bzlas par bya// pad+ma'i sbrang bur du ba btang // mi'i thod par mi bzhag ste// bskyed pa'i du bas
201b5(rgyud 'grel): skel bzang 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM rag te raka ti ni swA hA/ zhes bya ba yin te/ yo byad thams cad dmar por bslab po// tsan don mu khi ki li bzlas// dang po thams cad 'bar ldan bya// u ra bcas pas nges
201b6(rgyud 'grel): par ni// sa gsum dkyil 'khor bka' nyan 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM tsan+na mu khi ka li ur ni swAr+d+ha/ zhes bya ba ste/ rtag tu bzlas na dbang du 'gyu ro// kan tad+ya ya swA hA/ zhes bye bas/ mig sman bsregs te
202a1(rgyud 'grel): mig sman byA// glang che nu rdub dang shing tsha dang // ut+pal sngo bsregs skal bzangs gyur zhes bya ba la/ sngags ni/ oM k+Sha pya ya swA hwA/ zhes bya ba'o// 'dir snor ba ni dau Ta ke/ lus
202a2(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan dmar pos bskus la gos dmar po gyen te/ me tog dang phreng bas brgyan la/ suni ring du bzlas pa'i sngags gang yang rung bas bsrung ba byas nas/ zla be mar gyi ngo'i chos gnyis po gang yang rung ba la ma mo'i gnas
202a3(rgyud 'grel): dang lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am dur khrod du bsrung ba la sogs pa bya ste/ mig sman sngon po btags pa'i phye ma dang / glang po che'i rdul dus du bcas pa zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste/ logs da sA skal bzangs
202a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i ro'i mngal du bcug staM bsreg par bya'o// bsregs nas blangasi taM ki ma la dwe ba maN+Dal byas te mche la/ do nga tsha nga ut+pal sngon por bcas pa gser dngul gyi snod du sbya ra te/ mal gyi dbus su bzhag
202a5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ sngags brgyu de brgya 'am swA dIng bzlas so// des mig sman byas na bud med kyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu 'gyuro// skyes pa dbang du byu nga ni skyes pa'i snying gar bsreg go// na ya na ma no/ sa bsgrub// dri zhim rtsa ba ras dkris
202a6(rgyud 'grel): sbar// dmar sor ba dmar du baM yis// rtag tu mtshungs maud chags par 'gyuraro// zhes bya ba la sngags ni/ oM ka mo swA he saM hU~M/ lhag ma ni ko sla'o// ka ma sa ra swA// s+thAbasregs lag sman ni/
202b1(rgyud 'grel): ru r+N+Na r+g+ha spos a kar gnas// glang chen sen btags dbang du bsdus zhes bya ba la/ sngags ni/ oM ka ma swA he swA hA/ zhes byas pas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa khri phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o// 'dir yang glang po che'i
202b2(rgyud 'grel): sen me dang mig sman sngon po kun dan+ta'i sngags kyi cho ga bzhin du bsregs nas/ de'i 'og du rgyu spos dang / ru rta dang / a ka ru nag po dang bcas pa phye mar byas la/ snga ma bzhin bkab ste/ lan stong phrag tu bzlas la mig sman
202b3(rgyud 'grel): sman pa kun daR+Sha'i sngags kyi tshag bzhin du bsregs nas/ nga' 'ag du rgya sbas dang / byug na 'gro ba ma lus pa dbang du bsdud par 'gyur ro// oM Sh+TaM ban d+he zhes bya ba'i mig sman gyi ni du pos nges par dbang du byed/ 'od zer cani
202b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi man ngag gis/ rta rmig bkang ste bskyod par bya/ zhes bya ba la/ sngags ni/ oM Sh+TaM ban d+he swA hA/ 'di 'od zer can gyi mar sa rta'i rmig pas snod bkang la/ rta'i rmig pas gzhan gyi steng nas bautAb pa la du ba de bzung
202b5(rgyud 'grel): nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug gtor 'khor los sgyur ba'i mdun du mchod pa byas te/ sngags bzlas par bya'o// man tra bA ri zhes bya ba'i// yi ge thog mar yang dag ldan// nyin mtshan bzlas pa'i yang dag gnas/
202b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum yang bran du 'gyur/ zhes bya ba rol/ sngags ni/ oM man+ta ba re e mu kaM mo swA hA/ nga na ne sa pa ri ba ba sa mo na ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba gang dbang du bya bar 'dod pa de mdun du bsams nas bzlas na
203a1(rgyud 'grel): bran du 'gyur ro// mi mgor skyes gnyis skud pa gnyis// gtum dbang rkang pa skur bcas bsdud// d+ha nan tsan dA sgrar ni bcas// nyin mtshan tsha bas thebs par 'gyur zhes bya ba la//
203a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni/ oM hUM nan tsA na da a mu kan dzA raM na mA ra yA hUM phaT/ ces so// mi'i mgro ni me'i thod pa'o// skyes gnyis skyed pa ni bram ze'i sgo'i skud pa'o// gtAm dbang ni lha chen po ste/ de la phul ba'i me tog bzung
203a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo // rkang pa ni bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi rdul lo// de dag mi'i thod par bzhag la// mi'i rje ngar gyi rus pa'i srubos shing bram+bi ze'i rtse ud pas btags la/ sngags zlos bzhin du der sgra dang bcas par bsrubs na/ nyi ma
203a4(rgyud 'grel): bdun gyis skyes bu chen po yang rims che bas thebs par 'gyur ro// dang po tha mar yang dag ldan// gnod sbyin ma yi yig bdun brjod// b+hak+ke puk+ki zhes bzlas bya// 'bum phrag bzhi yi skal bzang 'gyur/
203a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba la sngags ni/ oM b+hak+ke puSh+pe swA hA zhes bya ba ste/ sngags 'di smanA ma ma shA'i kha zas za zhing / 'bumo phrag bzhir bzlas brjod byas na/ 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i yugs su mo rnams
203a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang du 'gyur ro// chu sbyor drug bzlas gnod sbyin dang // gnod sbyin mo yang mngon sum mthong // grong gi byang du n+ya gro d+ha'i// ya ma shing mngar gsum sngags pa bsreg ces bya ba la// dang por snga drom
203b1(rgyud 'grel): dus su nang du byung ba'i nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan chu skyor drug bzlas pa dang byin la// grong khyer gyis byang du n+ya gro d+ha'i yam shing mdAr gsum la stsags pas sbyin bsreg byas na gnod sngon dang gnod sbyin mo mngon
203b2(rgyud 'grel): sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// sngags ni/ oM b+hok+ke buk+ke swAhA zhes sngar bstan pa yin no// grub nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro// nags tshal chu 'gra ma ri ljongs su//
203b3(rgyud 'grel): sngo tshod 'thung zhing gnas par bya// dpa' bo sa rgyal bar byed pa dang / mkhar gnas 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ dpa' bo ni/ a khaM bI ra'i sngagaswA to/ nigs tshol
203b4(rgyud 'grel): la stsogs pa'i gnas su sngo tshad 'thung zhing dpa' bo'i sngags kI rgya lnga po 'di bzlas na/ grwa yul las rgyul bar byed pa dang na mkha' la rgyu ba'i rgyal srid ster bar 'gyur ro//
203b5(rgyud 'grel): oM ru tI ni swA hA/ zhes bya ba/ u ma'i snying po'i yig 'bru bzla/ pri yang ku'i me tog bas go/ yid kyi re ba bskong bar 'gyur/ ga Na
203b6(rgyud 'grel): dzal tshogs bdag snying / phyag 'tshal gaNagasal bar bca/ yo ge 'bum phrag bzlas nas su// sngags pas rtag tu
204a1(rgyud 'grel): gu gul bsgeg ces bya ba sa/ tshogs thams cad kyi nang nas rgyal b+hur byed pas nA ga Na dza'o// deci phyir zhen
204a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bdag snying po'o// dzaM ltar rgyal bar byed ce na/ glu kul zhes bya ba smos te/ gu gul gyis sbyin byug byas na'o// sngags ni/ oM ga Na ma ga Na dza ya stong+ka zhes bya bya'o//
204a3(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i 'dod 'jo'i rnam par bshad pa'o// slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po
204a4(rgyud 'grel): nag po'i zhal snga nas dang bod kyi lo tsa ba mgos lhas bi tsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // bkra shis
205a1(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor dum med pa'i gzung baphrag ci paco na rtsa brgyad dpa lnga gang 'chog phram can marnamargyas mdza pa 'khrug so//
205b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa kun nas sbyor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor d+ha ma med par snang ba'i gzungs bklag cing mchod rten brgya r+N+Na brgyud dam/ mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga yang skye las bsdus pa/
205b2(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs bzlas shing mchod rten gdab pa'i thabs la der gtogs pa thams cad phyi'i khrus kyang bya/ mgo mjug kun tu gnod sems dang / bi rna ba
205b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dang / ma dad pa dang / le lo dang / gnyid la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon dang / sems ma 'dres par bsdams shing gnod pa dang 'tshe ba'i las mi shor bar bya/ dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan gyi
205b4(rgyud 'grel): mthu'i khyad par dang / mdo sde'i phan yon la yid ches pa dang / dad cing gus pa cher bskyed/ sem+ba tsa thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje cher bskyed do// khyim pa zhig na bsnyen gnas kyi khrims bzung la/ de nas
205b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten gdab pa'i yo byad rnams bshams la/ 'jim pa brko ba nas btab cing dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa'i bar du mchod rten gyi cho ga bzhin du nang par snga dro thebs par bya// mchod pa'i cho ga dang yo byad ba shaM/
205b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yan chad legs par 'gyi/ mchod rten 'debs pa'i zla la chos kyi sbyin pa dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskul bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / go ser 'od dam pa dang / rin po che'i
206a1(rgyud 'grel): tog dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs kyi mdo sde tshar phyin rgyun mri 'chad par bklag/ yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs rnam gnyis kyi 'dzab bla gcig kyang bzlas/ mdo sde
206a2(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang mchod cing chos kyi sbyin pa bsngo ba dang / spyan drang ba la sogs pa sna la bgyis nas bklag go// mdo sde do snyed ma ltogs na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang gzungs tshar gang byung zhig tu snying po bzlas par bya'o//
206a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod rten thebs/ mi chod pa bsham/ gsung rab rdzogs nas bar skabs der cung zhig bsangs te/ de nas snga dro dge 'dun spyir tshogs nas mchod pa la sogs pa rim bzhin bgyi'o// mchod pa bshams pa'i
206a4(rgyud 'grel): thabs 'byor pa'i stobs ci nus pa dang sbyar te/ spos kyi maN+Dal chen po'i dbus su tshon phye 'am/ me tog rin po che sna lnga'i pho brang rkyen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bris pa'i dbus su pad+ma chen po'i ste dar mchod rten paN+ya rtsa
206a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad shong ba'i an+d+ra se ng+ge'i khri la pad+ma bzhag lA/ re'u chen po brgya dang / ngos bzhi'i dbus su re'u gnyis gnyis su bgyi ste/ rgyu rtsa brgyad pa sham pa 'am/ mchod rten lnga pa zhig na 'tsham par sbyar te de lo bcu
206a6(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gcig kyang dbus su bzhugs/ bar gyi snam bu gcig gam gnyis la pad+ma mong po dgram zhing 'phags pa gdan 'dzem pa gdad du bshom zhing / gzungs tshas
206b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi bum pa kha rgyan can bzhi yan chad du 'byor pa ngos bzhir bzhag/ de'i phyi rol gar 'os par bshos dang / mchod yon la sogs pa mchod pa rgyas par dgram/ steng du bla re dang 'phan dang bya ngan mang po brgya rtsa brgyad
206b2(rgyud 'grel): man chad rgyas pa dgra ma/ grwa bzhir pog phor a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug go// sgo bzhir mchod rten bzhi bsham/ gzhan yang mchod pa tsi nus su rgyas par bgyi'o// bum pa'i khor yungs
206b3(rgyud 'grel): kar dang bye ma yang bzhag cing bzlas la dur khrod dam/ phyogs kun tu yang gtor ro// drang por mchod pa bshams la dge 'dun tshogs nas phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag bgyi/ de nas chos thams
206b4(rgyud 'grel): cad la phyag bgyi/ de nas chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ci nus kyis bsgom/ ting nge 'dzin las langs nas chos thams cad don dam par de lta bu yin la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis
206b5(rgyud 'grel): de kho nyid thugs su chud pas/ sku dang gsung dang thugs na mkha' dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ sgrib pa mi mnga' zhing mthu dang byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go 'phang brnyes pa yang rung nA/ kye ma'o sems can 'di
206b6(rgyud 'grel): dag ni chos kyi de kho nyid ma rtogs te rmongs pas nyon rmongs pa dang sdug bsngal mang pos gzir cing nyam thag po'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyang thog ma med po'i 'khor ba nas 'gro brgyud
207a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams su bdag gi gnyen pa shes drin gyi zhing du ma gyur pa gang yang med cing / bdag gis kyang dang po byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed de 'gro ba mang po'i don dpag tu med pa bsgrub par dam bcas pa'i
207a2(rgyud 'grel): tshe/ sems can thams cad bdag gis blangs zin pas/ 'di lta bu la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yal bar dor ba ni/ mi rigs na 'di dag ji ltar sdug bsngal nas gdon/ bde ba la ni ji ltar bkod par bya snyam du
207a3(rgyud 'grel): snying rje dang / byams pa che no dang ldan pa'i brtson pa'i sems drag tu bskyed par bya'o// yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag ni dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dang mthu dman pa yin pas/ bdag nyid gcig pas 'phral du
207a4(rgyud 'grel): don rlabs po tsho 'di lta bu mi lcogs kyis/ ston pa bde bar gshe gso bas sngon lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa las rjes su thugs brtse nas kun nos skor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin
207a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang snying po la rnam par lta ba'i gzungs la brten te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa dang / dam pa'i chos skyong pab thams cad gdan 'dzom par spyan drangs
207a6(rgyud 'grel): la mthu brtan pa dkyang gnyen du gsol te/ da ltar ni 'phags pa'i mthu dang byin gyis brlabs kyis 'gro ba rnams la phan pa bsgrub par bya la/ phyis ni bdag nyid gcig pus gzhan la bltos pa med par yod thabs
207b1(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa'i sgo sna tshogs nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bla na med pa yang dag par sgrub par bya'o snyam du bsam mo// de ltar snying rje dang / byams pa'i sems bskyed pa'i 'og tu tsha tsha thebs nas bya ba'i rim pa la/
207b2(rgyud 'grel): dang por bden pa bdar zhing gnas byin gyis brlab/ de nas spyan drang / de nas bstod phyag bya/ de nas bsu ba'i ar+g+ha gsol/ de nas gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ de nas sku khrus gsol/ khrus kyi smon lam bya/ de nas mtsho
207b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bul/ de nas yon chab gsol/ de nas rang byung dpa' bos bstod / gtor ma bsngo ba zhar la bya/ de nas sdig bshags/ de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba kun la rje su yi rang bar bya/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskal ba gdub
207b4(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs par gsol ba gdab/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ shis pa brjod pa/ sems can dang 'phags pa'i tshogs la bsod nams bstab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med
207b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bas skabs 'di mchod rten gyi skor ba'i tshigasu bcad pa dang / de'i phan lon dang / smon lam la sogs pa ci nus kyis rgya cher bkrug/ de nas bskor ba bdun yan chad bskor bar bgyi/ de nas bshags
207b6(rgyud 'grel): bzod par gsol/ de nas gshegs su gsol ba bgyi/ sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i pho brang dang / mchod pa'i tshogs bshams pa bden pa bdar zhing yid kyis bsngo ste/ dkon mchog
208a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi bden pa dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongasu rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag
208a2(rgyud 'grel): cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis/ deng kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dam tshig la rnam par blta ba'i gzungs kyi mdo las 'byung ba
208a3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa'i gnas 'dir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras pa dang bcas pa dang 'phags pa chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'dzom pa'i
208a4(rgyud 'grel): pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang / mchod pa'i tshogs sbyor ba 'di rnams ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can gyis bsgrub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang / bcom ldan
208a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i zhing gi bkod pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ tha gru che ba yangs pa reg na 'dzi zhing bde ba/ dri ma med cing 'od gsal
208a6(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri bsung dang ldan pa/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du bkram pa/ mtha' rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs shing / gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig gram bu brdal ba/ ut+pal dang /
208b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma 'gying zhing ldem pas khebs par gyur cing / chu bya sna tshogs sgyu snyan pa sgrogs pa/ dga' zhing 'phyo la lding bas brgyan pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka dag gis
208b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang / lha'i nor buM dang / mu tog gi rgyan phreng dang / rin po che sbyangs pa dang / me tog gi mgo lcogs dang / 'bras bu mdzes par chags pa g.yur za zhing ldem
208b3(rgyud 'grel): la gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha 'khrol ba las dam pa'i chos kyi sgra 'byung ba dang ldan pa tshar du bsgrengs pas legs par brgyan pa'i sa bzhi la/ gzhal yas khang chen po rgyu rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar ba bkod pa/ badzin gyi khams
208b4(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med pa rgyas par khengs pa'i 'od zer chen po rab tu 'byung ba/ gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnam par phye ba mtha' yas par rnam par gnas pa/ rgyu yongs su ma chad pa/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod
208b5(rgyud 'grel): yul/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang sgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ byang chub sed pa dpag tu med pa'i dge
208b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dun dang ldan pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa mtha' yas pa rnam par rgyu ba/ chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang /
209a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen pos brtan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don yang dag par sgrub par byed par nye bar gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud thams cad yongs su
209a2(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa/ thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa'i gnas dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chen po bzhon pa yin pa/ rnam
209a3(rgyud 'grel): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo'i rgyal po'i yon tan mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la brten pa'i gzhal med khang chen por gyur pa'i dbus
209a4(rgyud 'grel): su pad+ma'i gdan chen po seng ge'i khri'i steng na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi sku'i mchod rten rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa/ brgya dang tshad dpag tu med pa/ mchod rten gyi rnam pa'i bye brag dang / legs
209a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khyad par thams cad dang ldan pa/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tAn thams cad kyi bdag nyid 'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal zhing du gyur pa grangs med pa zhig ro mo mi dkrigs par
209a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs par gyur pa'i mtha' 'khor bar gzhal med khang chen po'i nang du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs gdan 'dzom pa'i gdan khri/ 'phags pa so so'i smon lam khyad par can gyi
209b1(rgyud 'grel): mnga' tha dang 'tsham par grub pa mdzes pa shA stag 'byung bar gyur cig/ phyi nang kun tu yang rtswa rigs dang 'tsham par lha dang mi'i yo byad dam pa zhal zas dang / na bza' dang / rgyun dang / rol mo la sogs pa phul du
209b2(rgyud 'grel): byiphyin pa sna tshogs pa/ phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang / bzang po spyod pa'i smon lom las 'byung ba'i sprin rgya mtsho thams cad kyis rgyas par gang zhing rgyan klubs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ 'phags pa thams cad gdan
209b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzom nas de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs shing bzhes te longs spyod par gyur cig zhes lan gsum bzlas/ yang dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis
209b4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig ces lan gsum bzlas/ spyan drang po/ de bzhin
209b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos chen po'i sku gdung ring bsrel dang / sku gdung gi mchod rten dang / chos kyi sku'i mchod rten gzugs kyi tshul du
209b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bzhag pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yin
210a1(rgyud 'grel): lag brgyad dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / bsrung ba med pa gsum dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / stobs bcu dang /
210a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thugs rje chen po dang / ye shes la sogs pa yon tan bsags pa'i mchod rten dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang /
210a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang / 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten 'di lta ste/ lum bi'i tshal du bltams pa dang / rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa
210a4(rgyud 'grel): dong / ba ra Na sir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / rgyal po'i khab tu glang po che nor skyong btul ba dang / lha las babs par lha yul nas gshegs pa dang / yangs pa can du spre'us sbrang rtsi phul ba dang / gyad yul
210a5(rgyud 'grel): du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa dang brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdung gi gzugs dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po mdzad pas zhing khams 'di nyid mchod rten du gyur pa dang / dpal ldan
210a6(rgyud 'grel): skyid pa'i gnas la sogs par dpal phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa dang / dbang po'i brag phug la sogs par mdo yang dag par bsdus pa dang ka ni ka'i mchod rten du sku gdung 'dus pa la sogs pa dang /
210b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzam+bu'i gling dang / gling bzhi dang / stong khams na mchod rten khyad par can ji snyed bzhugs pa thams cad dang / gzhan yang sa bla dang / bar snang dang / lha yul dag na mchod rten ji snyed bzhugs pa dang / phyogs bcu thad na
210b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten khyad par can 'khor dang bcas pa ji snyed bzhugs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang / rigs thams cad na bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par bgyi ba dang / bdag cag la sogs pa sems can
210b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi bsod nams deng dkon mchog dang / mchod rten khyad par can dang bcas pa spyan drang ba'i gnas 'og min la sogs pa bar snang dang / sa bla'i lha'i gzhal med khang dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i
210b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhal med khang chen po ji lta ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs pa 'dir/ mchod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yongs su dag pa rgya chen po rnam pa thams cad dang / longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams spel bar mi mdzod kyang /
210b5(rgyud 'grel): btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po yongasu sbrel ba'i slad du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gnas mal dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / bsnyung pa'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dang / mchod rten la 'os pa'i bde bar
210b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba thams cad kyis bstabs shing spyan 'dren gyis mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad de// chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba'i tshul gyis gshegs shing bzhes par
211a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ dkon mchog dang / mchod rten byed par sha dang bcas pa'i 'khor du gtogs pa thams cad spyan drang ba/ lha'i 'jig rten mtho ris na 'phags pa gang dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams
211a2(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs shing gzigs pa dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa dang sgrib pa gsal ba/ bsam gtan dang rnam paro thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang du gyur
211a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pas/ lha'i dbang po'i cha lugs kyis lha mang po dag la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing bzhugs pa dang / lha mang po de gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du bden pa rtogs pa ste 'phags pa'i
211a4(rgyud 'grel): lam la gnas shing / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching pa yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis gsal ba/ dran pa bsal zhing ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas
211a5(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog dang / chos thams cad kyi mchog bla na med pa'i chos dkon mchog dang / tshogs thams cad kyi mchog bla na med pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog la smon bsnyen bkur mdzad cing dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed pa
211a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams kyis chos dkar po'i phyogs rtag tu rgya cher spel zhing bsrung ba/ sems can rnams kyi 'thab mo dang / bathab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phyi dgra dang / nang 'khrug dang / gnod pa
211b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / nyam nga ba dang / mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nang dang / rims nang dang / mi ngas dang / phyugs ngas dang / mu gre dang / lo nyes dang / ltas ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad
211b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ sngon sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po'i tshe/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang / 'dul bya dang / chos mngon pa dang / gzungs sngags dang / rig sngags dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa zab
211b3(rgyud 'grel): cing rgya chen po bshad pa'i tshe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe nga'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
211b4(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnam bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rigs bzhi chos dang ldan zhing chos spyod pa thams cad dang / lha yul dang / yul 'khor dang / glong dang / grong khyer la sogs pa 'byung po'i tshogs dge
211b5(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams srungs shig ces zhal gyis bka' stsal cing / de dag gis kyang dam tshig mnos te lha dang mo'i mgon mdzad pa/ phyag bya ba'i gnas/ bkur sti bya ba'i gnas/ bla mor bya ba'i gnas/ btsun par bya ba'i
211b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ 'di lta ste/ 'og min na lha'i dbang phyug chen po gnas gtsang ma gzhan gyi ris kyi lha dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dag gsum pa dang / gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan dang po'i ris kyi lha dang / gzhan 'phrul
212a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / 'thab bral dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding
212a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa bdag nyid chen po khyad par can gyi tshogs thams cad dang / dam tshig can dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song
212a3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dam pa'i chos sbrel bar dam bcas pa/ tshangs dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong bcu dang / gza' chen po brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / phyogs
212a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi glang po che dang / sde dpon dang / lha mo dang / phyogs kyi lha dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha dang / btsun mo dang / sras dang / 'khor dang / phyo nya dang / mngag pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / tshogs bdag dang / dga' byed
212a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dang / smin drug gi bu dang / nag po chen po dang / stobaso can dang / stobs po che dang / gnod 'dzin dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / dud dang dung chen dang / gang po dang / shin tu gang ba dang / mgrin po dang /
212a6(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams lhun po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / bum rna dang / dril rna dang / rna gsum dang / rna bo che dang / yang dag zhes dang / yang dag rgyal ba dang / rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / 'brog
212b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang / gangs gnas dang bde ri dang / lnga rtsen dang / lnga len dang / tshogs lnga ser dang / mgrin bcu dang / 'jigs rung dang / 'brug sgra dang / nam mkha'i dbyangs dang / stong gsum dang / rgya mtsho dang / dga'
212b2(rgyud 'grel): bo dang / nyes dga' dang / ma dros dang / gzi can dang / nor rgyas dang / gdon la 'jebs dang / drang srong dang rig sngags 'chang dang / char lha dang / sprin lha dang / lo tog lha dang / lamaM lha dang / sa'i lha dang / chu'i lha dang /
212b3(rgyud 'grel): me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha dang / na mkha'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / shing gi lha dang / rdzing gi lha dang / dus tshogs kyi lha dang / nyin mtshan gyi lha dang / dus mtshams kyi lha dang / tshes grangs kyi lha dang / skad cig dang / thang
212b4(rgyud 'grel): cig dang / yud tsam gyi lha dang / ha nu ma ta la sogs pa mthu bo che dang / tshag la dbang ba dang / dga' dbyangs dang / mdangs bu dang / dpal gyi lha mo dang / 'od zer can dang / dkar sha ma dang / brjod skyob dang /
212b5(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA dang / ya mu na dang / bu mangs dang / dung can dang / ri mkhar dang / nag mo dang / ma bdun dang / sring mo bdun dang / sring mo bzhi dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ral pa gcig mA la sogs pa dang / lha ma chen mo
212b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo dang / sha za chen po dang / gzhon nu dang / rdzu 'phrul can dang / dbang bdag dang / slag chen dang / brjid pa dang / g.yul rgyal dang / dge bsnyen chen mo dang / lha sras gnon
213a1(rgyud 'grel): nu dang / klu sras gzhon nu dang / rig sngags 'chang gzhon nu dang / drang srong gzhon nu dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin gzhon nu dang / ti ra ka la sogs pa dang / gzi
213a2(rgyud 'grel): brjid chen po'i gzhon sde thams cad dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang / lha'i gzo bo las thams cad pa dang / gegs kyi rgyal po log 'dren dang / gtsug lag khang gi srung mar zhal gyis bzhes pa gnyug mar gnas
213a3(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas mthong ba/ chos thos pa/ dge 'dun la brten pa/ bstan pa bsrung ba/ dam tshig gnod pa/ lha dang mi'i mgon mdzad pa/ phyag bya ba'i gnas bkur sti bya ba'i gnas/ mar bya ba'i gnas/
213a4(rgyud 'grel): btsun par bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa thams cad dang / gzhan yang mchod pa'i gnas dang / drin bsab pa'i gnas dang / snying rje'i gnas su gyur pa'i sbyin gnas ji snyed pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang / rigs thams cad
213a5(rgyud 'grel): na bzhugs pa'i 'phag sa thams cad na bzhugs pa thams cad mnyes par bgyi ba dang / bsod nams bsgrub pa'i gnas dpal lha mo chen po'i sgo yon dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / pha ma dang gzhan yang mchod
213a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas sam/ drin bsab pa'i gnas sam/ snying rje'i gnas gang yang rung ba dang / bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi don du dang dkon mchog gsum dang / mchod rten khyad pa can 'khor
213b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa spyan drang ba'i gnas 'og min la sogs pa bar snang dang sa bla'i gzhal med khang dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa'i gzhal med khang chen po ji lta ba de lta bur gshegs par gsol/ bstod pa
213b2(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag 'tshal ba/ ye shes tshogs kyis bskyed pa'i sku// ming dang gzugs las rnam par grol// rtog pa dang sgras las rab 'das kyang // bsnyel ba mi mnga'i rang bzhin can// dngos dang dngos med mtha' las
213b3(rgyud 'grel): dben// bsam brjod yul las shin tu 'das// ye shes rnams kyi gnas gyur pa// rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bsod nas tshis kyis bskyed pa'i sku// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas mchog na// chos la mnga'
213b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad longs spyod pa// byang chub sems dpa' yongs kyi mgon// gtsang ma'i gnas nas ma g.yos pa// gdul bya'i bsam pa ji bzhin du/ 'jig rten khoms ni mtha' yas par// sbrul myang 'gyed la rgyag 'tshal bstod//
213b5(rgyud 'grel): skad cig thung cig lud tsam la// dga' ldan mchog nas babs pa dang // 'jig rten sgyu rtsal phul phyung zhing // bdud bcom byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// 'khor lo bskor nas 'das pa'i bar// cho 'phrul cig car so sor
213b6(rgyud 'grel): ston// cho 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad byung ba// lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// ston pa ma chog bzhugs gzhal med khang // dbyibs legs rnam par phye bas mdzes// kha dog sna tshogs spel legs su// rin chen
214a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba mang pos brgyan// yid 'ong nyams dga' lha yi gnas// brgyan dkod dkyil na mdzes pa la// 'phags pa mchod pa'i rten bgyis te// ston pa 'khor dang bcas la bstod// mchod
214a2(rgyud 'grel): rten bsu ba'i ar+g+ha gsol ba// chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang // de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/ de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge slong che// skar ma rang
214a3(rgyud 'grel): ring mar me dang // sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang // rmi lam glog deng sprin lta bur// 'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya// mkhas pa gang dag rab tu sems dang zhing // sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la sa 'dor na// dzam bu
214a4(rgyud 'grel): chu bo gser gyi srang tshad ni// stong phrag brgya yang de dag mnyam pa min// mchod rten mchod nas dpal ljon pa// sku gdung chos sku chos dbyings dang // rig sngags gsang sngags snying po dang / phyag rgya byin brlabs
214a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol// gshegs byon skyo 'bri med pa'i sku// ji lta smon bzhin yod pa dag/ dkar po 'char ba'i tshul bzhin du// 'jig rten skyabs su gshegs su gsol// dkon mchog dang mchod rten khyad
214a6(rgyud 'grel): bar can dang bcas pa'i 'khor du gtogs po de dag la bsu po'i mchod yon ar+g+haM gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // mchod rten kha par 'khor gtogs pa// 'og man gnas dang lha tshogs dang //
214b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan bzhi dang 'dod khams drug/ sde brgyad tshegs dang 'byung po kun// dam tshig can dang thugs dam can// tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal chen bzhi// phyogs spyod gza' dang rgyu skar dang // dkon mchog mthong
214b2(rgyud 'grel): thos skyabs brten pa// phyag bgyi thul mo sbyar 'os shing // mgos gtugs mchod dang kun sbyin dang // rab tu sbyin 'os kun gshegs shig/ mchod pa dri med yongs dag pa// rnam mang rgya che thams cad dang //
214b3(rgyud 'grel): so so'i mnga' thung rgyas ched du// 'os pa'i bde ba sbyar ba dbul// mchod rten gdan la bzhugos par gsol// sku gdung chos sku byang chub phyogs// ma 'dres bsrung med bsnyel mi mnga'// mi 'jigs stobs
214b4(rgyud 'grel): ngang sangs rgyas chos// rdo rje ye shes tshogs bsagos pa// chos dbyings rig sngags gsang sngags dang // snying po phyag rgya byin rlabs kyis// mchod rten khyad par ji snyed pa// dpal ldan bsod nams zhing
214b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog kun// chos don dag pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rin chen stegs dang khro 'phang dang // gtsang ga dang lha rdzas pad+ma la// mi gnas tshul gyis gdan la bzhugs// dkon pa da rten khyad par dang
214b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i 'khor du gtogs pa de dag so sor gdan la bzhugs par gsol ba/ chos don kun gyi dkyil 'khor du// dpal ldan dag pa'i gnas bshams par// ting 'dzin ma g.yo mnyam gzhag cing
215a1(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i dgongs pas gad na la bzhugs// gtsang ga dang gdan khri yangs pa la// thogs med dog pa med pa'i sku// mnyam nyid tshul gyis bder bzhugs shing // bde bar sbyar ba bzhesu gsol//
215a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po gang dgra 'dir ni lcags gyur te// sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag/ skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing // nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ 'di na rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis// shin tu
215a3(rgyud 'grel): bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa// bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog/ deng kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig/ mchod rten la sku khrus gsol no// rnam dag skyon bral byang chub sems kyi dbyings// rnam rtog skyon
215a4(rgyud 'grel): bral yon tan tshogs kyi gter// kun gyis phyag byas bstod cing mchod pa'i gnas// bdud bzhi dpung rnams ma lus tshar gcod phyir// chos dbyings dag pa'i sku la khros chab gsol// nyon mongs 'khrul ba'i rtog po dag
215a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan snang gyur yang // chos dbyings dag pa'i sku la bskyod pa med// rin chen lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten dang / sa 'am chu 'am 'on te bar snang la// sems can don du rin chen skur bstan
215a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten dmigs par bcas te sku khrus gsol// khams gsum gnas pa'i bag chags dag gyur cig/ gzhi rmang dge bcu'i rnam dag pad+ma 'jam// dran pa nyer bzhag rmang gtu 'brang bstod// theg pa rnams kyi
215b1(rgyud 'grel): bang rim brtsegs pa ste// chos dbyings spros med bum pa zlum po la// smon lam chen po'i srog shing dge ba btsugs// dge ba'i longs spyod na mkha'i gdugs kyis bkab// byang chub sems kyi zla tshes rnam par dag/ dge
215b2(rgyud 'grel): sde bcu gsum 'khor lo'i phreng bso brgya ni// snang dbyings chos kyi dbyings la sku khrus gsol// shar phyogs byams pa brtsegs pa'i chos sku la// byams pa'i sems kyis sgo khrus 'di gsol bris// zhe sdang gdug pa'i
215b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams kun bsal nas// rtag tu byams pa'i ting 'dzin thob gyur cig/ lho phyogs rin chen brtsegs pa'i chos sku la// nga rgyal gdug pa'i tshogs rnams bsal ba'i phyir// byang chub sems kyi chu bos sku khrus
215b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol// khams gsum 'khor ba'i nga rgyal skyon bral nas// rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan thob gyur cig/ nub phyogs rnam dag pad+ma chos kyi dbyings// 'dod chags skyon bral pad+ma'i khri 'phang brtsegs// khams gsum san/
215b5(rgyud 'grel): bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// chos kyi sku la ye shes sku khrus gsol// sems can 'khor po'i 'dod chags dag gyur cing // byang phyogs rnam dag las kyi zhing rab ni// 'dod sred spangs pa'i yon tan rdzogs pas
215b6(rgyud 'grel): ston// rin chen in+d+ra lta bu'i mchod rten la// las kyi sgrib pa sbyang phyir sku khrus gsol// sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa grub gyur cig/ chos sku rnam par dag pa'i skyon bral nas// legs pa'i yon tan phun sum
216a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs par shog/ chu rnam lngas sku khrus gsol ba// sgyu mchog rnam dag lta bas mi ngoms la// ngo mtshur spyon bral mkha' dkyil nyi gsal 'dra// chos kyi sku la d+hi ma mi mdu' yang // dri zhu bkur sti
216a2(rgyud 'grel): gro'i tshul tsam du// chu gtsang sman spos 'o ma bdag che la tshus// 'gro ba'i lus sems sdug bsngal nad bsal te// nyes pa'i skyon bral 'gro ba'i yid 'ong ba// dam pa'i sku mchog bdag gis thob par shog/ oM badz+ra tsan d+ha la sa pa
216a3(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ma the swA hA/ oM a mr-i te hUM/ oM sarba A be sha hU~M/ de nas ras dkar po kha tshar ma nyams pa yug gcig gis sku phyis te/ bsam pa ni tshig bcad las smos pa ltar bsam/ bde gshegs sku
216a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum dpe dang mtshan mnga' yang // 'gro ba'i don du gzugs sku cir yang gda'// rin chen dbyis ltar nyes pa'i snyer bral yang // 'jig rten sri nu gus pa'i tshul tsam du// sdig med rgyal ba rnams kyis rab sngags pa'i// /
216a5(rgyud 'grel): ras mchog 'di yis rgyal ba'i sku phyis pas// nyon mongs dug gsum sgrib pa kun byang nas// sta gsum dang du ngadag tsog rgyur grub shog/ oM sar+b+ba ra tse a di baNA swA hA// mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul ba/ bde gshegs rnam
216a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi longs spyod kyis// kun bzang mo tshad pas rol mdzad kyang // 'gro ba'i dbul ba bsal slad du// bkur sti me gro'i tshul tsam gyis// bla med mchod pa rnam lnga 'di// 'gro ba'i don du 'bul lags na// mchod pa'i sprin gyis
216b1(rgyud 'grel): khyab gyur nas// bsod nams gter chen thob par shog/ rgyan dang na bza' dbul ba/ bde gshegs sku mchog mtshan dang dpe byang dang // rin chen 'od chags 'bar bas sku brgyan cing // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi rgyun
216b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis mdzes lags kyang // 'jig rten bkur sti rim gro'i tshul tsam du// rin chen phreng ba se mo do shal dang // rgyan gyi dam khyad par mchog phul bas// byang chub phyogs kyi rgyan dang ldan gyur nas// bla med thar pa mchog
216b3(rgyud 'grel): la gnas par shog/ bla re dang / 'phan gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rol mo la sogs pa dbul ba/ theg mchog bla re mgon skyabs gdugs dang ldan// bdud bcom rgyul mtshan ba dan ting 'dzin phan// lha da
216b4(rgyud 'grel): mi yi mchod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pas rab brgyan pas// bla re 'phan gdugs rgyal mtshan rol mo brjid// bdug spos dri zhim sil snyan sprin tshogs mdzes// bdag dang 'gro ba'i don
216b5(rgyud 'grel): du 'di phul bas// dbang mchog dam po dus 'dir thob gyur te// gnod pa'i dag bcom bla med go 'phang la// theg pa mchog gis nges par bgrod par shog/ bshos dang zhal zas gsol ba// rgyal bas bdud
216b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom byang chub sangs rgyas te// rgyal ba'i sku la sbrebs skye ma mi mnga' yang // bdag cag bsod nams zhing du 'gyur slad du/ bshos dang zhal zas sbyar ba 'di phul bas// dus kun dge ba'i lo rtog 'phel rgyas
217a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba can du pad+ma las skyes te// ting 'dzin chos drang zas la longs spyod shog/ 'bru dang sman dang spos dang snying po dang / rin po che sna lnga dbul ba/ bde gshegs mgon po dpag bsam 'khor dang ban+d+ha/
217a2(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams ye shes sku lnga mthar phyin pa// chos kyi longs spyod bkur sti tshul tsam du// 'bru lnga spos lnga sman lnga rin chen lnga// snying po lngar bcas rgyal ba r-i rabri bsngags pa// bdag gzhan don gyi snying por 'di phul bas// 'gro
217a3(rgyud 'grel): la phan phyir tshul khrims mechog ldan te// rin chen gtero las kun la phan 'dogs bshog/ bde ga shegs kun bzang mngon par sangs rgyas te// rdo rje gdan la mngon par bzhugs pa na// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gyis
217a4(rgyud 'grel): gus btsos pas// sngags grub rgyal pos yungs kar phul ba ltar// deng 'dir ston pas bdud bzhi tshar bcad nas// skye rgan 'chi 'khor la sdug bsngal las// bdag dang mtha' yas 'gro ba kun bsgral nas// rdo rje
217a5(rgyud 'grel): ga dan la mngon par sangs rgyas shog/ bkra shis shing zhal dro zhing byin phebs zhing 'jig rten du yun ring por bzhugasu gsol ba/ bde gshigs kun bzang mthong bas bkra shis ltar// rgyal ba 'khor bcas
217a6(rgyud 'grel): deng 'dir bkra shis shog/ ngan sdig log pa'i tshogs rnams bcom gyur nas// rgyas sras rigs 'dzin tshogs rnams 'phel ngar zhing // zhal mthong tsam gyis bde ba'i mchog brnyes nas// nyi ltar zhal dro zla ltar
217b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal zhing // bdag dang 'gro la zhal dro byin che nas// bskal pa mthar thug bar du bzhugs su gsol// spyan dbye ba'i smon lam du gsol ba/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum
217b2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bzhengs su gsol to/ chu gtsang dang / sug cha ba dang / 'o ma dang / spos chu dang slan chab kyis sku khrus gsol bas bdag dang
217b3(rgyud 'grel): mtho' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi dri ma dang / dus gsum gyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dag nas rnam par dag pa'i sku dang ldan par gyur cig/ ar+g+haM gsol bas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i
217b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag pa thob par gyur cig/ dri chab kyis sku la gtor te byugs pas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin
217b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi chu yis g.yeng ba'i dri ma thams cad rnam par bsal te bde zhing tshim par gyur cig/ spos gsol bas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims rnam par dag ste/ yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang
217b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan par gyur cig/ me tog phul bas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me phul bas sems can thams cad ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal nas//
218a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan par gyur cig/ bshos dang zhal zas gsol bas sems can thams cad bkres bya'i sdug bsngal bsngal nas yid bzhin gyi zas sgrom dang ldan
218a2(rgyud 'grel): par gyur cig/ 'bru rnam pa lnga phul bas sems can thams cad la 'jig rten gyi lo tog 'phel zhing dge ba'i lo tog dus kun tu rgyas par gyur cig/ spos lnga gsol bas sems can thams cad tshul khrims rnam
218a3(rgyud 'grel): par dag ste/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig/ sman lnga gsol bas sems can thams cad nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i sdug bsngal dang bral nas thugs rje'i sman gyis dus gsum gyi nad las thar
218a4(rgyud 'grel): par gyur cig/ rin po che sna lnga gsol bas yid kyi nor bu rin po ches sems can thams cad kyi dgos dgu yid bzhin du bskongs nas 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ snying po lnga gsol bas bdag
218a5(rgyud 'grel): drang sems can thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur cig/ rgyun dang na bza' gsol bas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i ngo tsha mkhyen pa'i na bza' dang ldan pa dang / byang chub
218a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyogs kyi rgyan dang ldan par gyur cig/ bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang 'phan dang gdugs la sogs pa phul bas bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang ldan nas theg pa bla na med pa la gnas par gyur cig/
218b1(rgyud 'grel): yungs kar gsol bas 'jig rten ji srid gnas pa'i bar du 'jig rten na bzhugs shing sems can gyi don mdzad nas mchod pa'i don du gyur cig/ bkra shis phul bas mi dge ni zhing bkra mi shis pa thams cad bsal
218b2(rgyud 'grel): nas bu gcig pa'i ma ltar byams pa chen po rgyas nas bkra shis byin che bar gyur cig/ 'phags pa'i sku gdung rin chen ring bsrel snong // rnying bcos byi dor bgyis shing mchod pa dang / gsar brtsig mchod cing khrus chab
218b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba dang // bstod dang skor dang gus pa bgyis pa dang // smon lam zab mo sems yid dang btab pa'i// byin brlabs yon tan khyad par chen po'i mthus// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad dang // dad mos grogs
218b4(rgyud 'grel): byed rjes su yi rang rnams// smon lam mthu stobs khyad par chen po yis// dang ba'i yid kyis mchod pa 'di brtsigs pas// des na bdag cag sdig sgrib byung gyur te// bla med byang chub bdag cag myur thob shog/
218b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab mchog gis bdag med thugs chud de// ye shes chen po'i tshogs las byung ba yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i chos sku spros med pa// so so rang rig de la phyag 'tshal bstod // 'gro ba'i don du dka'
218b6(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams mdzad de// bsod nams chen po'i tshogs las byung ba yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs sku gang snang ba// yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bskal pa grangs med 'das pa'i sngon
219a1(rgyud 'grel): rol nas// sems can don du byang chub thugs bskyed de// spyod pas gzhan gyi don la rab brtson pa// bla med 'bras bu brnyes la phyag 'tshal bstod// thabs kyis spod pa mdzad pa mthar phyin cing //
219a2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen yongs bskor nas// mya ngan 'das pa'i tshul ni rab bstan pa// sku gdung bzhag pa dag la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku gdung phro mor bsil ba'i ring srel snod// rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa chos
219a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshul// sems can rnams kyis mchod par bya ba'i brten// gzugs brnyan nyid kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// sngon gyi smon lam chen po'i rgyun mnga' bas// byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun te// bang rim bum pa srog/
219a4(rgyud 'grel): shing tshul bstan pa// rgyu yi chos su bzhag lo phyag 'tshal bstod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ma 'dres chos// thugs rje chen po tshad med rab mnga' bas// 'khor lo char khabs lta bu'i tshul bstan po// 'bras
219a5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i chos su bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi 'jigs bsrung ba med dang bdud las rgyal// tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan mngon par mkhyen mnga' bas// rdo ring them skas rgyal mtshan dril bu tog/ chos sku'i rten du bzhag la
219a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod// chos kyi grags pa ye shes bzhi la sogs// yon tan ngo mtshar rmad kyi tshogs rdzogs shing // gang gi chos kyi rgyal por mtshan gsol ba// bdag nyid chen po dag la phyag 'tshal bstod// rang
219b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rnam dag chos dbyings de bzhin nyid// spros pa'i dri mas ma gos dkar ba la// rin chen spras pas mtshan mchog rdzogs pa'i sku// 'gro don legs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// de bzhin sku gdung dbyings bcas
219b2(rgyud 'grel): chos sku dag/ gang gis mthong thos dran nam rig kyang rung // mtho ris dpal dang thar mchog bde thob pa// yon tan rmad tshogs chags mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod pa dbul ba/ ye shes tshogs rdzogs smra
219b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum lhun gyis grub/ bzhi bcom drug ldan mi gnas mya ngan 'das// thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor ba'i 'dam bskams pa// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa 'bul// dri med bdud rtsi 'khor ba'i nad rnams
219b4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms// don dam dmigs med bde gshegs 'byung ba'i rgyu// ye shes nyi ma sa ma rig mun 'joms pa// 'phags pa'i lam gyur chos la mchod pa 'bul// byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms tshul// bde
219b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs rin chen pad+mo las kyi rtags// rin chen bzhi las mngon du gyur pa'i sku// rigs bzhi'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa 'bul// lho phyogs 'jam gling rin chen dkyil 'khor na// ye shes
219b6(rgyud 'grel): dpag yas thugs rjes 'brel pa'i sku// rang 'byung sprul pa'i mchod rteni chen po dang // yid bzhin lhun gyis grub la mchod pa 'bul// nub phyogs bde ldan pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor na// thabs kyi bye brag ring bsrel bskur
220a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa// dpe med bsam las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang // rmang grags chos kyi dbyings la mchod pa 'bul// byang phyogs bsam yas yid bzhin dkyil 'khor na// thabs dang shes rab bsal zhing
220a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i gdung // yon tan rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang // khams gsum bde rgyas sgron la mchod pa 'bul// shar phyogaso lus 'phags ye shes dkyil 'khor na// byams pa 'khor ba 'dren mdzad
220a3(rgyud 'grel): ring bsrel sku// byams ldan bsod nams gtor gyi mchod rten dang // mthur legs g.yung drung rdzogs la mchod pa 'bul// khri 'phang dang po dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// lus sems tshor dang chos rnams rjes su dran// spyi
220a4(rgyud 'grel): dang rang gi mtshan nyid mngon rtogs pa// rig pa'i shes rab bskyed la mchod pa 'bul// khri 'phang gnyis pa yang dag spong ba bzhi// sdig pa mi bskyed mi dge'i chos spong zhing // dge ba'i chos bskyed tshogs gnyis
220a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs mdzad pa// rtog pa'i bag chags bral la mchod pa dbul// khri 'phang gsum pa rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi// 'dun dang sems dang dpyod dang brtson 'grus rnams// spong ba'i 'du byed ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis//
220a6(rgyud 'grel): thogs med 'gro don mdzad la mchod pa 'bul// khri 'phang bzhi pa snang ba'i dbang po lnga// dad brtson dran dang ting 'dzin dbang po dang // shes rab dbang po chos la dbang sbyar ba// 'dod dgu dge rtse spyod la mchod pa 'bul//
220b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur med bum rten 'degs pa'i stobs lnga ste// da dang brtson 'grus dran dang ting 'dzin stobs// shes rab stobs kyis nyon mongs zil gyis gnon// mthu dbang mngon du gyur la mchod pa 'bul// bum pa mngon 'phags
220b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub yan lag bdun// dran dang chos 'byed brtson 'grus dga' ba dang // shin tu sbyangs dang ting 'dzin btang ba snyoms kyis// 'grub 'gyur thogs pa med la mchod po 'bul// kha khyer 'phags pa'i lam gyi lan
220b3(rgyud 'grel): lag brgyad// lha dang rtog dang ngag dang lus kyi mtha'// 'tsho dang rtsol dang dran dang tod 'dzin gyis// 'phags pa'i lam nas 'jug la mchod pa 'bul// srog shing mkhyen pa bcu yi bdag nyid de// thabs dang shes
220b4(rgyud 'grel): rab ting 'dzin rtsal mchog gis// dam chos bdud rtsi 'dzin pa'i mchog gyur pa// shes rab don kun rig la mchod pa 'bul// 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu nyer bzhag gsum// shes rab spyan ldan thabs
220b5(rgyud 'grel): chen mngon gzigs te/ shes bya'i bag chags sbyangs pas thogasas med// ye shes phun sum tshigs la mchod pa 'bul// char khabs sgrub chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid de// gdul bya'i dus dang sems kyi rgyud
220b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen nas// 'jig rten rnams lo phan 'dogs rab brtson pa// phyi mthar yun rings bzhugs la mchod pa 'bul// dod brtson shugs kyis lus ngag sems btud // brtson 'grus drag po'i rin chen sna lnga
221a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'byung ba lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten dang // sku gdung ring bsrel rnams la mchod pa 'bul// sku gdung thugs la sprul pa'i rgyal ba'i sras// rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis phyi mthar
221a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don mdzad// skye 'gag med pa'i don gyis blo sbyangs pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa 'bul// rnam grol thar lam mchog tu rab brtson pa// zung bzhi ya brgyad rig pa'i skyes bu'i tshogs//
221a3(rgyud 'grel): rten 'brel don kun rig pas rang sangs rgyas// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun tshogs la mchod par 'bul// dge ba bcus bskyed bskal ldan sangs rgyas zhing // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis ngan song mtha' spangs
221a4(rgyud 'grel): shing // rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// 'jig rten srung ma'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// rdo ring them skas chu sbyin rgyal mtshan dang // gdugs dang ba dan dur gyi cod pa na dang // pad+ma nyi zla sil
221a5(rgyud 'grel): snyan lha rdzas kyis// tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar dmigs pa dag par mchod// ting 'dzin sngag snga dang phyag rgya'i mthus bsgyur ba// yon chab bdug spos mar me dri chab dang // me tog dam pa ba shos gtsang mnyes
221a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog/ mchod yon rnam lnga'i tshogs kyis mnyes par bgyi// dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pa yi// 'jog rten 'das dang 'jig rten grub pa'i rdzas// kun bzang rnam dag mchod pa'i sprin phung gis
221b1(rgyud 'grel): namakha' gang bar dmigs te mchod par bgyi// srid gsum 'khor ba'i 'dam las drang ba dang // bgro don mdzad pa'i thugs dam bskang slad du// ye shes nyi mas mtshan pa'i skyon spangs te// byams pa'i
221b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes mchod pa bzhis su gsol// rgyal ba'i rang bsel mchod pos bla ma'i rnams// spyan drangs phyag bgyis bstod dang bkur bya'i mthus// sngon bsngags las kyi sgrib pa kun byang nas// 'gro drug tsho
221b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs mngon par sangs rgyas shog/ 'phags pa'i mchod rten la mchod yon ar+g+haM gsol ba ni// mchod rten sku yi cha lugs ni// 'og gi rmong bting ye shes bzhi// gyen du khri 'phong rnam thar gsum//
221b4(rgyud 'grel): chags med pad+ma'i gdan skyong bum+b+ha pa zlum po chos kyi rje// gser gyi bye phul 'od 'phro// srog shing drang srong bla na med// 'khor lo bcu gsum ye shes brgyad// 'bar ba rdo rje ye shes lnga// bkra shis dpal tshog
221b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas dU// bla med ma chod pa'i rgyun ba sham s+thA nas// chu bo gad+hA ri rgyun+da bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// sku yi mchod rten thams cad lo// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'brel na// thugs rjes dgos
221b6(rgyud 'grel): te ga zhes su gsol// mchod rten gsung gi cha lugs ni// man ngag sngags kyi snying po brjod// bzlas brjod gsung rab bcu gnyis brjod// don dam sgra skad yul las 'das// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal
222a1(rgyud 'grel): yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i rgyan ba shams nas// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// Ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// gsung gi mchod rten thams cad la// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na/
222a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// mchod rten thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// dpe med pas ma yas na mkha' che// ting 'dzin yin pas cir yang gsal// ye shes yin pas sna tshogs rtogs// shes rab yin/
222a3(rgyud 'grel): pas mkhyen par rtogs// thams cad mkhyen pas lhun gyis grub// don dam sems rtogs yul las 'das// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas// chu bo gang+gA
222a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// thugs kyi mchod rten thams cad la// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// bla med mchod rten cha lugs ni// rin chen
222a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i srid rtse nas// tsin d+hA mA NI ye shes bzhi// bkra shes dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i rgyun bya shams nas// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chang de// bla med mchod
222a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// yid kyi mchod rten cha lugs ni// nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho'i 'jing // byang chub sems kyi mchod rten spyi// snang zhing stong la stong zhing gsal// yid kyi
222b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten thams cad la// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// rang bzhin mchod rten ye shes sku//
222b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i byin brlabs rmad po che// mtshon ma'i sdug bsngal yongs bsal bas// sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha
222b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyun yang mi 'chad de// rang bzhin mchod rten thams cad la// bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// sprul pa'i mchod rten ting 'dzin sku// byams shing snyoms pa kun gyi
222b4(rgyud 'grel): mgon// thugs rje chen po skyo dub med// nub byung rgyal po mig nad sel// dpal tshogs bkra shis gzhal yas 'dir// chu bo gad+hA'i rgyan bzhi nA du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'tsheng ngo // sprul pa'i mchod rten thams ca
222b5(rgyud 'grel): la// bla med mchod pa de 'bul no// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// gzugs brnyan mchod rten shes rab sku// bdud kyi sde dngogashin rje'i 'khor// srin po'i tshogs dang lha ma yin// gnod sbyin ma rung
222b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi// gzi byin mdangs stobs 'joms mdzad cing // gnod spyani mang po'i rgyun srang gcod// gzugs brnyan mchod rten bzhugs dgu la// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// chu bo gang+gA'i
223a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun bzhin du// an+t+ra'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// tha med mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// 'phags pa'i mchod rten la bskyod pa// rang 'byung 'dren phyu
223a2(rgyud 'grel): bo lha yi lha// bcom ldan shAka thub sku gdung ring bsrel snod // 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod gnas mtshad gnas mchog bzhugs pa// bad+ma rim ri rab lta bu'i khri 'phang la// bum rte na pad+ma bum bzang snying po ni//
223a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yo bzhin sku// phyag 'tshal mchod pas brgya byin lus dag cing // mthar gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i sku thob pa// yon tan tshogs kyi sku gdung mthu chen bzhugs// bum pa dbyis
223a4(rgyud 'grel): legs srog shing drang byartan la// 'khor lo gdugs phre ngo ri pra 'gebs pa'i steng // 'di stong nyi dbyibs char khabs gdugs bris te// zla ba dril bu cod pan 'jig rten skyong // phreng ba the ma skas rgyal mtshan pa dran
223a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// rgyun la rgyan bkod 'jig rten su I rgyan// chos bzang rnam snang rnam pa thams cad zhal// gzugs kyi khyad par blta bas mi ngoms khyed// ye shes tshoDa rdo Ta chos kyi sku legs te// rnam rtog bral bas ston
223a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gzhi// dran pa nyer gzhag rmang gi khro 'phang ba can// brtsoni 'grus yang dag khri 'brang gnyis pa legaso// rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi khri 'phang gsum pa dge/ dbang po la lo khri'i phrang bzhi pa bzang // bum pa byang chub
223b1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag bum rten stobs// bre legs 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad// srog shing shes bcu stob bcu gdugs phreng bcu// gdugs phreng ma 'dres dran pa nyer gzhag gsum// thugs rje 'phags pa'i
223b2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi char khabs lding // bla med go 'phang gdugs kyi glanam 'phadra mtho// 'jig rten mun sel ye shes zla ba bsal// tshangs pa'i gsung gi dril bu sgra snyan 'khyol// rdzogs pa'i byang chub dar gyi cod pan 'phur//
223b3(rgyud 'grel): bden bzhi phan 'dogs 'jig rten skyong bzhi btsun// tshul khrims phung po me tog phreng ba bzang // skyon bral bsrung ba'i ngos kyi them skas mdzes// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ba dan sgo// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i chu
223b4(rgyud 'grel): srin rgyal mtshan grags// mi 'jigs bzhi yi rdo ring seng ge brjid// 'di 'dra'i dam chos ngo mtshar rmed kyi rnams// thabs mkhas thugs rjes mchod rten tshul du sprul// na mkha'i khams la tshon bkye ji bzhin du// yon
223b5(rgyud 'grel): tIn khyad par khwa dog dbyibs su bsgyur// dpal gnas rin chen 'byung gnas chen po pa// dus gsum rgyal ba'i mchod rten sku gdung tshul// dpal 'byung ka ni ka rAng rab 'byung tshul// bsod nams phung pos yul kham
223b6(rgyud 'grel): byin chags shing // sangs rgyas spra la pa'i phrin las rdzogs par mdzad// sa bcu'i rgyal tshab byams pa'i gtsug gi rgyan// dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid chen po la// ri lung nags tshal chu klung mkha' gnas
224a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// lha tshogs dad pas gnam sa kun nas dkrigs// sdom brtson rgyal sras 'khor bzhi khyim bdag dang // dbus mtha'i rgyal khams mi tshogs kun 'dus nas// me tog phreng bas
224a2(rgyud 'grel): bas spel legs mdzes pa dang // tsan dan dri ba shos mar me'i rol mor bcas// bkra shis glu dbyangs bstod pa'i rnam pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba ngan ltab lhub brgyan// lus ngag yid gsum dang bas
224a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa bgyi// rgyal po chen po bzhi la mchod cing bstod pa// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor bsrung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni ku be ra// rgyal po chen po
224a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed// sde po che la stobs po che// pha rol dgra rnams rab tu 'joms// gzhan gyis mi thub thul bar dka'// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od
224a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul che zhing lha min dang // lha yi g.yul yang myong bar byed// bdag nyid chen po de dag la// mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag nyid
224a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po dam tshig can sangs rgyas mthong ba/ chos thos pa/ dge 'dun la brten pa bstan pa bsrung ba// lha dang mi'i mgon mdzad pa/ bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas// spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ sde dpon dang bca
224b1(rgyud 'grel): ga pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog tu bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu dkon mchog gsum gyi zham 'bring mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dam pa'i chos spel ba/ dge slong dang / dge slong
224b2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / rka dang/ bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i 'khor rnam bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rigs bzhi dang / yul dang / yul phyogs dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten dang / skye dgu'i
224b3(rgyud 'grel): gas thams cad bsrung bar mdzad du gsol// sba ba dang yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongs bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spangs pa dang / mtshon cha slongs pa
224b4(rgyud 'grel): du ga gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sau bcing bar mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya dag tu 'tsho bar shog/ ston brgya drag ni mthong bar shog/ phyogs skyong ba bcu la bstod cing mchod pa// dpa
224b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha// lha'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shAr phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// me ste sreg bya ba zhes pa'i lha// 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag
