224b6(rgyud 'grel): garnab sems gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// gshin rje be con thogs pa'i lha// ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ lho phyogos gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag
225a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'tshal// bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha// srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag 'tshal// zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha//
225a2(rgyud 'grel): bden pa bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag/ nub phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha// tshig bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste// rlung mtshams phyogs kyi gdon
225a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas la// mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// gnod sbyin lag na be chen thogs// nor bsrung gdon gyi bdag po che// byang phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod pa 'bul zhing byig kyang 'tshol// dbang dang ldan
225a4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dren pa'i lha// bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ dbang ldan gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// 'og gi klu dang sa yi lha// sa 'dzin dang ni lag chen dang // dam tshig shes pa'i
225a5(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams la// mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// steng gi lha tshegs thams cad dang // zla ba nyi ma gza' chen dang // gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la/ mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// phyogs skyong bcu
225a6(rgyud 'grel): po bdag nyid chen po dam tshig can sangs rgyas mthong ba// chos thos pa/ dge 'dun la brten pa/ bstan pa bsrung ba// lha dang mi'i mgon ma dzad pa// bu dang bcas pa/ tsha bo dang bcas pa// spun dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcwa
225b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa/ sde dang bcas pa/ pho ny+dza dang bcas pa/ g.yog dang bcas pa/ mngag pa dang bcas pa/ pho nya dang bcas pa/ 'khor dang bcas pa/ rtag tu dkon mchog gsum gyi zhabla 'bring mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi
225b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa bsrung ba/ dam pa'i chos spel ba/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / ngage bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rigs bzhi dang / yul dang yul

225b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho bar shog/ ston brgya dag tu mthong bar shog/ lha klu sde brgyad dang 'byung po'i tshogs dam tshig can thams cad la mchod yon ar+g+haM gsol ba/ 'khor du gtogs pa'i sde brgyad po// lha dang klu dang gnod
225b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dang / dri za lha min na mkha' lding // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rigs nas rigs kyi gtso mdzad pa// mchod 'os gyur pa thams cad la// rim gro gus pa mchog bskyed nas// mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag
226a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'tshal// mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs// sa chu bar snang gnas bcas pa'i// byams sems ldan pa thams cad la// mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// 'byung po gang dag 'dir
226a2(rgyud 'grel): ni lhags gyur te// sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dang // skye dgu rnams la rtog tu byams byed cing // nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod par shog/ 'di na rgyal ba dag rgyal bden gang gis// shin tu bden pa gsung zhing
226a3(rgyud 'grel): brdzun med po// bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde bar shog/ de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur tsog/ sdig pa bshags pa khams gsum 'gro lnga skye gnas bzhi// 'khor ba'i rgyud du gtogs kun dang // rigs
226a4(rgyud 'grel): mthun skyes pa bdag cag gis// dus gsum dbang gis sgo gsum nas// las dang nyon mongs skye ba'i rgyu// mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga// mi dge bcu dang log pa bzhi// sgrib pa rnams dang kun sbyor dang // de yi rgyu dang /
226a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dang // yun ring 'khor zhing mi khom brgyad// mtho ris thar pa'i lam 'gog cing // bdog dang gzhan la yongs gdung ba'i// kha na mtho ci bgyis pa// chos dbyings phyogs bcu dus gsum dang // rigs
226a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun la rab zhugs pa'i// rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams la// ma lus bshags shing bsdam par bgyi// rjes su yi rang ba// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sros bcos dang // rang rgyal nyan thos thams cad
226b1(rgyud 'grel): dang // 'gro kun bsod nams ye shes kyi// rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad dang // skyon rnams spong zhing yon tan thob// chags bral mnyam gzhags dang ni// de yi 'bras bu'i khyad par dang // dge ba'i bshes dang dang
226b2(rgyud 'grel): chos 'dzin// byang chub sems mchog skyed byo de tsang // bdag gzhan smin par byed pa dang // lam dang 'bras bu thob pa dang // bla med go 'phyang mchog thob pa// de dag kun la yAM rang zhing // bsam dang sbyor ba dag pa
226b3(rgyud 'grel): yis// 'gro bo kun la bde slad du// 'khor gsum dag pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// bde gshegs
226b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rigs 'khrungs lung bstan dbang bskur ba// byang chub rim por sangs rgyas pa// dam chos btsun par mdzad pa dang // gdul ba'i don la gzhes pa dang // rgya che zab pa rtogs dka' bas/
226b5(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba'i don la bzhes rnams las// chos kyi snang ba rgyas pa dang // 'gro ba kun la bde ba dang // rgya che zab pa bstan pa dang // sngon gyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// tshangs pa 'dra bar tshul bsgyur te// rim gro gus
226b6(rgyud 'grel): pas mchog bskyed cing // thal mo sbyar bar rab btung ngo // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol ba// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byoms na// bco
227a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs bdud ba'i ngas bcom zhing // rdzogs sangs rgyas nas 'khor lo bskor// 'gro don sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad// 'gro ba gzhan dag 'dul ba dang // 'du byed mI rtag byAd+d+hA na b+hU dang // gdul bya
227a2(rgyud 'grel): brten pa bskyed skad du// mya ngan 'da' ston bzhed rnams la// thal mo sbyar ba rab btud de// 'gro ba kun la phan pa dang // bde ba bskyed par bya ba dang // chos tshul yun ring spel po'i phyir// chos dbyings bstan po'i lugs
227a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// myo ngan mi 'da' g.yung drung sku// stuglo dkod pa'i bdag nyid rnams// bskal pa'i mthar yang bzhugasu gsol// bla med byang chub sems bskyed pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i sras// dbang gyur spyan gyur
227a4(rgyud 'grel): tshad mar gyur// 'gro don mdzad par dab gyur pa// byang chub blo mnga' dgongasu gsol// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba dang // rgyal sras dpa' bo de dag gis// 'gro la phan dang bde skad du// byang chub snying por bzhugs su gsol//
227a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos po kun dang bral ba dang // phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// bdag med chos kyi bdag nyid kyi// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong nyid rang bzhin thugs bskyed ltar// bdag
227a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ris mthun gzhan gyis kyang // bla med byang chub sems bskyed bgyi// dkon mchog gsum gyi byin brlabs kyis sems can thams cad la shis par brjod po// dkon mchog gsum gyi byin rlabs dang // 'phags
227b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi thugs rje dang // chos nyid dag pa'i mthu dang ni// bsam dang sbyor ba dag pa yis// khams gsum rgyud lnga gnas bzhin// gzugs can gzugs tsA ma yin dang // 'du shes me dang yod min dang // sems can ris
227b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams ji snyed pas// so so'i skye bor gtogs pa'i sa// sdug bsngal thams cad myur spangs te// 'phags lam bde ba mya ngan 'das// nges par legs par rtogs gyur cig/ 'phags lam brnyes pa thams cad kyis//
227b3(rgyud 'grel): gong ma'i yon tan mchog thob cing // bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi// bde ba dag la gzhol gyur cing // sems can dang 'phagasmra ba'i tshogs thams cad la bsod nams bstab pa/ 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dang /
227b4(rgyud 'grel): da ltar dus dang phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten khams na gang zhugs pa'i// rmyil bya sras dang bcas rnams kyis// bsod nams dang ni ye shes tshogs// de yi rgyu dang 'bras bu dang // sbyor ba dang ni dngos dang 'jug/ sems
227b5(rgyud 'grel): can kun la bstobs mkhyen ltar// bdag dang sems can kun gyis kyang // rang gi bsod nams ma lus pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas bde ma thob pa'i// sems can rnams la bstab pa ra bgyi// sbyor ba dang ni mthong ba dang // /
227b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom dang mi slob lam pornyes pa'i// 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams kun la yang // de dag rab tu bstab par bgyi// de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba/ bla ma'i bla ma dkon mchog dang // mchod
228a1(rgyud 'grel): rten khyad par 'khor bcas la// phyag 'tshal mchod cing gshegs pa dang // si rang bskul zhid gastsol bya dang // sbubs gsol susmra sbrul snyems bskyed dang // shes pa brjod cing bstabs pa dan/

228a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ mchid rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las btus pa/ slob dpon chen po bo d+hi satwa mdzad pa rdzogs so// / bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo//
228a6(rgyud 'grel): bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs dang / rgyung dag las tsi t+ya dang / tsha tsha gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga/ A tsAr+ya d+harma kirti dang / badz+ra kIrti dang / badz+ra bo d+hi la sogs pa las thos nas/ slob dpon de dag gos lung bstan te/ gtan
228b1(rgyud 'grel): la phab par byas pa'o// de la dang po tsi t+yA gdab pa'i sku gzhi ni/ khang pa 'am/ yol bas bskor ba 'am/ ra ba la sogs pa glang 'byor pa'i nad bde bar dkyil 'khor du bya ba'i sa brtag pa na/ dkyil 'khon gyi zang/

229a1(rgyud 'grel): k+Shan s+yAr+thAHthA krAt+tA/ dz+had+yA p+ta kAr+tha/ d+huy+YA d+hA la d+hAr+m+mAt+ka tu gAr+b+he/ ts+tshe ga mo/ saM d+hA smA smAr+N+NaSh+Ta shro d+hA ya/ saH pA bAM/ sar+b+ba t+ta d+hA gA tA/ ASh+mi Sh+Ta br-I mA le b+h+rUM shwad+d+haM/ d+hud+hAb+hUr+dz+dza.a bA s+yAdz+dzaHAt+ma/ de nas mdzad/
229a2(rgyud 'grel): rten do'i 'phang lo'i steng du/ ba~M ma la~M uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'dus gdu gas lta bur 'khyil bar gur skem gyi so bru~M/ de'i sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA gamad+hA tsan d+ha ma d+hi dza sbyi na s+t+wa~M gau ra~M/ gam b+hI re e keD+D+h+ya ye/ A kan+d+ha
229a3(rgyud 'grel): s+ye/ A yun+d+ha ra/ AM sun+d+ha ra/ san+d+hA rA/ saun+d+ha ra/ k+Sha NaM kyA Na/ k+ShiN+Di k+Shi NaM/ k+Shu N+yak+Sha Nu/ sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA sa ma ye/ taiShAM tiSh+Tha/ mad+hA b+hA ba na swA ga re/ saM shai d+hA ya mAne/ sarba b+hA baM/ bai mA laM/ dza s+yA dzA ya/ dzA ya la bi d+he/ sU Ta s+thAH
229a4(rgyud 'grel): s+pho Ta ya swo Tau ya/ baM ga tau/ A ba raM Ne/ b+hU ya hA rid+b+hadz+hAd+hAMrtA/ mr-i d+hud+yAd+b+had+hI rau/ A b+ha y+ya prA taM/ AD+b+hi 'ab+hu ba lo ki te/ sa myaMn+ta mU khai/ sa man+tu t+ya byA lo krI te/ mad+hA mA ye/ mad+hAd+b+ha shA d+hA re/ a myo g+hA bi ma le/ U ka rem+b+ha Ik+Sha
229a5(rgyud 'grel): r+g+ha/ a ka Da D+hA ya/ yU kAn+thaD+hA ya/ thA ra b+hA ra/ baM d+hI saM d+hA ra/ i ni dr-I ya/ sho d+ha naM/ b+hU Shau taM b+hU dzaM/ mat+ta mu drA bi lo ki to/ dza ya dza ste/ s+t+rid d+he sId d+h+waM shud+d+he shud+d+he bud+d+ha bod+d+hi ni dro dz+nyA na/ s+t+waM bo d+hAn+ti/ s+ye bod+hA ni/ shaud+b+ha ni/

229b1(rgyud 'grel): si tA bAd me/ bi ka si ta b+hU ba ni/ ka ba tsi twA b+hu dze/ Sha Ta bA ra mi tA/ ba ri pu ra Ni/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi ma le pra la ki twe swA hA/ sarba ta thA gA ta gu d+h+ya/ ar+d+har+d+haHka/ ar+d+haSh+TaHAH/ mas yuman \u0f7f/ rba d+h+rad+b+h+yAM sat+su/ !\u0f7f
229b2(rgyud 'grel): bi lo kI te swA hA/ bu d+h+ye a bA lo te swA hA/ mr-i t+yu daN+Da d+ha re swAhUM/ yai \u0f7f daN+Da d+he ra swA hA/ ya ma d+hu te swA hA/ saM he ra NI swA hA/ suM d+hA ra NaM swA hA/ san+ta d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ brA tAM sa rA Ni swA hA/ oM dz+yaM bA tAM swA hA/
229b3(rgyud 'grel): te dzo ba taM sA hUM/ oM dzo ya ba ti swA hA/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta mu dr-i a d+his+thAn a d+hiSh+Thi ti swA hA// mchod rten de dang / gdugs de las ye shes kyi bod zer sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phyo zhing 'khrigs pa bri/ de bzhi'i dbus
229b4(rgyud 'grel): su dar ma sh+log shog gang 'byor pa las/ sring cu mda' gong tsam zhing du khru gang lhag tsam la/ gzungs gnyis ka rdzogs par rgya nas ma mo ya wAn+ti par byas te/ dbus kyi mchid rten ring bsgyel can de la me reg tu
229b5(rgyud 'grel): gdags/ de nas dkyil 'khor de'i steng lci ba gtsang ma dang / tsan danA dang / gu ra kum la sogs pas bskus la/ de'i steng du dkyil 'khor gru bzho ngos gcig la re'u bcu bcu/ re'u gcig la yang chag gang
229b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / tshon do'i tha dad du brtsis te/ cha mnyam par byas la/ srad bu ring thung cha mnyam pa cig tshon sna gcig gis thig btab ste/ re'u brgya dang ngos gcig kyang re'u gnyis gnyis yod pa dang / spyir brgya
230a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad du sbyar ba/ re'u re re'i steng du yang tsait+ta gzhags pa'i gzhi tsan dan dang spos chu gang 'byor pas dkyil 'khor zlum po re rI bya/ de nas las kyi bye brag las shar phyogs la sogs par gong thabs
230a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gding / 'phan gdugs ci rigs par bres la/ stan dbus ma'i steng du tsi t+ya su 'debs pa 'dug/ de'i g.yas kyi stan la bi ma li uSh+NI Shi'i gzungs sngags klog cing 'dug la/ de'i mdun du dkyil 'khor cig
230a3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i steng du mchod pa sna lnga dgram/ dbus su bum pa 'am/ bya gang 'byor pa gcig spos chus bkang la/ de'i nang du sman dang 'bru dang rin po che sna lnga bcug la kha bcings te/ de'i mgul nas srad bu gtsang ma gcig
230a4(rgyud 'grel): bo tags l-I stegs gnyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsam pa'i rgyud mnyam par bklag go// de la spyan ljon sing hA dang / bya g+h+ri dang / ki ri kar ni ka dang / sa haM dang s+yo ho de ba'o// 'bru wA nri til dang / bal sran dang / 'bras so ba dang /
230a5(rgyud 'grel): nas dang gro'o// rin po che sna lnga ni b+h+yo ru dang / gser sa lai s+tham+ba dang dung dang / mu tig dang shil dang ste/ ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las dngos su ma 'byor na/ gang 'byor pe de rnams lA sU lngar sbya ru ro// g.yon gyi stan
230a6(rgyud 'grel): la shes rab tshul brgya lnga bcu pa klog pa cig 'dug la/ yo byad gzhan ni gong ma bzhin sbyar la/ d+harma lan cig yan chad tsai t+ya 'debs kyi bar du lhogs par bklag/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du tsai t+ya la sogs pa

230b2(rgyud 'grel): nas tsai t+ya gdab pa'i sngags rim gyis 'byung ba gang yang rung ba des/ bsam pa'i rgyud dang ldan par byas te brjod cing tsi t+yA gdab po// tsai t+ya btab pa des thal byung du dkyil 'khor gyi steng bzhag ste/ drang por mchod rten

230b4(rgyud 'grel): bkod la shar nas nub tu bsgre'o// tsau t+ya gcig btab ste/ re'u dbus su bzhag pa dang / dar dang shog shog gang 'byor pa'i rgyal mtshan chung ngu chu srin gyi mgo 'am/ tog zlum po gang 'byor pa dang bcas pa dang /

230b6(rgyud 'grel): bar dbul/ dbus kyi 'khor lo'i steng mchod rten btab zin nas/ mtha'i tse t+ya brgyad dang shar lhor bskor zhing byang gi bar du rim bzhin dgeng / de nas tso t+ya 'debs pa de bstan/ dbus mo'i steng du 'dug ste/ bsam
231a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams spyan drangs la/ dung por la sogs pa gang 'byor pa'i nang du rin po che sna bdun dang / sman dang
231a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bru sna lnga dang / tsan dan dang / ga bur dang / gu ro kum dang 'di rnams las ci 'byor pa bcug ste/ ar+g+ha'i chu lan gsum du sbreng zhing bsam pa'i rgyud dang ldan pas dbul/ de la rin po che sna bdun ni b+hu ru dang / gser dang dngul
231a3(rgyud 'grel): dang zangs dang lcags so// de nas kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung rnam par 'khrigs pa kun nas gang bar byin gyis brlab cing mchod do// de'i 'og tu tsai t+ya de dag thams cad shel sgo nga yongs su dag pa'i tshul du rang bzhin
231a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis rnam par dag cing gsal te/ de dag gi dbus su sngags mang nyung gnyis ka 'am/ yang na rigs so so'i snying po gang gcig po yang rung ste/ kha dog gser btso ma bzhin du/ dang zhing 'tsher ba de las 'od zer sna tshogs
231a5(rgyud 'grel): byung bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha'i mthas klas pa kun tu khyab par sems can gyi don mdzad cing / re ba skong bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ slar 'dus pas bdag gi spyi bor zhugs par dmigs par dmigs nas/
231a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag ste/ shel sgong yongs su dag pa'i tshul du bsam/ de bzhin du yon bdag gson gangashin gang yang rung po'i gzugs brnyan du dmigs nas/ de'i spyi
231b1(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tu ye shes kyi 'od zer shin tu 'phro ba dag/ tshul gong ma bzhin du zhugs shing de'i las dang / nyon mongs pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad rnam par dag ste/ shel sgong ltar rab tu gsal bar dmig/
231b2(rgyud 'grel): yon bdag ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor thams cad la yang dmigs shing byin gyis brlab/ de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nas na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can thams cad la tshul gong ma ltar byin gyis

231b4(rgyud 'grel): uSh+NI Sha dang tshul brgya lnga bcu paM klags pa'i sngags chab cho ga bzhin du btab cing dbang bskur ba/ spyi bo nas blugs pa la bya'o// de dang dus gcig tu sngags mkhan tshi ga shis pa cig yod na/ phyogs bcu'i mgon po
231b5(rgyud 'grel): yang tshul bzhin du dgug cing ar+g+haM gsol te/ mchod pa sna lnga la sogs pa dang gtor ma bzang du sbyor la rim bzhin du phul te/ 'phags pa thugs dam can khyed kyis mchod pa 'di dag bsnoms la/ sbyin bdag
231b6(rgyud 'grel): meng 'di zhes bya ba dag la khyed kyis bsrung bskyab pa dang / don bsgrub cing byin gyis rlobs shig tsos sgo'o// de ltar sngags mkhan cho ga shes pa med na/ mchod rten bskor zin pa'i 'jug la phyogs bcu'i
232a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma sbyin zhing bsti'o// de nas rol mo sna chags kyis drangs la 'khor thams cad kyis mchod rten de dag la 'od zer sna tshogs bcur 'phyo bar bsam zhing / lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bsam pa'i rgyud mnyam/
232a2(rgyud 'grel): bar byas te bskor/ de ltar zin nas yang tse t+ya 'debs pa'i cho ga shes pa des/ mchod rten de dag las 'od zer 'byung ba de bdag gi spyi bor zhugs pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi spyi bor zhugs pa'i bar du snga ma
232a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la/ bla na med pa'i mchod pa dang / yon ci 'byor pa yang skabs 'dir 'bulo// de nas an+te tshul bzhin du gsol te// bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas par byas kyi 'phags pa rnams dang / mgon
232a4(rgyud 'grel): po dag slar gshegs par gsol lo// tsai t+yai yo byad la sogs pa kha dog dbye ba ni/ las gang byed pa'i khyad par lasaM kha dog dkar po la sogs pa bzhin du byas te de la zho ba'i cho ga ni kha dog thams cad dkar
232a5(rgyud 'grel): por bsgyur ro// rgyas pa'i cho ga ni yo byad thams cad kha dog ser por bsgyuraro// dbang gi cho ga ni yo byad thams cad kha dog dmar por bsgyuraro// mngon spyod kyi cho ga nI yo byad thams cad nag por sbyar zheso// tse ti 'debs

232b2(rgyud 'grel): gang gru bzhi pa yan chad la/ de'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa gcig bri ste/ de'i dbus su bzhag/ tsi ti de'i nang du sha ri ram dang rin po ci 'byor pa yang gzhug go// mchod rten gci shu gdab pa'i cho ga'o// mchod rten gnyis
232b3(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa'i cho ga la/ las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu ni chur khru do zheng du khru gang / 'phang du yang khru gong ba zhig byas la/ khru gang gru bzhi pa'i re'us bcad de/ de'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma

233a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ de'i steng du mchod rten kAHdes banan mgo rims ni/ dang por dbus su bzhag go// mchod rten gsum gudab pa'i cho ga'o// mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga lA/ las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra'o// de la
233a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni stegs bu khru gang gru bzhi pa 'phang du yang khru gang ba zhig byas la/ de'i grwa bzhir yang de dang 'dra ba re re byas la/ dbus kyi stegs bu gru bzhi dang tha ma'i stegs bu bzhi'i gru bzhi dang sbyar bar bya/

233a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa zhig na ni/ mthar brgyad pa bris te/ de'i dbus su mchod rten bzhag/ mchod rten bzhag pa'i go rims ni/ dang po dbus su gzhag nas/ tha ma bzhi ni shwa ra nas lhor bskor thabs su bzhag go/ yang rnam pa

233b6(rgyud 'grel): mchi ba'i tshul du bye ba 'di ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags la/ badz+ra yak+Sha hUM/ 'dis btab pas thams cad gtsang mar bsangs pa dang / bgegs la sogs pas mi tshugs par
234a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// oM shud+hen du shro d+ha ya/ zhes 'dis btab pas/ thams cad gtsang mar bsangs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ba'i sngags la/ na mAs+t+rai ya/ d+hi kA
234a2(rgyud 'grel): nAn/ dza na nan/ bana? d+ha raM drA yA nu/ sha ban ak+Shau b+hU aM mr-i ta pany+tsa ba na de a haM/ a ba lo ki daM/ na mas+t+r-i ya d+hI/ nu gA t+ya nAn/ sarba ta thA ga tra nAM/ tad+ya thA/ au su sme su sme su nu ga te/ shan+te den+te/ shi shi bi ni/ ra ku laM/
234a3(rgyud 'grel): yau she/ ya sha ba de/ te dze tAM dze ba ti sarba bud d+ha/ d+hi shI t+ye swA hAM/ mu dra gdab pa'i 'jim pa 'am sngags bri baM'i tshe sngags lan bdun gdeb pa'i sngags laM/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAnA/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAn/

234a5(rgyud 'grel): brdeg cing gdongab pa'i sngags la/ oM badz+ra mud ga ra A kro Ta ya dz+nyA/ tsai d+hi por bya nas dbyung ba'i sngags la/ oM d+harma rat+ne swA tra~M/ 'khor lo dang dbu zhu ga sol ba'i sngags la/ oM pra mUd+ha na ya swAt+ma/ tsi ti dkyil 'khor du bzhan
234a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra swA hA/ cho ga de ltar byas na tse t+ya gcog btab pas bye ba stod btab par 'gyu ro// skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyu ro// dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'jim pa can gyis gang ni bskus na nad mdzo/
234b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bco brgyad lnga sogs pa nad thams cad ma lus pa zhi bar 'gyu ro// / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang mchod rten gyi cha dbye ba bshad pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i gang gA'i bye ma snyed thams cad
234b2(rgyud 'grel): g+h+nAM sku nI rnam pa gnyis te/ tshe blangs pa'i sku dang / chos kyi sgra'o// de la tshe blangs pa'i sku nI yab yu ma las skyes pa'i yid mig dang yod tshim par byed pa/ dag par byed pa sbyin par byed pa ste/ sku tshigs re re
234b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing srid med kyi bu'i stobs dang ldan la/ tshogs re re yang bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtswa gats+tsha sa kyis brgyan cing dpe byed bzang po brgyud bcus mdzes par
234b4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa mthong na/ blta bas cho ga myi shes shing mi mthun pa med pa dang / blta bar bya ba bla na med pa ni becom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshe blangs po'i sgra'o// de bzhin ga shegaso pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
234b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud par zad kyi/ rang sangs rgyas bse ru lnga bu dag dang / gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la sogaste nyan thos chen po rnams
234b6(rgyud 'grel): man chad ni/ su yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par ji ltar byas kyang nus pa med de/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag pa spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
235a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po'i chos 'di dag dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
235a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / lam bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang /

235a6(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen
235b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug dang / ma 'dres par bsgom pa rnams dang /

235b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / dbang po nyi shu gnyis rnams yin no// zab cing mchog tu zab pa'i chos 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i
235b5(rgyud 'grel): klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa ste/ gang rang rang gi mtshan nyid dang / spyi'i mtshan nyid rjes su rtogs nas nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs su chud de/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang
235b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / mu stegs can sna tshogs dge sbyong dang / bram ze gcer bu dang / rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi
236a1(rgyud 'grel): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dulha rnams btul nas 'khor grangs med pa khrag khrig brgya stong pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa
236a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i grong khyer du zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi sku bshad pa rdzogs so// // de nas mchod rten gyi don bshad de/ bsags par bya ba yin pas bsags pa'o// yang na bsags su rung
236a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir yang bsags pa zhes bya'o// yang na don gyi skabs su/ 'dir dran par bya ba yin pa nas dran pa zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spyod
236a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi yan lag dang / ye shes dang / stobs dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / snying rje chen po zhes bya ba'i yon tan de dag yun+da ring po
236a5(rgyud 'grel): nas thabs kyi bye brag gi bsags po dang / snron yang dag par ma bsgoms kyang / don gyi skabs dag tu 'dul ba rnams kyis dran par bya ba'i phyir na btsugs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ dran pa zhes bya ste/ de dag gi gzug
236a6(rgyud 'grel): brnyan la mchod rten zhes bya'o// chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o// de'i bang rim bzhi dang / bum rten dang / bum pa dang / pu shu dang / srog shing dang / 'khor lo rtseg ma bcu gsum dang / char khab
236b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni mchod rten gyi dbyibs yin no// de la byang rim dang po ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/ 'di ltar lus dranA pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// bang rim gnyis
236b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / 'di ltar sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir brtson pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
236b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i phyir brtson pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa'o// bang rim gsum pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ 'di ltar 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin slong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pA rdzu 'phrul gyi
236b4(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// ba rim bzhi pa dbang po lnga ste/ 'di ltar dad pa'i dbang po dang /
236b5(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o// bum rten ni stobs lnga ste/ 'di ltar dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs
236b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so// bum pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ 'di ltar dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa dang / dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyad pa
237a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ pu shu ni lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ 'di ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i
237a2(rgyud 'grel): dag dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / long dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te// srog shing ni shes pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar kun rdzob shes pa
237a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs par shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa'o// 'khor lo dang po ni gnas
237a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// 'khor lo gnyis pa ni las bdag gir mkhyen pa'i stobs so// 'khor lo gsum pa ni bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug
237a5(rgyud 'grel): pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// 'khor lo bzhi pa ni dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// 'khor lo lnga pa ni mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs so// 'khor lo drug pa ni khams sna tshogs mkhyen
237a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stobs so// 'khor lo bdun pa ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs so// 'khor lo brgyad pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa'i stobs so// 'khor lo dgu pa ni 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs so//
237b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bcu pa ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// 'khor lo bcu gcig pa ni ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po ste/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na/ slob mthur
237b2(rgyud 'grel): mthun par gus par nyan pa la dga'i sems mi 'byung ba'o// 'khor lo bcu gnyis pa ni ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa ste/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na/ slob
237b3(rgyud 'grel): ma thams cad mthun par gus par mi nyan pa la khong khro ba mi 'byung ba'o// 'khor lo bcu gsum pa ni ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum pa ste/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor rnams la chos
237b4(rgyud 'grel): ston pa la slob ma la la gus par mnyan la/ la la gus par mi nyan pa rnams la dga' ba dang / khong khro ba gnyis mi 'byung ba'o// char kha ba ni snying rje chen po ste/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul ba'i
237b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud smin pa dang / ma smin pa dang / da ltar smin pa rnams kyi don dpyod cing / 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku ma lus pa dus kyi khyad par dag tu yang dag 'dzin pa 'di ni mchod rten gyi
237b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin no// de las gzhan pa'i rdo rings dang / the mo skas dang / chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dril bu dang / gdugs dang
238a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba dang / dar gyi cod pan dang / ba dan la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i rkyen du 'bab pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad dag kyang yod de/
238a2(rgyud 'grel): de la rdo rings rnams ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi bstan te/ 'di ltar zag pa zad pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / bair du gtsad pa'i chos rnams phyin ci ma log par bsten
238a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam phyin ci ma log par bsten pa'o// them skas kyis ni bsrung ba med pa bzhi bstan te/ 'di ltar sku'i 'phrin las yongs su dag pa dang / gsung gi 'phrin
238a4(rgyud 'grel): las yongs su dag pa dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las yongs su dag pa dang / 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa'o// chu srin rgyal mtshan rnams kyis ni bdud kyi rgyal mtshan
238a5(rgyud 'grel): bskul bar bstan te/ 'di ltar lha'i bdud bskul ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud bskal pa dang / phung po'i bdud bsgral ba dang 'chi bdag gi bdud bsnyal ba'o// me tog gi
238a6(rgyud 'grel): theb bas ni bla na med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po bstan to// 'jig rten skyong po rnams kyis ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bshad pas/ 'jig rten bzhi lo phan 'dogs par bstan to// 'di
238b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar so so'i skye bo la phan 'dogs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa la phan 'dogs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba la phan 'dogs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba la phan 'dogs pa'o// dril bu rnams ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs
238b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan te/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas tshegs chung ngus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos bstan pa'i sgra skad kyis kun tu 'grengs pa'o// gdugs kyis ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyi bor sbyor bar
238b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rkang pa med pa dang / rkang pa gnyis pa dang / rkang mangs dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs med pa rnams kyi mchog ces bya bar gyur pa'o// zla bas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba
238b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan te/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mun pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig bskyed par mdzad pa'o// drar gyi cod pan gyis ni bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi cod pan thogs pa bstan
238b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kun tu 'jug pa'o// baM dan rnams kyi ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi grags pa'i ba dan bstan te/ gang gis de bzhin go shigs pa chos kyi 'khor lo
238b6(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba'i grags pas 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor non par gyur pa'o// mchod rten gyi cha bye ba 'dul ba las byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so// / bkra shis//
239a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam tshin srung ba'i sgrub thabs gtsug tor drim med mar me mdzang ye shes kyi mdzad pa bzhug s+ho//
239b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa m+b+ha ya rak+Sha s+yA d+ha ne/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsrung ba'i sbubs thabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dri ma med pa/
239b2(rgyud 'grel): snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// gang 'dod dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa'i// bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul la ni// dngos po kun gyis phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
239b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal sras thu bo rnams la yang // dngos kun phyag byas 'od zer gyi// dri med snying po sgrub thabs bshad// bkra shis yi 'ong bde gnas su// khrus byas bde ba'i stan la 'dug/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang //
239b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang // sdom bzung tshad med bzhi la gnas// rang snying a las 'od byung bas// bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems// na mkha'i ngos la bsam par bya// phyag 'o tshal mchod pa la sogs
239b5(rgyud 'grel): byo// de nas stong pa'o ngo bor bsam// oM shrI n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ke haM// de nas lam rjes dran par bya// a las zla ba rdo rjer bskyed// de yis ji ltar 'dod rgyal pos// bgrogs rnams bskrad par byas nas ni//
239b6(rgyud 'grel): de dbus na mkha' gru gsum zlum// gru bzhi ri rab rnam par bsam// gru bzhi sgo dang rab ldan pa// 'od dang ldan pa'i khang par bsgom// lte bar pad+ma zla ba la// a dang maM mu hriHhUM las// a las nor bu 'bar
240a1(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur// rgyu ya ga smra chags ma ngas la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyun dang ldan// g.yas pa skyabs byin gAyan nor bu// mtshan dang dpe byang tshogs pa dbus// g.yas su 'jam dang
240a2(rgyud 'grel): rnon po la// rgyu ba tu shAk+Shu thub pa nyid// g.yon du sing+ge skya bsam bya// mdun du phyag na rdo rje bsgom// mdun g+h+r-i na mkha' ye shes bas mo// b+hin+da brlabs dbang bskur bsam por bya// mchod pa stong legs pa rdzogs pa dang
240a3(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig yid kyis bsgom par bya// daM las sbyin snying po bzlas// gtsug tu bzlas dang smon brag bzlas// snying ga nyid du bzlas pa'o// nye ba'i snying po// oM sarba taM thA ga ta mu dra a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ dwe nas gtor mas mchod
240a4(rgyud 'grel): nas gshegs// bdag nyid spyodo lam nyid bya zhing // snang ba sgyu ma bzhin du smad// 'di byas dal bsdigs pa dag/ dri med 'khor lo'i skur gyur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyo dam tshig bsrung ba zhes bya
240a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM shrI dz+nyA nAs mdzad pa rdzu gas so// / paN+Di ta de nyid dang / bod kyi lo tsa nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//
240a6(rgyud 'grel): ji nas khrus bya gos gtsang bgos// spri kyi kyis dkyil 'khor gruba'i bya// mchod rten lnga btab gro ga la// 'khor lo bye ru rdzogs par bya// ba dan gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sogs// me tog phreng bas brgyan pa ni//
240b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus dang grwa la bzhugs su gsol// bum pa gang ba bzhi lnga ni// byin b+h+yas brlabs la phyogs bzhir bzhag/ rma bya'i sgo ldu mu men dang // spros kyi sdong po snod bzhi dang // grwa la legs par gzhug par bya//
240b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod yo ni spos dang me tog tshogs// mar me de dang lta ba shos dang // rol mo sna tshogs rog byas mchod// a laso byung ba'i ngo mtshar mchog/ thugs ni na mkha' sangs rgyas nyid// gtsug tor dri med
240b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i mchog/ yid bzhin nor bu khyod phyag 'tshal// shes rab mchog gyur 'jim pa'i mgono// a la la ho ngo bo'i chos// yid bzhin nor bu'i mchog 'byung ba// 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bsta
240b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub// thugs rje'i mchog tu gyur pa ni// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mtshungs// shAkya thub la phyag 'tshal bstod// snying rje chen po'i mchog gyur pa// dri med dag pa'i snying po'i sku//
240b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'byar bas gsung dag bo// spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud rnams 'joms pa'i rdo rje can// thugs kyi rdo rje yid bzhin tshul// nad rnams sel ba sman pa'i mchog/ phyag na rdo rje phyag
240b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod// sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang // 'khor lo bskor dang myang mi 'da'// bsngo dang gsol gdab 'dod don zhu// gang 'dod pa yaM las la 'jug/ rgyun dang nar mar tshogs bsag byaM//
241a1(rgyud 'grel): dI bAM kA ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dang por sems bskyed la gang la dmigs pa'i bsam rgyud dang bcas par bya'o// dang por bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
241a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang / gtsug gat+nor dI ma myed pa la sogs pa la sogs pa mdun gyis na mkha' lu bzhugs par bsams la mchod pa rgya chen po de ngos su dbul lo// de rnams kyis kyang bdag dang bum pa nad pa 'am gang
241a3(rgyud 'grel): la sgrub par byed pa de la byin gyis rlob par gsol ba gdab pas byin gyis rlob par bsam mo// bum pa'i kha rgyan dang bcas pa de la rang yang khrus bya/ gso sbyong la sogs pa gtsang mar byas la gzungs tshar brtsa
241a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa rgyud bzlos// de na s+yo gang la dmigs pa de la de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsams la khrus bya'o// bos ma rgyud dang bcos pas so// / bla ma rnams la phyag
241a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na des khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o// snying po'i rog sngags gro ga la bri bar bya'o// mchod rten lnga gdab par bya/ rig sngags 'ad
241a6(rgyud 'grel): yang mchod rten gyi nang du bzhugs par bya// mchod nyon ni grwa bzhir gzhag par bya/ gcig ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbuso su gzhig par bya/ shing bu btsugs te bo dan dmar po sbyang bar bya'o// me tog gis gtor bar
241b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ bum pa gang bA bzhi bzhag/ grwa bzhir pog phor bzhi dang / du ru ka dang / u ka ru dang / gu gul+lI dud pas bdug par bya'o// spos kyi mchod yon gyi snod bzhi gzhag par bya/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
241b2(rgyud 'grel): tsho'i sngags 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ dkyil 'khor la bskor bar bya'o// nad gyis btab pa/ gnod pa/ nad tshabs che ba/ tshe zad pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa/ rgyal po dang / pha
241b3(rgyud 'grel): rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa/ bu 'dod pa rnams dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par bzhag go// rma bya'i sgo lngas byub par bya'o// mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o// cho ga 'di lan cig byas
241b4(rgyud 'grel): na bskal pa 'bum du byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang bral nas sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro// kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / dam tshig la
241b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par blta bo'i gzungs sngags 'di bris la mchod rten gyi nang du gzhag go// mchod rten gsar pa 'am/ rnying pa bcos pa yang rung ste/ de'i nang du gzhug/ spos dang byug pa yang dbul lo// gzungs sngags
241b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di bris la mchad rten gyi nang du gzhug gi/ mtshad rten gsur pa 'am/ rnying pa bcas pa yang rung ste/ nga'i nang du gzhug/ sbas dang byug pa yang dbul lo// gzungs kyi sngags zlos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bskor bar
242a1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ nyin zhag re la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o// de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shur phyogs su spros kyi dkyil 'khor bya/ nyi ma logs su me tog gis/
242a2(rgyud 'grel): gtor ro// a ka ru dang / du ru ki'i du byas bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab la rig sngags kyi snying po bris
242a3(rgyud 'grel): te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khyig 'bum phyag dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung ring bsrel mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug
242a4(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro// snying po 'di bris la gzhug go/ gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga rdzogs so// / 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// gtsug tai raM dri ma
242a5(rgyud 'grel): myed pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga/ dang por ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ de la tsan+da dang gur kum la sogs pas gtor la/ me tog sil ma 'ong gtor ro// de'i steng du gtsug
242a6(rgyud 'grel): tor dri ma med pa'i yang snying gur kum mam/ gi thang gos me tog dkar po 'byung ba'i myu gus gro ga la bris la/ de la dkyil du bcug pa'i sa ta sa lnga 'am/ bdun nam dgu tsam byas la/ maN+Dal gyi me
242b1(rgyud 'grel): tog phung po'i steng du bzhag/ de nas mchod rten re re la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lnga re re bshams la/ maN+Dal gyi steng du bskor ba ltar gzhug/ yang mtshal gyi steng du bskor ba ltar gzhag/
242b2(rgyud 'grel): gser dngul la sogs pa rin po che'i bum pa bzhi tsam dang / sgyogs la sogs pa'i snod bzhi tsam a ka ru dang du ru kaM la sogs pa dri bzang pos bkang la/ phyogs mtshams rnams su bzhag go/
242b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod pa bshams pa rnams sku gzugs dang swa ta sa la sogs pa dkon mchog la dbul zhing / bsod nams kyi yan lag rnams tshang bar bya// de nas mchod yon gcig bdag gis
242b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod ma zin gyi bar du a~M ka ru la sogs pa'i spos dri zhim po bsreg du gzhug/ bzlas pa'i dus su gtam gzhan dang ma 'dres par byabazlas pa zin pa dang yang snying po
242b5(rgyud 'grel): 'ba' zhig bzlas shing bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya/ de ltar zin pa dang / rin po che'i snod rnams kyi chu kun las cung zad bsdus la/ nad pa la cung zad blud cing khrus bya/ de ltar byas
242b6(rgyud 'grel): na glo bu ba la sogs pa'i nad tshabs che ba las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro// tshe zad pa las ring du 'chi bar 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa chen po rnams kyang bying bar 'gyur te/
243a1(rgyud 'grel): de dag la sogs pa phan yon dpag tu med pa ni de nyid kyi cho ga rgya chen po las shes par bya'o// cho ga gang byed kyang 'byung ba
243a2(rgyud 'grel): tham+b+ha sa nAd pa'i gar ma gsum mam bzhi btang bar bya'o// slob dpon dbul mar mdzad ye shes kyi mdzad pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzung
243a3(rgyud 'grel): mas tha yang yi miH nga
243a4(rgyud 'grel): teShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e thaM thA dI ma shra ma NaH/
244a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod zhen gyi rnam par dbye ba gzhugs so//
244b1(rgyud 'grel): gcan zan dang la sogs pa ni rgyu de phan gdags pa'o// kun nas sgor 'jug pa la sogs pas ni bzlas pa'i grangs gsungs te lan stong ni shi ba la phan gdugs pa'i bzlas brjod kyi
244b2(rgyud 'grel): grangs so// khri ni 'chi ba blu ba'i tshes brgyad nas nyi'i bar du dge slong la sogs pa gang zag bcus byed pa'i grangs so// 'bum ni bsnyen pa'i bzlas brjod kyi grangs so// 'bum bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ces/
244b3(rgyud 'grel): nI snying po 'ba' zhig gur kum+ba dang gI lpA dang tsan+d+ra la sogs pas sngon bzhin b+his na tsha tsha'i nang du bcug pa'o// 'bum tshang nas mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du gu tsug ste/ shing bu b+hAsgreng zhing rgyun btags naste/
244b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod dro zhes pa ni 'bum gter chen po'i ring bsrele lo// de la mchod rten gyi rim pa ni/ ri 'am thang ngam ljongs gang dag/ dur khrod la sogs yangs pa med/ yid 'ong gnas su rgyal po yi// sku gdung mchod
244b5(rgyud 'grel): rten brtsig par bya// yang nA sa 'am rdo dag la// mkhas pas tshul bzhin brko bar bya// sa 'am rdo 'am shing dge gam// yang na tshogs pas brtsig par bya// de la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni khyi 'pha bcu gsum
244b6(rgyud 'grel): yan chad/ sum cu rtsa gnyis man chad do// rang sangs rgyas kyi dgu yan chad bcu gcig man chad de char khab dang tog kyang med do// dgra bcom pa'i khri 'phang bzhi yon chad do// 'khor lo lnga pa'o// rgyun du
245a1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i bar gyi khri 'phang gsum kho na'o// 'khor lo bdun pa'o// sa so'i smra ba'i khri 'phang gnyis 'khor lo bzhi'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung cha brgyad du bgos pa'i
245a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten chen po brgyad ni grong khyer ser skyar rgyal po zas gtsang gis yon bdag byas nas dpal lha las babs pa'i mchod rten brtsigaso// yul ma ga d+ha dbus 'gyur tshal du rgyal po ma skyes dgras yon bdag byas nas
245a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chu' chen po'i mchod rten brtsigs so// grong khyer rtsa mchog tu gyad rnam sti yon bdag byas nas cho 'phrul chen po'i mchod rten brtsigs so// yul bA rA Na se ru ser skya'i rgyal po tshangs byin gyis yon bdag byas nas
245a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal chos kyi 'khor lo'i mchod rten brtsigs so// yul yangs pa can du rgyal po li tsa byaM gzhon nus yon bdag byas nas dpal ka ni ka'i mchod rten brtsegs so// yul mnyan yod du rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis yon bdag
245a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas dpal bkra shis sgo mangs brtsigs so// yul chad ger rgyal po 'dun 'dzin ti las yon bdag byas nas dpal bod can gyi mchod rten brtsigs so// yul ti ka tsa shir rgyal po in+d+ra ba mis yon bdag byas nas/
245a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten pad+ma can brtsigs so// slad chad kyang de dag gi rjes su 'brangs te brtsigs par bya'o// de la byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gyi tshul du brtsigs na/ sku gdung gi rmang yod na rmang rten ji ltar mtho ba bzang ngo //
245b1(rgyud 'grel): rten med na bang rim dang po'i sum cha'i tshad do// de'i steng du dge bcu ni phyir bskyed pa dang rngams pang rI ma dang po'i rngams byed do// gnam 'phang phyi la bang rim dang po'i ngos chud do// de yan chad srog shing ste bang rim
245b2(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i bzhi gsum gyi tshad do// bang rim bzhi 'phang mnyam mo// bang ri mo rngams kyi phyir tshad khri 'phang ngo // bum rten khri 'phang gi tshad do// bum pa ni bang rim dang po'i sum gnyis kyi tshad do// stod kyi skyed ni bar
245b3(rgyud 'grel): rim gsum pa dang mnyam mo// bri rten gyi rgya ni bang rim bzhi pa'i lnga cha gcig go// pre ni br-ing rim bzhi cha gcig go/ de gnyis ka'i 'phangs ni byang rim gyi sum gnyis dang bang rim gyi phyed do// bang rim bzhi shar
245b4(rgyud 'grel): dang stor gsal khung bang rim nyid kyi brgyad cha'o// srog shing gi rtsa ba bang rim bzhi pa la reg go/ 'khor lo bcu gsum gyi 'phang du bang rim dang po'i bzhi gsum gyi tshad do// 'khor lo dang po ni bre'i zur bzhi la
245b5(rgyud 'grel): sleb so// de bzhi chas 'khor ba'i tshad ni 'khor lo bcu gsum pa'o// bcu gcig po yang de'i rim gyis gzhol ba'o// rdeg par thams cad ni ci mdzes su bya'o// thugs rjes mdo gzungs 'phang lo chung ba
245b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam mo// de'i slad du rngams kyi bzhi gsum ni 'jam po nyid stong du bzhi cha cig ni phreng ba'i sul bcu drug pa'o// de'i steng du 'khor lo bcu gsumo pa nyid kyi shing phyed tshad yang rtse phra ba bang rim nyid
246a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'phang byed do// yang srog shing 'phang du bre ched tsam steng du zla ba'i rtse mo gdugs dang mnyam srog shing la bskor te rtse mo dgad do// gdugs ni 'khor lo bdun pa dang mnyam mo//
246a2(rgyud 'grel): gdugs khebs 'khor lo drug pa dang mnyam mo// za ra tshags ni bre'i 'phang dang mnyam mo// yang srog shing 'phang du bre'i sum cha'i tshad kyi steng du nyi ma zla ba lus khyad g.yung tsam mo// nyi ma'i steng du tog gi uta pa la
246a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i tog bu 'dra ste ci mdzes nyi ma dang zla ba dang tog thams cad kyi zur la bya mi 'chags par bya ba'i phyir lcags kyi thur ma rnon po gzer bar bya'o// tog nI ser po nyi ma ni dmar po// zla ba ni dkar po/ gdugs
246a4(rgyud 'grel): khebs ni dkar po'o// gdugs ni sngon po gdugs kyi phyogs bzhir rigs bzhi'i phyag rgya bri'o// thugs rje'i phul ni dmar po'o// thugs rje nyid dngo shes bcu ni ser po'o// srog shing ni dmar po'o// mchod rten kyang
246a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'o// dge bcu yang ser po'o// rmang dang rmang rten ljang khu'o// mchod rten brtsig pa'i rim pa'o// da ni mchod rten gyi bum steng du gdung ma bzhi rgya gram du bri bar bya'o// de ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs
246a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i zheng gi bzhi bri'o// de'i steng du rdo leg bam so btang ba'i so phag legs par gzhib bo// de'i steng du bkris pa'i rtswa mun dza btubs pa dang / bsres pa'i dri bzang po'i chus
246b1(rgyud 'grel): smras nas glo phye dang shing bal bkal bas bsre bar bya'o// rgya ji tsam yod pa'i bcu drug gum brgyad kyi cha ni 'phangs su bya'o// gnyer ma dang sgro 'bur med pa'i gru bzhi par bya'o// de nas thig gdab pa dkyil 'khor chen
246b2(rgyud 'grel): po bkod pa'i rgyud las/ skyon med ras bal 'jam pos ni// shin tu gtsang po'i bu mos ni// shar du bltas nas dgu bsgril du// sngags 'di brjod cing bkal b.raro bya// oM a no n+ya a nu ga to ya// sarba d+harma
246b3(rgyud 'grel): raM pa ra/ sarba d+harma a nan ta ya/ ma su pa ra pa tha sarba d+harma hUM/ shar nub lho byung tshangs thig gdab// tshangs dang ngos dang gru chad gdab// nang gi phyed kyang phyed tshad gdab// rgyab tu phyed phyed tshad gtab nas// lnga pa
246b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi nas tshwa re gdab// drug pa dbus kAr rgyab ma bkas// bzhi rgyab phyogs bzhir dbus cha bzhi// re re yang ni bzhi bzhir ba sgo// de ni sgo'i dkyil 'khor ro// pho brang ci bder sgrub par bya'o// de'i rgyab tu cha gnyis
246b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang // phyed cha re rer bskor ba ni pad+ma rdo rje 'od phreng dang // mchod pa bgos pa'i sa gzhi ste zhes pa'i tshul gyis thig btab nas sa tshon bkye bas gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs dang dra shar dang zla mdzes dang bu dan la sogs pa'i
246b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa bri'o// phyi rol dung ba rim pa gsum ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba dang dmar ser me 'od 'bar ba thams cad du zlum po drang ba'o// dkyil 'khor de la lha'i rten
247a1(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya ste/ sku bam tsA ka li 'am phyag rgya 'am ming yig kyang rung ste/ tshon ma lus pAr bris nas dgod par bya'o// de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud
247a2(rgyud 'grel): las/ phung po lnga dang bcwa brgyad khams/ 'byung bzhir bcas pa'i lus kyi ni// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bltas nas// mi do myur du grol bar 'gyur zhes so// de nas lus dkyil 'khor ci lta ba gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil
247a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la'ang lha nyi shu rtsa bdun du nges so// de'ang gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs gtso bo yab yum li lha mo nyi shu rtsa drug gis bskor ba'o// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor lha mo dang byang chub sems
247a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa'o// gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor la lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo'o// 'on kyang nyi shu rtsa bdun de dag kyang phyogs dang kha dog gi bye brag gi lha re re yang bzhi bzhir 'gyur la/ de ltar no rigs
247a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i lha brgya rtse brgyad do// de nyi shu rtsa lngar 'du zhing dgu dang lnga dang gcig kho nar yang nges so// de brgya rtsa brgyad do dbang du byos nas dbus su rnam par snang mdzad chen po zha bzhi phyag brgyad zhabs brgyad pa yum
247a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'o// g.yas su nyi ma rnam par snang mdzad do// g.yon du zla ba rnam par snang mdzad/ shar du mi bskyod pa la rigs bzhi dang sbyin mo la sogs pa bzhi dang / gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
247b1(rgyud 'grel): se la sogs pa bzhis bskor ba'o// de kho na bzhin du lho drang nub dang byang du yang shes par bya'o// de ni dbus kyi pho brang ngo // de yang sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud las// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi// dkyil
247b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gtso bo rnam snang mdzad// mdog sgra byang chub mchog gi rgyal// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad do// rig pa kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ zla ba nyi ma rna ma snang mdzad// nyi ma zla ba 'chang ba'o// phyogs bzhi
247b3(rgyud 'grel): pho brang dbus su naM// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma'i rigs// las kyi rigs rnams so sor yang // rang rig sangs rgyas sras po dang // spyan ma bdag mo gos dkar sprul// gzugs sgra dri ro lha mo dang // sgeg mo gar phreng gA
247b4(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams// phyogs mdog rigs kyi phyag rgya can// g.yon da rang rtags rgya 'chang ba// ldem bag zhi ba'i tshul du bsam// zhes pa dang / yang byang chub sems dpa' sum bcu gnyis// lha'i snam pur dgod par bya//
247b5(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i lha mo khro mo che// mos pas skr-i la dgod par bya// zhes gsungs so// de'i rgyub tu lha rnams la// bskal bzang sems dpa' bcu drug go// sgo bzhir lha mo bzhi 'am khro bo bzhi dbus kyi gtso bo la yang gzung/
247b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshul du bsgrub pa la lha mo bzhi'o// rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshul du bsgrub bo la rigs bzhi nyid do// yang dbus su rigs lnga mtshams su spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang pho brang gi dbus su gzugs rje/
248a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bzhi dang sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma la sogs pa 'am yang na khro mo bzhi'o// sgo'i nang gi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa' zung re te brgyad do// rten dag bkod nas dkyil 'khor
248a2(rgyud 'grel): yol ba dmar po dang bla re sngon pos bya'o// cod pan dang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan dang gzungs la sogs pa ngos re re yang brgyad brgyad mngon par 'du bya ste legs par bgod/ de'i steng du khri bcas nas g.yon gyi bdag po gang
248a3(rgyud 'grel): de'i gos la sogs pa dang gzugs brnyan bzhag par bya'o// de ni dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa'o// da ni dkyil 'khor de la mchod par bya ste/ lha'i grangs kyi mchod pas dkyil 'khor de yongs su bskor nas sgrub pa po phyogs
248a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhir bzhugs te/ ji ltar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang par lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa skad cig gis dmigs nas rang bzhin gyis lha bcug ste/ na mkhar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
248a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i a~M yig las 'phrul pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod par bsam zhing / gzhung gzhan du gsungs pa'i tshigs bcad dang sngags du mas mchod cing bstod par bya'o// sal snyan du ma'i tshogs bkrol
248a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing bkra shis kyi gru du ma dang smon lam du brjod par bya'o// 'byor ba rab kyis nai raM dang ro'i snod brgyan cing ro bcug nas ro'i lha'i phyogs su sa legs par bstar ba'i dkyil 'khor khru bzhi nas
248b1(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug gi bar du ci rigs par bya ste/ khru bzhi pa ma tho gang nas khru gang gi bar du brtsig par bya'o// de la mkhas pas thig 'di ltar gdab po// tshangs thig zur ngos legs btab nas/ zlar bzhi sdom gdab par bya/
248b2(rgyud 'grel): cha chen bzhi ru 'gyur ba yin/ de nas gsum gsum bgos nas ni/ cha chen bcu gnyis 'gyur ba yin/ de nas gnyis su bgos nas ni// cha chen nyi shu bzhi ru 'gyur// de nas cha bran bgos nas ni// tshangs pa'i
248b3(rgyud 'grel): thig gi ngos gnyis kyi// cha chen dang po'i phyed du bgo/ phyi'i cha phyed de bzhin bgo/ cha chen gnyis pa'ang ched du bgo/ nang gi cha phyed de bzhin bgo/ cha chen gsum pa'i mtha' la gcig/ cha chen bzhi pa'i phyi nang gi/ cha re
248b4(rgyud 'grel): btab cing lnga pa phyed// cha chen drug pa lha rnam 'gyur// cha chen bdun pa phyi nang gi/ cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis bzhag/ cha chen brgyad pa phyed du bgo/ phyi yi cha phyed de bzhin bgo/ cha chen dgu bzhi ru bgo/ cha chen bcu pa
248b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang gi/ che re gdab cing dbus gnyis gzhag/ cha chen bcug phyed du bgo// cha chen bcu gnyis khor yug 'gyur// phyogs gsum du'ong de bzhin no// sgo cigo phyed na tshangs thig dang // phyogs gcig zur thig gdab
248b6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis su// cha chen lnga lnga bgo byas nas// cha chen bcu ru 'gyur ba yin// de nas gnyis su bgo byas nas// cha chen nyi shur 'gyur ba yin// de nas cha bran bgo bar bya// tshangs pa'i//
249a1(rgyud 'grel): thig gi ngos gnyis kyi// cha chen dang po phyed du bgo// phyi'i cha phyed de bzhin bgo/ cha chen gnyis ni byed du bgo// cha chen gsum pa'i mthar cha gcig/ cha chen bzhi pa lnga snum 'gyur// cha chen lnga pa phyi nang gi/
249a2(rgyud 'grel): cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis bzhag/ cha chen drug po phyed du bgo// cha chen bdun pa bzhi ru bsgo// cha tshan brgyad pa phyi nang gi/ cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis bzhag/ cha chen dgu pa phyed du ba'o// de nas bskor ba rim ga
249a3(rgyud 'grel): bya// gsum pa mtha'i cha phran bskor// cha chen bcu pa khor yug 'gyur// sgo gsum pa sogs byed 'dod na// phyi nang dkyil 'khor gang yin pa'i// tshad kyi rim pas bya ba ni// cha phran dprI dang bsnun par bya// de nas blo dang ldan pas tshon
249a4(rgyud 'grel): sna ma lus pas/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa rim pa gnyis sam yang na rim pa gcig kho na bri'o// der sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor lha gang mos pa dgod par bya'o// gal te rim pa gnyis bris na bar khyams la 'jig
249a5(rgyud 'grel): rten skyong ba bcu dgod par bya'o// de yang brgya byin dkar po rdo rje 'chang // me lha dmar po me thab 'chang // gshin rje sngon po be con 'chang // bden bral sngon skya ral gri 'chang // chu bdag dkar po zhags pa 'chang // rlung lha ljang ser ba
249a6(rgyud 'grel): dan 'dzin// gnod sbyin ljang sngon dbyug pa 'chang // dbang phyug ljang skya rtse gsum 'dzin// sa bdag mi ni buM ljang ser// nyi zla tshangs pa dkar ser ni// 'od 'phro 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// lha de dag gi swa Da saM phyag rgya baM sku dgod por bya'o/ 26//
250a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i slab rangs bzhugaso//
250b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA si ta ta pa tre a pa rA dzaM ta nA ma no pe kA/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i sgrubs thabs/ 'phags ma gdugs
250b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo gdugs dkar can bsgrubs par 'dod pas/ gnas dben par khrus byas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ rang skad cig gis lha mor bskyod pa'i oM gyi 'od kyis 'phags ma ri khrod ma dang
250b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la sogs pa spyan drangs la phyag bya ste/ mchod po la sogs pa'i bdun rnam dag gis tshogs bsags nas/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsag par bya'o// de'i ngang las snying ga'i oM
250b4(rgyud 'grel): las 'od 'phros don gnyis byos tshur 'dus pa lngas gdugs dkaru po oM gyis mtshon par gyur/ de las 'od zer sku phra mor 'phros 'dus pa las bdag nyid lha mo gdugs dkar can sku modog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag
250b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa/ sman gnyis las byams pa dang / snying rje'i 'od zer 'phro ba/ g.yas skyabs sbyin/ g.yon gdugs dkar po bzung ba/ padi zla'i gdan la zhabs skyil krung gis bzhugs shong sgeg pa'o// de dbu rgyan dang rna rgyun
250b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan du mas spras par blta'o// spron ri khrod ma dang legs ldan gyis bskor bas bsam mo// de la oM gyi 'od kyis ye shes pa dgu gau gzhug bcing dbang du bya'o// de nyid la dbang poskur la por
251a1(rgyud 'grel): canas dbu rgyun no// de'i thugs kar 'phags ma mtshon grang ba oM dang bcas par bsdu'o// de nyid las skyo bar gyur na ye shes kyi lha mdun du bkug la phyag dang mchod bya stong byas nas thugs ka/
251a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su A~M la sngags kyis bskor ba dmigs nas zhal dang lte bar mgal me 'khor bas rang gzhan thams cad kyi nad gdon la stsogs pa bsregs par bsams nas/ tad+ya thA/ oM a~M no le yA na la/
251a3(rgyud 'grel): de bi Sha de/ bai re be re/ badz+ra d+ha raM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni/ badz+ra pA Ni phaT/ hUM hUM phaT phaT hUM d+haM ban+d+ha phaT swA hA/ 'bum la sogs pa bzlas par bya'o// de nas thun mtshams su mdun gyi ye shes pa la dmigs pa'i mdo dang /
251a4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo legs ldan la gtor ma btang nas/ spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor bya'o// 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can+da gyi sgrub thabs/ slob dpon tsan dra go mis mdzod pa rdzogs so// / lo tsa ba
251a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// N+ya gar skad du/ AR+YA sa ti te pa tra a pa rA dzi tA pA lai ta bI d+hi nA maHbod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can
251a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo tsan la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags ma thugs rje'i rang bzhin cen// 'byung po kun mnga' mdzad ma'i// khro mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal nas// stong
251b1(rgyud 'grel): zlog gtor ma bshad par bya// ba li gzhal yas khang bsaM gri pho brang zlum por bya ba mchog/ sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram la// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad kyis bskor// de bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de// phyi rol dkyil 'khor sgo
251b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhir ldan// kha dog 'jig rten pa dang mthun// sgo rgyan la sogs de bzhin no// de nas lha rnams dgod par bya// dbus kyi pho brang zlum po dang // yum chen gdugs dkar 'khor lo dang // tshangs pa lha yi gtso ma
251b3(rgyud 'grel): dang // gsol kha'i pho nya las byed pa// sring mo ming por bcas pa'o// sna tshogs rdo rje'i rwa bzhi la// rgyal chen bzhi po rim bzhin dgod// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po la// brgya byin gshin rje klu chen brgyad// gnod sbyin
251b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni rim pa bzhin// phyogs bzhi dag tu dgod par bya// me lha sbyin po rlung lha dang // lha chen brgyad rnams mtshams bzhir dgod// de bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lo// 'byung po dang ni gza' gdon dang // sa
251b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang ni lha ma yin// rim pa bzhin du phyogs bzhi r-i dgod// mi 'am nI dang mkha' 'gro ma// ma mo'i tshogs dang na mkha' lding // rim pa bzhinA du mtshams bzhir dgod// lto 'phye dang ni rnal 'byor ma// klu yi
251b6(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang 'byung po'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir dgod par bya'o// de nas g.yos kyi rnam pa ni// rag sha dang ni bo de tse// lung thang dang ni lha yi mig/ phreng ba za ba rnams la sbyin// 'bras 'tshang rgun chang la
252a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa// zas su sems 'phrog rnams la sbyin// 'o ma lho dang kha ra ni// srog rnams 'phrog la sbyin par bya// shing tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa// 'bras bu za ba rnams la sbyin// bong rtsi zas skyug
252a2(rgyud 'grel): za la'o// bdug pa za ba smos sna tshogs// mngor gsum sbyar ba mngal zi la'o// bcos dang rjen shi sna tshogs// sha za bi la sbyin par bya'o// sbrang rtsi mchil ma 'thung ba la'o// khur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o//
252a3(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma za bai rnams la sbyin// lag pu na sbyin sreg za la sbyin// rkang dang rkang mar bcas pa ni// rkang za ba la rab tu sbyin// 'bru ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa// lo tog za ba rnams la sbyin// thang skyes chu skyes me tog rnams// me tog
252a4(rgyud 'grel): za ba rnams la sbyin// la phug sgog btsong la sogs pa// mau gtsang za ba rnams la sbyin// tshal ni rul dang ma rul ba// tshil za ba la sbyin par bya// bya mo'i sgo nga 'byor thang ba// zas su snabs zo ba la sbyin// sha rul
252a5(rgyud 'grel): yi bas sums song ba rnams// rnag za ba la sbyin par bya// bya pho las byung ngar skyong 'od// ngar snrubs za ba rnams la sbyin// khrag rnag mang po ji snyed po// zas su khrag 'thung rnam la sbyin/ sha rnams btsos pa'i zhag rnams
252a6(rgyud 'grel): ni// zas su zhag za rnams la sbyin// bu ram shing kun sbyar ba ni// gtses pa za ba rnams la sbyin// ga pur gur kun la sogs pas// zas su dri za ba la sbyin// kun gyis lhag ma bsdus pa ni// lhag ma za ba rnams la
252b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin// chu sna mang po bsdus pa ni// stong khung 'thung ba rnams la sbyin// sha dang khrag dang sgog btsong rnams// bgegs rigs 'khor du gyur la sbyin// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu yi// rgyud kyi gdams pas gtor/
252b2(rgyud 'grel): maM sbyin// 'di yis nye bar mtshon pa ni// kun lA mkhas pas nAM sa pAr+ya byA// de la lag pa'i thal mo khong stong du sbyar la// oM swa b+h+r-i ba bi shud+d+haHswa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho haM/ zhes pas pr-i nga ba'i dri mra sbyang ngo // lag
252b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thal mo sbyar la sor mo rnams rtse sprad de// tshig zur can rIn po che'i sgrom bu ltar byas la/ na maHsarba ta thAM ga te b+h+yo bi shA mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tad khaM uda? ga te/ s+pha r-i NA hi maM/ gA ga na khaM swA hA// phreng ba rgya chen
252b4(rgyud 'grel): por sbrul la rnam pa ma 'gyur ba'i bdud rtsi'i zas phun sum tshogs par bsam mo// lag pa thal mo sbyar ba phyir bgyid de mthe bo gnyis bsnol te kha phye la/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hU~M phaT kyis gang mos su
252b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyuraro// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas mdzub mo bsgreng ste/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a byA lo ki taM/ sau b+hU ra saM b+hA ra hUM gis 'dod yon la sogs pa thams cad long spyod nus par bsam mo// lag g.yas rje
252b6(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur snying gar bstan la/ g.yon mchod sbyin gyis snod 'degs pa'i tshul du byas nas/ oM dz+nyA na a ba lo ka te/ se man+ta pa ra na ra smi ta b+ha ba sa ma ya/ ma hA ma ni du ru dr-i ru/ hr-i da ya dza la ni hUM zhes brjod pas
253a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gron rnams kyis so sor thob cing tshim par bsam mo// lag pa'i thal mo khong stong du sbyar la sor mo rnams nang ba snol te/ mthe bong ga shi bas nas brkyang la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ gra
253a2(rgyud 'grel): he shwa ri dza la ni sa ma ya swA hA/ zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa'o// de nyid dbang du bsdu'o// bstod cing phrin las la sbyar ro// gtor ma thams cad de bzhin du shes par bya'o// de nas rang las kyi lha mo'i thugs ka'i oM gyi
253a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis gtse 'khor rnams spyan drang bar bya ste/ hUM bcom ldan gang+gAH dkar 'kho bcas rnams// tshur gshegs 'dir ni bzhugs su gsol// mchod yon zhal bsil po zhes nas kyang // pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gso
253a4(rgyud 'grel): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nan/ ga ga~M nA pra ba ra song kA raM pad+ma la sa me ya s+t+wa~M/ rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs stong bcu// 'byung po gza' gdon sa bdag dang // sta min mi 'am mkha 'gro ma// ma tshogs mkha' lding 'dir gshegs
253a5(rgyud 'grel): shig/ lto 'phye che dang rnal 'byor ma// klu'i gdon dang 'byung po'i tshogs// spyan 'dren mchod 'bul snyan gsan 'bebs// thugs dam rgyud bskul gshegs su gsol// oM e he hI lo ka pA la sa pa ri bA ra saM ya s+t+waM//
253a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas dkyil 'khor gyi dmo tshig la bstim par bya'o// de nas gtso mo ri khrod ma logs ldan 'jig rten pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa la rnam pa lnga dang / 'dod yon lnga lha mo brgyad la sogs pas khyad par mchod la/
253b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi bstod pa bya'o// de'i rjes la gtor ma thams cad kyi phud kyis gtso mo la mchod de/ de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams la tshig 'di rnams kyis sbyin par bya'o// hUM 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa
253b2(rgyud 'grel): baM dang / de'i btsun mo tshangs ma dang // tshangs pa'i rgyal mo gtsug pud dang // dkar mo'i 'od dang mchog 'od dang // rin chen 'od dang snang ba'i 'od// sprin g+hi 'od dang kun tu 'joms// tshangs pa srid pa 'dzin lnga sogs//
253b3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la// phyag 'tshal bstod de mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su phreng ba za bi la// rag shi bo de tse las ni// gzhi blangs pa yi gtor ma ni// 'jig rten dkon
253b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sman rnams la// snying po la sogaso sbyar ba 'di// tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'khor bcas la// bsngos shing tshim pas dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcos thams cad kyi// tshe srog
253b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog rnams bzlog tu gsol// nyes po thams cad bzlog pa dang // tshe srog bar chad zlog tu gsol// sring mo bzhi dang ming po gsum// rnam par rgyal dang mi pha ma ma// gzhan gyis mi thub dril bu ma// rgyal bar byed
253b6(rgyud 'grel): dang sbrang rtsir byed// don kun grub dang rgyal byed ma// ming sring 'khor dang bcas pa la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bskur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis po'i gtor ma 'di// zas su gcin 'thung zhes bya la// 'bras
254a1(rgyud 'grel): chang rgun chang la sogs pa// 'bru dang bcud du sbyar ba 'di// sring mo ming po 'khor bcasu kun+da// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgos gyur cig/ khyod la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag tsug 'khor
254a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis// bza' nyes pa dang bri nyes pa// bsgom nyes pa la sogs pa yi// nyes pa ma lus zhi ba dang // tshe srog bskyang zhing rgyas par mdzod// rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ shar
254a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung // btsun mo rdo rje yangs byed ma// dri za pho mo shug chen dang // ut+pal dang ni tsan dan sogs// zur phung lnga la so gra pa yi// dri za'i rgyal po 'khor bcas la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen
254a4(rgyud 'grel): bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor mu 'di// zas su srog 'phrog zhes bya la// 'o ma zho dang kha ra dang // smana? dang bcud sbyar gtor ma 'di// dri za 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes
254a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// dri za'i gdon tshogs bzlog pa dung // tshe srog par chod bzlog tu gsol// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po 'khor dang bcas pa la
254a6(rgyud 'grel): sngo ba ni/ lho phyogs rgyal po 'phags skyes po// btsun mo rdo rje 'dul mkhas ma// 'khor ni grul bum mgul mdzes dang // mgul nges dang ni ma nges dang // kun tu lha dang mngon par shos ldan// bum lto can dang
254b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa mchog/ grul dum rgyal po 'khor bcas la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su 'brus bu za ba la// shing trog sna chags gzhi blangs pan/
254b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bru dang spyan du sbyar ba 'di// grul bum 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba nI// bdag cag 'khor bcus thams cad kyi// grul bum gdon tshogs bzlag
254b3(rgyud 'grel): bu dang // tshe srogo bar gcod bzlog tu gsol// rgyal po mig mI bzang 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ nub phyogs rgyal po mig mi bzang // btsun mo rdo rje myos byed ma// klu yi rgyal po rnams lung dang // pad+ma na
254b4(rgyud 'grel): po rgya mtsho dang // mA dros 'od zer rgyal ba dang // klog chen pa 'byin dang rin chen 'od // sog ma med la sogs pa la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su skyugs
254b5(rgyud 'grel): pa zla ba la// sbrang rtsi la ni sbyar ba yi// rtsi dang bcud du sbyar ba 'di// mig mi bzang ni 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshami zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams ca cod kyi//
254b6(rgyud 'grel): klu yi gdon tshogs zhi ba dang // tshe srog bar chad zlog tu gsol// rgyal po rnam thos sras 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ byang phyogs rgyal po rnam thos sras// btsun mo rig ma phreng ldan dang // gnod sbyin
255a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dga'i ring po dang // mig mi bzung dang nye sneng+ge// seng+ge dul rdob ser sgra dang // gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i
255a2(rgyud 'grel): gter ma 'di// zas su bdug pa za ba la// spos sogs dri dang spos sbyar 'di// byung phyogs gnod sbyin 'khor bcos so// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba nI// bdag cag 'khor
255a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas thams cad kyi// gnod sbyin gdon tshogs zhi ba dang // nad dang sdug bsngal bzlog tu gsol// brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ shar phyogs dbang ldan brgya byin dang // dri za'i rgyal po gtum bu ra
255a4(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong yi dgas 'od sbyangs dang // 'jam mnyen dbyangs dang nyi zer dang // yid 'phrog gtso bo la sogs pa// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su mngal za zhwa
255a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba// mngar gsum rtse smon sbyar ba 'di// phyogaso sbyong dri zla 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phyin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcus thams cad kyi// dri za'i gdon tshogs
255a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa dang // tshe yi bar gcod bzlog tu gsol// gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni// gshin rje long ba'i rgyal po dang // ded dpon rje mo srin mo dang // ma mo dang ni lha ma srin// dus mtshan dang ni sha
255b1(rgyud 'grel): za mo// gshin rje rigs kyi gdon rnams la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma ni// zas su sha za zhes bya la// btsos dang sha chen gtor ma 'di// ga shin rje 'khor
255b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// gshin rje'i gdon sogs bzlog pa dang // pha rol rig sngags bzlog tu gsol/
255b3(rgyud 'grel): klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni// klu rgyal dga' bo nyer dga' bo// mtha' yas 'jog po stobs kyi rgyu// rigs ldan dung skyong pad+ma dang // chu la nor rgyas la sogs la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa
255b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bu lo// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zos su mchil ma 'thung ba la// bong rtsi bcung ngu sbyar ba 'di// klu yi rgyal po 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phyin las zhu ba ni//
255b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// klu gdon thams cad zhi bo drang // klu dug rig sngags bzlog du gsol// gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ gnod sbyin rgyal po ku bo ra// 'brog gnas mched
255b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga gang ba bzang // nor bu bzang dang lag brgya pa// lnga rtsen lnga brtsegs phyis la ser// gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad mo mchis pa'i gtor me 'di// zas su
256a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma za ba la// khur ba sna tshogs bcud dang sbyar// spyan gzigs sna tshogs bcas pa ni// gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las
256a2(rgyud 'grel): zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// gnod sbyin gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang // rkyen ngan par mchod zlog du gsol// me lha 'khor dang bcas pa le bsngo ba ni/ drang srong me la byin za dang // gnas mchog
256a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas brtan a ko ta/ 'go'u ta ma thogs pa'i dpal// gar ldan dang ni phreng ba can// drang srong dpal sbyin la sogs pa// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// sreg
256a4(rgyud 'grel): bya za ba zhes bya ba// 'bras kyi lag pan la sogs dang // 'bru dang bcud kyis sbyar ba 'di// me lha 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor
256a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas thams cad kyi// drang srong gdon tshogs zhi ba dang // dgra bgegs thams cod bzlog tu gsol// bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa la sngo ba ni// bden bral srin po bumo sna dang // gdong pa bcu la khros pa bzhin//
256a6(rgyud 'grel): mche bzangs mdog drag po la// rab gtams dang ni 'jigs pa ltar// srin po drag byed la sogs pa// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zasu rkang za zhes bya la// rkang dang
256b1(rgyud 'grel): rus pa sna tshogs dang // khur ba la sogs sbyar ba ni// srin po 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// srin po'i
256b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams bzlog pa dang // tshe srog par chad bzlog tu gco/ rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni// rlung lha bai DUr ram pa dang // phreng ba can dang 'jig rten sman// rlung gi lha dang 'jig byed dang // tshangs chen dang
256b3(rgyud 'grel): ni kun tu mgyogs// rlung lha rnam par 'thor byed dang // rlung phyogs gdon la sogs pa la// phyag 'tshol bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su l-i tog za ba la// 'bras dang
256b4(rgyud 'grel): nus dang snye ma dang // gang du 'bru gtsang bcas pa 'ong // rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos paso tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// rlung lha'i gdon
256b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bzlog pa dang // lo nyes la sogs gdon rnams bzlog/ dbang phyug chen po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ dbang phyug ma hA de ba dang // btsun myo u ma de ba gnyis// dga' byed dbang phyug b+h+r-ing gi
256b6(rgyud 'grel): ri// tshogs bdag gzhon nu smin drug dang / pa tra pa la nAn di ka ra// ma hA kA la sha ri sogs// de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor mo 'di// zas su me tog za bau la// chu dang thang las
257a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa yi// me tog rtsi bcud sbyar ba 'di// lha chen brgyad po 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// lha yi
257a2(rgyud 'grel): gdon tshogs zhi ba dang / rims nad thams cad bzlog tu gsol// 'byung po'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dang // log 'dren sna 'dren mdung thung dang // gshol mda' can
257a3(rgyud 'grel): dang gtun shing dang // 'khrus byed snyan drag yang dag 'gugs// 'byung po'i 'khor bcas la sogs pas// de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su mi gtsang za ba la// 'byung po'i
257a4(rgyud 'grel): kha zas sgog btsod dang // la phug 'bras la sogs pa la// rgya dang rkyen du sbyar ba 'di// 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshom zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams
257a5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi// 'byung po'i gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang // bgegs kyi bas mya ngan bzlog du gsol// gza'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ gza' chen byi tri pa t+yA dang // zla ba nyi ma gzu' lag can// bya ba sangs/
257a6(rgyud 'grel): dang phur bu dang // spen pa dang ni mig dmar dang // sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa la// de la phyag/ 'tshal mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su tshol za zhes bya la// phyi tshil nang tshil la sogs pa//
257b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang len du sbyar ba ni// gza' gdon 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// gza' yi gdon tshogs bzlog pa
257b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // lhas ngan mtshan ngan bzlog du gsol// sa bdag rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ sa bdag rgyal po phrag mgo can// bdag hA phan the se dang // be sna lag chen cing ku dang // rtsang kun 'khor dang pa
257b3(rgyud 'grel): rta li// sa bdag brtan ma la sogs la// phyag 'tshal bsnyon bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su snabs za zhes bya ba// bya yi sgro nga la sogs pa'i// srid pa'i rgyu dang sbyar ba 'dri// sa
257b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'khor bcas thams cad la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcus thams cad kyi/ sa bdag gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang // tshe dang dbang thang spel du
257b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol// lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ lha min rgyal po thag bzangs ris// rab gsal dang ni zhi ba'i mchog/ thag pa sri dang khra chen po// dus kyi 'khrod dri med po// lha min rgyal po thams cad la/
257b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su rnag za zhes bya la// sha sums rus pa la sogs pa// rgyu dang rkyen du bsags pa 'di// lha mon 'khor dang bcas pa la//
258a1(rgyud 'grel): bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// lha min gdon tshogs zhi ba dang // lo skag zla skeg bdud sgeg dang // khram sgeg la
258a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs bzlog tu gsol// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la sngo ba ni// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dang // chos ldan chos skyong chos bzangs dang // lha ma ni phung byed la sogs pa// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur
258a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su ngar snabs za ba la// de po'i ngar sgo sbyar ba dang // myi 'am ci'i rgyal po 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las/
258a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni// bdag cug 'khor bcu sa thams cad kyi// gzhan gyi sbyor ba ngan pa dang // bsam ngan thams cad bzlog tu gsol// mkha' 'gro ma 'khyo dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ mkha' 'gro ma tshogs de bai ra// hA pad+ma dang
258a5(rgyud 'grel): su ka ri// be hi bi dang bi ma ka/ be bo ka dang kar tI ka/ byA ka ra tA ding mu ha ka/ ba ka ra tA dang mu h+yA ka/ mkha' 'byo chen mo thams cad la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bu la// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/
258a6(rgyud 'grel): zas su khrag 'thung zhes bya la// khrag sna brgya'i gtor ma 'di// mkha' 'gro chen mo 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad
258b1(rgyud 'grel): kyai// mkha' 'gro'i gdon tshogs zhi ba dang // mdangs 'phyog thams cad bzlog tu gsol// ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la bsngo ba ni/ ma mo chen mo dza mi ka/ rdo rje gzhon nu lu gu rgyud// pad+ma'i mig
258b2(rgyud 'grel): dang rig gser phreng // rdo rje shugs ldan rgya ldan ma// rdo rje pad+ma'i 'od phreng ma// me mo'i gdon tshogs thams cad la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gter ma 'di// zas su
258b3(rgyud 'grel): zhag zu zhes bya la// zhag dang bcud du ster ba 'di // ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// ma mo'i
258b4(rgyud 'grel): gdon tsho gso zhi ba dang // srog 'bru gau sdug bsngal bzlog du gsol// na mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ na mkha' lding gi rgyal po la/ gser mig can dang yan lag 'du// rna bdud dang n+ya
258b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs par 'gro/ 'dab brgyad dngon gcig phud can// shugs ldan bzang dang yan lag ldan// na mkha' lding gi 'khor bcas la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor
258b6(rgyud 'grel): ma 'di// zas su btsas pa zo ba la// bu ram shing kun la sogs pa'i// bcud dang bdud rtsi sbyar ba 'di// mkha' lding rgyal po 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshom zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu
259a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// mkha' lding gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang // tshe yi bar chod bsgrub tu gsol// lto 'phye'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ lto 'gyur/
259a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyul po chen po ni// mgyogs chen dang ni du ba can// la ba can dang hu ta ka/ shu bar ka sna sna bzangs dang // dpung bzangs dang nI 'jigs chen+da dang // lto 'phye'i rgyal po la stsogs pa// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur
