259a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su dri za zhes byA la// ga puraraM gur kumA sug snrel dang // li shi dz+nye tI la sogs pa'i// dri dang sman du sbyar ba 'di// lto 'phye 'khor dong bcas pa la// bsta sa
259a4(rgyud 'grel): pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed lnga phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// lto 'phye'i gdon tshogs zhi ba dang // gdon gyi bar chad bzlog tu gsol// srin po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/
259a5(rgyud 'grel): rnamra 'byor+ya s+t+rinA mo nAg mau dang / sbru mIg+na nag mo gnod sbyin mo// be tshon nag mo lnga sogs la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'dri// zas su lcug ma za ba la// kun gyi
259a6(rgyud 'grel): sgeg mo'i tshogs sbyar 'di// phrin mo / kho 'i bcas tham // c+doMs pas tsham rgyas gyur cig// khyod 'i phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// ma mo srin mo'i gdon tshogs dang/
259b1(rgyud 'grel): mi na phyugs nad bzlog du gsol// klu'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ gang+gA'i lha dang sin d+hu'i lha// byams ldan lha dang dbyangs can lha// zla ba can dan dang ya mu ta// kun gyi lha dang mgyogs chen lha//
259b2(rgyud 'grel): mtsho lteng lha la sogs pa la// phyag 'tshil bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su store khung bab 'thung la// chu sna brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni// bcu dang rtsi ldan sbyar ba 'di// chu klung sna tshogs//
259b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshomi zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// chu klung gnas pa'i bgegs bdon dang // tshe sroge bar chod bzlog tu gsol//
259b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhi'i bgegs chen 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni// shar phyogs khams kyi bdag po dang // lho phyogs sprin gyi sgron ma dang // nub phyogs bgegs rgyal rdo rje dang // byang phyogs bi nA yA ka la// phyag
259b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'od// zas su maM gAts+tshan pa la// khrag dang sha sna sbyar ba ni// bgegs chen bzhi po 'khor bcos la// bsngos pas tshim zhing degyes gyur cig/
259b6(rgyud 'grel): khyed la phris zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcwa zad kyi// phyogs bzhi'i bgegs tshogs zhi ba dang // bsam sbyor ngan pa ba zlog tu gsol// 'byung po ma lus khyed rnams kun// so sor gtor ma phul ba 'di//
260a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas su// rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas kyang // rang ki bu smad mdza' ba shes gnyen 'dun dang // nang mi dmag dang dpung bcus lhan cig tu//
260a2(rgyud 'grel): gter ma me tob dri dang 'dug par bcas// 'di dag gsol zhing legs par bsnams nas kyang // bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// ces brjod par bya'o// de nas blo 'phag bzhi byas pa'i mdun du
260a3(rgyud 'grel): sgor bzhi drangs la// de b+h+yo sngags kyis sngags te phyogs bzhir bskul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'khor bcas le mchod pa dang / rgyud kyi bstod pa la sogs pas sted nas bdag dang yon bdag 'khor
260a4(rgyud 'grel): ces kyis me tog tho gau se la rgyal mtshan nam// sku dang dkyil 'khor bcas pa la yang bstod pa byed cing bskor ba bya/ nad gdon zhi ba'i gsol ba gdang / bzod par gsol ye shes pa gshegs/ dam/
260a5(rgyud 'grel): rlig pa bsdu/ gtor ma gnod byed kyi phyogs su gtang la/ bkra shis brjod par bya'o// de ni mi nod dang / phyugs nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas dran pa dang / byAd ka dang / phur ka dang / pha rol gyi dpag
260a6(rgyud 'grel): tshegs la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// char chu yang dus su 'bab pa dang / rtsi bdud dang / le tog la sogs pa'i 'bru thams cad rgyas pa dang // mi byugs thams cad 'phel ba dang / mchog tu dge bar
260b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// tsan+d+ra go mis 'phags pa yi// rjes gnang dngos su thob gyur nas// gtor cho ga bshad rgyud la brten brtsams// dge ngos 'gro kun bde thob shog/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gyi gtor mang /
260b2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga/ slob dbe na tsan+da dra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// tho ling gi gtsug lagaM khang du dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ta thA/
260b3(rgyud 'grel): gA toSh+NI Sha si twA h+NA pa tre nA mA pa rA dzi ta d+hA ra Ni sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
260b4(rgyud 'grel): spro tsa~M thabs dkon mchog gsum le phyag 'tshal lo// mthing dang mya mthong la sgrol ba'i// gdugs dkar yum la phyug+sa pa 'tshal to// bdag gzhan don de thob bya'i byor// lo 'dab tsam zhig gsal bar \u0f7f/
260b5(rgyud 'grel): de lce 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ g+ha nas dben zhing yid dang mthun par dang po maN+Dal dang mchod pa bshams la khrus bya ste/ lus dris byugs nas/ gos gtsang ma
260b6(rgyud 'grel): bgos te stan bde ba la gnas par bya'o// de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i steng du oM dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa/
261a1(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar mo can dmigs te/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du bya'o// de nas tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms te stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o// de ltar stong pa nyid las zla ba'i
261a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i oM dkar po bsams te/ de nyid la phyogs bcur 'phros pas 'gro ba'i don bya ste/ tshur 'dus pa las gdugs dkar po oM gyis mtshan par gyur te/ de las 'od zer lha mo'i sku dang
261a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa 'phros pas 'jig rten thams cad du nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las dkrol te tshur 'dus pas/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// phyag dang po gnyis gdugs dkar
261a4(rgyud 'grel): po 'dzin pa/ sbrul bI dbu stong phyag stong mnga' ba/ sbyin bye ba phyag brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo// dbul mi phyed rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ swa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa/ bdag dang
261a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan 'jigs pa thams cad los skyob pa/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis kunas yongs su bskor te/ gnas par bsams te/ mchod pa'i tshogs rnams byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs par bya'o// de nas mdun gyi
261a6(rgyud 'grel): na mkhar bruM las ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang sems kyi 'byor pa'i rgyan dang ldan par bsgom pa'i nang du seng+ge la sogs pa'i gdan rnams bskyed pa la/ sbyin drang ba ni snying ga'i oM gyi 'od kyis bskul te dmigs pa
261b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams mchod yon gyis bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o// de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang / sprul pa'i tshogs rnams gsal
261b2(rgyud 'grel): bar dmigs te/ gzhung las byung ba'i phyag rgya dang bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod do// de nas gsol ba btab ste bzlas pa ni bdag dang ye shes kyi thugs kar/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/
261b3(rgyud 'grel): la bzlas pa'i yi ge mu tig rdeg po lto bur bsams te/ spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas bzlas pa'i skyon spangs te/ bzlas pa bya'o// de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar
261b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs shing sems tson gyi don dran pas bzlas pa bya'o// de ngal lam gtong por 'dod na bzlas pa yid kyis 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la phul to/ bdag las kyi lha mos 'phags pa rnams la mchod
261b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bstod pa bya ste/ bzod par gsol zhing dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngos nas gshegasu gsol lo// de nas lus bsrung bar bya ste ldang bar bya'o// langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o// rtag
261b6(rgyud 'grel): tu 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo dran par bya'o// phyag 'tshal bar dmigs shing 'byung po'i kha zas spangs te bsgrub par bya'o// bsrung ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / bzlog pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bgegs
262a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlog cing gzir ba dang / dmag dpung gzhom pa dang / dngos grub bsgrub pa dang / ser ba bskyung ba dang / spre'u gso ba dang / gtor ma btang ba dang / mdze nad gso ba dang / 'jigs pa bsgrub pa kun
262a2(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i phan yon las 'byung ba ltar thams cad bya'o// bdag 'dra blo dman so so skye bo yis// 'phags pa mchog la chu yi thigs tsam bstod// 'di las bskyed pa'i bsod nams gang byung bas// bdog dang srin/
262a3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi mchog thob shog/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs// slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis
262a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dri lnga rang ngam gzhan la bsrung ba 'dod pas/ dang por gro ga 'am rAs sam shing shun la/ gur kumA gyis rim pa bzhir gnas par bskor te dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
262a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bkod pa'i ste ba la bskyang bar bya ba'i ming bsrung tshig dang bcas pa bris tAM/ rtsibs brgyad po dag lA nI/ oM ri Shi grA nA nas aSh+TA na ma'i bar du so sor byis te/ yang bsrung ba'i tshogs dang bcas par ro// gnyis
262a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la ni tad+ye thA/ oM nas hUM druM bano d+ha'i bar du sde tshan brgyad du dgod par bya'o// rim pa gsum par ni zhi bar byed pa'i rig sngags/ tad+ya thA/ hUM nas ma ma'i bar du dgod par bya'o// rim pa bzhi par ni/ thams cad
262b1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa'i rig sngags oM A si tA na lArka nas bi sa na ya'i bar du bsrung ba'i tshig dang bcas par dgod par bya'o// de ltar bris pa de bum pa 'am maN+Dal steng du bzhag nas/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs
262b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ 'khor lo'i dbus kyi yi ge las 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can 'khor bcas bskyed par bya'o// de nas mdun du gzhal yas khang bsams te/ ye shes kyi lha tshogs spyan drangs mchod pa bya ste/
262b3(rgyud 'grel): gzungs nas 'byung bas gsol ba btab la/ bzlas pa rgya'am stong ngam ci tsam 'tsham par bya'o// de nas 'khor la yang mchod cing tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang legs ldan la sogs pa la gtor ma phul te/
262b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba btab nas rang ngam gzhan skyes pa 'am bud med de phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu 'gro ba byas nas/ yungs kar dang bcas pas lus sam mgul du btags na mes mi tshugs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang
262b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan no// slob dpon tsan+da dra go mis mdzad pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs so// / bdag nyid bsnyen pa thob pas 'khrul 'khor 'ching bar 'dod na// dur khrod kyi ras la khrag dang dug dang
262b6(rgyud 'grel): len tshwa dang / ske tshe la sogs pa'i khu bas 'khor lo mu khyud gnyis la bskor ba bris te/ nang ma'i lte ba la bsgrub bya'i ming sa bon gyi yi ge bris pa'i phyi rol du/ tad+ya thA/ oM nas hUM druM bin d+ha'i bar du bris pa/
263a1(rgyud 'grel): 'am mthar che ge mo mA ra ya phaT ces bri'o// rim pa gnyis pa la thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags/ mA rA ya dang bcas par dgod do// de nas grog nA khar gyis dang / ba lang gi lci ba dang /
263a2(rgyud 'grel): dga'i rkang rjes kyis bgegs kyis chu phar 'gram gyi sa la gzugs brnyan byas te/ de'i snying gar 'khrul 'khor bcug ste dong gru gsum du gzhug go// de nas bdag nyid lnga'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par bya ste/ 2k+Shar/
263a3(rgyud 'grel): l-i bsgrub byar bsams pa'i rten pa phyag rgya'i cho gas la sogs pa kun bkug cing bcug par bsams la/ tshangs pa dang dbang po ring legs ldan drag po la sogs pa rnams la gau ter ma byin te// gsol
263a4(rgyud 'grel): btab nas/ zas pa ni phyag rgya'i tsho gos la sogs pas bsgrub bya bkug cing / bkug nas bcings par bsams te/ de nas ling ga 'gul ba dang ldeg pa dang / sha ba la sogs pa byung nas thams
263a5(rgyud 'grel): cad 'joms pa'i sngagasau kyis rig sngags bcang phur pas gdab par bya'o// tha mar sman ma rlung la 'char pa 'am mnan par bya'o/ yang na ling gra la bzlas pa bya b+h+ya/ mu mig gam/ sbyin sreg gam/ sa
263a6(rgyud 'grel): gter ram/ ri rtser gtad bya'o// 'khrul 'khor rdzogs so// / dus mi yin par 'chi ba dang / ngag bzlog pa ni bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byasate/ phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa
263b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgos nas/ mdun du 'tsho bdag gnas par bsgoms te/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis de la bsnun pa'i sbyor ba bya ste/ tshur 'dus pas bdag ye shes kyi bdud rtsis lus lA phan btags bur bsams te/ thams cad
263b2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa bzlas par bya'o// ngag bzlog pA nI gr-ig mkhar gyi s+ya dang / bA lang gi lci ba la gI sgrub byi'i ming go zugs byas la/ de'i snying gar sngar gyi 'khrul 'khor bris pa'i mthar che ge mo mA ra ya ban d+ha ya nan bya ba
263b3(rgyud 'grel): bcug ste bkod nas btsug nas/ gzugs kyi khar thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags bzlas po'i yungs kar dang phur bros btab ste/ de nas mchod rten rnying pa 'am/ lha khang gi them pa pam/ ra pa rgya gram mam/ bsgrub
263b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'i yul gyi phyogasu tsha tsho'i 'og tu 'am/ yang na rang gi mal 'og tu dong gru gsuM pA byas pa'o// 'og tu bzhag nus byi mas bkang ste/ g.yam pa la rdo rje rgya gram bris la mnan pa'i sbyor ba bya'o// de nas tshangs pa dang bA
263b5(rgyud 'grel): byin dang / leg ldan drag po la gtor ma byin la/ 'chi bdag gzhom pa 'am/ che ge mye'i dgra bcings shing che ge me'i srung ma bdag gi dbang du gyis shig ces bsko bar bya'o// rang bsrung pa yang thun mong du lha'i nga rgyal gyis
263b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas bsgom rtag tu bya ba dang / lus la sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gdags so// bzlog pa'i thabs rdzog so// / bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba ni bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ grog
264a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhar g+hu sa dang / dur khrod kyi thal ba dang / chu phar 'gram cur 'gram gyi sal bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas te/ 'khrul 'khor sna mA ltar bris pa'i mthar che ge mo'i 'byung
264a2(rgyud 'grel): mA ra ya nan bya ba bkod de/ de'i snying gar bcug nas de la bdag gi thugs las phyag rgya'i tshogs spros pas bsgrub par bya ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rnga mo la bskyon te/ bkug ste gzugs brnyan
264a3(rgyud 'grel): lha bcug ste/ bcings nas la chas dril te dris mas dkris la/ thod pa 'am kham phor kha sbyar sar pa ru bcug ste/ tshangs pa dang dbang po dang legs ldan drag po la sogs po la gter ma byin nas 'byung
264a4(rgyud 'grel): bopo 'di bdag gi dbang du gyis shig ces bsgo la lha khang gi them pa 'am/ lam rgya gram mam/ mchod rten rnying pa'i 'og dong gru gsum du bcug la/ bye ma 'im tshar mus bkang nam/ rdo rje rgya gra ma~M gyis mnan te/
264a5(rgyud 'grel): bskal par mi thar bar bsam mo// bgegs gzir ba ni gzugs brnyan snga mA wAr rama?/ 'jug ma lA byas te// 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar byas te/ de'i tha mar che ge mo mA ra ya btags te bris te/ gtor ma sngam
264a6(rgyud 'grel): slar byin te/ tshangs pa dang dbang po legs ldan la sogs pas gnod par byed pa'i 'byung po 'di choms shog ces bskul nas/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rang dbang med par snga ma lta bkug bcings nas/ thams cad/
264b1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa'i sngags dang yungs kar/ phur bu dang ral gri dang bcas pas gzir zhing tha mar mnas sa 'am bsreg par bya'o// yang na tha mar mna' chu blud la btang bar bya'o// bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba'i
264b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs rdzogs so// / pha rol gyi dmag dpung gzhom par 'dod na/ bdag nyid rnal 'byor dang ldan pas 'khrul 'khor mu khyud gnyis pa snga ma ltar ram/ ras dmar po lta bu la bris pa'i mthar che
264b3(rgyud 'grel): ge mo'i tshogs dang / de dag gi srung ma'i ming gi mthur ban d+ha ya nAn bya ba bris nas/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis de'i bsrungs ma dang / dmag dpung rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis btags nas bstims te/ bcings
264b4(rgyud 'grel): nas 'thub mtshams su snga ma ster mnan par bya'o// yang ni pha rol gyi dmag 'ong bA la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i gzungs rgyal
264b5(rgyud 'grel): tshan gyi rtse mo lA bat+ta ko sa te rim glo dang mchod pa bya ste/ grong khyer thams cad k+Shi sgo 'am+b+ha/ grang dam/ grong rdal lom/ ljongs sum dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so// yod na rin zla tshwa'i byang bu ra/
264b6(rgyud 'grel): kro ka 'am/ shog pu la gzungs 'di bris te lhar bskyod cong spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa chen po byas nas bskor ba bya/ tshangs pa dang dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa lo gtor ma gtang ngo // che ge mo'i dmag dpung
265a1(rgyud 'grel): choms shig ces pas kyang bskul te de ltar gzungs du mar bris te spyi gtsug tu gdags pa dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ dmag dpung gi mdun du bdag nyid lta
265a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor du bya ste/ nga rgyal dang ldan pa phyag rgya'i tshogs dang tshangs pa dang / dbang po la so gas pas bskor te/ gnas par bsam shing phyar te 'gro bar bya'o// rtag tu mchod cing gsol ba gdab par bya'o//
265a3(rgyud 'grel): des ni pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams zhi bar 'gyuraro// dmagu dpung gzhom pa'i thabs rdzogs so// / dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod no/ gnas yid dang mthun zhing bkra shis par gr-i ga
265a4(rgyud 'grel): ras la gzungs 'di bris te/ gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa 'am/ yang na rin po che'i sgom du bcug ste/ maN+Dal gyi dbusu bzhig nas sum dngos grub kyi rten pa dmar ser gyi zho 'am/ mar khu
265a5(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ yang na chad dam/ zan la sogs pa gzhag nas/ lha'i rnal 'byor byas te gsol ba btab la/ tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pa la gtor ma sbyin te/ yang gi sol ba btab nas dngos grub gsol bar
265a6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs te bsgom zhing bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam zhig na du ba dang / dro ba dang / 'bar ba kun byung nas 'thungs sam/ zos na tshe ring ba dang / dbang che ba dang / rigs rgyas pa dang / na mkhar 'gro ba la sogs pa 'byung
265b1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ro// yang na bu 'dod pa gang la las gzungs 'di bris te/ gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ skor ba dang / mchod pa byed cing tshangs pa la sogs pa la
265b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang gtor ma sbyin te/ gsol ba btab na bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams kyi stobs kyang dpag tu med pa yang rnyed do// dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// /
265b3(rgyud 'grel): yang 'jigs pa las sgrol bar 'dod pas gzungs 'di bris te/ gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags la/ grong ngam grong khyer ram skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyi mchod pa dang bskor ba bya ste/ gsol ba btab
265b4(rgyud 'grel): nas tshangs pa la sogs pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma byin te/ gzungs 'di rgya 'am stong du bzlas brjod pa dang / bris te lus sam mgul du brtagaso nas rtag tu 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can yid la byed pa dang / gsol
265b5(rgyud 'grel): ba 'debs shing bzlas brjod byas na rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa la gsol pa dang / lha'i gdon la sogs pa dang / mdungs ze ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gdon thams cad kyis byas pa la sogs pa dang /
265b6(rgyud 'grel): nad dang rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs pa dang / rims thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i thabs rdzogs so// / ser ba bsrung ba 'dod pas/ 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar
266a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad byas te/ tha mar ser ba'i 'byung po mA ra ya ban d+ha ya nan bya ba bkod nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bkug cing bcings nas/ kham phor ram thong
266a2(rgyud 'grel): par bcug nas/ bsrung bar bya ba'i yul gyi phyogs mtshams bzhir dong gru gsum snga ma ltar mnan te/ de gzungs 'di bris te mchod cing skor ba byas nas gzhag pa dang / yungs kar la sngags 'bum la sogs
266a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzlas te gzhag pa dang / gzhan du yang bskor ba dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa laM gtor ma byin te/ gsol ba gdab pa dang / snang srid kyi lha 'dre dang / bar snang gi lha dang / gnod sbyin kunane dang / yul de'i lha dang /
266a4(rgyud 'grel): klu la sogs pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma tshim par byas nas gsol ba gdab bo// de nas gzungs la rtag tu mchod cing bzlas pa dang / skabs su mchod pa dang gtor mu btung zhing / sprin la sogs pa byung ba'i
266a5(rgyud 'grel): tshe bdag nyid lha'i nga rgyal byas te thams cad 'joms pa zlos shing yungs kar dang bcas pa na mkha' thams cad phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis gang bas 'joms par bsam mo// ser pa bsrung ba'i thabs rdzogs so//
266a6(rgyud 'grel): mdze la sogs pas bdag gi nad gso ba ni// dang po lho'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par byas la bsgrub bya 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo'i spyan sngar sems bskyed pa dang / skabs su 'gro bo bya ste/ gzungs bris nas
266b1(rgyud 'grel): gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ mchod bstor bya zhing mdun du gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor bar bsams te/ rtag tu khrus bya zhing bzlas brjod bya ba dang / thun
266b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su tshangs pa la sogs pa la gtor ma byon gsol ba gdab pa dang / gnod par byed pa la yang gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab par bya ba dang / gdugs dkar mo'i bsrung ba gdogs shing tha mar
266b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'joms pa yis bskrad cing gzir ba dang kun sngar bshad pa bzhin bya'o// de lta bu'i gang zag la ni dpag tshod bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun tshad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha 'gro ma dang / rims dang
266b4(rgyud 'grel): shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang zhes pa la sogs po gzhung gi phan yon de yang sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs so// rkyenu las gyur pa thams cad la/ phan yon ji
266b5(rgyud 'grel): ltar bshad pa bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nad gdug pa can gso ba'i thabs rdzogaso// / gtor ma btang bar 'dod pas snod gtsang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i nang du zan dang / khur ba dang / chan
266b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'bru'i tshogs dpe/ shing tog dang / rin po che'i tshogs dang / sman dang ldan par bya ste/ de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor pas a kA ros sbyangs te na mkha' mdzod kyis spel la/ bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor
267a1(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ de'i phyogs rnams su d+hIHlas pad+ma'i tshogs bskyed pa la/ phyogs bskyong ba bcu la sogs pa chos kyi bsrungs ma dang / khyad par du tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang legs ldan la
267a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang bar bya'o// yang 'byung po'i gtor ma gnyis pa la lha'i gdon la sogs pa dang / zas su mdangs za ba kun la sbyin+ni par bya'o// de yang lce rdo rjer bsam zhing sbu gus bdud rtsi thams cad
267a3(rgyud 'grel): ngoms shing tshim par bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga char bzhin 'byung bar bsam mo// de nas tha mar bzod par gsol te/ gsol ba btab nas yi ge brgya pa brjod do// thams cad gshegs so// de yang 'byung po'i
267a4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma ni mngal dang / khrag dang / zhag dang / sha dang rkang dang / btsas pa za ba la sogs pa la sbyin no// de yang 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / gzungs kyi lha'i gdon dang / bya ba nas zas su mngam za ba
267a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis sbyin no// gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA gau toSh+NI Sha saM tA ta pa tre nA ma/ a pa rA dzi ta d+ha ra NaM sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin ga shogs pa'i
267a6(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa zhes bya bI gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// mthong dang ma mthong la grol ba'i// gdugs dkar yum
267b1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal te/ bdag gzhan don de thob bya'i phyir// lo 'dab tsam zhig gsal bar bya/ de nas 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor paste/ gnas dben zhing yid dang mthun par dang por
267b2(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal dang mchod pa pashams nas khrus byas te/ lus dris byugs nas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ stan bde ba la gnas par bya'o// de ni sa rang gi snying kar zla ba'i steng oM dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od zer 'phro ba
267b3(rgyud 'grel): pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phagasu pa gdugs dkar mo can dmigs te/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa rim pa bzhin bya'o// de nas tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms te/ stong pa nyid du bsgom
267b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de nas stong pa nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khoru la gnas pa'i oM dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas 'gro ba'i don byas te/ tshur 'dus pa las gdugs dkar po oM gyis mtshan
267b5(rgyud 'grel): par gyur te/ de las 'od zer lha mo'i sku dang bcas pa spros pas 'jig rten thams cad du nang sdug bsngal thams cad dkrol te/ tshur 'dus pas 'phags pa gdugs dkar po can/ sku mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad
267b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis gdugs dkar 'dzin pa/ sprul pa'i dbu stong phyag stong mnga' ba la/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag steng mnga' ba chen mo// dbu la mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can// sa gsuM
268a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang kyis 'khor mang ya zhun bdag cag gzhan 'jigs pa thams cad las stob b+ha/ phyug rgyu'i tshogs kyis kun nas yongs su bskor te gnas phyur bsam mo// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams/
268a2(rgyud 'grel): n+da sa bArlab b+hu lha stsogs pa bya'o// de nas mdun zi na mkhar b+ha las ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang sems kyi 'byor po brgyan dang ldan pa bsgoms pa'i nang du/ seng+ge la sogs pa'i gdun rnams bskyed la/ spyan du
268a3(rgyud 'grel): bo ni/ snying ka'i oM kyi 'od kyi bskul te dmigs pa rnams mchod yon gyis bzhugs su gsol bar bsam mo// de yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor
268a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / sprul pa'i tshogs rnams gsal bar dmigs te/ gzhung las 'byung ba'i phyag dang / bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa'i tsho gas kyis mchod do// de nas gsol ba gdab ste bzlas pa ni bdag dang ye shes kyi
268a5(rgyud 'grel): kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzlas pa'i yi ge mu tig 'bru lta bur bsams te/ spros pa dang bsdu bas bzlas pa'i skyon sbyangs te bzlas par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
268a6(rgyud 'grel): bar dmigs shing sems can gyi don dran pas bzlas par bya'o// de nas ngal la mi gtong bar 'dod na/ bzlas pa yid kyis 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo la phul te/ bdag las kyi lha mos 'phags pa rnams la
268b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste/ bzod par gsol zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos nas gAshegs su gsol lo// de nas lus bsrung bar bya ste ldang bar bya'o// langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o//
268b2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo dran par bya'o// phyag 'tshal bar dmigs shing 'byung po'i khyu zlas sbyangs te bslabs pas/ bsgying ba dang 'khrul 'khor dang / bzlog pa dang sbyin steg dang / bgegs bzlog cing
268b3(rgyud 'grel): gzir ba dang / dmag dpung gzhom pa dang / dngos grub sgrub pa dang / 'jigs pa skyob po kun+da dang po'i phan yon nas 'byung ba ltar thams cad bya'o// bdag 'dra'i blo dman so so skye bo yis// 'phags pa'i tshogs pa
268b4(rgyud 'grel): mos pas chu yi thigs tsam bstod// de la swA skyes pa'i bsod nams gang byung ba// bdag dang sems can kun gyis kun mchog thob par shog/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar m+bo ts+tshin gyi sgrub thubs/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mas mdzad
268b5(rgyud 'grel): ba rdzogs so// / bar+t+ti tam hA dza na ny-id kyi rang 'gyur yin gsung // / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ta thA gu taiSh+NI Sha si twA ta pa tri nA mU d+ha ra Ni bi d+hI nA maHbod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin
268b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor nus pa chung gyur cing // bsdus pa la mos
269a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can la// tsan dra bdag gis legs bsdus te// gzungs kyi cho ga dgod par bya// dang por sngags pa dam tshig ldan// byang chub sems ldan rab spangs te// cho ga bsdus rgyas
269a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa yis// maN+Dal chag chag btab stengs su// dr-i yaM byug pa legs bsgos te// dang por dbus su pad+ma ni// 'dab brgyad ge sar bcas pa bri// de yi phyir ni bcu drug pa// bris te sgo ni gcig pa bya// ngo dbus
269a3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen khri stengasu// bum pa mtshan nyid ldan pa gzhag/ rgyan dang dri yis chus gang bya'o// de nas mchod dang gtor ma bsham// dang po byang chub sems bskyed la// bdun po rnam par dag pa yi// sngon 'gros lha mo bskyed
269a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de nas bzlas dang gtor ma dang // mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya// bum pa mya dmigs bruM las ni// rin chen las grub gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor cho ga nas gsungs pa// rim pas bskyed pa rdzogaso par
269a5(rgyud 'grel): // byin brlabs ye shes spyan drangs dbang // de rjes mchod pas mchod par bya// bsnod dang gsol gdang bzlas pabya/ par 'bris 'od kyis lha mchod la// tshur 'dus bdag gi sdig pa dag/ ngo bo chu la rnam pa lnga// yang na
269a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa'i rnam par bya// de nis legs ldan chen po la// gtor ma rgyas par byin nas ni// slob ma khrus byas stan la 'dug/ thun mong khyad par sdom pa kun// phog la lha la mcho de bstod bya// de nas thams cad 'joms pa
269b1(rgyud 'grel): yi// sngags kyis slob ma bsrung bskrad la// de nas bum pa'i chu yis ni// slob ma'i mgo nas blugs pa dang // bkra shis tshogs bcad brjod par bya// sdig sgrib dag ste rang gi ni// rigs kyis dbu la brgyan par bya// de
269b2(rgyud 'grel): nas me tog mchod pa dang // dbu rgyan la sogs byas de nas// rang gi 'dod don gsol ba gang ba// bla ma la ni yon phul la// rang gi dam tshig brjod par bye// brims dkyil 'khor la bsrung ba'i// dam tshig rgyas par bsgra/
269b3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// byur bsal la seDA rdzoT par bya// de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo yang // cho ga ltar bris gdags par bya// mdor bsdus maN+Dal 'dab brgyad pa// byas te gong ltar cho ga bya// shin tu bsdus la bum par ni// lha mo nyid
269b4(rgyud 'grel): sku rdzogs par ni// byas te smon la mo la sogs bya// de nas khrus sogs rgyas par bya// des ni phyi nang gnod pa dang // sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus// thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang las tshogs ma lus pa/
269b5(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang de las 'grub par 'gyur// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug gtor nas byung ba'i gdugase dkar mo can gyi cho ga'i man ngagu slob dpon tsan dra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
269b6(rgyud 'grel): tha ma zangs dkar ma che bas bsgyur ba'o// / snga mo gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor pa rims bsrung bar 'dod na/ dang po mchod pa dang gtor ma po rims kyi 'byung po tshim pa
270a1(rgyud 'grel): byas te// bden pa'i stobs kyis brjod pa dang gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas gdugs dkar mo'i gzungs bris te// bsgrub par bya ba'i dkyil 'khon+ti dbus su de gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor
270a2(rgyud 'grel): btags te/ mchod pa dang / gtor ma bsha maswA/ rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas twa/ thun bzhir bsgom bzlas bya'o// de yang nyin mtshan dus drug tu gdugs dkar mo 'khor dang bcas pa la gsol ba gdab pa dang / mchod
270a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod dang / bskor ba byas te bum pa'i chus bkru zhing bsrung ba yang gdagos por bya'o// dpal tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang mgon po la yang gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab bo// de nas bsgrub bya
270a4(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar mye'i skyon sngar phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / skor ba thun bzhir bya zhing / gdon gyi tshogs rnams la gtor ma b+hin+ya te gsol ba gdab bo// khyad par du rims kyi 'byung po la yang gtor ma byin te gsol
270a5(rgyud 'grel): ba gdab par bya'o// cho ga de lta bu dang ldan pas thun bzhir gzungs gdon par bya'o// tho mar yang 'phags pa la mchod pa dang / srung mo'i tshogs la gtor ma rgya chen po sbyino// rims bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//
270a6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo gdug so dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo// phyugs nad bsrung bar 'dod pas/ dang por gor gyi 'byung po la mchod pa dang gtor mas tshim par bya ste/ de nas bsgrib bya rnams la thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i sngags
270b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis bgegs bskrad cing gzir ba dang / bsrung ba'i 'khor lo btags te khrus bya ba dang / 'phags pa gdugs dkar po can bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas mthar mchod bstod byas te/ gor zhi ba'i gsol ba gdab
270b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / tshangs pa la sogasu pas mchod pa dang gtor mas tshim par byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de yang byar skabs su gdugs dkar mo dang srong ma'i tshogs la gsol ba gdab cing snyim pa sbyar te bsrung bar bya'o//
270b3(rgyud 'grel): khyad par du gor gyi 'byung po la 'byung gtor gyis mnyes par bya'o// de ltar thun bzhi'i sbyor bso rtag tu bsgoms pas mthur phyin pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pas mchod bstod byas to//
270b4(rgyud 'grel): phyugs de rnams gnas dben par gnas par bya'o// de lta bus ni gor thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gor bsrung ba'i cho ga slob dpon tsaun+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor pa zhi ba'i sbyin
270b5(rgyud 'grel): srog byed par 'dod pas/ dang por sa gzhi shin tu kha dog dkar ba dag pa la thab khung zlum po rgyar khru gang zabs su khru phyed pa/ kha khyer sor bzhi pa dang ldan par bya ste/ de la dri dkar pos byug pa dang / me tog dkor po/
270b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor bar bya'o// de yang dbus su pad+ma'i steng du rdo rjes mtshan pa bris te/ kha khyer yang rdo rjes bskor bar bya'o// de nas thab tu bud shing brtsigs pa dang / mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams te/ zhi ba'i rdzas til dang mar
271a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ku sha dang dur ba dang / nas dang gro dang dkar gsum mngar gsum la sogs pa bsags te rang nyid khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ stan bde ba la pad+ma'i 'dug stangs
271a2(rgyud 'grel): sam/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis kha shar du bltos te gnas par bya'o// de nas rang nyid sgrub thabs las 'byung ba lhur lha'i rnal 'byor byas / de nas man+ta shu n+ya twA dz+nyA nas/ thub dang rdzas rnams skyong par byis ti/ raM las
271a3(rgyud 'grel): thab khung 'bari ba'i gzhal yas khang du bsams te/ de'i dbus su seng ge nyi ma pud+ma'i steng du/ sngar bzhin du cho ga'i yan lag gsum gyis gdugs dka ra mi can 'khor dang bcas pa bskyed par bya'o// de nas
271a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa bsang zhing byin gyis brlabs nas mdun du ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ maMchod pa dang bstod pA byas la/ sreg rdzas rnams gdugs dkar mo'i snying pos bsreg par bya'o// rdzas de rnams re re la yang
271a5(rgyud 'grel): bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la 'bul lo// mthar yang mchod pas mnyes shing tshim par byas nas bzod par gsol te dge rtsar bsngos nas ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol la/ dam
271a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig pa rang la bsdu'o// de lta bu'i zhi ba'i cho ga yang nad dang gdon la sogs pa zhi bar gyur/ de srid kyi bar du bdun namo nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bya'o// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg slob dpon tsan dra go mi'i gling pas mdzad
271b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / lha mo gdugs dkar mo'i mngon spyod kyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas/ dang por sa bzhi yang gdug cing gas pa dang / rtsub pa la thab khung zur gsum ngos re la khru re yod pa la zabs su khru
271b2(rgyud 'grel): phyed pa bya ste/ dbus su 'khor lo la rdo rjes mtshan pa/ kha yang rdo rjes bskor ba/ sa bzhi yang dug dang khragra la sogs pa nag por byugs te/ me tog nag po dang 'bru nag pos gtor ro// de nas drag po'i mchod
271b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gtor ma bshams la/ drag po'i rdzas khrag dang dug dang / ling ga dang / ske tshe dang / rdzo phyi lcags phye/ zir ba'o nag pa/ sran ma nag po/ de ltar rdzas ba shams nas/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas la/
271b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang rdzas rnams stong par bsams te/ dzaM las thab khung gru gsum pa bskyed pa'i nang du/ cho ga gsum gyis gdugs dkar mo 'khor dang bcas pa drag po'i lhar bskyed par bya'o// de'i mdun gyi na mkha'
271b5(rgyud 'grel): la ye shes pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te bzhugasu gsol nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/ bsreg rdzas rnams yum gyi sngags kyi tha mar mA ra ya btags te/ khra ga dang dug la sogs pas lan bdun
271b6(rgyud 'grel): nas nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du dbul bar bya'o// de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la bzod par gsol ba la sogs rnams bya'o// de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs pa dang / dam tshig sems dpa'
272a1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas rang nyid la bsrung bar bya'o// de lta bu de yang gang zhig tshar mchod kyi bar du lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bya'o// mngon spyod kyi las slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa
272a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / de bzhin du sa gzhi ser po la rdzas rnams yang las dang / mthun pa bsags la// tha/ khung glu bzhi par rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byo'o// de bzhin dus gzhi dmar po la sogs pa
272a3(rgyud 'grel): las dang 'thun par rdzas bsags te/ thab khung zla ga ma byas te/ dbang gi sbyin sreg bya'o// srob dpon tsan dra go mi'i man ngag go/ sbyin sreg rdzogaso// / dngos grub sgrub pa'i sgo nas sri
272a4(rgyud 'grel): so ba ni/ bud med bu 'dod pa gang dag la la gzungs 'di bris te/ gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nus rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas de la mchod pa dang / skor ba bya zhing / tshangs pa dang
272a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang po la sogs pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de ltar byas na bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs la sogs pa yang rnyed par 'gyur ro// dngos grub sgrub pa'i sgo nas
272a6(rgyud 'grel): sri'u gso ba slob dpon tsan dra go mis mdzad po rdzogs// / rnal 'byor pas bzlog pa'i zor bya bar 'dod na/ dang por rdzas bsags pa ni/ kham pa'i mi mo'i gzugs bzhi 'am/ brgya da dam/ bcu
272b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas sgo nga dang / mda' 'ug pa ma skyer ba'i mde'u can bzhi dang / khrag phor bzhir dug dang zor gyi sna du ma blugs pa'i snod bzhi dang / dmar gtor cha bzhi dang / mchod pa rnam pa lnga ba sham mo// de rnams kyang glang
272b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor na bcu bcu ma 'byor na brgyad dam bzhi bsag pa ni/ de nas sngags mkhan bcu 'am brgyad ngam/ bzhi 'am/ tha mar rang gcig pus lus la khrag dang sol bas byugs te/ gos naka po bgos nas khros
272b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yid kyis gnas te/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ thun drug gum/ thun bzhir thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i sngags rings dang / 'byung po tshur gcod pa'i yungs dkar dang / tshel sngags te/ de rnams la
272b4(rgyud 'grel): gzer nas bar bar du nang gdon thams cad la byaM zhes bya bas gdab bo// de yang gdugs dkar mo can la thun bzhi 'am/ drug tu mchod bstod byas te byo ba dang / bzlog par gsol ba gdab pa dang / lha ma srin sde
272b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyang dang / yul lha'i gsol ba gdab par bsam mo// de ltar thun bzhi 'am drug tu bsngags pa de/ chos grangs dang / gza'i skar brtsis twa/ dus la bab pa na skyes bu sngags dang ldan pa 'am/ cho ga dang ldan
272b6(rgyud 'grel): nga bstsal te/ de lta bu yang rang ngam/ gzhan shin tu nyen che na/ nar mar byas pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad/ dgra dang bgegs bzlog par nges te/ byol sngags bzlas kyang 'gal ba med do// bzlog sde
273a1(rgyud 'grel): zor bya ba'i cho ga slob dpon tsan+d+ra gau ma~M s+ya mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ bi tI sA d+ha na bi d+hi k+Sha ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ mchod rten sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/
273a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// thun mtshams las dang dang po yi// gang zag dag gis bsgrub pa yi// mchod rte ni cho ga mdor bsdus pa// bla ma dam pa'i gdams pas dgod//
273a3(rgyud 'grel): dang po gnas khang byi dor byas// mchod pa la sogs bshams de nas// rang gi lha yi bskyed rims bsgom// de nas bden pa'i tshig 'di yis// sa yis bdug pos sa blang bya// bdag ni gzhan don bsgrub pa la//
273a4(rgyud 'grel): lha mos mchod rten sau brang gi/ dgyes pas bdag la stsal du gsol// zhes bya brkos te 'dag pa la// 'od kyis sbyangs te rin chen bsam// de nas 'bi 'bi legs byas te// mar gyis brkus la skor phyor stsal//
273a5(rgyud 'grel): leg bton lha mo rang du bas mi// de la mchod dang gsol ba gdab/ de nas thams cad bsgrub pa'i sngags// rtsa ba'i sngags nyid kho nas bya// de nas na bza' legs gsol la// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lo sogs
273a6(rgyud 'grel): kun// bstims te mchod bstod yi bya ste// rten 'brel sngags kyis brtan par bya// de nas mchod le gsol ba gdab// yon bdag la sogs smon lam gdab// de nas dge 'dun mchod ston bya// 'byung ba chu rlung
273b1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' dang // yid kyi bsgrub pa la sogs kun// bla ma'i gdams pa ldan pas gdab// de ltar mchod rten cho ga ni// mdor bsdus pa yi cho ga las// grub pas sems can ma lus pa// 'khor los sgyur
273b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal thob nas ni// rim gyis gtsug tor lha mo yi// zhal rdzogs par nI mthong bar sh+log/ mchod rten sgrub po'i cho ga'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mris mdzad pa rdzogs so//
273b3(rgyud 'grel): zangs dkaR+Sho tsa'i 'gyur ro// / rgya gar skad du/ uSh+NI Sha sI tA ta pa tre ho ma bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dAkA ra mo can sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ gu dugs dkar mo can la phyag
273b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// gzhan don mthar phyin lha mo ni// gdugs dkar can la phyag 'tshal te// lha rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// sbyin sreg gis ni tshim par bya// dri zhim po'i chus legs par khrus byas gos
273b5(rgyud 'grel): gsar pa dgos te/ rgyan khyad par can btags la bgegs bsrung po dang / bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o// de nas rgyud dag par bya ste/ phyag dang mchod pa la sogs rgyud dag par bya'o// brtsam du rung
273b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sa phyogs su phrin las dang sbyar te/ thabs dang rdzas la sogs pa rdzogs par byas la/ shing gang yin pa bcer te/ mchod pa dang bsrog rdzas tshogs pa dang / oM badz+ra dz+wa la ri zhes pas me sbar la/ de nas
274a1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa cud med par bsgoms te/ oM badz+ra dz+wA lA sarba d+harmA badz+rA sar+b+ba d+harma s+thA tsan+d+he zhes pa'i sgras stong kaR+Sha bsgom mo// de'i ngang las 'byung ba ri ra dang bcas pa'i steng du b+h+rUM las me thab gzhal yas
274a2(rgyud 'grel): du'o// der a dang zla re la sa bon gyi yi ge las 'od zur kha dog sna tshogs pa ldan pa 'phros shing 'dus pa lA me lda // ra po t+pan kun rdzogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa a ga tshoms sems 'aSh+NI2 // gsus pa che la 'bar
274a3(rgyud 'grel): can/ g.yas rdo rje dang bgrang phreng bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis skyibs sbyin dang / gun+d+he bsnams pa'o// thugs kan rI dmar po gru gsum gyis mchin pa'o// de nas de nyid dang 'dra ba'i ye shes mas dpa' spyan drangs te/
274a4(rgyud 'grel): don tshur gshig 'byung ba che// lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog/ sr-ig blugs zhal zes bi zhes slad du// 'phar ba'i nang du shegs su gsol// e hUM hi a ga na ye ma hA rA dza ka dza hUM 'byung ba chen po me yi lha// lha rgyal
274a5(rgyud 'grel): srong 'i byung ba'i mchog/ sgeg thugs zhal zas bzlas nas kyang / 'di nyid du ni bzhugs sdu ga s+ho// de nas yon chab kyi ste spyan drangs la/ bsang gtor byin te dbang bsgyur bar te'o// nas mchod pa dang phyug giso ma
274a6(rgyud 'grel): de/ mar gyi dgang blugs phul te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon skyob pa'i// gzi brjid chen po me yi lha// sku bcas sku ni dpal dang ldan// rnga ma brjid rgyan ldan las la dbang // sreg blugs phul bas las rnams bsgrub//
274b1(rgyud 'grel): wI la sogs pa'i lha dpal twe// ji ltar 'dod paSh+Ti las bsgrub pa// gzi brjid rgyal la phrag 'tshal bstod// bsang gtor phul la/ a ga na ye ha byA ka byA ba ha na yA/ a ti b+hU ti bya/ sarba pA paM shAn+ta taM ku ru zhes pa 'am/
274b2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra a ga na ye swA hA/ shing 'od la ni/ oM A ga na yai swA hA/ mar zhal du'o// AM sarba pA paM da hA na badz+rA ya swA hA/ ti la dang spangs dkar phyug du'o// sarba saM ba de/ zho dang 'byas chan phyag tu'o// oM pra ti ha tA
274b3(rgyud 'grel): sa ku zhi gtsug tu'o// badz+re A yuHShe dur ba gtsug tor du'o// me dI baM ga ya/ nas zhal du'o// mAh+ne g+hasmai raM/ gr-i zhal du'o// ma hA ba la/ sran ma zhal du'o// ma hA puSh+Ta ye/ 'bras so ba zhal du'o// ma hA shwA ya a ma /
274b4(rgyud 'grel): ti/ zhes bya bas/ dza ti pha la dang / stan+ma dang / bil bu rnams zhal du'o// rdzas thams cad me lha'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o// u dum bar la sogs ming dang thig ma tha mar brgyan te bsreg par bya'o// dri dang me
274b5(rgyud 'grel): tig dang spos dang / mar me dang mtsha dwe yi na rnams ni so sor dbul bIr bya'o// oM badz+ra a na la mad+h+ye b+hU tA dz+wa la yA sarba b+haskr-i ku ru sarba dr-iSh+TAnA ma ma hUM phaT/ shan ta~M ku ru swA d+hA/ mAM lha gzi brjid bstod pa'i dgang blug
274b6(rgyud 'grel): phul la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o// de nas me lha'i thugs kar dkyil 'khor ba 'am lha rnams dkor po la sogs par bskyed pa las 'od zer 'phros pa las ye shos kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/ de bzhin
275a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i gdung dang / rdo rje'i gdung dang / pad+ma'i gdung dang / glang po'i gdung dang / gzhon nu'i gdung dang klu'i gdung dang / 'dus pa'i gdung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma
275a2(rgyud 'grel): lus pa dang / rgyal ba'i rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ gtum chen skyobs chen 'byor ba mo// bgegs tshogs 'jims ma gshegs su gsol// bsing gtor phul te mchod yon gyi sman rnyings la spyugs dang
275a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas brtan par bya'o// de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa 'byung po'i rim pa brjod par bya'o// de nas gong ma bzhin du bgang blugs dang / sreg blugs dbul lo// oM sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Shi si tA tA pa tre hUM/ a mu
275a4(rgyud 'grel): ko shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying po 'am/ oM na mo b+ha gA ba ti uSh+NIShA yau gud d+he bi ra tsa bi ma le swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags sam/ rdzas so so'i sngags rnams kyi khyad par gyis dkyor bi 'am/ lha
275a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams tshom par bya ste sdig pa sreg pa'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o// de nas mchod pA dang / bstod pa byas la smon lam gdab bo// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas
275a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ ji ltar tshogaso ba'i mchod pa dang / sbyin sreg rnams kyis mchod pas/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrib pa gnyis byang nas/ tshogs gnyis rdzogs te/ 'di nyid du bla na med pa'i
275b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub chen po thob par gyur cig ces gsol ba btab la/ gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa la phrin las su gsol ba ni/ bdag dang yon gyi bdag po rnams la nad kyi rigs su gyur pa rlung dang
275b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang 'dus pa lus gyur pa thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig/ gdon gyi rigs su gyur pa gdon stong phrag brgyad cu las thar par mdzod cig/ 'phral gyi rkyen las gyur pa'i nad thams cad zhi
275b3(rgyud 'grel): b+hur mdzad du gsol// bzod par gsol ba ni bdag snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi sems rgyun du gyur pa sti yo byad mtshogs pa dang / bad ga lus dang po par gyur pas sems lnga dbang ma thob ste/ bying ba dang rgod pa'i dbang
275b4(rgyud 'grel): gis mig gi sel ba dang / cho ga nyams te lhag chad du gyur pa thams cad bzod pa chen po mdzod du gsol lo// de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs te/ rjes su 'thun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du
275b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs nas kyang // gtan du gshegs pa ma lags pas// slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol// muHgats+tsha zhes pas gAshegs su gsol lo// mjug me lha mchod pa dang / las sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste/
275b6(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa ni 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mchog gi sras// mi lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog gyur pa// ye shes mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad bsreg/ 'dzin byed me lha nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzi brjid
276a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa me yi lha// 'dod pa thams cad stsol mdzad pa// bdag gzhan don bsgrubs la bzhugs// tshangs pa'i sras la phyag 'tshal 'dud// de nas ye shes kyi me lha gshegs te//
276a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa me 'bar ba la bltas te/ oM ma ma hUM ni sarba dA ha nu badz+ra ya che ge mo shAnA taM ku ru swA hA/ zhes bya bas brgya 'am stong ngam khri 'am 'bum mam// ji srid nus pas sreg par bya'o// bdag gi cho ga'i rim
276a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'ongs// lhag pa'i lha rnams mnyes bya ste/ srid pa'i btson re ra nyam thag pa'o// 'gro kun skyid mtsho brgal bar sho ga/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gtu
276a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo can ma zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ slob dpon rdo rje rnon pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ uSh+NI ShA b+ha pA si tA pa tre bi d+hi nA maM/ bod skad du/ gtsug
276a5(rgyud 'grel): tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ rje btsun phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam snang mdzad rigs gtsug tor grags// phyag stong sbyin stong zhabs btud nas// gzungs kyi rim pa las
276a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'o// dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya// chu klung ngam/ nags tshil lam/ chu bo'i 'gral laH// cha bi'i 'gram mam/ ro'i sul lam/ phug gam/ yid dang mthun pa'i yul dben pa bas mtha'i dgon
276b1(rgyud 'grel): bar// slob dpon gtsug lag mkhas pa chos la dga' ba bslab pa bsrung ba 'gogs na bde ba/ snying rje can dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob pa dkyil 'khor la
276b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i las la mkhas pa rmi lam du rtags dang mtshan ma thob pa/ sgrub pa'i grogs po rigs btsun pa chos spyod pa dad pa tson snying stobs che zhing brtson 'grus can bsam pa bzang zhing mi skyo ba gzhan gyis
276b3(rgyud 'grel): brid kyang 'phags pa'i tshul mi gtong ba'i grogs dang / lhan cig tu/ stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ sgrub pa'i yan lagau ni rdzas me tog dkar po dri zhim pa dang / rtsa ba dang sdong bu la sogs pa sbyar ba'i spos dkar po dang /
276b4(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan dkar po'i dri dang / 'bras dkar gyi be shos dang / lug lnga sogs pa dkar ba las byung ba'i mar gyi mar me dang / 'bras yos dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / me tog dkar po dang ldan pa'i Ar+g+ha dang /
276b5(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor dkar mo'i nye ba'i snying po bzlas pa'i khrus byas la/ snying po sngags bzlas te/ stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dkar po bgos nas/ gtsug tor nas byung ba bzhin tshogs sogs pa'i lha mdun
276b6(rgyud 'grel): duspyan drangs la/ bdun rnam dag byas te/ gtsug tor nas byung ba bzhin du khro mo bcu bdun bsgoms la sngags bcu gsum brjod nas thugs ka'i 'od zer las ra ba dang dra ba dang / bla re dang me 'od rnams byu /
277a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar byasam byar bya'o// de nas rang gi snying gar yi ge hUM bkod nas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o// de nas dbyangs yig bcu drug las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
277a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed la de'i steng du yi ge hUM bsam mo// de yongs su gyur pa lus rdo rje dkar po rtse dgu pa bsam myo// de nas 'od zer s+pha ra Na hUM zhes pas spro ba dang / saM hA ra Na hU~M zhes pas bsdus nas+ya/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das
277a3(rgyud 'grel): bya kau ni rdo rje rdo rje dang zhags pa bsnams pa/ daglegs kyi rgyal po d+hIn+de laM ke gdun du gting ba/ sku mdog ston+de po sangs rgyas lnga'i rkyod pan tsA na~M/ rdo rje'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa// mo'i phung po'i dbus na bzhugs pa bsams
277a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ de'i snying ga nas nye ba'i snying po'i sngags brjod pas shar la sogs pa'i khro mo brgyad sprul paM hUM druM hriHSh+T+r-i gyis bdag dang khro mo brgyad byin gyis brlabs la snying po dang nye ba'i snying po bzlas nas/ de'i mdun du gdug/
277a5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad tshar gcod pa'i dkyil 'khor dbu stong mnga' ba/ phyag stong mnga' ba// spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can 'grel pa nas 'byung ba bzhin bsgoms la/ mchod pas
277a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang gtsug tor dkar mo'i gzungs kyis bstod pa dang / bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad bsrung du gsol zhes phrin las bcol la// snying po'i dkyil 'khor phyogs skyong ba bcus bskor bar
277b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams la/ gtor ma bcu dbul ba dang / gdon thams cad la gtor ma gsum mkha' spyod dang / sa spyod dang sa 'og na spyod pa'i dbye bas phye ba la mchod pa phul nas gzungs nas 'byung ba bzhin du phrin las
277b2(rgyud 'grel): bcol la gshegs su gsol bar bsam par bya'o// de nas nye ba'i snying po'i 'khrul 'a khor khros la rgyal rigs la sogs pa la gdog so// yang na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/
277b3(rgyud 'grel): glong rdal gyi sgor btsugs te/ klog pa bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhug pa mchod pa chen po byas la sbyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad byu ba 'am/ yang na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas grong ngam/ grong rdal la skor bar bya'o//
277b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di thams cad la snying po dang nye ba'i snying po 'bum sngon du bzlas te/ gzungs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas kyu tshon dkar pos dkyil 'khor bris te/ mchod nas las thams cad shes par bya'o// gtsug tor nos byung ba
277b5(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar mo can rtsi gzungs 'don pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon shu raM ga bar+N+Na badz+ra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// / zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// / gtsug tor
277b6(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar mo la bstod pa/ srid gsum ston pa lha yi lha// mtshungs mod bde gshegs shAkya seng+ga yi// mthon mthing g.yas su 'khyil pa'i spyi gtsug nas// ya motshan rmad byung lha mo khro rgyal gtso// kham
278a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum dag na khyod 'dra'i mgon med de// thugs rje'i dbang phyug bkra shis mchog gi lha// sku mdog gangs ri'i rtse la nyi shar 'dra// zhal mang stong la spyan mang bye ba brgya// srid pa'i btson rar
278a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can nyam thag pa// dus gsum gzigs nas sems can grol mdzad de// zhal stong phyag stong spyan stong rnams kyis ni// kun la khyab mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud dang bgegs rigs phas kyi/
278a3(rgyud 'grel): rgol ba rnams// spyan mang gzigs kyis khro gnyer 'gal ston pas// gnod pa'i rgyun rnams gtan nas 'joms mdzad pa// rgol ba tshararo gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma rig nor pas bslus pa'i sems can
278a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams// rang gi las nyid rnam par smin pa yi// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i rims nad mi bzad pa// zhi mdzad thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod// ji ltar khyod kyis sems can mang po la// thugs rje mchog gis 'gro don nyer
278a5(rgyud 'grel): bzung nas// srid gsum 'jigs pa che las bsgral gyur cing // sdug bsngal mang po'i nad las thar mdzad ltar// bdag kyang khyod bzhin 'gro ba'i mgon gyur te// sems can klu yi zhags pas zin pa dang // nad kyi
278a6(rgyud 'grel): bskal pas nyon pa'i saum+ba nA la// sdug bsngal sel ba'i skyabs su de gyur cig/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar can la bstod pa rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tra
278b1(rgyud 'grel): ta pa tre nA ma a pa rA dzaM tA u pa de sha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i nye bar bshad pa/ bcom ldan
278b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das gdugs dkar po can la phyag 'tshal lo// snying rje chen pos sems bskyed de/ maN+Dal legs par byugs te thig le dang me tog gi tshom bu bkram nas spyan drangs pa dang / mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas legs pa
278b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma sbron par bya'o// de nas maN+Dal la a las zla bo la oM bsams la/ 'od kyis spro ba dang / bsdu ba byas pa las bcom ldan 'das mo gdugs dkar mo zhal gsum ma/ zhal gsum la
278b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum gsum yod pa'o// sngo ba dang dmar ba ni g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal la'o// rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas kyi dang po na gdugs dkar po// gnyis pa na 'khor lo/ gsum pa na
278b5(rgyud 'grel): lcogs kyu'o// bzhi pa na gzhu'o// g.yon dang po na rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// gnyis pa na rdo rje dkar po'o// gsum po na mda'o// bzhi pa na zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sngags mdzub ni g.yon na'o// khros pa'i stangs
278b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas ma rungs pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'o// 'od zer lcags kyu dang 'dra bas ye shes kyi lha dgug pa gzhug pa dang bcing ba dbang du bya'o// dbang du bskur ba la bai ro tsa na'o// phyag dang mchod pa byas
279a1(rgyud 'grel): nas mngon du byas te dmigs pa bcu bzhis bklag par bya'o// legs pa dang ldan pa la gzungs kyi bstod pa bya'o// yang na mdun du dmigs te bstan pa ltar kun yid kyis bya ba yin no// dmigs
279a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bcu bzhi ni phyag gi dmigs pa dang / thams cad bzlog pa dang / ri khrod lo ma tsan nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / bdag bsrung ba dang bcom ldan 'das ma'i tsho ba dang / 'jigs pa brgyad bzlog pa dang / gdon chen po nya
279a3(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa bzhi bzlog pa dang / rig sngags gcod pa dang / ma mo brgyad dang / dam tshig can bcu bzhi'i sngags dang / thams cad bzlog pa dang / nad thams cad bsrung ba dang / thams cad bzlog pa dang / lus la gdags
279a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / 'di dang phyi mar phun sum tshogs pa dang / bu srid dang g.yul zhi ba dang / khyad par du bdag bsrung ba dang / char dbab pa'o// gshegs pa dang bsdu ba byas te/ ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o// 'phags pa
279a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin ga shigs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po n+dan gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i nye bar bshad pa bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / boN+Di ta chen po de nyidang
279a6(rgyud 'grel): lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ si tA ta pa tre a pa rA dzi ta nA ma maN+Da la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
279b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo tsA la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tAn kun gyi gzhir gyur pa// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor las byung ba// sprul pa'i rang bzhin lha mo ni// sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra// phyag
279b2(rgyud 'grel): sto nga spyan stong brgya phrag stong // lha rdzas gos kyis yang dag brgyan// bkra shis che ba'i lha mo la// de la bstod de sgrub thabs bri// kun la phan gdags rim pa yi// gdugs dkar dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis wa~M//
279b3(rgyud 'grel): yid kyi rnam pa bkod pa yis// bshad kyis nyon mongs ma dad min// yid dga' ba yi gnas dag tu// sgrub pa dam tshi ke grogs bcas kyis// sa phyogs der ni bsham pa dang // bsag pa bum pa la sogs pa/
279b4(rgyud 'grel): nub dang sbyar yin de las gzhan// rigs dang mi rigs tshogs par bya// snying rje chen po rab dmyigs pas// sems bskyed sngon du stong ba yis// skad cig sku yis phyogs dang mtshams// bsrung dang sngags dang phyag
279b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas so// snying gar zla stengs yi ge yi// 'od kyi drang dang sprul nas no// bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs pa dang // snyan tshig bdag gi bstod pa dang // phyag 'tshal sngon du song ba yis// sems bskyed sdom pa bzung
279b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bsgyur// lha rnams bsdus pas lus bsregs te// rang bzhin lus su blta bar bya// gnas su oM bsal 'gro ba sbyang // sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs pa dang // 'khor lo ma lus rdzogs par bya// dkar mo
280a1(rgyud 'grel): chen mo phyag stong ma// dbu stong spyan drangs brgya phrag stong // lha yi rgyan dang chas rdzogs pa// bkra shis che'i lha mo'o// phyogs ni shar lho nub byang du// drag shul chen mo rab gtum
280a2(rgyud 'grel): mo// 'bar ba chen mo stobs chen mo// blta dkar ser dang dmar ljang mo// g.yas g.yon mthun par phyag rgya ni// rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten dang // bum pa bzung bas 'gying ba yi// nyi zla gdan bzhugs bsam
280a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de yid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// shar phyogs 'khor lo rnam bzhi la// gos dkar mo dang khro gnyer can// phreng ba'i pad+ma rdo rje ma// snum phreng ba ut+pa la'o// sngo bsangs ljang gu dmar mo'o// lho yi
280a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi 'khor lor ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub sgrog can mo// mchod mo gzi brjid chen mon// dkar dang ser na gu ljang gum// rdo rje rin chen dbyug pa ste// spos dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud// nub tu stobs chen su gu rgyud// rdo rje rig
280a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin rigs gser 'phreng // dmar dang ser dang dkar ljang ma// rdo rje dang ni bgrang phreng bsnams// byang du rdo rje rinA tshonA ma// gtsug to ra bsgyings maM gser can me// dmar myo dkar dang ljang gu saur// sna tshogs
280a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bgrang phreng can// sgrol ma dkar mo na mkha' la// bsgyings pa skyabs spyan bsam pir bya// pad+ma'o spyan ni 'od du bas maM// dkar mo rdo rje skyil krung bcas// lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyang // yod tsam
280b1(rgyud 'grel): khros nas gtso la gzigs// sgo ma mtshams kyi lha mo ni// dkyil 'khor kun+da nas rab tu gsal// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams dang // me yi mtsham su gnas par bya// thams cad pa ni rdzogs pa ru// blo
280b2(rgyud 'grel): dudang ldan pas bsgom par bya// gtso mo'i thugs kar sa bon las// de lta bu nyid bskyed pa yi// sa bon 'od kyis 'gro ba sbyang // de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang // mdzad pa ma lus mthar phyin bya// ye gas
280b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' spyan drangs l-i// mnyes dang tha dad med par bya// yi ge gsum gyis byi ni brlabs te// ma 'dres rab bsal bsgom par bya// gtso mo chang gis mchod pa dang // phyag sogs rdzogaso nas bya ba ni//
280b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa kun la sbyar bur bya// gal te slob ma dbang bskur no// skyon bzhin du ni bsgom par bya// bum pa sbyang byas zla la oM// spro bsdu lha mo bskyed pa dang // dgug pa byas nas mchod sogs bya// de nas legs ldan
280b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang // bsgo dang las bcol de nas ni// sngon du lung de bklag par bya// bdun nam 'bum mamo grangs med pa'o// legs ldan gzungs kyi bstod pa dang // mchod pas bsgo ba thams cad byed// lha myo 'odi
280b6(rgyud 'grel): gu bdud rtsi yis// khrus dang bkra shis brjod par bya'o// dbus bzhag phyogs rnams bcings pa dang // skud pa lnga yi dra ba yis// tshon gyis bcad de dkri ba dang // ris pa 'am bong ba rdo ba la// dkris nas gtor te
281a1(rgyud 'grel): byung bsal bya// de nas gtor ma byas nas ni// bsrung ba lus sam mgul du gdags// bcings pa lus las dkri ba dang // phor bu bton nas gdab par bya// glo ga 'am ras sam shing shun
281a2(rgyud 'grel): la// gur kum dri zhim 'on bu yis// skur ma rgyal la bab pa na// sngags pas bri bya rdzogs nas ni// btags pa tsam gyis bshad pa yi// gnod pa ma lus pA las thar// dad ljon 'di ru dbang bskur ba// bu 'dod yi
281a3(rgyud 'grel): dum btsos tsam gyis// rnyed de tshe dang bsod nams 'phel// bde ba can du nye bar 'gro// rgyal la bri ba rdzogs nas ni// rgyal mtshan rtse la btags nas ni// rim gro chen po bcugs byas na// mI nad la saM gAs zlog par
281a4(rgyud 'grel): byed// de ni char 'bab nad med pa// klu rnams kyis ni byin gyis rlog// 'di dag byA bya kun la ni// mchod dang gtor nas legs ldan mya chod// mkhas pa rnams kyis bzong po dang // dge bas sku gnyis rdzogs pa
281a5(rgyud 'grel): sho ga/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor na chung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi cho go'i rima~M pa/ slob dpon g+h+r-i ri wa tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / r+m+ma gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga tA toSh+NI Sha si tA
281a6(rgyud 'grel): ta pa tre nA ma a pe ra sA d+ha d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong
281b1(rgyud 'grel): dge tshul dge bsnyen dang // rnal 'byor bde bzhi'i tshul ldan pas// sa gzhi bkra shis yid 'ong bar// maN+Dal ba yi rnam lngas byugs// sa yi cho ga legs byas la// thig ni rab tu gdab par bya// 'khor lo rtsibs
281b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi rtsobs bcu ba// rdo rje'i phreng bas gru chad dang // sA ma bu dang ni gru bzhir bya// pad+ma sna tshogs phreng ba dang // rdo rje phreng bas bskor bar bya// tsan dan shug pa l+ya sogs pa// zhi dang rgyas pa'i shing rnams la// gtsug
281b3(rgyud 'grel): tor rgyal mtshan ldan pa bcu dgu bya/ de la sngags rnams nI legs par+Na bri// tad+yaM thA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ oM Sh+TaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha bdag la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM hUM Sh+To ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bdag la rok+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT
281b4(rgyud 'grel): swA hA// oM rat+na ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha ai nau a ba lo ki te/ marta ni te dzo rak+ShaM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM pad+ma dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+he kA d+hu ra d+ha ra/ byAM dra ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+taM/ bin+d+ha bIn+d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT sU hA/ oM karma sarba ta thA
281b5(rgyud 'grel): be tauSh+NI Sha si tI ta pa tre hUM phaT swA hA/ rigs lnga'i gtsug twor+ya ro// tar+ya thA/ A na l-i a na le/ kha sa me kha sa ma/ be ra be ra/ so me sau ma/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha/ oM d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hoSh+NI twe sarbi te thA gA doSh+NI Sha si twA ta pra tre hUM phaT swA
281b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM ma mi hUM ni sAM hA/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo'i'o// oM ri Shi ga Na pra shaste sarba ta thA gA toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hAM druM/ dze b+ha na ka ri hUM druM/ staM b+ha ni ka rA hUM druM/ ma hA bid+yA saM b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hAM dr-I/ pa raM bing+ga se b+haMk+Sha Na
282a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM druM/ sarba duSh+TA nA na s+yAm b+ha na ka rI hUM d+h+waM/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa gra hA NAM/ b+hi d+ha na sA na ka rI hUM druM/ tsa tur shI tI nA na gra h+ya sa ha srA NA ma bi d+hA na sA na kA rI hUM d+h+waM/ aSh+Ta gI shu tI nAn/ nak+Sha t+yA NA m+b+ha/
282a2(rgyud 'grel): pra sA d+ha na ka ri hUM d+h+waM/ adz+dza nA~M ma hA gra hAdz+dzi/ bi d+h+wa na sa nA kA rI b+h+yo r-I/ pad+ma 'dab brgyad gdan stengs su// rim bzhin gtsug tor bzhi gi suM gsol// gru cheng mchod pa'i lha mo bzhin// sgo bzhi sgo be phur bu bzhi// rig
282a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags phreng bas bskor te gzugs// sgo bzhir raMl gri me ling dang // bum pa mnga' dang rim bzhin brgyan// kha tog lnga yi rgyan rnams dang // yungs dkar la sogs 'bru lnga bkod// de nas rig sngags gcod cing mtshams/
282a4(rgyud 'grel): bcad de/ yan lag bdun pa'i smon lam+ba gdab// phyogs bcu'i bde ga shre Da thaMd la// bdag la dbang bskur sngon lam gdab// gnang ba thob nas sngags 'di brjod// oM mat+ta shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/
282a5(rgyud 'grel): de yis thams cad stong pa'i ngang // a yi 'od zer 'pho 'du hUM// de las yi ge 'bru gsum 'phros// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// raM gyis bsregs te yuM gyis gtor// khaM gyis bkrus la dag par byas// de nas
282a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bra lnga 'di 'phros te// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chags// khaM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i dbus// laM lis gser gyi sa gzhi chags// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor 'phros// 'byung ba lnga yi 'phro 'du las// rin chen
282b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs ri rab ste// b+h+rUM las sna tshogs gzhal yAs khang // A bzhi sde bzhi sgo khyung ldan// sna tshogs rnga rdzu pad+mas bskor/ dbus sa b+h+rUM las 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bzhi rtsibs bcu nyi zla'i bar// baM lAs pad+ma 'dal
282b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad de// ge sar dbus su bsamA pa ni// rigs kyi gtsug ter lnga rnams dang // phyogs bcu'i gtsu ga te ri bcu rnams dang / zhig tsug dor chen po bzhi// thams cad yi ge b+h+rU~M las bskyed// sems can sangs
282b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi// yid kyi rang bzhin na mkha' ste// gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// phyi nang snod bcu 'jig rten khams// 'byung lnga ye shes lnga rang bzhin// thams cad stong gi sa la rang bzhin med// de las
282b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phros zla ba'i gdan// de yi dkyil du yi ge a// de dag 'phros shing 'dus pa las// thams cad par pug seg shang gis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste// slar 'dus bcom ldan rA shAkya thub//
282b5(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog gser 'od 'bar ba la// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan// gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu ste// thugs ni ye shes lnga dang ldan// de 'dra bde ba ga shegs pa
282b6(rgyud 'grel): sUs// na mkha' bar snangs gzhi rnams// til gang bzhin du gang bar bsgom// de dag dbu'i gtsug tor las// b+h+rUM las gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo// zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhi ba'i tshul// rin chen sna tsho
283a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyis brgyan// dang po phreng ba rgyal mtshan bsnams// 'og ma skyabs sbyin mnyam gzhug can// thugs kAr bde gshegs gtsug tor ni// sku mdog skyer po dbu rgyan 'khor lo bsnams
283a2(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs rdo rje gtsug tor ni// sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dril bu bsnams// lho phyogs rin chen gotsug tor ni// sku mdog sngo skya rin chen nor bu bsnams// nub phyogs chos kyi gtsug tor ni// sku mdog dmar skya pad+ma
283a3(rgyud 'grel): bum pa bsnams// byang phyogs las kyi gtsug tor ni// sku mdog ljang ser rgya gram lcags kyu bsnams// de lnga thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// b+h+rUM lis gtsugI tor chen po bcu// dkAr sngo dmar ljang mthing gu dang // sna
283a4(rgyud 'grel): skya dmar nag kha dog bcu// rin chen sna tshogs rgyun gyis brgyan// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis la// g.yas bya gtsug tor g.yon bum pa// re re 'khor yang bcu bcus bskor// 'khor lho pad+ma'i lte dbus nas//
283a5(rgyud 'grel): brjid pa'i tshul du mnyam gnas te// phyigasu rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// dbang bskur+ya yi ge thig le bkod// oM AHhUM swA hA/ spyi bo lce dang snying ga dang // lte gAs dra ba'i gnas rnams gsol// sku gsung thug
283a6(rgyud 'grel): dang yan tan phrini las lngas// byin gyis brlobs pa'i cho 'phrul lo// oM hUM traM hri ha/ spyi bo rna ba g.yas g.yon dang // lhag pa dpral ba dag tu dgod// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma rgya gram phyag mtshan sogaso//
283b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bdag pos dbang bskur ba'i cho 'phrul lo// rdzogs pa'i sku mchog thugs ka nas/ gsang ba'i yi ge 'bru bzhi 'phyos// dzaHhUM baM hoHlcags kyu zhugs pa lcags sgrog dril// tshad med sgo ba chen mo bzhi/
283b2(rgyud 'grel): byams pa snying rje dga' bu btang snyoms so// d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ke/ gno d+he mchod pa'i lha mo bzhis// bde gshegs kun la mchod par dmigs// byams pa'i lha mos bdug pa 'bul// snying rje'i lha mos me tog
283b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bul// dga' ba'i lha mos mar mi 'bul// be tang snyoms lha mos byug pa 'bul// so so sku mchog tshim nas kyang // bskul dron byas nas 'od zer 'dus// lha mo de dag thams cad kyi// mig dang rna ba sA lce lus// 'dod/
283b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha mo lnga 'phros te// gzugs s+thA dr-i dang ro reg bya// gzugs kyi lha mo sa spyan la mchod// sgra yI lha mo ste stanA la mchod// dri yaM lha mos shangs la mchod// ro yi lha mos ljags la mchod// reg bya'o lha mos sku la
283b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod// thams cad 'phros te bdag la thim// gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa'i cho 'phrul lo// de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du spyan drang ba ni/ phyogs bcu rab 'byams 'jig rten na// rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor
283b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas// gtsug tor chen po 'khor bcas rnams// dkyil 'khor gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hau/ sa ma yaM s+t+waM/ br-idz+nyA pA ra mi sarba ta thA g+hoSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa traM hUM/ rgyal ba
284a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas rgyur gshegs gdun mya bzhugs// rin chen stegasna dang seng ge'i khaM// ny+dzi D+hA prAd+hA brtsegs pa'i gdan// ma nyams tshul khrims brten pa'i gnas 'dir bzhugs// pUd+d+ha sa ma
284a2(rgyud 'grel): sas+t+waM/ srid gsum ston pa mi dang lha yi lha// bcom ldan mgon po shAH seng+ge sris// mthon mthing g.yas su 'khyil pa'i sgo gtsug na// ya mtshan rmad byung gtsug tor gdugs dkar skya// srid gsum 'dren pa khyod
284a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// de nas rnam lnga rim bzhin 'bul// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa yi// dbu rgyan rin chen gtsug tor las// thugs rjes sprul pa'i gtsug tor gdugs dkar sku// zhal gci ga mche gtsigs ye shes sdang mig
284a4(rgyud 'grel): rkyen// phyag bzhi rigs bzhi nyon mongs bdud bzhi 'joms// rang bzhin rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes dbu stong kha dog cir yang gsal// phyag ni 'bum phrag sprul pa'i phyag mtshan bsnams// thugs rje
284a5(rgyud 'grel): go cha cis kyang mi thub bsal// 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags thugs rje nyi ma ltor// thugs rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer kun la khyab// rig sngags drag po phra men tshogs 'joms shing // log 'dren bgegs kyi tshogs rnams
284a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dul mdzad pa// log pa'i skyon rnams sel la phyag 'tshal bstod/ shAkya thub pa ljags kyi dkyil 'khor to// nyi zla pad+ma'i lte dbus su// b+h+rUM las 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad pa// gsang sngags 'dis ni legs par
284b1(rgyud 'grel): bskor// bsnyen pa 'bum phrag drug bya'o// tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ bi Sha dwe bi Sha de/ bI re bi re/ badz+ra d+ha ra Ni/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ badz+ra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT paT swA hA/ hUM druM ban+d+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon
284b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod rnams// gsang sngags 'dis no 'grub par gsungs// sngags re yungs kur re re sprul// bcad dam bskrad nas phur bus ba rdeg/ rlon chen lnga sogs bum pa la// khri bi'i lha rnams bsgom byas te// khrus kyi
284b3(rgyud 'grel): tshi ga legs par bya// gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te// shar phyogros sgo nas phyag 'tshal bshags// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tsho lo// dge 'dun
284b4(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bya ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// bcom ldan 'ad
284b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pa la bsung gi tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
284b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
285a1(rgyud 'grel): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
285a2(rgyud 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la
285a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi b+ha bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
285a4(rgyud 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs de la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal/
285a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la
285a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tsho lo// nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+mo'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i gdung la phyag
285b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
285b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i drong srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang // phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'dzin grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tsha
285b3(rgyud 'grel): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan gcig pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pu l+ya
285b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan nag po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jigs par byed po dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bum pa rgyan ldan lnga rnams la// gtso bo
285b5(rgyud 'grel): stsogs rnams legs brjod cing // brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya// dbang bskur bsgreng po'i tshig 'di brjod// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshigs pa'i gtsug tor nAs byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyi
285b6(rgyud 'grel): mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa chen mos/ dus thams cad du bdag la dbang bskur cing byin gyis brlab tu gsol// oM dus gsum bde gshegs sprul pa'i sku// gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che// gtum pa chen mo
286a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs chen mo// 'bar ba chen mo gzi baN+Did che// dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo// 'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo// 'phags ma sgrol mkhro gnyer can// rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags//
286a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshon// gzhan gyis maM thub phreng ba can// rdo rje'i mkhar rnams 'joms pa mo// drag po'i lha rnams thams cad kyis// bdag la bsrung bar mdzad du gsol// zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod
286a3(rgyud 'grel): pa// gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can// 'phags pa sgrol ma stobs chen mo// rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang // rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin ma// lag nu rdo rje rigs gser 'phreng // le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma// snang
286a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags// rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang // gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma// rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang // pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang // phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis/ bdag la
286a5(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar+ya mdzad du gsol// de nas phyogs bcu'i gtsug tor rnams kyis dbang bskor// gsang sngags brjod/ oM rI Shi gA Na pra shas+t+r-i ya// ta thA ga toSh+NI Sho si tA ta pra tre hU draM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ phyi ma gong gis
286a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dre/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can/ rdo rje gtsug tor phyir bzlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong ma nga' ba chen mo// dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba
286b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya stong mnga' bya/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen pos gsum kyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa// kun nas bdag la bsrung du gsol// 'jigs pa chen po nyi shu las bsrung
286b2(rgyud 'grel): du gsol// gdon nyi shu rtsa gcig las bdag rgyal bar mdzad du gsol/ sha za'i gdon sum cu rtsa gcig las bdag bsrung du gsol// gdon de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad do// phur bus
286b3(rgyud 'grel): gdab bo// kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// phur bus gdab po// mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad ngo // phur bus gdab po// phyugs bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig
286b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags bcad do// pu ra bus gdab po// sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags bcang ngo // phur bus gdab bo// na mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i reg sngags bcang ngo // phur bus gdab po//
286b5(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// phur bus gdab po// mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// phur bus gdab pa/ rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir
286b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa dang / don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// phur bus gdab paM/ sring mo bzhes byas pa'i rig sngags bcad// phur bus gdab bo// b+h+r-ing gi r-i ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi
287a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag po dang / lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// phur bus gdab po/ dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags bcud do// phur bus gdab po/ dgra bcom pas
287a2(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i rig sngags bcud do// phur bus gdab bo// 'dod chags dang brel bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do//
287a3(rgyud 'grel): phur bus gdab bo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la bsrung du gsol// bsrung du gsol lo// oM a si tA na
287a4(rgyud 'grel): lArka dr-i b+ha phu Ta bi ka si twa tA pa tri/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ kha da khA dra/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi dA ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin da b+hin da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ he he phaT/ ha~M ho phaT/ a mo g+ha ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ya phaT/
287a5(rgyud 'grel): ba r+ya pra dwA phaT/ a su ra bi rU ba Na ka ra ya phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA gai b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ru te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru DaM b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+d+ha be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin+ma na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba
287a6(rgyud 'grel): ma ho rA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rak+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pra te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+haN+De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pu ta ka Ta ne b+h+yAMHphaTo/ sarba un ma de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a
287b1(rgyud 'grel): b+huSh+ka re b+h+yaHTa/ sarba ostA rA ge d+h+yA phaT/ sar+b+bA dur wa ka te Sh+TAHyaH/ sarba du b+huT+Ti te b+h+yA phaT/ sarbad+hA r+ye b+hUd+d+ha ya/ sarba kr-i d+ha kar+m+ma N+Da ka khoR+Sha dwe kA raN/ D+ha tA tsat+ta pra shrA krA d+hAts+tshad+hA tA dur b+hag te b+hUHpanra/ s+yAr+d+ha/
287b2(rgyud 'grel): trin+bi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sar+b+bA shra ma Nai b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+hA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza yA ka ra ma d+hu kA ra saurba an+ma s+yA d+hA tAM Sh+Tu bi d+hA tsa ye b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa dur b+h+yo b+hU gI ni d+h+yAHphaT/ sArba ku mA ri bid tr-i pI ni ye b+h+yaHphAT/ mA hA pra t+yaM gi
287b3(rgyud 'grel): r+ye b+h+yaHpheMT/ dz+nyA shAM ku la prA t+yaM gi rA rA dza ye phaT/ mad+h+r-i kU lA ya mA trI gu Na na mau s+thi ta ye phaT/ baiSh+TaM b+hI yau phaTe/ drAd+hA Ni ye phaT/ ai naM ne yai phaT/ mA d+da kA lI yai phAT+Te/ ka li dar+t+ti yAM swA hAM/ en dwi ye phaT/
287b4(rgyud 'grel): r-iri d+h+r-i ye phaT/ kau ma rI ye phaT/ bA rA hI yai phaT/ tsA muN DI ye phaT/ rA tri ye phuT/ kA la rA tri ye phaT/ yaM me daN+Di ye phaT/ ka pA li ye phaT/ a ti muka tish+tse shI ba si nI ye phaT/ dkyil 'khor lho yI snum bu
287b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa rnam lnga brgya rtsa brgyud// phyogs bzhir nyi shu lnga lnga dgod// sgo khyud snam bu ljang gu'i steng // drug po'i dug shing sna tshogs la// phur pi tshad ldan brgya rtsa brgyad// lnga bcu rtsa drug rig sngam
287b6(rgyud 'grel): bri// phyogs rer nyi shu rtsa lnga dgong // byed ma'i phyogs bcu gdon rnams kyi// gzugs ming gro gaM la bris te// phyag rgya bzhis ni bkug bcug nas// phur bus gdab cing sngags kyis gdab//
288a1(rgyud 'grel): bskul tshig bcas pa'i bzlas pa ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya// 'jigs pa thams cad bzlog 'dod pas// yul phyogs bcas pa'i ming rus bris// cho ga bzhin du phur bus gdag/ bud med gang
288a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig pu 'dod pas// drag cing gtsang mar khrus byas nas// zhi bu'i rgyan dang ldan par bya// gtsug tor snying po 'bum phrag brjod// byis pa'i gdon rnams phur bus gdab// yul dang grong khyer bsrung 'dod pas// phyogs bcu'i pad+ma
288a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dab brgyad steng // phyogs bcu gtsug tor bzhengs su gsol// mchod pa'i cho ga bcu bcu bya// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod// grong khyer gtso bo badz+ran/ tsug []9yi kyor chen po rgyas par bya// gzungs kyang 'bum
288a4(rgyud 'grel): tshar gdon par bya// de ltar lan bdun byas gyur na// 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams 'grub// thams cad gcod bzlog rlig sngags 'di// ston pas sngon sangs rgyas tshe gsungs// gzhan yang 'di yi yon tan ni// bye ma snyed
288a5(rgyud 'grel): du brjod mi yang // ma 'ongs 'gro ba thams cad kyi// bsod nams thams cad bskyed bya dang // rkyen rnams thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir// rdo rje lta bu'i sbubs thabs 'ang // shes rab ldan pas rtogs par shog/ gtsug tur
