288a6(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar mo'i sgrub thabs// slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// / bkra shis// sarba mang+ga laM//
289a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma gdug pa dkar mo'i dkyil cho ga bzhugs/
289b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA thA gA toSh+NI Sha sI tA ta pa tre nA ma a pa rA dzi ta maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung bya'i gdugs dkar mo
289b2(rgyud 'grel): can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshe ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags m+b+ha gdugs dkar me cen la phyagu 'tshal lo// 'jigs pa brgyad la sogs pa las thor zhing // rang gi don las gzhan dran
289b3(rgyud 'grel): gtso mdzad pa'i// bla ma sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal nas// dkyil 'khor cho ga phyi yi don ltar brtsam// de la dang por bla ma ni// chos bcu la sogs ldan pa la// slob ma dang ldan lha la gus// rigs ldan de yis
289b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol gsum gdab// de nas bla mo dkyil 'khor gyi// rdzus dang yo byad tshogs pa dri// tshogs ni bsnyen pa la 'jug bya// gnas khang dben zhing nyams dga' bar// maN+Dal chag chag mchod sogs dgram// byang chub
289b5(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed ldan pa yis// bdun po rnam dag sngon 'gro bas// rang nyid lha mo 'khor lor bsam// nang gi dkyil 'khor cho ga las// ji ltar 'byung po bskyed par bya// de nas gsang sngags bzlas pa ni// rang gi snying
289b6(rgyud 'grel): gar rab rdo ga le// snying po 'bum du 'phrin las bzhi// ji ltar rigs pas bzlas par bya// yang na dus dang mtshan ma dang // nus ldan rigs pas sbyar bar bya// 'khor gyi sngags kyang 'dus par bzhed// de nas
290a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// dA ni sa chog bya ba la// dang por phyi dang nang dang ni// phyogs dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang // 'byung khungs la sogs rigs kyis brtag/ de nas 'jig rten rgyal po 'am// blon po bdag
290a2(rgyud 'grel): po ci rigs par// mngon pa bdag chachags blang // mingon par gyur sa gzhi ni// lho dang sa yi lha mo la// blangs te rmi lam la sogs pas// brtag pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o// su bdag la ni mi gnod pararo// rim pas bkod la nyes
290a3(rgyud 'grel): pa gsal// rnam lnga dang bsres 'thas par bcag/ yang na 'jig rten gsum 'dul gyi// sngags sam las kyi bum pa'i chus// nyes pa ma lus dag par bya// yang na lha mo'i rang sngags kyis// dag par byas pas gdon dang ni
290a4(rgyud 'grel): zug rngu'i nyes pa dag par bya// yang na 'byung ba rim brtsegs dang // rang gi sngags kyis gzung bar bya// rak+Sha'i sngags sam rang nyid ni// 'phags mar byas te gsol ba gdab// de nas cho ga rim pa yis// bskyed la phyogs bzhir
290a5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma yang // lha mo bzhi yi bskyed rims kyis// tshigs ni 'di skad gsol ba gdab// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun mchog la yang dag byung // 'ophags ma'i
290a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs// zhos pa brjod par bya'o// yang ni tshigs bcad brjod par bya// de nas bla mas 'khor lo na mkha' la bteg la rang nyid khros pa'i gzugs/ maM TaM las ni mig nyi zla// hUM las rkang pa rdo rjer
290b1(rgyud 'grel): bya// 'gying bcas rdo rje gasbyor ba ni// gar gyi tshul gyis 'di skad brjod// lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi// bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun nyon cig/ nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // bsrung ba'i 'khor lho rab sbyar bas//
290b2(rgyud 'grel): gol te gang zhig 'da' 'dod na// rdo rje 'bar ba'i lus kyis ni// lus gsum las gsum dag bya ste// 'dri ni daM gzhom gzhan du min/ oM g+haHg+haH/ g+hA ta ya g+hA tA ye/ sarba duSh+TAn phaT/ kI la ya/ kI la yo sarba/
290b3(rgyud 'grel): pA paM phaT/ badz+ra kI la ya badz+ra d+ha ro Adz+nyA pa ya ti kA yaM bAk+ShIt+ta hUM phaT tsos brjod la/ bgegs med byi phyir bgegs dgA ni// phur bu'i gzugs kyis gdab par bya// de nas lha yi tshogs dang ni// gtoR+Wa mchod pas
290b4(rgyud 'grel): tshim bya ste// rang bsrung gnas su bsrung bar bya// de nas sa la log pa ni// lan gsum brdabs pas lha mo ni// lang tsho ldan pas bsams te ni// byin brlabs ye shes bzhugs pa dang // mchod bstod byas la
290b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad brjod// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cod kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang // sa dang phar phyin lam la ni// lha mo khyod ni dbang gyur te// shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis// ji ltar bdud sde bcom pa ltar// de bzhin
290b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bdud kyi stobs// pham par bya ste 'khor l-i bri// lha mos gsol te thim par bsam// de nas dri yi thig le dang // mchod pa la sogs rgyas par bya// rdo rjes bum pa rnam pa drug/ gser dngul rin chen las
291a1(rgyud 'grel): byas pa 'am// sa las byas pa mgrin bya ba'o// lto ba n+de la nag po yi// ra ri med pa'i ras kyis ni// kha brgyan mtshan ma legs byis te// 'bru dang rin chen sman sna dang // ldan par byas te me 'od dam//
291a2(rgyud 'grel): yi thig le'i steng du bzhag/ de nas slob ma rgyun drung ni// kha dog ldan pa'i rig bzang dang // byade gshegs gsung sngags bsgrub brtson pa// don ston de la sdom pa dpog/ dge bsnyen dge tshul la sogs pa// rim pas
291a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems bskyed bya// de nas sngags kyi sdom pa yang // sbyin pas dang por 'di skad brjod// dkyil 'khor cho ga'i 'khor lo nI// 'khor ni bzhi char la yang gnang // rat+na rang skyob dang ljon pa lnga// theg pa chen po/
291a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub byed pa// kha cig gsang sngags sgrub don genyer// 'di na dkyil 'khor 'jug par byed// de las gzhan yang bsod nams 'dod// gzhan dag pha rol don du gnyer// 'jig rten phyi ma mchod bya ste// dad pa mang du
291a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas ni// blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yis// tshe 'di'i 'bras tsam 'dod mi bya// tshe 'od tsam ni don gnyer ba// 'jig rten pha rol pa de min// skyes bu 'jig rten pha rol gany+tsir// tshe 'di'i 'bras kyang rgyas par 'byung //
291a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bla mas spro ba bskyed// rang gi lus la legs bcug ste// rang gi snang ba las byung ba// ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar gzhug/ lan gsum bar du sbyang bar bya// de nas slob mas bla ma la// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs
291b1(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// dga' chen khyod ni ston pa po// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge
291b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dun te// skyabs gsum po yang bdag yang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i tshul mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni bzhugs par mdzod// ces lan gsum gsol ba gdab// de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod// bu
291b3(rgyud 'grel): tshur thog pa chen po yi// gasdang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga ni// khyod ni bstan pa'i snod yin no// khyod ni yang dag bstan par bya// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje gsang sngags
291b4(rgyud 'grel): mthu yi ni// ye shes mnyam med pa yang dag brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de// shAkya seng sogs cho ga yis// bdud kyi sde ni drag po yang // dpung chen ma lus bcom pa ste// 'jig rten rjes su 'jug shes
291b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// 'khor lho bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de bas kun mkhyen thob 'dod pas// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ ces pa lan gsum yang na gcig/ brjod la yan lag bdun pa rdzogs// byas te byang chub sems
291b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed bya// de yi cho ga las byung ba// shes par bya ste sbyin par bya// de nas hUM AHoM gyis ni// rdo rje dang ldan thig les mchod// de nas rigs kyi sdom pa dang // bla ma sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// lha mo'i tshogs
292a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad dang // 'phags pa'i dge 'dun bdag la dgongs// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni// dus 'di nas nyid bzung nas su// byang chub snying po la gnas par// sems can ma lus pa
292a2(rgyud 'grel): yi don// rdzogs par bya phyir sems bskyed bya// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges gnas pa// tshul khrims rnam gsum sdom pa dang // dge bo'i chos ni bsdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims/
292a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // so sor bdag gis bzung bar bya// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// de ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig yin par rgyal bas
292a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po lnga// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// slob dpon bdag kyang bzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba lu// nyin re
292a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing ni dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnams bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la// phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus bzung // las kyi rigs mchog chen po
292a6(rgyud 'grel): la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// tshul khrims bslab pa la sogs dang // gnyis su med pa'i tshangs spyod dang // rang gi dam tshig bsrung bar bgyi//
292b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi bya ba'i las rnams kyi// sangs rgyas nyid ni bsgrub bya ste// sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bya// ma grol ba rnams grol bar bya// dbugs ma phyung ba rnams dbyung bgyi// thaMd
292b2(rgyud 'grel): bla med byang chub kyi// lam la myur du gnas par bya'o// lan gsum du ni zlos su gzhug/ de nas byur bsal sdig pa dbyung // me tog phul te sngags kyis ni// brtan par byas te las kyi sngags// rgyal la sogs pas
292b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod por bya'o// so shing a shAng+ga tha dadang ni// uM dum ba ra stsogs mi 'khyog cing // srinr-i dngags chog mi sdug med// sor bcu gnyis pa mthe'u chung tshad// me tog ldan pa 'char bcug ste// byang shar bltas te mi smra bar/
292b4(rgyud 'grel): ba ko tsam byugs maN+Dal steng // ltos med rang gi mdun drang dor// de yi rtse mo bdag dang nye// bltas na mchog gi dngos grub yin// phyogs dang mtshams su kha bltas na// 'bring dang zhi sogs las brgyad 'grub// thur
292b5(rgyud 'grel): bltas sa 'og 'grub pa skye// dkyil 'khor phyir ni dngos grub med// de nas dri yi chu ni bzang blugs ste sbyor chu blung par bya// oM hU~M b+hi shud+d+ha sarba pA paM ni tsa sau sho d+ha yaM bi kalka a ba na ya hUM zhes lan gsum brjod la
292b6(rgyud 'grel): 'thung du gzhug/ ngag go sgrib po thams cad 'byung // skud pa dmar po sum bsgril pa// mdud pa gsum ldan ring ltar byas// sngags kyis btab la lag par bcing // hUM las byung po'i ku sha yang // sngas da stan du
293a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bya// de nas mchod pa spro bas chos// le glu pU bshad par bya ba ste// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen pa// u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar// brgya lAm na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo //
293a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni rnyed par dka'// gang gis mnyam med sems can don// bla na med par byed nus pa// gnyis med zab mo'i spyod yul ni// sems can sangs rgyas thob byed pa'o// dang po bskam
293a3(rgyud 'grel): pa grangs med nas// bsags pa'i sdig pa gang dang gang // dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di mthong bas// de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur// zhes pas kun la spro bo bskyed// slob ma de rnams kun gyis kyang // seng+ge'i nyal stabs ldan
293a4(rgyud 'grel): bas su// ku sha'i stan la nyal bar bya// nang par longs la skal ldan rnams// thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi// / grong khyer dam pa mthong bar 'gyur// nang par dus su langs nas ni// rmi lam mtshan ma dri bar bya// des kyang bzang dran
293a5(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba rnams// bla ma'i mdun du brjod par bya// mtshan ma bzang bas dngos grub 'grub// ngan pa bsrung ba me yi ni// los kyi sdig pa gzhom par bya// de yi cho ga sbyin sreg bzhin// de nan mkhar bzhugs pa yi// dkyil 'khom
293a6(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs mchod bstims la// mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya// pus mi g.yas pa sar btsugs te// lag tu bdug pa'i spos thogs te// 'phags mi gdugs dkar lha mo mchog/ rig sngags rgyal la phyag
293b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// thugs rje'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor ni// mgon po bri bar 'tshal lags na// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das ma bdag ni gus// de ni bka' drin mdzad/
293b2(rgyud 'grel): par rigs// 'gro ba'i 'khor lo bya don gsol// sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs// byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang // gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong pa ma lus dang // 'byung po
293b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub nyer gnas pa// gang dag rdo rje'i spyan mnga' ba'i// bston la mngon par dga' ba kun// nye ba ru ni mdzad par rigs// bdag ni rdo rje che ge ste// 'phags ma gdugs dkar dkyil 'khor ni// ji ltar nus pa'i yo byad kyis/
293b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba don phyir 'bri lags na// thugs brtse bar ni dgongs nas su// deng bdag slob mar bcas pa lnga// dkyil 'khor lhan cig gyur pa kun+da// nye bai ru ni mdzad par rigs// lan gsum la sogs brjod par bya// slob dpon
293b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid bzong ldan pas// rna 'byor rdzogs pas ster langs te// sdig 'joms dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor bteg lo thig las bya// ras bal la sogs nyes med la// mtshon lngas legs bsgyur ra
293b6(rgyud 'grel): chen snod// rigs lnga'i sa bin las bskyod// byin brlabs dbang rnams rdzogs par bya'o// oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba a nu ga ta sarba d+harmaHpa ra s+pha ra a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA// a t+yan ta a nu pra ba~MSh+Ta sarba d+harmA/ zhe sa badz+ra
294a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga po gcig tu bsgril// tshad ni nyis 'gyur la sogs bya// de nas dri bzangs kyi btsal te// ye shes thig ni mkhas pas gdab// bla mas slob ma dza yis sbyin// de nyid sum 'gyur gyis blangs te//
294a2(rgyud 'grel): thig sgras sems can don du ni// sangs rgyas mad+mo bskul bas bya// bla ma nub ste shar bltasaH// slob ma nub bltas tshangs thig gdab/ de ltar g.yas bskor gnyis btab la// zur dong logs sogs thog gi cha// bla ma'i man
294a3(rgyud 'grel): ngag ltar bya'o// phur bu btsugs la bskor bar bya// mtshan min pas ni dngos min 'gyur// thig skur chad na bla ma 'chi// lhag dang chad las nad du 'gyur// phyogs 'khrul bas ni slob ma'o// zur bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs
294a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi// do sha la sogs kyis spras pa ste// sgo khyud rin chen rdo rje dang // rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bur bcas// mchod pa'i shing dang bkra shis rdzas kyis brgyan// de ltar mdzes pas lhag chad yang // de nas tshe nI las bya ba//
294a5(rgyud 'grel): rin tshun lnga bam 'byung khungs so// yang na legs par byas pa yi// kha dog lnga ni rin chen snod// bzhag la rigs lnga'i sa bon snod// bskyed cing bstims la ye shes dgug/ gnas gsum brlab cing mchod bstod
294a6(rgyud 'grel): la// oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM// zhes sogs brgya la sogs pa bzlas// de nas bla mas dbang ldan la// sogs pa'i mtshams nas g.yas bskor du// 'dzub re snyoms par drang bar bya// sngo dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
294b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po nang du rim pas so// mnyam zhing mi g.yo ma chad pa// bris te rin chen snod kyis dgab// me tog dor la slob mas kyang // ci rigs par ni skyon sbyangs bris// sbom phras nad dang nor zad byed// chang na slob dpon slob ma
294b2(rgyud 'grel): 'chi// yon pos thams cad kyis sdang 'gyur// shar dkar lho sar nub dang byang du ni// ljang khu'i rnam pa shas che'o// dbus kyi pad+ma lte ba la// gdug so dang rdo rje byi bar bya// de yi phyir mi 'khor lo'i cha// dkar por gnas la
294b3(rgyud 'grel): shar rtsibs la// bang sdong phreng ba'i rnam pa dgod// lhor ni rin chen dbyugs pa la// spos snod rdo rje lu gu rgyud// nub tu rdo rje'i rnam pa la// byang du rgya gram dgod par bya// shar dang nub tu skyabs sbyin no// gru chad dmar mo la
294b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs te// sgo la lcags kyu la sogs dgod// lha yi snam bu dag la yang // phyogs skyong mtshanA ma ri ma byas so// tshon gyi rim pa rgyas par bya// de nas lha ni mnyos bya dang // slob ma'i sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir// gnon
294b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i cho gas sgra ni sreg bya// gzar bu'i tshad dang thabs dang rdzas// de rnams gzhan las 'byung bzhin bya'o// de ltar thams cad rdzogs pa dang // lus bkrus dri zhim chus byugs te// rgyan ldan pas ni mchod rdzas thogs//
294b6(rgyud 'grel): skor ba byas lo slob dpon ni// lha mor byas te hUM sgra yis// rdor dril ldan pas na bzhugs la// dbus nas sgo yi rim pas su// dbye ba byas te bum pa sogs// rang rang gnas su dgod par bya'o// mchod pa'i tshogs

295a3(rgyud 'grel): rim// dang po dpa' bos blang bar bya// de nas slob ma rgyan ldan zhig/ mdzes pa'i gdong yang dar gyis ni// bkab lte lag par me trig ldan// mkhas pas kring nas yol ba'i bar// bzhog ste b+h+ra ma ku sha yis// bu khyod su yin ci
295a4(rgyud 'grel): la dga'// dris te bdag ni skal ba bzang // gdugs dkar lha la bdag dga'o// de nas slob ma bla ma la// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// slob dpon mgon la skyabs su 'chi// gtso bo lha mor bcas pa yi// lha rnams
295a5(rgyud 'grel): klan l-I phyag 'tshal lo// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol// de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod// do byA zhin grwashegs pa kun gyis gnas// lha mo gdugs dkar kun gyi gnas//
295a6(rgyud 'grel): snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi// de nas dkyil 'khor lha rnams la// dad pas phyag na bya ba ste// oM na ma ste hUM/ na mA mi hU~M/ na mo na mo hUM/ swA hA// de nas slob ma khrus byas te/
295b1(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi sgo ru gnas pa la// de nas me tog bcas pa yis// bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab// dam tshig de ni bdag la gsol// sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol// zhes bya bla
295b2(rgyud 'grel): mas de la mi/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun sogs// gong du bshad pa'i sdom pa sbyin// oM sarba yo ka tsat+ta uta pA da yA mi// sems bskyed me tog dang bcas pa// snying gar bzhag ste sngags 'di brjod// oM su ra ste/
295b3(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya s+t+waM ho sid+d+hi badz+ra la thA su khaM/ oM a khaM bI ra hUM zhes pas slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug ste// slob dpon tshig 'di brjod par bya// deng khyod lha mo dang ri khrod pa rnams kyi rigasu 'gyur gyis// ngas gdugs
295b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo'i sems bskyed par bya ste// ye shes de bzhi ni gshegs pa thams cad dang // gdugs dkar can dang ri khrod ma rnams kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur la// dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos// khyod kyis dkyil
295b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ma mthong ba'i mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de la 'khor lo gzhug bya ste// lag gis rdo rje spyir bzhag nas// khyod ni su yang rung ba la// gal te khyed kyis smras gyur na// khyod kyi
295b6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig rdo rje yis// rang gi mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur// de nas bdud rtsi chu blugs te// 'thung du bcug ste 'di skad brjod// lha mo chen mo dang khyod kyi// snying la yang dag di ring gzhug/ gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma
296a1(rgyud 'grel): thag tu dral te gshegs// zhes bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyis dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// oM badz+ra u da ka

296a5(rgyud 'grel): a a ces bya'o// yang na A be sha s+yA to Sha ya ra ra ra ra tsA lA ya tsa lA ya hUM hA a dz+nye/ zhes brjod 'gying ba dang bcas pas// rdzas kyi bdug pas legs gdugs te// dril bu'i sgra dang a na le'i// sngags kyang ci mang

297a5(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// bskon pa dar dbyangs gis bcings la// oM pan+d+ha badz+ra A ra li hU~M/ b+hir tshug cad pan gyis bi rgyun pa// bad+me gshugs kun gyis bstegasa~M pA dang // rin chen dbu rgyun dam pa dang // dar dpyad+yash+tsa rgyan dbang bskur//
297a6(rgyud 'grel): gser sogs tshad ldan rdo rje la// snang ba mtha' yas bkug bstims te// slob ma'i lag gtang sngags 'di brjod// oM badz+ra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM e b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas// di ring khyod la dbang
297b1(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long // dril bu ldog pa'i tshad ldan la// don yod grub par byas nas ni// lag pa g.yon sbyin sngags 'di brjod// oM a d+hi pa tis+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tiSh+Tha
297b2(rgyud 'grel): bA re sa ma ya// 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhod// de tshe dril bu sgra sgrogs te// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag

297b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis bra ba dang srung skud gdagus// phur bus gad ba dang bzlas pa yi// snang ba sbyin dang bsrung 'khor gyi// cho gas legs par gdugs par bya// mchod byas lha rnams gshegs byi ste// brabs pa'i lhag mo chu bor dor//

298a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo// dang po'i lngas can rnal 'byor pas// lus ngag sgrib pa sbyang ba dang // khyad par bsgrub pa'i las brtson pas// tshwa tsha bya ba'i rim pa bstan// dang po yid dang rjesu mthun pa'i sa phyogs/
298a5(rgyud 'grel): su thang bu blta bor bya ste/ de ru spos dang bdud rtsi 'khyil bya'i sngags sam/ thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags zlos shing gtor bas mi gtsang ba'i tsho gos thams cad byang ste rin po che'i sa gzhir bgegs yod
298a6(rgyud 'grel): po kun rang rang gi gnas su dngas par bya ste bka' bsgo ba yeng bya'o// de nas dri bzang po la sogs pa'i chus skyang nul byas// me tog so ma dpag tu med pa bkram la// mchod pa la sogs pa'i yo byad kun
298b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs par bya ste/ gnas khang+ga dang mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba'o// de nas bla mas khrus dang gtsang sbrang bya ste/ sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga rdzogs pas 'phags ma gdugs dkar can du bsams te/ tsha tsha'i

298b3(rgyud 'grel): ma byin la gsol ba gdab pa dang / sa bdag la gtor ma byin la bka'i sgo bo ste// de nas ji tsam porko ba'i sa de la ser ldeng la sogs pa'i phur bus phyogs bzhir btab ste/ de yang bstod legs ldan nam/
298b4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la smad phur bar 'dug par bskyed// byin gyis brlabs la/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba duSh+Ten hUM phaT/ ces lan gsum bzlas la gdab bo// de nas bu mo gtsang mas bkal
298b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshon skud rnam pa lnga rigs lnga'i rnam pa 'am/ rin tshon lnga'i rang bzhin du bsams la/ oM badz+ra sU tra sa ma ya hUM phaT ces bya ste// phur pa'i tha ma tshon skyed kyis bskor la rang gi rkang pa gar bzhag par rdo rjer
298b6(rgyud 'grel): lam lam song bar bsam mo// yang na sngags de thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bya'o// de nas thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags zlos shing yungs kar gyis gtor ro// de nas sa gzhi de rin po cher gyur par
299a1(rgyud 'grel): bsams la rang ji tsam 'dod pa brkos te/ de'i sngags kyang oM badz+ra kha nA kha na ya hUM phaT ces bya'o// de nas phur bu dang tshon skad bsdus 'o mas bskur te bzhagro/ sa blang ba'i cho ga'o// de
299a2(rgyud 'grel): nas blangs pa rnams stegs bu la sogs par bzhag las brdung ba'i las bya ste/ sngags kyang oM badz+ra mud gaM ra A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT ces brjod cing rdo rje'i tho bas brdung ngo // de nas spos chu la sogs pa'i
299a3(rgyud 'grel): chu la oM a mr-i te hUM phaT ces bzlas la// spos chu dmigs pa las a dkar por bsam// de las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i bod kyi spos chu thams cad khyab ste/ bdud rtsir gyur bI ra bsams te smra'o// de'i sngags
299a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra pra marda ya pra mUr+d+ha yA hUM phaT ces byas la s+thA'o// de nas 'jim pa de bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgyas bcus la sngags 'di brjod de// oM suk+Sh+me sur+b+be nu gA te/ shAn+te dan twe/ ni ra ku li/ ni ra ba ra Ne/ sarba b+hu ta b+ha ya nu/
299a5(rgyud 'grel): ga te/ ya ba de ya sho dzi ni/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ d+harmi rA dza ya ba shi he/ sarba bud+d+ha ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA nA ya/ oM d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ zhes brjod pas rang thugs la 'os yi shes 'od zer 'phros pas khams gsum sems can/ 'phaT
299a6(rgyud 'grel): ma gdugs dkar can du byas// tshur la rig sngags la sogs sangs rgyas mchod pas 'jim pa la thim/ zhu nas khyab pas rin po che rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsam ste/ stegs bu la bzhag go// de ni 'jim
299b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bya ba'o// de nas 'bi 'bi bya ste/ de yang oM badz+ra badz+rodwa b+ha bA ya swAhA/ zhes zlos shing bya'o// de nas rang gi thugs ka las 'od zer sems can gyi smig gsum sbyangs// 'phags ma gdugs dkar can du byas/
299b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa mchod/ 'dus pas 'bi 'byi la thim pas ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi shel sdong dag pa'i rnam pa'i gzhal yas khang du bsams te/ de'i nang du yang gdan pad+ma dang seng ge las 'phags ma
299b3(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar can dang phyag rgya'i lha mo la sogs pa bskyed// 'di cho ga gsum gyis bskyed/ de nas oM las ye shes kyi 'od phyung la gzhalnga yas khang du byas te/ gdan nas lha rdzogs pa'i bar gyi dkyil
299b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bskyed// ye shes pa gzhug/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pas so// de nas rang gis kyang sbyang ba la sogs pa bya'o// de nas 'bi 'bi rnams su oM a na le dang phyag rgya'i sngags sam sa bon rnams kyang gzhug/
299b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan srog shing brten pa'i gzungs la sogs pa ci rigs par gzhug/ rten 'brel dang dri ma med pa lo sogs pa yang bzhugo/ de la mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa yang rgyas par bya'o// de nas oM
299b6(rgyud 'grel): d+har+m+ma d+hA tu gar+b+he dz+wa la swA hA/ zhes brjod la/ de las lha mo rnams bskul nas slar yang bzhugs te sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa rdul dang mnyam pas bdag dang sems can sbyangs te bzhug par bya'o// de nas
300a1(rgyud 'grel): mar byug pa ni oM a ru dze bi ra dze swAhA/ zhes brjod la byang chub kyi sems kyis bsgos par byasam mo// de ni 'bi 'bi bya ba'o// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi dbyings rnam
300a2(rgyud 'grel): par dag par bzhugs par bsams te skor phor du bcug la// oM badz+ra d+harma d+h+r-i tu gar+b+he swA hA/ zhes bya'o// de nas skor phor shes rab lag po thabs su bsams te/ brdung pa ni de ni gnyis su med par bsrub
300a3(rgyud 'grel): par bsam ste/ oM badz+ra mud ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM zhes pa 'am/ rten 'brel lam// snying laM sogs zlos shing gdab bo// de nas chos kyi sku las sbrul sku gnyis kyis sems can gyi don byed par chos kyi dbyings las/
300a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar bsam ste/ oM badz+ra d+har+m+ma d+ha re stA re swA hA/ zhes brjod la 'byung ngo // de nas oM sarba ta thA ga tA kA ya ma hA su kha badz+ra su ra ta sa ma yaM s+t+waM/ dwe las gzugs sku gnyis byung bas 'gro ba thams cad kyi don bsam
300a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis myi khyab pa byed par bsam mi// de nas gzugs skus ji ltar rigs pa ste/ long skus dag pa'i sems can g+ho don byed par bsams t+yaM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ho ka sa maM yA s+t+waM zhes bya'o// sbrul sku ma dag pa
300a6(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i las can la sogs pa'i don byed par bsams la// oM sarba ta thA ga ta nir ma Na kA la sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bya'o// de nas tsha tsha gdab pa'o// de nas sku gsum gyi ngo bo dang rang don ni gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas
300b1(rgyud 'grel): ma briso// de la ye shes bstim pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa yang bya'o// de nas oM badz+ra phru shI swA hA// zhes pas srog shing gzugs par bya'o// de nas sems can shes bcu ldan gyur cig/ bstan pa yun rings panag/
300b2(rgyud 'grel): par shog/ sems can lhag bsam dag pa yi// kun bzang smon lam 'jug par shig ces bya'o// de nas oM pra marda na ye swA hA/ 'khor lo gsum bskor la/ khams gsum sems can ma lus pa// stobs/
300b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ma 'dres chos dang ni// dran pa nye ra bzhag rnam thar brgyad// ye shes bzhi sogs ldan gyur shog ces bya'o// oM pa de ka laM pa swA hA/ zhes brjod la dar gyi cod pa na phul la/ sems can+da rnams ni maM
300b4(rgyud 'grel): lus pas// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la// da dang lhab lhub la sogs pa// byang chub bar du mchod par shog/ ces bya'o// de nas oM pe ka swA hA/ zhes bya ste/ ba dan phul la/ sems can
300b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni ma lus las// phyogs bcur bstan pa'i ba dan gyis// 'tshe ba med cing chos ldan bas// grags pas rgyas par 'gengs por shog ces bya ste/ de nas oM kum+b+hi ra d+hA dza sU hA/ zhes bya'o// chu srin gyi
300b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan phul la/ 'khor ba ma stongs bar du ni// bdud bzhi dag las legs rgyal nas// ston pa'i bstan pa zab mo dag/ mi thub rgyal mtshan thob par shog/ ces bya'o// de nas oM br-i ma na yo swA hA/
301a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gdugs phul la// khams gsum sems can ma lus pa// nyon mongs tshad pas gdungs pa la// thugs rje byang chub sems kyi gdug// phub pas bde bas tshim gyur shog/ ces
301a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// daM nas oM rat+na ma le traM zhes pas me tog phul la/ ya na na mAHshrI ya d+ha nu ga tA pra tISh+Tha ta puSh+pa ko ta no ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puSh+pa swA hA/ zhes bya ste/ 'khor ba'i sems can
301a3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus kun// mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs thob nas// blta bas mi ngoms gzugs kyis ni// soms can don rnams rdzogs byed sho ga/ ces bya'o// de nas oM su na d+ha re dza ye swA hA/ zhes byas te ga dan phul la//
301a4(rgyud 'grel): sems tsan+da ma lus sangs rgyas te// stobs bcu ldan pa glang po'i gdan// mi 'jigs seng ge'i gradan dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rta yi gdan// dbang bcu thob pa rma bya'i gdan// thogs mye da shugs ldan
301a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' lding gdan// 'dod gu 'byung ba rin chen gadren// skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma'i gdan// rang bzhin 'od gis la nyi zla'i gdan/ gdan rnams myur du thob par sho gau/ ces bya'o// de nas oM d+ha ra d+ha ra mi li dza le
301a6(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ zhes gzhal yas khong du gshegs su gsol// ji ltar chos dbyings dag pa yi// gnas su bsam shes bzhud pa ltar// bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyang // dag pa'i gnas su
301b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs gyur cig/ de nas oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+rI swAd+hA/ zhes bzhugs gsol te/ rin chen gzhal yas chos dbyings su// sems can don du brtser dgongs la// ji srid sems can byang chub par// de srid du ni bzhugs par
301b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzod/ ces bya'o// de nas oM badz+ra d+ha rA Nu sha rI me tiSh+Tha hUM a g+ni hrIny+tsa mA zhes brjod la// dbang bskur te rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par bya'o// de ni brtan par bya ba'i cho ga yin// des ni phum sum tshogs pa'i cho ga'o//
301b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob dpon byang chub sems/ ldan pas tshigs btsu brjod bya ste// bla med sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs// sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung zhing // bdud dang phyir rgol log 'dren tshogs// thams cad pham byas
301b4(rgyud 'grel): bde la dgod// sems tsun nying mtshams sbyor ba yis// nyon mongs mo lus smyung bar bya// nga rgyal ri ni gzhom bya zhing // skye ba'i sngon shing gcad par bya// 'chi bdag srin po brlag bya ste/ ma rig pa yi mun pa bsal// lha
301b5(rgyud 'grel): log yang dag lha la dgod// las kyi chu klong bskam par bya// srid pa'i rgya mtsho yang bskams te// chos sgro na spar zhing byang chub lam// brtan par byas te bzod de byos// 'dod chags me dang zhe sdang mtshon// phrag dog tshub ste//
301b6(rgyud 'grel): ser sna bdud// 'jig tshogs bdag gis gzhom par bgyi// sems can bde ba bla med kyi// byang chub lam la rab dgod phyir// bdag gis sdig bral mthun pa yis// dngos grub sna tshogs bdeg la stsol// de nas dkyis
302a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du byas pa 'am// yang na mchod rten bum par gdugs dkar can dmigs pa de las 'od zer 'phros pas phyag la sogs pa'i lha mos 'jig rten khams khengs par bya ste/ de dag gi sgrib
302a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum ma lus par dag par bya ste thams cad lha mo'i rang bzhin du byas la/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ngo bor dag par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA yA bAk+tsit+ta ma hA sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bstan par pa'o// dung pho ra du dri chab la
302a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs blugs te/ lag pas bzung la a las zla ba'i rnam pa las 'od zer gyis yon chab bdud rtsi bsams la// gtso mo nas 'khor la sogs pa'i snying po bzlas te dbul lo// de'i sngags/ oM a mr-i ta ar+g+ha pra tIts+tsha
302a4(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ zhes lan gsum du spyi bor bzhag la dgang / der ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te dbang bskur bar bsam mo// de nas mchod pa lnga yang rang rang gi sngags kyis dbul// sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis kyang mchod do// 'dir
302a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhung mangs kyis dogos biso+o ma bris so// mchod pa bsang ba dang sbyar ba nI// oM sar+b+ba pU dza puSh+pe swA hUM/ zhes pas sbyang ngo // de nas rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pas bstod pa bya ste/ de yang dang po spyir yang bstod pa na/ 'gro ba rgyang
302a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gzir ba'i 'gro gzigs nas// thugs rjes sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'joms mdzad pa// thugs rje'i mnga' bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sen
302b1(rgyud 'grel): smin cing grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir// sems can khams na bzhugs shing spyod gyur kyang // chags pas mi gos pad+ma ltar dag pa// 'dod chags dag pa'i bdag nyid khyod la 'dud// sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa
302b2(rgyud 'grel): la// thugs rjes thabs dang shes rab grur bzhag nus// zhi ba rin chen mchog gling skyel mdzad pa// kun gyi ded dpon lha mo khyod la 'dud// sems can bkren pa d+mo gyiH phongs gyur pas// ma rig thibs po'i nang du song ba rnams/
302b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa'i nor bdun dag gis tshim mdzad pa// ye shes sgron ma'i lha mo khyod la bstod// sems can las kyi chu bos 'bad pa rnams// dam chos bdud rtsi'i zam pas sgrol mdzad pa// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad la
302b4(rgyud 'grel): 'god mdzad pa// gsung gi mnga' bdag lha mo khyod la bstod// ces pa dang / yang slob dpon tsAn+d+ra go mes bstod pa'i srid gsum ston pa lha dang mi yi s+t+waM mchod 'os la sogs pas kyang bstod pa bya// de nas yon bdag 'khor
302b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa la bsams smon lam rgya chen po gong ba ste/ bdug sogs sems can skal ldan 'di rnams kyis// chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bzhengs bla ni// dge tshegs ma lus ci yod mdun byas te// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
302b6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo thob par sho ga/ 'khor lo sgyur rgyal mchog gi lus thob shog/ phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing du skye bar shog/ tshe 'di nad dang gnod pa dang // 'byung po 'khrug dang gdon kun zhi 'gyur shig/ ces bya'o// shar phyogs su//
303a1(rgyud 'grel): gzungs tshar gcig gam// gnyis sam gsum la sogs pa nyer bshad ltar klag/ rgyas par byed na/ dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa'i byang du slob ma 'dug la/ bkra shis kyi dbang la sogs pa bskur bar
303a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas bsdu gshegs gtor ma btang ba kun bya/ khyad par du legs ldan gyis mchod pa bya'o// de nas dge 'dun gyi mchod ston la sogs pa kun bya'o// che tsha'i cho ga 'di byas pas khams gsum ma lus sems
303a3(rgyud 'grel): tsan kun// lha mo nyid dang skal mnyam nas// gdul bya'i don la myur brtson sh+log/ tsha tsha'i bya ba slob dpon pad+ma'i lcags kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / zangs dkar lo tsa bas tho ling gi gtsug
303a4(rgyud 'grel): du basbyor ba'o// / n+ya gor skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi nA ma/ tsho 'das pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdun dku mo can la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma rje btsun sprul pa
303a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin rgyu mo gus brgyad de// rab gnas cho ga bsdu ba~M yI// mAn ngag ri ma pas bri bar b+hu// de la gang zag thams cad la// rab gnas 'thad pa ma yin te// skye ba med pa'i ngo bo la// gang gi gang la ji ltar ni// rab tu
303a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa byas pa yod// kun rdzob la yang gnas pas ni// de mo byin brlabs mi shes pas// rab gnas cho ga 'thad pa min// las dang po yi rnal 'byor la// rgyu sbyangs ded dang nges bskyed phyir// rab tu gnas par bya bar

303b3(rgyud 'grel): ba mtshan nyid ldan// bkru dang brgya n+ya baM la sngogs bya// rang rang mtshan ma bkod la bzhag/ bskyed dang bzlas pa rdzogs par bya// rnam rgyal bum par chu bsdus la// gzungs thag rdo rjes bzung la bzhag/ de nas mchod
303b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod rgyas par bya'o// bum pa sta gon bya ba'o// zla bo drug dang gza' bzhi dang // rgyu skar bcu bzhi la bya ba dang // seM khra ba \u0f7fsa nyid dang // rgyas pa'i rab gnas la sogs bya// de nas rab tu gnas pa'i gzhi// dgram

303b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs cho ga ni// yungs kar chu dang 'bru zan dang // dAr bas byabs te sbyang bar bya// oM badz+ra ba dra zhes pa'i sngags kyis so// de nas ba yi rnam lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga yos snod bkang la// dUr ba'i pa ri gyis bkrus
304a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA// de nas til mar dri zhim pa// spos kyis bsgos pas gong ltar byug/ de yi sngags ni 'di yin te// oM hUM traM hrI baM/ de nas de ni bsngal ba'i phyir//
304a2(rgyud 'grel): u dum par shir sha dang / a shwad+d+ha dung n+ya gr-i dang // pAr+g+ga ti yi shun pA yaM// phye mas bskus ti bkru bar bya// de nas skyu ru ra sogs pa// 'dag chal kun gyis byug par bya// de nas bum pa'i chu gtsang dang // dri zhim bdud rtsi lnga
304a3(rgyud 'grel): yis bkru// bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems// grub pa'i rig 'dzi na la sogs kun// bkra shis brjod dang mchod bste de bsam// lha mos chu ni blugs bsams te// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa
304a4(rgyud 'grel): khrus gsol ltar// lha yi tshu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gri Sh+ya gsol lo// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shrI ye hU~M aHswA hA/ de nas chu yi thigs pa dgA/ ras bal 'jam pas phyi bar bya/ rAs ris glegs
304a5(rgyud 'grel): bam la sogs pa// dngos su bkru ba med pa la// me long sogs la khrus sogs bya// de ni khrus kyi cho ga yin// tsan dan gnyis dang gur gum dang // lang gu ldan te dri lnga yis// rten la thig le byas de nas// oM badz+ra gan d+he aH
304a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA// de nas mchod pa rnam lnga sogs// rang rang sngags kyis dbul bar bya// de nas ye shes sems dpa' ni// na mkhar spyan drangs mchod bstod la// khyad par rigs kyi lha bltas te// thugs ka spyi bo mgrim pa dang // phrag sa
304b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang bcas pas// reg la lag tu spos thogs te// pus mo sar btsugs lce hUM lngas// rdo rje dmar por bya ste brjod// bcom ldan gtsug tor gdugs dkar can// rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs
304b2(rgyud 'grel): rI'i bdag nyid can khyod kyi// sang ni rap+ta gnas bgyid par 'tshal// slob ma la ni bairtse ba dang // khyod rnams la ni mchod pa'i phyir// gus pas bdag dang de la ni// bcom ldan bka' dron mdzad pa'i rigs// 'gro ba 'khor
304b3(rgyud 'grel): lo'i bya dren phyir// sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs// dgra bcom byang chub sems rnams dang // gang yang sngags kyi lha gzhan dang // lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang // bsnyen pa la ni mngon dga' zhing // byang chub la brten
304b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po dang // rdo rje spyan ldan sems can rnams// rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bo dag/ rig pa yi ni rgyal po yi// ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa dang // 'gro ba zhi bas rob gnas bgyid// slob ma mchod dang bdag la ni// khyod kyis
304b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs brtse nyer bzung nas// rab gnas 'di la thams cad kyis// thugs brtser ldan pas gnas par mdzod// de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes// nam mkha'i lha rnams dam tshig bstims// byin brlabs dbang bsgyur rgyus gdab bya'o//
304b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod pa rnam lnga dang // sgra yi tshogs pa dpag med dbul// de nas bum chus slar yang bkru// de nas lha yi rtags dag ni// skyon lnga spangs la bzlas par bya// de nas dang por gsol btab la// nang du byin par 'dod po
305a1(rgyud 'grel): yis// tshogs bcad yang ni yi ge bya// tha ma muHyis mtshan pa gshegs// rdzus kyis g.yogs te bzhag par bya// slob ma yod nA sta gon bya// 'di ni lha yi sta gon no// de nas thig tshon
305a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs bya ba ni/ rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga ltar// mchod pa'i dngos po gser thur dang // rgyan dang sku chings glegs shing dang // na bza' la sogaso rgyas par bya// dkyil 'khor bskyed la bzlas sogs bya// dbang blang dam tshig
305a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bya// de nas gzhi ma bkru la sogs// gong gi cho ga ltar bya'o// de nas sa bon lha bkug la// na mkha'i gnas la mchod bstod bya// spos dang rdor dril thogs nas// pus gtsugs gong ltar byin brlabs te// sang ni rab
305a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas bgyid lags na// zhes pa bgyid par 'tshal du bsgyur// de nas ye shes spyan drangs la// dzaHhUM baM hoHdgug gzhug bya// de nas mau tshad bstod rol mo'i sgra// dpag med mchod dang gnas gsum brlab// dbang bskur byas te/
305a5(rgyud 'grel): bum chus bkru// rnam snang rang gi rigs kyi lha// gang yin ba sa ni rgyas gdab bo// de nas dbang gzhan rim pas bskur// oM badz+ra A b+ha ra Na bi b+hU Sha Ni swA hA// zhes pas rgyan gyis mchod pa 'bul// de nas rang rang rigs kyis blostong //
305a6(rgyud 'grel): gsere thur oM dzi na byugs pas// spyan dbye sngags ni 'di yin no// oM tsak+Sha sa man+ta tsak+Shu tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni badz+re swA hA/ oM an da sa mA d+hi d+hA naM pra na nai swA hA/ zhes pas bza'o ba bzang po dbul// de nas bdud rtsi'akhyi la ba yi// s+pha
305b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis zhabs bkod dbul ba ni// rdo rje bzung ba'i lag g.yas kyis// lan gsum bskor la brtan par bya// de nas su pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra swA hA/ zhes pas gnas su gzhag par bya// de nas mchod bstod rgyas par bya// de nas bla mra
305b2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma la// khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa'i// sku gzugs da ni khyad par du// ji skad gsungs bzhin spyan dbye ba// de ni ngas kyang byas 'gyur te// khyod kyi de ni kun rdzob pas// ci bde bar ni mchod par byos// zhes bya
305b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal khab la sogs bya// de nas slob mas mchod pa dang // bla ma yon gyis mnyes par byas// bla mas legs ldan gtor mas mchod// byin chen bkra shos yun ring du// bzhugs par bka' yis chos skyong bsgo// gsol
305b4(rgyud 'grel): btab la sogs bla mas bya// slob ma'i sgrib pa gzhom pa dang // rang gi lhag chad bskang pa'i phyir// sbyin sreg tshe gas bskang bar bya// bsdu gshegs smon lam gdab par bya'o// mchod bstod la sogs rgyas par bya//
305b5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga 'di// k+Sha ma d+he nu'i rjes 'brangs te// pad+ma'i lcags kyus mtshan pa yi// dge slong gis sbyar bsod nams kyis// khams gsum sems can thams cad kyang // sprul pa'i sku dang mnyam 'gyur
305b6(rgyud 'grel): sho ga/ mang du thos pa'i slob dpon pad+ma'i lcags kyus/ rigs ldan ha ra ba'i slob dpon kA ma la d+he nu pa'i rjesu 'brangs nas sbyar ba rdzogs so// / A tsar+ya ba~M na ya tsan+da dang / lo tsa ba dge
306a1(rgyud 'grel): slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya si tA ta pa tre A rA dzaM ti sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi
306a2(rgyud 'grel): thub pa sgrub pa'i thabs/ bsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rol phyag 'tshal lo// dang por tho rangs langs te/ byang chub kyi sems dran par byas la/ rung tha mal pa'i snying ga phye ba'i steng du zla ba nya pa la oM dkar po bsams
306a3(rgyud 'grel): te// de'i 'od kyis rang gi sdig pa dag pa dang / khang dang ba spu'i bu ga nas 'thon te/ sems can gyi don byas shing / 'og min nas gdugs dkar mo can/ bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpas bskor
306a4(rgyud 'grel): ba mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs te/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rje su yi rang ba dang / skyabasu 'gro ba dang / lam rten pa dang / sems bskyed de/ yan lag lnga pa
306a5(rgyud 'grel): byas la// de'i bsod nams byang chub tu bsngo ba bya'o// de nas byams snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o// de nas snod bcud ma lus pa bsdus te/ stong pa nyid dmigs la/ oM shU n+ya tA dzI badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma /

306b1(rgyud 'grel): ma// sku mdog dkar mo 'gying bag can// dbus dkar g.yas sngo g.yon dmar zhal// spyan gsum khro mo'i lta stangs can// g.yas pa 'khor lo lcags kyu mda'/ g.yon pa rdo rje dkar po gzhu// zhagaswA pA dang
306b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas sdigs 'dzub nyid// gza' kun 'joms par byed pa ma// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// lha yi rgyan dang na bzar ldan// rnam snang mdzad kyis dbu rgyan ma// de ltar bdag nyid lha mor bsam// de'i snying gar
306b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i steng zla ba la oM dkar po'i 'od zer gyis/ ye ro shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la bzhugs pa dang // dbang bskur zhing rigs kyi dbu rgyan gyis bdag po rnam snang gis rgyas gdab ste/ yi ge gsum gyis byin
306b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs la phyag rgya bcas te/ lag pa khu tshur snying gar bcu' ste/ l-ig pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur g.yas pa'i mya dzub mo nAs gyen du blta bar bya'o// sngags bzlas pa ni/ oM sI tAM ta pa tre a pa rA dzi ta sar+b+ba gra
306b5(rgyud 'grel): na hA na tra yA ya yA hi na dr-i dzu traM traM phaT phaT swA hA/ snying po'o// gtor mA nai yi ge gsum gyis byin b+hisr-i brla bas+ya te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+ma NAM a d+ya nutan+nan+yA tAta oM AHhUM phAT swA hA/ zhes 'byung b+h+yo thams cad ba'i

307a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yos sna tshogs rdo rje dang // bang steng rgyal ba 'od dpag med// mnga' dang mchog sbyin phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhugs pa dang // gzhu dang mi 'jigs phyag rgya dang // bum pa dag ni legs par

307b1(rgyud 'grel): po ni// ut+pal mdog 'dra rdo rje grwayon// g.yas pa rnga yab mdzes 'dzin pa// mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshalo// shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi yi// khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi po ni// mdun na khro rgyal mi g.yo ba//
307b2(rgyud 'grel): sngo bsangs g.yas na ral gri 'dzin// g.yon na sdigs 'dzub skra brdzes pa// sbrul rgyan stag gi sha ma thabs can// pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs// mA rungs 'dul la phyag 'tshalo// khro chen 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni/
307b3(rgyud 'grel): sngo bsangs lcags kyu 'bar ba bsnams// ma rungs 'dus pa'i rgyan cha can// thams cad 'gugs la phyag 'tshal lo// khro chen dbyug pa sngon po ni// zhal cig phyag gnyis g.yas pa na// dbyug tho g.yon pa sdig
307b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mdzad// sngo bsangs kun 'dul khyod la bstod// khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che// ut+pal mdog 'dra phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub g.yon// bdud 'dul drag po khyod la bstod// zhal gcig
307b5(rgyud 'grel): phyug gnyis sku mdog sngo// kun kyang stag dang sbrul gyis brgyan// pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs// bar chad zhi mdzad khyed la bstod// steng gi phyogs na mdzes pa yi// gr-i nas gtsang lha yi ba gnyis po// lha yi
307b6(rgyud 'grel): bu ni gnyis po yang // lha yi rgyan dang na bzas mdzes// phyag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs kun la snyoms// dag pa'i sku la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig nang par sngar langs te// bstod pa
308a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis dus kun tu// 'khor dang bcas la bstod gyur na// blo dang tshe rnams 'phel ba dang // dpal dang 'byor pa'i dngos grub ster// mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// gus pa'i
308a2(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis sngar langs nas// rtse gcig sems kyis pastong par bya// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i bstod pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya uSh+NI
308a3(rgyud 'grel): Sha si tA ta pa tre sto tra/ bodra skad du/ 'phags ma gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo la bstod pa/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo// srid gsum ston pa mi dang lha yi lha// mtshungs med ba
308a4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs shAkya seng ge yi// mthun mthing g.yas su 'khyil ba'i spyi gtsug nas// ya mtshan rmad byung lha mo khro rgyal gtso// khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra'i mgon med de// thugs rje'i dbang phyug bkra shis
308a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi lha// sku mdog gangs ri'i rtse la nyi shwar 'dra// zhal mang stong la spyan mang bye bas brgyan// srid pa'i btson rar sems can nyam thag pa'i// sdug bsngal gzigs nas sems can nyam thog la// zhal

308b1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms mdzad pa// rgol ba tshar gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma rig nor pas bslus pa'i sems can rnams// rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa yis// 'du
308b2(rgyud 'grel): ba rnam bzhi'i rims nad mi bzang pa/ zhi mdzad thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod// ji ltar khyod kyis sems can mang po la/ thugs rjes mchog gis 'gro don

310a1(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim pos gang ba'i khyim phor bzhi banag ya bya'o// de'i phyi rol tu phyogs bzhir sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam tsan dan dmar pos yongasu bsgos pa'i skud pa dmar po yongasu bcings pa'i seng sde
310a2(rgyud 'grel): gi phur pa btsugs te/ yungs dkar dang / oM g+haHg+haHg+hA ta la sogs pa'i sngags kyis gdab par bya'o// bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba'i skud pas yongs su dkri bar bya'o// me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang /

310a5(rgyud 'grel): bdugs byas shing // dri zhim me tog rnams kyis dkris// brtsed du byams pa'i sems 'jug pas/ shar du mngon par phyogs tAM gtsang zhing 'dzAm bi'i stan la nye bar 'dug ste// rang gi lha'i nga rgyal du byas pa'i
