348a4(rgyud 'grel): pas blangs te/ bum pa'i hUMs rnam+b+ha su kAk+ko la dang / tsan dAn dkar po la sogs pa shin tu dri zhim pa bkra shis pa gang yang rung ba dag gis rdo rje la sogs pa phyag rgya'i ri mo rnams legs par bri bar bya'o// de nas bdud rtsi
348a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs sbyor gyi sngags/ oM a mr-i to hU~M phaT ces bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pas gu gul la btab ste/ des bum pa bdugs nas chu mig gam/ rdzing bu 'am/ chu klung bkra shis pa gang yang rung bI'i chu go tsang ma blangs ni s+yA stsas
348a6(rgyud 'grel): chags med pa legs par btsags po des bkong ba'i bum pa'i nang du rin po che sna lnga ste/ dung dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byu ru dang / gser te rin pa cheng lta bu dag dang / sman lnga ste/ go ri kaR+Shi dang / sau ha dang / bya gri dang
348b1(rgyud 'grel): ha sa dang / ha sa de ba 'di rnams dang / sa bon sna lnga ste/ nas dang / 'bras dang / mon sran gre'u dang / gro dang / tIl te 'di rnams dang / spos lnga ste/ tsan dan dang / glur kum dang / du ru kA dang / a kaT dpag pur ro// dri dang ldan pa 'ang
348b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang bzhag go// bum pa'i mgul pa la yang tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa la yang bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyis btab pas bcings la// dar ram ras dkar po sar pas yang bcings te/ bum pa'i kha shing a mra'i rigs ha sa
348b3(rgyud 'grel): ka ra zhes bya ba yal ga dang / me tog dang 'bras bur ldan pa 'am/ yang na zhim po 'khri shing dang yol ga gzhan gang yang rung ba dag kyang gzhug go// bum pa legs par bkang nas de'i 'og tu legs par khrus bya'o//
348b4(rgyud 'grel): khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te thogs nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs sgor 'greng ste/ de'i sngags kyis 'bar ba'i mig gis shar phyogs su bltas la bgegs bsal ba'i sngags kI lI kI l-I sau gol
348b5(rgyud 'grel): de ljon par brjod do// yungs kar gyis kyang bgegs bsal bar bya'o// bgegs thams cad bsal nas dra ba dang ra ba phur bu bya ste// na myAHsarba ta b+hA ga te b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+hi kau pa badz+re kI li k+Shi lA ya
348b6(rgyud 'grel): ke a swAhA/ rje bur dro'i phrugaso// namaHsa thA a mug te brgyanan// sasu na ya rdzog ga/ nam lag tu
349a1(rgyud 'grel): gA na ka swA hA/ rdo rje ra ba'i sngags so// cho ga lhag chad du gyur pa'i phyir zhi ba'i sbyin sreg legs par byas nas dbang ldan gyi phyogs la sogs pa dkyil 'khor phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu d+ha bi da la sogs
349a2(rgyud 'grel): pa lha rnams so so'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi tshig gis stan drang bar bya'o// de la log pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis ral gri ltar bsgrengs po 'di ni drA bau de'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ na mo rat+na tA ya
349a3(rgyud 'grel): yan ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+rA b+hU Nau ye/ ma hA yek+Sha ma nA pa ta ye/ oM dri bi da pa ra hU~M phaT/ lag pa g.yon mdzub mo gaunyis ka logasu gzhug la lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum par byas pa 'di ni gtum po chen po'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ oM
349a4(rgyud 'grel): ma hA tsaN+Da hU~M phaT/ gong ma bzhin du phyag 'tshal ba'i tshig dang yang ldan par bya'o// lag pa gnyis snyim pa khong stong du sbyar du 'di ni stobs po che'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM ma hA ba lA hUM phaT/ snyim bI bkon lnga mthe'u chung
349a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi rgyab tu srin lag gnyis sbyar te gung mo gnyis yang de bzhin du de'i rgyud tu sbyar nas nang du bkug la mo dzub mo glanyis rtswa spyad de na the bo gnyis so so'i ngos la gzhar ba 'don gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya ste/
349a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags la/ oM a pa rA dza te hUM phaT/ log pa gnyis snying gar byas la srin lag gnyis nang du bkug ste phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo mithe bo dang mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad 'dud par byas la/ gung mo gnyis gauzhibs pa'i
349b1(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa nas gang gis ma reg par bya ste/ mthe bo gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis kyang gshibs pa 'di ni/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya las thams cad byed pa yin te/ sngags la/ oM badz+ra dzA
349b2(rgyud 'grel): la nA ya swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis phye ste bkug nas nas tsam gyis mA reg par bya ste/ mthe bo gnyis bar du gshibs pa ni rdo rje yangs pa'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM ha na hA na hUM phaT/ snyim pa bkrin
349b3(rgyud 'grel): la mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bsnol te bzhag pa'i bar du mA the bo gnyis kyi bkab lA mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo'i tshogs dbu ma la gzugs/ srin lag gnyis gshibs te ba~Msgreng ba'i tshogs dang por gung mo gnyis bkug pa'i
349b4(rgyud 'grel): mo btsugs pA nI kI li kI l-i phyag rgyu ste/ sngags la/ ai kI lci kI lAM ba lA kI li kI li yau swA hA/ lag pa gnyis sdor mo'o nang du bsnol te khu tshurar+ya bcangs la mthe bo dang / gung mo dang mthe'u chung rnams so soR+Sha gshibs te
349b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrengs pa 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin po'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM badz+ra d+h+ri ka 'di la re re nas lag pa'i phyag rgya sngar bcings la/ e h+ye hi zhes bya ste/ re re la yang bskul ba'i sngags dang sbyar la son so sba lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig
349b6(rgyud 'grel): btib la dbul lo// de nas dbang po la sogs pa rnams so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drang po dang / gang na bstan pa dang / mchod yon la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// shar phyog su~M kha bltas te rkang pa g.yas brkyang ba'i
350a1(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i phyag rgya sta zur phyogasu bzhug par bya/ sngags la/ oM ha nA ha na b+hi na nga badz+ra hUM phaT/ rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis lag pa
350a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bskyod de gu ya bsau las ni brgya byin spyan drang ngo // lag pa gnyis brkyang la phyag rgya bkrol la slar btang ngo // me'i phyogasu bltas te log pa brkyang la mdzub mo bkug ste rtse mo gung mo'i
350a3(rgyud 'grel): tshigs gsum par gzugs so// sngags la/ oM badz+ra na ma hA d+hU ha dz+wa la yau sarba ma hA b+hasmiM ku ru sarba duSh+TA na hUM phaT/ mthe bo la mthil du sbyar te brtan por bzhag la g.yabs pas ni spyan drang ngo // mdzub mo ma the bo'i ngos la
350a4(rgyud 'grel): btsugs la phyir drag tu brkyang bas ni slar btang ngo // gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas te 'greng la snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste/ sor mo phan tshun bsnol la khu tshur dam du ba tsadwe tau srin lag gnyi ga shibA te bsgreng na snying gar bzhag par
350a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ aM badz+ra kI la daN+Da ha na ha na hUM phaT/ srin lag gshibs pa la nang du bzlog pas ni spyan drang ba'o// nang du bzlog pa las phyir phyung ba gshibs pas nI slar btang ngo // bden bral gyi phyogasu rkang pa mnyam par
350a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs pa la mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis ral gri 'dra bar gshibs te bsgrengs la lag pa g.yon pa yang de'i tshul gyis zhags pa 'dra bar byas tau/ sta zur logasu bzhag par
350b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// sngags la/ oM nai ri te rak+Sha sa a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste g.yabasra pas spyan drang ngo // phyir bkyed de bkrol bas ni slar btang ngo // chu lha'i phyogasu rkang pa mnyam par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu
350b2(rgyud 'grel): tshur bcangs nas/ mthe bo dang mdzub mo zhags mig ltar bya/ g.yon pa la yang de ltar byas te/ snying gar bzhag go// sngags ni/ oM nA ga badz+ra A na ya sarba d+ha na dA n+ye nI d+ya n+yo su bar+Na ma Ni/ muka ti ka ra d+hi ni/ sarbo ka ra ni sh+tsa/ badz+ra d+ha ra sa
350b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ya ma nu sma ra ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/ ban+d+ha pan+d+ha/ ha ra ha ra/ pradz+nyA nAM ma hA tse da hUM phaT/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g.yabs pas ni spyan drang ba'o// phyir bkyed de bkrol bas ni slar btang ngo // rlung lha'i phyogasu 'greng la
350b4(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshogs dang por mdzub mo bkug pa'i thor tho btsugs lnga/ lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te/ snga zur logasu bzhag go// sngags la/ oM badz+ra a nI la ma hA d+he
350b5(rgyud 'grel): gra A ni la ma hA d+he ga oMn ya sarba duSh+TAn+tu hUM phaT/ mdzub mo de nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang slar btang bar bya'o// ku be ra'i phyogs su rdo rje bcings pa nang du bzlog nas mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs te brkyang ba'i rgyab tu so so
350b6(rgyud 'grel): srin le bzhag par bya'o// sngags la/ oM kuM bi ra yak+Shi a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje lngarau bkug sde g.yabs pas spyan drang ngo // de phyir bkyed de bkrol bse ni slar gtang ngo // dbang ldan gyi phyogs su kha
351a1(rgyud 'grel): bltas te 'phreng la snyim pa dkan nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bcug ste bsnol/ gung mo gnyis gAshibs te bsgrengs pa'i rgyab log su rdo rje ltar bya/ mthe bo gnyis bar du gshibs te
351a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go/ sngags la/ oM dr-i hUM bi la badz+ra shu laM swA hA/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo sbed paM las nang du g.yebs pas ni spyan drang ngo // phyir bak+Shed de bkrol bas na slar btang ngo // 'gro gr-i ni lag pa gnyis pad+ma ltar byas la
351a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan drang ba dang slarA btang bar bya ba la yang nang du g.yebs pa dang phyir bkrol bas bya'o// sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA rI/ oM dra bi ti swA hA/ steng gi ni grA ha shu d+ya pra ba tidz+yo ta ma yas+thA tA// phyogs kyi lha rnams kyi phyag
351a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya dang / sngags 'di dag kyang bshad zin to// de nas mchod yon phul nas dra bi da la sogs pa legs par mchod de/ me tog chu la skyes pa dang / thang la skyes pa dang / bdug pa so ga che gas kyi yan lag ma yin
351a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i yid du 'ong ba dag dang / mar dang / 'bru mar gyi mar me dang / tsan dana? dang / gra pur+ya dang / gur kum la sogs pa'i dri bsung can+da dang // khur ba bkra shris ljon/ 'bras chan zho dang sbyar bas mchod nas/ dbang po la
351a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rnams la sha chang ma yin pa dang / sha chang de dang sbyar ba ma yin pa'i bshos cha mang po dbul lo// de dag gi 'khor gyi gdon rnams la ni sha chang dang ldan par sbyin no// de ltar sha dang chang rtsa ba dang /
351b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dang / bgegs kyi kha zas ci yang rung ba byin na phyi rol gyi 'khor bgegs kyi gzugs can gang yin pa de dag des dga' bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i lha rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshigasu bcud pa 'di yang bsgrags
351b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ lha yi rgya lho gro don gyi bdag/ shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ mchod pa bgyid cing phyug kyang 'tshal// me skaM bsreg bya zla ba'i lha// me lha'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ phyogs
351b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tsho l-I/ gshin rje bai con 'chang ba'i lha/ ma mo'i bdagu po gau don gyi bdag/ lho phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas lA/ mchod pa bgyid cing phyog
351b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'tshal// bden dang byal ba legs ldan lha// srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ lho nub gdon gyi tshogasra bcas la/ mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// zhags pa thogs pa chu'i lha// bden pa bsrung po gdon
351b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag/ nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha// tshig srung gdon gyi bdag pa ste// rlung gi phyogs kyi gdon btses la// mchod pa bgyid cing
351b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag kyang 'tshal// gnod sbyin lag na dbyug tho thogs// nor bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste// byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa laM// mched pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha// bgegs
352a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ byang shar gdon dang bcas pa la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// 'og gi sa yi lha mo mi ku mo chen mo zhi ba ste// sa bdag 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i mchogs yi lha me
352a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// steng gi lha chen thams cad dang / nyi ma zla ba gza' chen dang / gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la// mchod cing bstod de phyug kyang 'tshal// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
352a3(rgyud 'grel): su 'dug la bum pa rnams phyogs bzhir bzhag nas// de nas dug bzhin du sngags dang ldan par phyag rgya bcings la/ bum pa rnams kyi nang du lha rnams bkod nas gau rims ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan rangs pas
352a4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod bya'o// yang nu snyi po brgyad po re ras bum pa rI re la ldan brgya rtse brgyad bzlas nas/ rtsi ba'i sa bon dang / sdong bu'i sde bon dang / snying po'i sa bon dang / 'bras sA lu'i sa bonaM dang / me tog gi sa bon dang /
352a5(rgyud 'grel): gre sar gyi sa bon dang / lo ma'i sa bon te/ sa bon sna bdun gyi phye ma zhib mo til mar gyis sbyar te/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags kyis legs par btab ste/ de nas khrus byed pa la sogs shig tu lus bkrus shing
352a6(rgyud 'grel): dril te/ khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gon te dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bkug nas de la bsrung ba chen pa bya'o// de nas gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa byin te dkyil 'khor du de btsug la/ gus pas
352b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag byas nas cho ga bzhin du nAd+ha du zhugs te 'dug pa'i 'og tu sngags bzlas shing bum pa re re nAs legs par khrus byed du gzhug go// shin tu bde ba dang / legs pa dang / bkra shis pa dang / rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur ces
352b2(rgyud 'grel): tsos b+h+yo ba'i tshig dang / rol mo'i spyi skad rab tu sbyin pa dang yod ldan par bya'o// yungs kar dang zho dang d+hA dur b+ha dang / lo khri da mi long dang / dung dang / bil ba'i 'bras bu dang / gi zhung rnams yang slob ma'i nang du ras khri'u chang
352b3(rgyud 'grel): ting po'i steng du rdzas de bzhag ste/ slob ma de bkra shis 'don pa'i lag tu bzhag la/ de las yungs kar la sogs pa blangs shing de la sbyin no// de nas yang bsrung ba byas la rdo rje phyed de'i lag tu byin te zhi blo dang dga' ba'i
352b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dang ldan pas longs shig ces bya ba'i tshig kyang brjod par bya'o// rdo rje phyed po dri la 'dzin pa'i bgegs thams cad las thar nas ldang bar byed de// zla ba dgro gcan gyis btang ba bzhin du lus sdig pa dang bral
352b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing mdzes so// de nas yang 'byor na mor la stsogs pas zhi ba'i sgron sreg bya'o// bla ma'i yon yang khrus byed pa des shin tu bzang po legs par dbul bar bya'o// de nas mchod yon la sogs pa phul te slar gshegs
352b6(rgyud 'grel): su gsol lo// 'phags pa dr-i bi da'i bum pa'i cho ga rim par phye ba rdzogs so// / @#/ rgya gar skad du/ pra tiny+dza bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ rab gnas kyi tshe
353a1(rgyud 'grel): gA dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// bya ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// rab gnas cho ga brjod par bya// snyan grags mi snyan rnyed ma rnyed// bde sdug bstod dang de bzhin slad// 'jig rten chos kyis ma
353a2(rgyud 'grel): gos pa'i// rdo rje slob dpon drag gis bya// dkyil 'khor dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya dang / byed pa dang / gdan dang / bzlas po dang / sbyin sreg dang / gtor ma dang / mchod pa'i las dang / phab cing bsdu ba ste/ kho na nyid bcu rig
353a3(rgyud 'grel): partag tu sdig pa 'jigs shing d+hAng po dang / lus dang srog la mI lwa ba blo brtan po// 'jog rten pha rol la ltos pa dang bcas pa'o// nyal ba dang / gnyid dang / reg pa'i bde ba dang / bza' dang bgo ba la sogs pa'i nye bar long spyod
353a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la chags pa med pa/ phyin ci ma log pa sgrub pa la snying por byed pa// phyi rol la ma chags pa/ sangs rgyas nyid sgrub par byed pa/ 'khor bas 'jigs pa/ sems can la ltos pa dang bcas pa/ kha na ma tho ba
353a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa/ sdig pa thams cad spangs pa/ 'dod pa'i chugs pa la stsogs pa la srog po la yang dag par mi rtogs pa/ mo gtsang ba dang byams pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i phyog su gyur pa'o// dge ba dang
353a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa mtshan nyid 'di rnams dang ldan pa la/ slob mas gsol ba btab ste/ lugs ma 'am 'bur du byas pa'am/ 'dus byas la sogs pa rab tu gnas par bya ba'i don du rab tu gnas pa'i sa gzhi mngon par
353b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus byas pa/ bla re dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa bslang zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ rgyan med na gser gyi sor gdub gcig thogs te/ de la rab tu gnas pa'i sa gzhi lnga sku gzugs dang // pro ti dang / thang ka 'am
353b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten la sogs pa mdun du yang dag par gzhag ste/ de la sku gzugs sam thang ka 'am/ po ti dang / mchod rten la bsang dang kha bshal ba dang / me tog la sogs pa rnam par sbyin par bya'o// phyis ni na mkha' la gnas
353b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la rnam pa lngas yang dag pa mchod de rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i slob dpon gyis bdug spos kyi snod bzung zhing / na mkha'i khams pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
353b4(rgyud 'grel): la 'di skad brjod par bya'o// sa ma yA s+t+waM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a haM zhes pA la gsum brjod do// ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dga' ldan gnas su rapa gnis nas// lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar// de yi rnam par 'dir
353b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs shig/ rtag tu mgron po 'dir bzhugs nas// che ge mo yI ngon phyir dang // byang chub sems ni 'phel bya'i phyir// me tog la sogs 'di bzhes shig/ ces bya ba 'di mi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lhag par gnas
353b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// phyis ni bstod cing sbyin sreg gi dus su yang ji lta ba'i bstod pa bya'o// sku gzugs la sogs pa'i mdun du yang / yungs kar lag pa g.yon pa dang g.yas pa gnyis su bzung ste/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis
354a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas skor du lan gsum du bskor zhing yungs kaR+Sha de rnams me la blugs par bya'o// g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis g.yon du lan gsum du bskor zhing yungs kar mer blugs par bya ste/ 'dis ni rtog pa
354a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa khams gsum du skyon bsal po'i ched du bskor bar bya ba ni/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+rA ya swA hU~M/ zhes brjod de// de nas khyer ba dang bcas pas chu blangs te me de nyid du blugs par bya'o// de sngon du song bas sku gzugs
354a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rab tu gnas par bya'o// zhes bya ba ni lhag par gnas pa'i rim pa'o// de nas phyi dro'i dus su bum pa ni lha 'am brgyad dam gcig kyang rung ste/ dri zhim pA dang btsas pa'i chus yongasu bkang la skye lA gi su gnyis

354a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / gr-i dang / nas dang / mon sran gre'u dang / til dang / 'bras so ba dang / 'bru sna lnga dang / rnam par rgyal po dkar po dang / pr-i ha tI dang / kaN+Da ki da / ha sa de bo dang / der+t+ti ta pa la dang / sman lnga'o// de rnams dang yang drag pAr ldan par
354a6(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ zlum por byas la bzhag par bya'o// bum pa so sor blangs te/ oM ruM ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha naM swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa re byas pa 'am/ yang na byin pa'i sngags
354b1(rgyud 'grel): yIste gsum dang sbrel pa 'dis phyi dro'i dus su bum pa mngon par bya'o// nang par snga bar sgra gzugs gos ser posna bAkris te// kha shar phyogs su bskrun te bzhag la khrus bya'o// do'u khrus kyi rim pa ni 'du yin te/ khwa'i rnam pa lnga/
354b2(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM trAM hrIHaHzhes bya ba'i so bon gyis mngon par bsngags cing dur ba'i chang pus bzhug par bya'o// de nas dri zhim po'i mar nago gis blugs te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA~M ya bi sho d+h+r-i ne swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis mngon par
354b3(rgyud 'grel): bsngag cing dAr ba'i chang bus gzhug par bya'o// de'i rje su u dum pa ra dang / n+ya gro d+ha las skyes pa'i shing shun lags par btags pa 'khor po'i snod kyi dbus su bzhag le g.yas phyogs kyi glor bzhag le/ mar nag dbyung bu bya/
354b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don du sku gzugs la byugs par bya'o// de nas bum pa r+ye re'i chus sku gzugs lo khrus gsol bar bya ste/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// de bzhon gshegs rnams khrus gsol ltar// lha yi chu ni dag pA yis/

354b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i chus sku gzugs la khrus byed por bsgom par bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyis de la gos kyi chu blangs shing rlan med par byas la gdan rang rang gi bzhag par bya'o// 'di ni sku gzugs kyi khrus kyi rim pa'o// /
355a1(rgyud 'grel): gal te thang sku 'am po ti 'am/ bris pa'i mchod rten nam sku gzugs la sogs pa lus byed par 'dod na/ de'i tshe po ti la sogs pa khrus kyi rim pa bya ste/ mdun du me long bstan pa/ me long de la bu'i rnaM
355a2(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga dang / mar nag dang / shun pa la sogs pa'i rim pas sngon bzhin du bum pa'i chus kyang bkru bar bya'o// zhes bya ba ni khrus kyi rim pa'o// de nas nA mkha' la gan+da bI bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi
355a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i rnam pa'i gzugs la khyad par du gzhug par bya'o// gal te sku gzugs sam po tIr byed par 'dod na/ na mkha' lho gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa'i po tI yi ge
355a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par yongasasu gyur par bsam par bya'o// de nas gos zung brtsegs sku la bskon por byas te/ oM ba~Mdz+ra pA sa s+ye swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so// ku sha'i chang bus ni sku gzugs la sogs pa la bsang gtor yang
355a5(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing zhal bsil yang bya'o// me tog la seg pa mchod pa rnam pa lnga sngags 'dis dbul bar bya ste/ oM badz+ra pul+la hU~M da ltar thams cad bya'o// yang de bzhin du chu dang thang la skyes pA yi// me tog 'di ni
355a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog yin te// bdog gis dad pas 'buli lags kyis// ji ltar bde bas bzhes su gsol// lhan cig skyes dang de bzhin sbyar// bdug pa 'di ni mchog yin te// bdag gis dad pas 'bul
355b1(rgyud 'grel): lags na// ji ltar bde bas bzhes su gsol// lhan cig skyes dang de bzhin sbyar// dri zhim bde ba'i mchog yin te/ bdag gis gus pas 'bul lags kyis// ji ltar bde bas bzhes su gsol//
355b2(rgyud 'grel): mar dang marA nag mar me 'od// lha rdzas 'od 'bar mun 'joms pa'i// mi shes thams cad zhi ba'i phyir/ bdag gos dang bas 'bul lags na// ci badre bar ni gzhesu gsol// bza' dang bca'
355b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa yi// lha bshos thams cad yang dag ldan// kha dog dri dang ror ldan pa// khyed la dbul gyis bzhes su gsol/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis 'di rnams kyi go rims bzhin du dbul bar
355b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// ji ltar sbyina? sreg gi dus su yang ar+g+ga la sogs pa'i sngags kyis de bzhin du yang bya'o// de nas sku gzugs kyi spyan thur maus dbye bar bya ste/ i tsak+Sha tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Sh+ya tsak+Sh+ya bi
355b5(rgyud 'grel): sho d+ha na swA hA/ dwe nas rdo rje bzung zhing dril bu dkrolpa nas mr-i skyong rdo rdza ye shes la legasau pas bstod par bya'o// de nong par snga bar sngon bzhin du sbyin srego byas la/ tsA ru'i bza' ba
355b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis dag byed sgrub par bya'o// i di bya ni sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na pra Na ne swA hA/ tsa ru'i bza' ba dbul ba'i sngags so// de nas lhag ma gzhan rnamos slob dpon dang slob ma dang / yon
356a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bzla' bar bya'o// gzhan dag don du gnyer ba la yang cung zad sbyin no// glang yang nye bar dgos pa thams cad sbyin sreg gi dus dang / rab tu gnas
356a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus dang / rab tu gnas pa'i dus kyi rdzas ni rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang zhing yongs su brtag par bya'o// slob ma dang lha bzol ni gang yang phul ba'i nor de rnams mi gnang ngo //
356a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / baN+Di ta don yong rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ce bas bsgrur
356a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o//
357a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde'i man ngag slob dpon bo d+hi satwas mdzad pa bzhug so//
357b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde bklag cing de bzhin gshegs pa bdun mchod de smon lam gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las bsdus te
357b2(rgyud 'grel): rim par bklag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi mdo bklag cing cho ga rim par mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam gyi mdo bklag cing smoni lam gang ba pa la/ mgo mjug dus kun du gnod
357b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dang / 'khon dang bsnab sems dang / ma dad pa dang le lho dang / yid gnyis la sogs te nyon mongs pa'i skyon dang / sems ma 'dres par bsdam zhing bag bya/ gzhu rdeg la sogs pa chad pa dang / gnod pa'i
357b4(rgyud 'grel): las mying yang mi grag par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi yon dang / mthe'u khyad par lnga yid ches shing mos par bya ste/ bka' drin gzo zhing dang ba dang / dad pa dang gus pa'i sems cher bskyed/ mdo sde'i
357b5(rgyud 'grel): phan yon la yid ches pa nges par gzung / sems can la byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems bskyed la/ khyim pa zhig yin na bsnyen gnas kyi khrims bzung / btson dang bu lon can bdag la dbang yod pa rnams thar
357b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya zhing / phongs pa rnam la dpung gnyen bya de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad dang / 'phags pa 'jim dpal-i dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / skyabs grol gyi sku gzugs rgyu ci 'byor pa las gsar du bya/ gsar du ma 'byor na sku
358a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rnying pa ci bzhugs spyan drang / de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ mchod pa zhag dus zin gyi bar du nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par tshar bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las
358a2(rgyud 'grel): mi nyung bar bklag/ 'phags pa chos skyeng ba dang / gnod sbyin rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa dbul ba'i mdo sde bzang po gra gcig kyang rgyun tu bklag/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la zas dang skom dang / yi byad thams cad kyis ci nus su mchod pa
358a3(rgyud 'grel): dang rim gro bya'o// mchod pa bya ba'i zhab grangs ni zhag bdun nam/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ sum cu rtsa lnga 'am bzhi bcu rtsi dgu'i bur du bya ste/ lcogs par byed na nyin lan gsum mtshon lan gsum du mchod cing smon lam
358a4(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ dum chos bklag pa dang mchod pa gzhan rgyun mi 'chad par bya/ cho ga 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs po bdun pa'i mtshan thos shing brjod pa las phan yon 'byung ba yin pas phyug 'tshal
358a5(rgyud 'grel): bab dang bsngo ba'i bar du skabs ci yod par mtshan len mang du smos shing / ci nas kyang mang du thos shing brjed pa'i tshul du bya'o// mchod pa'i yo byad 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du bshams shing gcing sgra che bar bya/ mchod pa
358a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa lnga dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa la sogs pa se yi ma shing rnga dang gar la sogs pa rol mo ci 'byor pa rgyas par bya/ yon bdag dang mchod pa'i las la gtogs pa rnams khrus bya zhing gos gcing ma nyin
358b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mchod pa lan du byed pa'i tshe spo zhing bgo'o// mchod pa'i rim pa ni yo byad tshul bzhin bshams kyi 'og tu dge 'dun dang yon bdag tshogs nas sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par bya ba'i phyir ting nge/
358b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin bsgom/ de nas mchod pa'i tshogs rnams bden pa bdar zhing byin gyis brlabs te nas 'phag pa spyan drang / de nas 'phags pa'i tshogs gdan 'jom ste/ so so'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam/ de nas 'phags pa'i cho
358b3(rgyud 'grel): mngon du dmigs la glang na 'dzom pa'i spyi la phyag 'tshal ba dang michod pa lnga dbul/ bskul ba'i smon lam bklag/ de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad la sogs pa re re la mchod pa dbul zhing mdo las 'byung ba'i smon
358b4(rgyud 'grel): lam gdab par tshar phyin par bya/ de nas kun gyi gzungs kyi snying po logs shig tu phyung ba bzhi bcu rtsi dgu man chad bdun yan chad ci nus su bklag// de'i rjes la rdo lan cig byas nas bsod nams bsngo ba'i smon la mi
358b5(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ de nas bzod par gsol te/ slar gshegs pa'i tshogs bcad bklag ste gyis/ mchod pa bshams pa'i thabs 'byor pa'i stobs kyi ci nus par sbyar te/ maN+Dal tshon po'i steng du tshon phye 'a me/ me tog las rin
358b6(rgyud 'grel): po che sna lnga'i pho brang rta babs dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bzhi pad+ma'i gdan dang bcas po bris pa snam bu bar ma gzhal med khang gi gung la an 'tshim po'i seng ge'i khri dang sbyar te/
359a1(rgyud 'grel): tshon sna lnga'i ras kyis dkris pa'i mdo sde'i po ti dang / de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad kyi sku gzugs bzhugs/ g.yas g.yon du'ang an khri 'tsham pa bzhag la/ g.yas g.yon gyi gral stong du ni de bzhin gshe
359a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi 'khor byang chubi sems dpa' bzhugs par bsham/ g.yas gral slad du ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / dam pa'i chos skyong ba thams cad bzhugasu gsol/ g.yon
359a3(rgyud 'grel): glagral slad du ni gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu gnyis bzhugs par bsham/ shar phyogs kyi ngos su an chung ngu 'am/ gzhong bu 'am many+dzi las gzhi blangs pa'i steng du/ 'phags pa 'jom dpal dang / phyag na rdo dang / skyabs
359a4(rgyud 'grel): grol gi dan 'dzom pa l-i sngon gyi thugs dam bskul zhing mdo sde'i don las 'byung ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa ltar gdon bsham zhing so so'i sku gzugs kyang bzhugs par bya/ lha bzhugs pa'i snamA bu'i gzhi
359a5(rgyud 'grel): yang pad+mas 'khor bar bya/ dbus kyi pad+ma la 'am spyan sngar sgreng ba/ gar sdug cing bde bar gzungs chu'i bum pa kha rgyan dang bcas pa dgu bzhags/ phyi rol gyi snam bu'i nang du bkra shis dang / shing ljon pa la sogs pa'i rkyen la
359a6(rgyud 'grel): 'os pa'i khol ma bkra mi la/ phyi tshon sna lnga'i gzhil meng khang sgo khyud dang / rta babs su bcas pa bri zhing mu tig gi phreng ba dang / do shal gyi khol ma bkod la/ de dag gi steng du lha bshos dang / yon chab la sogs pa
359b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa rnams kyang dgram/ tshon phyes bri bar dka' na me tog dgram pa'am/ maN+Dal tsam bya/ steng du yang bla re dang gdugs ci 'byor pas klubs/ ngos su yang rgyal mtshan dang / tshen sna lnga pa'i ba dan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu
359b2(rgyud 'grel): las lhag pa/ yan chad ci 'byor po rgyas par dgram/ mar me'i kha grangs ni lnga bcu rtsa bzhi mon tshad du bya ste/ de las kha grangs dgu yan chang bzhi bcu rtsa dgu man chad ci nus pa nyin mtshan du bar ma chad par btang / lha
359b3(rgyud 'grel): bshos ni de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad lA cha rI raM/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / skyobs grol la chu re re/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la cha re re/ dam pa'i chos skyong ba s+thi la
359b4(rgyud 'grel): cha gcig/ chos gnyis la cha re re/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu gnyis la cha re re/ spyi gtor chen po gcig 'di rnams so so'i spyan sngar gar 'os par dbab/ ngos gnyis su de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam gyi mdo
359b5(rgyud 'grel): sde nyin mtshan du bar ma chad par thun du bklag/ tshes kyi sbyin pa dbul ba mdo sde grwa gcig gdan khri bsham ste ci nus su bklag/ mchod pa bshams pa'i mdun du/ mchod pa la 'du ba rnams kyi sbyin bshams te/
359b6(rgyud 'grel): mdun du mchod pa rnam pa lnga dgul ba lags par bshams la/ rol mo dang sil snyan byed pa'i grwa gcig kyang zla la bltar te phyed du gzhug/ mchod pa bshams pa ni mdor na tshad nges pa med de/ bde ba can gyi
360a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing gi yon tan gyi bkod pa dang mthun par nus kyang rung / tha ma maN+Dal bya ste/ me tog chu bor gang tsam gyis mchod kyang rung ste/ rang gi 'byor pa'i nyams kyis ci lhogasu 'bad de bya'o// yid kyi mchod pa ni ci
360a2(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang rgya che zhing bzang bar bsams shing bden pa bdar te/ smon lal yang gdab/ lha bshos kyi chu dang / mar me'i grangs kyang mi 'byor na nyung ngu bsgyur yung rung / 'byor na ci 'os pa mang du bskyed kyang rung ngo // dang po mdo sde
360a3(rgyud 'grel): las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rjes khyab par bsgom mo// mchod pa bshams te// de dag bdun tshegs nas phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag bya/ de nas rig pa'i tshul
360a4(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA la goms pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad dmigs su med par stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin tse ran cig bsgom mo// de'i 'og tu ting nge 'dzin lngas langs nas 'di snyam du ches thams cad dmigs su med pa'i don de lta
360a5(rgyud 'grel): pubu yin la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid thugs su chud byas sku dang gsung dang thugs na mkha' dang 'dra bar gyur te/ sgrub pa mi mnga' zhing mthu dang byin gyis brlab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go 'phang brnyes pAr
360a6(rgyud 'grel): yang rung na/ kye ma sems can 'od rnams chos kyi de kho na nyid ma rtogs te/ rmongs pas nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal meng pos gzir te/ nyam thag pa'i gnaso su lhung bar gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyang thog ma med
360b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor ba nas 'gro ba rgyud rnamasu bdag gi gnyen bshes dam pa drin gyi zhing du gyur pa 'ga' yang med de/ bdag gis kyang dang po byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed de/ 'gro ba mang po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i don dpag tu med
360b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bsgrub par dam bcas pa'i dus kyo tshe/ sems can thams cad bdag gir blangs zin pas 'di lta bu la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yal bar 'dor ba ni mi rigs na/ 'di dag ji ltar sdug bsngal las ni gdon//
360b3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba la ni dgod par bya snyam du snying rje dang / byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i brtson pa'i sems drag tu bskyed par bya'o// yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag ni dus dran pa'i sems can spyod pa dang mthu dman pa yin pas//
360b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid gcig pus 'phral du don rlabs po che 'di lta bu ni mi lcogs kyi/ ston pa bde bar gshegs pas sngon ci ltar phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'grib pa na sems can thams cad rjes su bzung ba'i
360b5(rgyud 'grel): spyad du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang sngon gyi smon lamu gyi khyad par rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa lasna blang ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od gyi rgyal
360b6(rgyud 'grel): po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun la mthu brtan dpung ginyer gsol to// de ltar ni 'phags pa rnams kyi mthu dang byin gyis brlabs kyis/ 'gro ba rnams la phan pa bsgrub par bya la/ phyis ni bdag nyid
361a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig pus gzhan la ltos pa med par sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bla na med par bsgrub par bya'o snyam du bsam mo// snying rje dang byams pa'i bskyed pa'i 'og tu/ sems can gyi don bya
361a2(rgyud 'grel): bar brtsam pa'i phyir 'phags pa gdan 'dzem pa'i pho brang dang / mchod pa'i tshogs bshams shing bsdam pa rnam par dag pa'o yid kyi bden pa bdar zhing yid kyis bsngo ba//
361a3(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag
361a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stobs dang / bo tsam ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang / ston pa bde bar gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gang na 'dzom pa'i pho brang
361a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi dkyil 'khor dang / mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar po 'di rnams// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can gyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / bcom ldan 'ad
361a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med kyi zhing gi bkod pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lag mthol ltar mnyam pa tha gru che ba yangs pa/ reg na 'jam zhing bde ba dang / dri ma med
361b1(rgyud 'grel): cing 'od gsal ba/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri bsung dang ldan pa/ lha'i me togu sna tshogs kyi gcal bkram pa/ mtha' rin po che'i pha gusdu brtsigs shing gser dang mu tig gi gram bu dang bye ma brtul ba dang /
361b2(rgyud 'grel): ut+pa la dad+na/ ku mu ta dang / pad+ma 'gying zhing ldem pas khe bsdu pAr gyur cing / chu bya sna tshogs skad snyan+da pa sgrog pa dga' la 'phye zhing lding bas brgyan pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan po'i mtsho dang rdzing dang
361b3(rgyud 'grel): lteng kaM dag gis mdzes par byas pa// rin po che'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa lha'i nor bu dang / mu tig gi rgyun phreng dang / rin po che'i spangs pa/ me tog gi mgo lcogs dang / 'bras bus mdzes par chags pas
361b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yur za zhing ldem la/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha 'khrol ba las dam pa'i chos kyi sgra 'byung ba dang ldan pa cher du sbrengs pas legs par brgyan pa'i sa gzhi la gzhal med khang chen po// rin po che sna
361b5(rgyud 'grel): bdun mchog tu 'bar bar bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rgyas pa ru 'od zer chen po rab tu 'byung gA/ gun swA tha dad pa shin tu rnam par phye ba mtha' yas par rnam par gnas pa/
361b6(rgyud 'grel): yongasu ma chad pa khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang sgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa/
362a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa'i dge 'dun dang ldan pa/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phyo/
362a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa mtha' yas pa rnam par rgyu ga chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang bde ba chen pos brtan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad yang dag par thob par byed pa/ nyer bar gnas pa/ nyon mongs
362a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dri ma'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral pa/ bdud thams cad yongasu spangs pa/ thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa'i gnas dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'byung /
362a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi gnas dang lhag mthong chen po'i bzhon pa yin pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i rgyal po'o snyen mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i
362a5(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa la rten po'i gzhalnga med khang chen por gyur pa'i nang du/ gung la de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad bzhugs par 'os pa'i rin po che'i seng ge'i gdanu khri lha'i dar zab dang ras bcos bu g.yogs pa nem zhing
362a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phar ba'i rlong dang ldan pa'i sku rten dang bcas pa brgyad 'byung zhing g.yas g.yon du yang 'khor gyi gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / chos skyong thugs dam can bzhugs pa'i pad+ma'i gdan brgya stong
362b1(rgyud 'grel): mang po dang / mdun gyi ngos su 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / skyabs grol bzhugs pa'i pad+ma'i gdanA bzung po 'byung ba dang / phyi nang thams cad cha rigs dang 'tsham par mi dang lha'i yo byad dam pa zhal zas dang /
362b2(rgyud 'grel): za' dang / rgyan dang / rol mo la sogs pa phul tu phyin pa sna tshogs phung po gsum pa'i mde dang / bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las 'byung ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyis rgyas par gang zhing rgyan klubs pa dang ldan par gyur
362b3(rgyud 'grel): cig/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pas kyang / de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs shing bzhes te long spyod par gyur cig/ de skad ldan gsum bzlas/ yang de'i rje su la dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
362b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongasu rdzogs pa'i mnga' thab chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig ces lan gsum bzlas/ mtsho dwau pa'i tshogs
362b5(rgyud 'grel): bden pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan drang ba/ pus mo gtsugs te me tog blangs thal mo stA r+ya nas tshig 'di skad ces/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasku gzhan gyis mi thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs
362b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po/ zham 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig bzhugs pa dang / shar phyogs kyi 'jigs
363a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po
363a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa bzhugs pa dang / shar phyogs kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams spos kyis yongasu gang ba rin chen bsags pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
363a3(rgyud 'grel): gser bzang dri med rin tshan snang brtul zhugs grub pa/ byang chuchub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor te bzhugs pa dang / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na de bzhin gshegs
363a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs dpag tu med pas bskor te bzhugs pa dang / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan na de bzhin
363a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas kun nas bskor te bzhugs pa dang / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi/
363a6(rgyud 'grel): khams rin po che'i rgya mtshor legs par gnas pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa
363b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grungs med pas kun nas bskor te bzhugs pa dang / shar phyogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya snang ba na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
363b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyus sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed dang / zla ba lhur rnam par snang byed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa bzhugs pa la sogs
363b3(rgyud 'grel): te de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po 'khor dang btsas pa rnams dgongs su gsol// btsen+da ljin 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba
363b4(rgyud 'grel): na// sems can+da las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ rang sna tshogs kyis lus gzir be/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs por gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha
363b5(rgyud 'grel): dang mi rnams kyis don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i spyad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mang po dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bzang zhing rlabs che ba dang / mthu dang byin gyis blarlabs dpag
363b6(rgyud 'grel): tu ma mchis pa mnga' ba la brten te/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyab dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs
364a1(rgyud 'grel): shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ da ltar bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa gdul bya'i dbang du 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mya ngan las 'das
364a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul bstan kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pas sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing bzhugs pa yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang / sngon gyi smon
364a3(rgyud 'grel): lam chen po dang / sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can las glengs te/ bdag cag rnams mnga' ris kyi gdul bya phyag mtshan du bzhes pa'i nang du gtogs te/ bka' drin thob pa'i 'phro mchis pa tsam la brten te/ che ge mo
364a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchiso nr-i/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad
364a5(rgyud 'grel): de byin gyis brlab du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rje dang / rgyal pa'i sras po skyabs grol la sogs pa byang chub sems
364a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas po'i mdo sde bka' stsal pa'i tshe gang na 'dzem par 'dus te mdo sde byin gyis brlabs shing de bzhin/
364b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub par thugs skyed pa de dgu thams cad kyang che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bsgrub pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang
364b2(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gang ni 'dzem pa chen pos bkas btang cing so so nas kyang lha'i tshig bden pas mdongs
364b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol du zhal gyis bzhes te/ dam pa'i chos dang 'khor rnam bzhi skyong bar mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di yang lhag par phyag mtshan du bzhes pa
364b4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi sras la sogs pa 'phags pa chos skyong ba thams cid kyang che gi mo la sogs/
364b5(rgyud 'grel): pA 'gro ba mang po bsgrub pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchi sa na// mchod pa'i tsho gas sbyar ba'i po brang gis dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin/
364b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab tu gsol// sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzem pa chen po'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'chang ba dang mchod pa la sogs pa'i sems can//
365a1(rgyud 'grel): de dag phyag mtshan du bzhes shing bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen+do ji 'jigs dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin dang /
365a2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang / gnod sbyin gyi ste dpon chen po gnas bcas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dpang 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
365a3(rgyud 'grel): lhung 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsgom 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo bI 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed de/ gnod sbyin gyi
365a4(rgyud 'grel): sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po thams cad la yang sngon gyi thugs dom bzang po las glengs te/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bsgrubs pa'i slad du/ mgon skyobs dang dpung gnyen du stan 'dren zhing mchis
365a5(rgyud 'grel): na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzem pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ skabs 'dir lha klu spyan drang ste/ phyogs skyong 'jog rten skyong dadabang drang ldan
365a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs bsgom dkyil po che/ lha dang drang srong gshin rje srin po klu// rlung lha gnod sbyin bgegs gza' rgyu skar bcas// de dag so si'i dbang po'i skur ston po// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
365b1(rgyud 'grel): skyo ba bzhugs so 'tshal// bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol// sa mA dzaHde ltar spyan drangs pa thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' la byon par
365b2(rgyud 'grel): pos mo// spyan drang ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa'i rjes la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang / 'phags pa lha'i snyan dang spyan rnam par dag pa mnga' ba rnams kyi gsol tshig 'das ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis
365b3(rgyud 'grel): namakha' nas gshegs te/ gzhal yas khang gi dbus kyi seng ge'i khri chen po brgyad la de bzhin gshegs pa brgya du bzhugs/ g.yas g.yon gyi gral stongad du 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhugs
365b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon gyi gral slad du tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis bzhugs// gdan 'dzom pa'i dbus su pad+ma'i gdan lnga byang
365b5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / skyabs grol gsum gdan 'dzom pa la/ sngon gyi thugs dam bskul zhing gsol ba'i phrin las mdzad cing bzhugs par mngon du dmigs shing
365b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang mchid pa'i tshogs kyang sngar bden pa bdar ba'i tshul dang 'dra bar gyur par bsam zhing mos pa bskyed spyan drangs pa'i rjes la/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa la spyir
366a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal zhing ga mchod nas bskul zhing gsol gde nas mchod pa'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i pho brang na 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa bzhugs par mngon du dmigs bzhin du/ mchod yon la sogs pa
366a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul zhing rol mo bya/ de nas phyag 'tshal ba 'greng phyag bdun bdun bya ste/ de bzhi Da pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhab 'brang
366a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig dang bcas pa la phyag 'tsha lo// skyabs su mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang / zla ba dang pad+ma sa rab tu brgyan po
366a4(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// skye bsu mtsho'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bo tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser
366a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang dri med rin chen snang po rtul zhugs grub pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nos bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// skyabasu mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drug par
366a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal byang che ba sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal-i lo// skyabasu mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
366b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// skyabasu mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
366b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blas rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas kun nas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// skyabs su mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das
366b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi zla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byedas zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed la sogs pa byang chub sems
366b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs grang med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// skyabs su mchi'o// ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tsha lo// skye ba su mchis
366b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / skyabs grol la sogs pa la gus par phyag 'tshalo// skyabasu mchi'o// tshangs pa dang lho'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal
366b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po bzhi la sogs pa dam pa chos skyong ba thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la sogs te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshalo// skyabs
367a1(rgyud 'grel): mchi'o// 'phags pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad la mchod yon dang byug pa/ me tog dang bdug spos/ zhal zas dang mar me/ rol mo dang sil snyan/ gdugs dang ba dan la sogs pa dngos su ci 'byor pa 'di dag
367a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / phyogs bcu na bdag pos ma bzung ba'i lha dang mI'i rdzas dam pa bde ba'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / gzungs dang / rig pa'i mthu dang / myos pa'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin bzang po
367a3(rgyud 'grel): spyospong po'i smon lam las 'byung ba rgya mtshe thams cad kyis namakha'i mthas klas po/ chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ dbul lo mchod do// ming 'di zhes po gyi ba dang / bdag cag gis thog
367a4(rgyud 'grel): mo ma mchis pa nas 'khor po'i tshe rabs thams cad du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mdor na mi bgyi bar rigs pa'i las ni bgyis/ bgyi bar 'os pa'i las nam bgyis pa la sogs pa'i dang sdig ci mchis pa thams cad yang
367a5(rgyud 'grel): dag par 'chag so// dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dang skye bo'i dge ba mtha' dag gi bsod nams thams cad la rje su yi rang ngo // phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bla ni med pa bskor bar bskul lo//
367a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi sgron ma gang dge mya ngan las 'da' bo'i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'jig rten gyi don mdzad cing yun ring du bzhugs par gsol bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das
367b1(rgyud 'grel): gdan 'dzom pa chen po dgongs su gsol// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po rnams kyis slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba ni/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa
367b2(rgyud 'grel): nad sna tshogs kyis lus gzir pa/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rje su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyis don dang / phan pa'i dang bde ba'i slad du/ sngon bcom
367b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa rlabs po che ji ltar btub cing byin gyis brlabs pa dang / don de
367b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid da ltar bdag cag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pas ji ltar bka' stsal cing byin gyis brlabs dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / skyabs grol la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
367b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bka' lung yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / so so'i dgongs spyod rgya chen po rdzogs par bsgying ba'i slad du/ mdo sde'i don bsgrub pa'i phrin khris mdzad par
367b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa'i bka' btags pa'i zhal gyis bzhes shing ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshangs pa dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen bcu gnyis la sogs te/
368a1(rgyud 'grel): lha'i dge bsnyen chen po thams cad kyis gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sbyar mdo sde dang // mdo sde 'dzin pa'i sems can bsrung ba dang bskyab par zhal gyis bzhes pa la sogs pa/ sngon 'phags pa rnams kyis ji ltar
368a2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa de rnams gang na 'dzem par mdzad pa'i pho brang gi dkyor bshams 'byor pa'i stobs ci mchis pas mchod pa
368a3(rgyud 'grel): tshotshitshogs sbyar nas/ gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mtshan nas brjod de mchod pa 'bul bskul zhing smon lam gsol te bka' drin nod cing mchis na/ gdan 'dzem pas sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ mdo sde'i cho
368a4(rgyud 'grel): gag yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing phan yon ji skad 'byung ba'i bka' drin thams cad che ge mo la sogs pa bdag cag gi 'phral du thob par mdzad du gsol// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa rnams la re re nas mchod pa dbul zhing smon lam ga ba ste//
368a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal zhing smra ba su mchi'o// zhes lan bdun brjod de ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa
368a6(rgyud 'grel): phul la smon lam 'di skad ces gdab po// deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i tshogs gdan 'dzem pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po'i mtshan thos te/ yid la dran zhing lan bdun
368b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa dang / phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po de'i sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag nad sna
368b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir cing / rims dang / gshed byed dang / byang dang ro langs dang / 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa de dag thams cad kyis gnod pa dang / nad thams cad 'phral du byang zhing gtan du rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ byang
368b3(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rims dang sdig pa can gyi gdon rnams med par gyur cig/ rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag long pa dang 'on pa dang / smos pa dang / sha bkra dang / nad tshabs po ches btib
368b4(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dbang po thams cad yongasu tshang bar gyur cig/ sdug bsngal dang nad thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang /
368b5(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis bsgribs pa/ mtshams med pa la byed pa/ bya ba ma yin pa'i spyod pa mang ba/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs byed pa/ ngan song gsum dang / sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba
368b6(rgyud 'grel): dang sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag thams cad kyi mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang zhing zad par gyur cig/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyun 'phral
369a1(rgyud 'grel): du chad cing bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur cig/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas kyi bar du su yang sems can dmyal ba dang ngan 'gror 'gro bar ma gyur cig/ lha yul ba'i bde ba dang / mi'i bde ba myong bar
369a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag dbul por gyur te/ zas dang / skom dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mal cha dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / yo byad mi bdogs pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du
369a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyig dang gos dang / nor dang 'bru dang / mal cha dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang yo byad 'phel bar gyur cig/ bdag cog la sogs pa'i sems can gang dag bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / gau rar gzhug po dang / mtshon cha'i tshegs rnam pa sna
369a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis lus yongasu gzir ba de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bcing ba dang / brdeg pa thams cad las yongasu thar par gyur cig/ lus kyi gdung ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ bdag cag la sogs
369a5(rgyud 'grel): pa sems can gang dag mgron med par gyur pa lus lo gdung ba'i me 'bar ba dang / seng ge dang stag dang / dom dang dreng dang / sbrul gdug pa'i nang du chud de/ srog la 'bab cing nyam thag po de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug
369a6(rgyud 'grel): ra du lus la gdung ba'i me thams cang rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / sbrul gdug po de dag kyang byams pa la gnas par gyur cig/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag phan tshun
369b1(rgyud 'grel): 'thab rtsod cing 'gyed la/ 'khrugs shing 'jigs skrag nas spangs pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'thab rtsod dang 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ phan tshun byams pa la gnas par gyur cig/ bdag cag las/
369b2(rgyud 'grel): pa sems can gang dag chu'i nang du son te grur zhugs pa/ gleng med par phyin pa/ srog 'dod pa/ chu klung dang / rgya mtsho'i nang du son te/ smre sngags sna tshogs 'don pa/ de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gri bar du chu klung chen po de
369b3(rgyud 'grel): dag las dbugs 'byin pa sbyin par gyur cig/ 'jigs pa med par rgal bar gyur cig/ 'o nas shi 'phos nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags
369b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pad+ma'i snying po'i seng gri'i khri la rdzus te skye zhing skyes ma thag tu gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i ljon gyi tshogs thams cad mngon du gyur te/ ston+da pa bla na med pa mtshan legs par
369b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad las bka' lung yang dag par nod pa dang / thugs mnyes par byed cing skad cig skad cig la sangs kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med pa
369b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug par gyur cig/ gzhan yang bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad re ba thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsha

376a4(rgyud 'grel): tu dang med cing tshe ring por gyur cig/ log par ltung bar na mi yang 'gro bar ma gyur cag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog

376a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa chos rma mtsha mchog gi thos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i mtshon thos te yid la dran zhing lan bdun brjod de phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus ji bzhin gshegs
376b1(rgyud 'grel): chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag zhing las dang sa bon 'debs pa dang tshod byed pa dang
