382b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / mar me rnams kyis mchod par bya/ yan lag brgyud pa'i bsnyen granas la nye bar gnas la nyin bdun gtsang bar byas te sa phyogs gtsang mar byas thing
382b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi zhe der skye bar smon lam gdab/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje ba'i sems su byas nas/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal
382b3(rgyud 'grel): po des dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems par 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'brel bar 'gyur
382b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gauti mug dang bral bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho zhing nad med par 'gyur/ gang bsams pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang pa'i thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa
382b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang sdig pa thams cad zad par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i sangs
382b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi zhing der pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la rdzas te skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon du 'gyu ro zhes ji skad bka' stsal pa dang / yang 'di skad du gro gas po dag de bzhin
383a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa'i mtshan dang / gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag nyin lan gsum mtshan ldan gsum du sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems kyis
383a2(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ gtsang mar byas nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan par byas na/ de'i mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sdig pa thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ 'di nas shi 'phos na
383a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der pad+ma'i snying po'i song ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi
383a4(rgyud 'grel): yang de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs par 'gyur/ re pa dang bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhes ji srid bka' stsal pa dang / yang 'di skad du 'jam dpal gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ba
383a5(rgyud 'grel): pa mya ngan med mchog dpal de'i mtshan thos te/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod pa dang sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal de la mchod
383a6(rgyud 'grel): pa byed pa de dag gis las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du log par ltung bar
383b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ skye ba dran par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyis rje su bzung bar
383b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// zhes ji skad bka' stsal pa dang / yang 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs de'i mtshan thos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / dad par byed pa dang / rab tu gus pas mchod par byed pa de sdig pa
383b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad yongasu byang nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du tshe ra bos dran par 'gyur nam du yang byang chub kyi sems dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin
383b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ rtag tu nad med cing tshe ring bar 'gyur/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang log par
383b5(rgyud 'grel): ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ gang dang gang du skyes par bsams ma thag tu gos dang rgyan dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur ro// zhes ji
383b6(rgyud 'grel): skad bka' stsal pa dang / yang 'di skad du/ 'dzam dpal gang la la zhig gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po de dag gi mtshan thos la thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang // nang par langs nas yid la byed pa dang / dad par
384a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis mchod pa dang / glegs bam du bris te 'chang ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi gar 'bri ba dang /
384a2(rgyud 'grel): yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / sems btud de gzhan las nyan pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la yang 'tshog chas dang / yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa byed pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi
384a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes ji skad bka' stsal pa dang / yang 'di skad du/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po de'i smon lam dang thabs mkhas pa tshad med
384a4(rgyud 'grel): cing bskal pa bas lhag par yang brjed mi nu so// 'jam dpal so so'i skye bro gang dag dge ba dang mi dge ba mi shes pa dag yod de/ de dag ni chags pas zil gyis non cing / sbyin po dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu ma shes te/ nor sog cing
384a5(rgyud 'grel): srung ba la brten gyi sbyin pa yang dag par 'gyed pa la sems mi 'gro ste/ sbyin po'i dus nye bar gnas pa na rang gi lus kyi sha las bcad pa bzhin du yid mi dga' bar 'gyur la/ bdag nyid kyang du ma yongs mi spyod na/ pha ma dang / bu slang
384a6(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yog 'khor la lta ga ster/ gzhan slong ba rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i sems can de lta bu dag ni sha 'phos nas yi dgas sam dud 'gror skye bar 'gyu ro// de la gang dag sngon mir 'gyur ba na de bzhin gshegs
384b1(rgyud 'grel): sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos pa de dag ni yi dgas sam/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas gang yang rung ba der de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur zhing dran ma thag pa tsam gyi
384b2(rgyud 'grel): cho 'phos nas yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// ngan 'gro'i 'jig pas skrag nas 'dod pa'i yon tan don du mi gnyer ba dang / smyon pa la dga' ba dang / sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / bdog pa tha~Md
384b3(rgyud 'grel): yongasu gtong bar 'gyur te/ rim gyis rang gi mgo dang / yan lag+sa dang / sha khrug kyang slong ba rnams la rab tu sbyin par 'gyur na/ nor gyi phung po gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag de
384b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i gnas log par 'dzin pa dag yod de/ gang dag tshul khyim dang ldan pa de dag ni tshul khrims tsam bsrung gi mang du thos pa yongasu mi tshol/ mang du thos pa dag ni mdo sde rnams kyi don
384b5(rgyud 'grel): zab mo mi shes shing lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur te/ gzhan dag la phrag dog byed cing dum pa'i chos la dpeng zla zhing spong bar 'gyur ro// mi blun po bdud kyi phyogs rang yang lAm dran par zhugs la/ gzhan bye ba khrag khrig
384b6(rgyud 'grel): brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang g.yangs sa chen por lhung bar byed pa de lta bu de dag ni sems can dmyal ba mi bzang par 'greb 'gyu lo gang dag sngon de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i mtshan thos pa de
385a1(rgyud 'grel): dag ni sems can dmyal ba'i gnas der/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur te/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi'i 'jig rten du skye zhing yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang / brtson
385a2(rgyud 'grel): 'grus dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can du 'gyur/ khyim spangs nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag bdag la
385a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod cing gzhan la smod pa de dag ni ngan song gsum po dag tu lo stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal myong zhing 'od nas shi 'phos nas kyang / ba lang dang / rta dang rnga mo bong bu la sogs pa dud 'gror skye te/ dbyug lcag gis brdag
385a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / bkres skom gyis nyen pa dang / khal chen pos gzir bar 'gyur ro// brgya la mir skyes ni yang rtag tu rigs dma' ba dang / bran du 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ro// gang dag sngon de bzhin gshegs pa sman//
385a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi bla pa DA ri'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i mtshan thos pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des sdug bsngal thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur// dbang po rno bar 'gyur/ mkhas pa dang / gsal ba dang / yid gnyungs pa dang /
385a6(rgyud 'grel): dge ba yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur/ bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i
385b1(rgyud 'grel): chu klung skems par 'gyur/ skye ba dang / rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyu ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang / sems can gang dag phra ma
385b2(rgyud 'grel): lha dga' zhing phan tshun 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed par byed du 'jug pa dag yod de/ sems can de dag rtsod pa'i sems su gyur pas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'du byed de/ phan tshun gnod par bya bri
385b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ nags tshal gyi lha dang / shing gi lha dang / ri'i lha dang / dur khrod kyi 'byung po tha dad pa 'gugs par byed/ dud 'gro dag gi srog gcod cing / sha dang khrag za ba'i srin po rnams mchod par byed do// dgra bo de'i ming nas brjod de
385b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs byas nas der rigs sngags drag po sgrub cing byad dang ro langs kyi sbyor bas srog gi bar chad bya ba dang / lus rnam par gzhig par 'dod pa la gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po
385b5(rgyud 'grel): de'i mtshani thos par gyur pa de dag la gang gis kyang bar chad bya bar mi nus te/ de dag phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / gnod sems med pa'i sems su gnas par 'gyur/ rang rang gi bdog pas
385b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga shes par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / gzhan yang dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa
386a1(rgyud 'grel): gang dag bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nub phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhug mi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar shog cig ces smon lam btab pa de dag las/ gang dag gis de
386a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i mtshan thos pa de dag 'chi kar yang byang chub sems dpa' brgyad rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags nas lamA ston te/ bde ba can der pad+ma tshon sna tshogs can la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro//
386a3(rgyud 'grel): gang la la lha'i 'jig rten du skyes pa de dag ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par mi 'gyur zhing / ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ dri nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi'i 'jig rten 'dir gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
386a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong mang po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par 'gyur ro// gzhan du na yang rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang / nor dang /
386a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba mang po 'byor pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ gzugs dang dbang phyug dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtul phod pa dang / tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan
386a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro// bud med gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi blo bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i mtshan thos pa de'i bud med kyi dngos po de tha ma yin par shes par bya'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi pra bai DUr+ye/
386b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi rgyal po de'i sku gzugs byas te/ nyin zhag bdun du bsnyen gnas la gnas lnga kha zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lus legs par bkrus te/ ges dri ma med pa bgo zhing phyogs gtsang mar me teg sna tshogasas kyi sil ma bkram pa
386b2(rgyud 'grel): spros sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ rang dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshar sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i sa bags su dri ma dang / rnyeg pa dang / gnod sems med pa'i sems dang byams pa dang / btang snyems dang mnyam pa'i sems
386b3(rgyud 'grel): bya rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs blang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la bskor ba byas te/ de'i sngon gyi smon lam yang yid la bya zhing mdo 'di yang ba ton na gang bsam pa dang / gang smon pa'i bsam pa tha~Md
386b4(rgyud 'grel): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ tshe rIng bar smon nu ni tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// longs spyod dang ldan par smon na ni longs spyod 'byor par 'gyu ro// dbang phyugs dang ldan par smon na ni tshogs chung ngu rnyed par 'gyur ro// bu 'dod na ni bu rnyed par
386b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// gang dag sdig pa can gyi rmi lami rmis sam/ gang du bya khra 'am ltas ngan mthong nga mi/ gnas gang du bAkra mi shis pa brgya dag gnas par gyur pa la/ gang dag gis de bzhin gshigasu pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od
386b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal po de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkur stir byed na rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gang dag ma dang chu dang / mtshon dang / dug dang g.yang sa/
387a1(rgyud 'grel): sa dang / glang po che gtum po dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / ngo ma dang / dreng dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / sdig pa dang / rkang lag brgya pas 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmags tshogs dang / rkun po dang / chom po yid 'jigs pa de
387a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la mchod pa byas na 'jigs pa de dag thams cad las yongasu thar bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag skyabs sum 'dzin pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga
387a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dag dang / bsrung pa'i gni ban+d+ha po dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bsgrub po'i gzhi bzhi brgya po ngag dang / dge slong gi bslab pa'i gzhi nyis brgya lnga bcu po dag dang / dge slong ma'o bslab po'i gzhi lnga brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang /
387a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar yongasu bzung ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig nyams te/ ngan 'gro ngan seng gis 'jigs skrag pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la mchod pa sna tshogs byed na/ de dag la ngan song
387a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum po'i sdug bsngal med par shes par bya'o// bud med gang bu btsa' ba'i dus na sdug bsngal drag po myong ba des/ de bzhin du shegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la mchod na/ de sdug bsngal las myur du thar par 'gyur
387a6(rgyud 'grel): bu yang yan lag yongasu tshang bar btsa' zhing gzugs bzang ba lta na sdug pa dang / dbang po rno zhing blo dang ldan pa dang / nad med cing gnod pa med par 'gyu ro// de la mi ma yin pas mdangs 'phrog par mi nus so// gzhan yang kun
387b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' bo ma dad cing yid mi ches te spong du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan su'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de ngan 'gro ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur dwa ni/ gnas ma yin te go skabs medo// kun dka'o/
387b2(rgyud 'grel): bo sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni yid ches par dka'i ba'o zhes jo skad bka' ba stsal pa dang // / tad+ye thA/ g+hu me g+hu me/ i mi na mi hI// ma ti ma ti/ sap+ta ta thA ga tA sa mA d+h+ye d+hoSh+TaM taMta
387b3(rgyud 'grel): a te ma tau/ pA li pA pa sho d+ha ni/ sarba b+h+r-i pan nA sha ya/ ma ma bud+d+he/ bud+d+hot+ta me/ u me ku me/ bud+d+ha/ k+Shi tra pa ri sho d+ha ni d+ha me nai ra d+ha me/ me ru me ru/ me ru shi kha re/ sarba oM kA la mI d+ha ni/ b+ha ra Ni/ bud+d+he su bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+TaM te na rak+Sha tu maM/
387b4(rgyud 'grel): sarba daM bA/ sa me a sa me/ sa man+ta ha ran+tu me/ sarba bud d+ha bo d+h+ye satwe/ sha mai shaM me/ prA sha man+tA ma/ swarba au t+yA ra dra ba byA d+hA ya/ pU R+She pUr+Ne/ pU ra ya me/ sarba A sha paM DUr+yA ya pra ta b+ha se/ sarba pAM paM k+Sha yaM kI rau s+yA tAM/
387b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUR+Ya'i 'od ces bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di gang la lo zhog sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying rje ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po de dug
387b6(rgyud 'grel): gi sku gzugs byas te/ me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byed cing 'tshong ngam/ klog gam/ mchod dam/ nyin zhag bdun du gso sbyong yan lag brgyad la gnas te/ gzungs kyi tshig lan stong rtsa brgyad du bton na de la de bzhin ga
388a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems par 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyang yang dag par bsrung bar 'gyur/ lha dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa thams cad dang / rgyal po chen
388a2(rgyud 'grel): popo bzhi po dag gis yong su bskyang bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad kyi mi thebs par 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ dus ma yin par
388a3(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba dang dgra dang / dgon pa'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar
388a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ ci bsam pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhes ji skad bka' stsal pa 'di ltar nyi zla ni dog sar ltung yang gda'/ ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gnas nas 'pho yang gda'/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las
388a5(rgyud 'grel): yole yang gda'/ namakha' ni drog sar 'gyur / dogs ni nas / cha ba ni zhugs su 'gyur/ zhugs ni chab tu 'gyur/ bser ma ni zhags pa/ bzung du rung bar 'gyur yang gda'i/ lha dang mi'i ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
388a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa sku dang gsung dang / thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa la yongasu ma dag pa mi mnga' ba de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa
388b1(rgyud 'grel): lags na/ che ge me la sogs pa'i don du dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba'i tshul bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang / ston pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdan 'dzem pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor
388b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bshams te/ mchod nas smon lam du gsol pa rdo ci thog pa'i nyams kyis dpags te bgyis pa 'di tsam zhig sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing / bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ da yang gang na 'jom pa tshon pos cho ga yongasu
388b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bskangs te/ byin gyis brlab cing phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi 'phral du theb par mdzad cing stsal du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag
388b4(rgyud 'grel): pa tshad mar gyur pa 'gyur ba mi mnga' ba'i bden pa mngon sum du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thugs dri ma dang skyeskyon thams cad dang bral ba sku yon tan dri med
388b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rten gyi pad+ma la lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rlig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang / cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs 'jom pa la
388b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// mchod de skyabasu mchi'o// bcom ldan 'dis 'phags pa 'jam dpal dus ngan pa'i sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshog skyi bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis
389a1(rgyud 'grel): yun ring po'i bro nad kyis lus kyi sha bas shing / bkres pa dang / sgom pas gre ba dang / mchu ni bskams 'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs/ 'dza' bshes dang / nyi du dang / rnag gi gnyen mtshams ngu ba rnams
389a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni bskor/ phyogs rnams ni mun par mthong / gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni sgor drangs te/ de'i lus 'di na nyal yang rnam par shes pa chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing / mi de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i lha
389a3(rgyud 'grel): slad bzhin du 'brang ba gang lags pa de ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba bgyis pa de dag thams cad legs par yi ger bris nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la phul pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes de la dris shing brtags
389a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ dge ba'i mi dge ba ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du bsgo ba la/ gang dag nad pa de'i don du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la skyabasu mchi zhing / 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas
389a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa bgyis na/ de'i rnam par shes pa slar log cing rmi lam rmis pa bzhin du/ bdag nyid kyis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas mchis te/ yang na ni gdugs bdun/ yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig/
389a6(rgyud 'grel): yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga/ yang na ni gdugs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la/ de'i rnam par shes pa slar bzlog cing dran pa rnyed la/ de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du 'gyur te/ srog
389b1(rgyud 'grel): gi slad yang yang sdig pa'i las myi bgyid do// mchod pa'i sbyor ba ni btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag nad chen po yongasu thar par 'dod pa de dag gis/ nad pa de'i don du nyin bdun mtshan bdun du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso
389b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyong gi sdom pa blang bar bya/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la zas dang skem rnams dang / yo byad thams cad kyis ci nus su mcho pa dang rim gro bya/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das sman gyi pra bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi
389b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi mtshan yid la bya/ mdo sde 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgur gdon par bya'o// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me bud par bya'o// sku gzugs bdun bya'o// sku gzugs re re'i spyan sngar
389b4(rgyud 'grel): mar me bdun bdun bzhag go// mar me re re'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du bya ste/ ci nas kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me mi zad par bya'o// tshon sna snga pa'i ba dan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o// btsun pa kuni dge'
389b5(rgyud 'grel): po gzhan yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la nad kyi gnod pa 'am/ rang ngam pha rol gyi dmags tshogs kyi gnod pa 'am/ rgyu skar ram/ gza' zla ba 'am/ gza' nyi ma'i gnod pa'am/ dus ma yin
389b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rlung ngam/ char ram than pa'i gnod pa yang rung ste/ gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang 'khrug pa zhig nye bar gnas par gyur na rgyal po rgyal rigs skye ba nas dbang bskur ba des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i
390a1(rgyud 'grel): gtses ngag la la ngan pa sna tshogs kyis bklags pa/ lam dang sa dman par 'og nas 'og tu ltung bar 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ gang thos pa tsam gyis ci nas kyang sems can tha~Md
390a2(rgyud 'grel): da pa'i byang chu las phyir phrog par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang zhing bas par 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can gyis mi rdzi bar 'gar ba dang / gnod pa dang mi bde ba thams cad rab tu
390a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba dang / 'dod du'i rdzogs shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi mtshan dang sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde ston pa bcom ldan 'du
390a4(rgyud 'grel): kya thub pa la dmigs kyis zhu ba mdzad cing grang na 'dzom pa'i dbus su 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe srad ma'i dus na/ gang dag mdo 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / 'chad pa dang / gzhan dag le rgya cher
390a5(rgyud 'grel): nga dag par ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi gler 'drir stsol ba dang / glegs bA ma lnga bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid pa'i
390a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od gyi rgyal po de'i mtshan rnam pa sna tshogasu bsgrags par bgyi'o// tha na rmi lam du yang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rna lam du nye bar
390b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrags par bgyi'o// tshon sna lnga pa'i ras rnams kyis dkris te/ phyogs gtsang mar bzhag na gang na mdo sde 'di gnas pa der rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan yang ma mchi bar
390b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyu ro// mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'gum por mi 'gyur/ sus kyang mA dngas 'phrog paR+Sha mi nus te phrogs na yang slar 'phrol par 'gyur zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa gsungs shing / 'phags pa'i bka'
390b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par cheng mar gyur pas zhal g+his bzhes pa bzhin du deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs te mchod pa bzhes shing / de bzhin gshegs pa gdun 'jom pa la thugs
390b4(rgyud 'grel): dadam las glengs te bskul ba dang / mdo sde'i cho ga rdzogs par bskang ba'i phrin las mdzad de/ mdo sde'i phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis thob par byin gyis
390b5(rgyud 'grel): brlab cing sprul du gsol byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyabs grol la phyag 'tshatshal zhing skyab su mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa skya bas grol dus phan pa'i sems can phongs shing sdug bsngal ba
390b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la thugs rtse bar dgongs nas/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das gdan 'jom pa'i spyan sngar/ 'di skad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slang mi'i dus na/ sems can bro nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongasu gzir
391a1(rgyud 'grel): sems su bya/ brtson du bzung ba rnams btang bar bya zhing gong du smos pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la de lta bu mchod pa byas na/ rgyal po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ bcom ldan
391a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis// yul bde ba dang lo legs par 'gyur/ rlung dang char dus su ldang zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur/ yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang nad med pa
391a3(rgyud 'grel): dang bdi pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ro// yul der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pas sems can rnams la gtse bar mi 'gyur ro// lhas ngan thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po de'i
391a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe dang mdog dang stobs dang / ma med pa dang / dbang phyug rnams 'phel por 'gyu ro zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa gsungs shing 'phags pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar gyur pra zhal gyis bzhes pa bzhin du/ deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshe
391a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs te/ mchod pa bzhes shing de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa la thugs dam las glengs taM bskul ba dang / mdo sde'i cho ga rdzogs par bskung ba'i phrin las mdzad/ mdo sde'i phan yon/

391b1(rgyud 'grel): mchi'o// tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / ku be ra la sogs pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba'i lha'i dge snyen thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// mchod do skyabs
391b2(rgyud 'grel): mchi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po pargya byin dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang ku be ra l-i sogs pa dam pa'i chos

391b6(rgyud 'grel): bar lhan cig tu mchis te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa dang / 'dri ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs gyis bsrung bar bgyi/ grong dang grong

392a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir stsol ba dang / rab tu gus par mchod par bgyod pa de dag ngan song gAsum nga mi mchi bar rig par bgyi ste/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur//

392b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhes pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces/ gang mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi don du bdag gi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams rab tu bstsal
392b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi// sangs rgyas com ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dzin thams cad le phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ri

393b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang / yul phyogs su mi nang dang phyugs nang gtong ba dang / than pa dang sad dang ser ba la sogs pas lo tog ma rungs par bgyid pa dang / gnod pa dang mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa mang po ston cing / sems

393b3(rgyud 'grel): dang pha tshan dang rigs rgyud kyi sri can du gyur pa yang rung ste/ che ga mo'i lus dang / srog dang / chu srid dang / dbang phyug dang / 'khor dang / yo byad la sog pa gang sna rung ba la ci yang rung ba'i sgo nas gnod pa bgyod pa'i gdon bgegs
393b4(rgyud 'grel): ci mchis pa thams cad gang la gang 'tshim pa'i thabs kyis gdul zhing 'khon dang gnod pa'i bsam pa 'dor du stsal te zhi ba dang dge ba dang byams pa'i bsam pa can du bsgyur zhing / sngon chad bkra mi shis pa dang
393b5(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa'i sbyor ba bgyis pa rnams kyang 'jog cing mdor du sprul/ slan chad kyang gnod pa'i bag ci yang mi bgyid par so so'i rigs kyi br-i dam pos bsgag cing ga ni 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar dam tshig chen
393b6(rgyud 'grel): bo stsal pa'i phyin las mdzad du gsol/ mthu dpal dang ldan pa'i lha'i dge bsnyen dam pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu gnyis po la 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la phyag 'tshalo//
394a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tsha'o// mchod do sgrubasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo// mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi snga

394a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs byed la phyag 'tshalo// mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// mthu dpal dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen dam po/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po re re la yang g.yog gnod sbyin bdun 'bum bdun 'bum dang bcas pa rnams

394b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po de'i mtshan thos te/ bdag cag la yang ngan+d+ha 'gror 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ sangs rgyas la skyabasu mchi'o// chos la skyab su mchi'o// dge
394b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dun la sgrub su mchi'o// sems can thams cad kyi don+da dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o// bye brag tu ni grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang na mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang // ga bcom ldan 'ad
394b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gi shegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 'chang ba dang / mchod pa dang / ra ma g+ho byed pa'i sems can de dag la bdag cag gis bskyang bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ gnod pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar
394b4(rgyud 'grel): bgyid bsam pa thams cid yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// zhes 'phags pa'i ngag brtags pas zhal gyis pa zhes shing thugs dam du glengs te/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gyi gang gi phyir khyed de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi pra bI n+d+haR+Ya'i
394b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi rgyal po de la byas pa gzi zhing rje su dran la// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa leg so legs so zhes rje su gnang ba de bzhin du// ding 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i blo brang gis dkyil 'kho ba'i nga
394b6(rgyud 'grel): dul zhing zhi pa'i sems dang ldan par byamos pa dang thugs rtsebs mchod pa bzhes shing mdo sde'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskang ste/ phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cig la sogs pa sems can thams
395a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis thob par byin gyis brlab du gsol/ lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo la sogs pa/ gsung rab dam pa'i chos yun ring du rgyas par bgyi ba dang / sgo thang
395a2(rgyud 'grel): nas chos spyod pa rnams la bar chad dang bgeg su gyur pa bdud kyi phyogs thams cad dang / yul phyogasu mi nad phyugs nad gtong ba dang / than pa dang sang ser la sogs pas ma rung bar bgyid pa dang / gnod pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa
395a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / bkra mo shis pa mang po ston cing / sems can la sdang bar semasau pa'i gdon bgegs rigs tho dud pa mang po khams dang yul phyogs 'dir rgyu ba mchis so 'tshal dang / che ge mo la sngon gyi las kyis gdas pa dang / 'phral gyi
395a4(rgyud 'grel): rkyen las gyur pa dang / yul phyogs dang / pha tshan dang / rigs rgyud kyi sri can du gyur pa yang rung ste/ che ge mo'i lus dang / srog dang / chub srid dang / dbang phyug 'khor dang / yo byad la sogs gang yang rung ba la ci yang rung ba'i
395a5(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i gdon bgegs ci mchis pa thams cad gang la gang 'tsham pa'i thabs kyis gdul zhing 'khon dang gnod pa'i bsam pa 'dor du stsal te/ zhi po dang dge ba dang byams pa'i bsam pa can du bgyi
395a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing sngon chad bkra mi shis pa dang gnod pa'i sbyor ba ngan pa ci bgyis pa rnams kyang 'jig cing 'dor du sprul// slan chad kyang gnod pa'i bag ci yang mi bgyid par so so'i rigs kyi bro dam pos dgag cing / gdan 'dzom pa'o
395b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan sngar dam tshig chen po stsal ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// re re nas mchod pa 'bul zhing smon lam gdab pa rdzogs pa'i skabs 'dir/ gzungs kyi snying po logs shig tu phyung ba lan bdun yan chad bzhi bcu rtsa dgu man
395b2(rgyud 'grel): tshwade ci nus su bkrab// ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa snga ma bzhin du byas te/ mdor bsdus pa'i gsol ba
395b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad gdab bo// ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pas bdag cag la sogs pa sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs gan de sna tshogs kyis gzir bya/ myu drinA dang / sdug bsngal
395b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongasde par g+hur pA thams cad rje su bzung zhing / lU dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam khyed
395b5(rgyud 'grel): pir rgyas pa byin gyis brlabs shing dpal gyi mgyur nas yid dge bar gsungs nas/ phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa rgyas par bka' stsal pa 'di ltar nyi zla ni dog sar lhung yang gda'/ ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gnas
395b6(rgyud 'grel): nas 'pho yang ganga'/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las yol yang gda'/ na mkha' ni dog sar 'gyur/ dog sa ni na mkhar 'gyur/ chab ni zhugs su 'gyur/ zhags ni chab tu 'gyur/ bser ma ni zhags pas bzung du rung ya
396a1(rgyud 'grel): ganga'i/ lha dang mi'i ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa la yongasu ma dag pa mi mnga' ba/ de bzhin
396a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa lags na/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i don du dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba'i tshul bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs
396a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bdun dang / ston pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdan 'dzem pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor pa bshams te/ mchod nas smon lam gsol ba rdo ci thog pa'i nyams kyis dpags te bgyis pa 'di tsam zhig/ sngon ji
396a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ nga yang gdan 'dzem pa chen pos cho ga yongasu rdzogs par bskangs te/ byin gyis brlabs cing phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems
396a5(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad kyis 'phral du mdzad cing stsal du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar gyur pa/ 'gyur pa mi mnga' ba'i bden pa mngon sum du bstan du gsol/ 'phags pa rnams la so sor re re nas
396a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa phul zhing smon lam btab pa dang / gzungs kyi snying po bzlas pa rdzogs pa'i 'og tu/ spyir mchod pa dbul zhing bsod nams dmigs kyis bsngo ba'i smon lam gdab pa/ 'phagasarba gdan 'dzom pa'i spyir mchod
396b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ci 'byor pa phul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
396b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mos rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / de
396b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan meng mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
396b4(rgyud 'grel): chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas
396b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan na sa brjod de phyag btsal ba dang / mchod cing 'phags pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam khrid par can dong / bka' lung dang mthun par smon lam gsol ba dang / gzhan yang 'phags pa de drag gi spyan sngar deng
396b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir sdig pa bshags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba phul ba dang bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa'i stobs dang / 'phags pa de dag gi mthu dpal dang byin gyis brlabs kyis/ lha
397a1(rgyud 'grel): sras kyi zhal snga nas kyi thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bsags pa'i dado sdig dang / sgrib pa ci mnga' ba thams cad zhu byang bar gyur cig/ sku la bstan mi mnga' zhing sku tshe dpag tu med pa ring ba dang /
397a2(rgyud 'grel): dbu rmog brtsan pa dang / chab srid 'byam par rgya che zhing / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyes par gyur cig/ mthar yang tshogs gnyis yongasu rdzogs pa'i g.yung drung
397a3(rgyud 'grel): gi sku chos kyi rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phangs brnyes par gyur cig/ chab 'og tu gtogs pa'i 'bangs thams cad kyang phyi nani gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi zhing bde zhing skyid pa dang /
397a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phral yun du legs pa'i chos bzang po la gnas par gyur cig/ mnga' ris kyi yul khams thams cad yang mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / lo nyes dang dgra'i tshogs la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang / bkra mi shis
397a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bag ci yang mi 'byung ba dang / char chu dus su bab ste/ lo phyugs 'phel zhing rgyus pa dang / bde skyid kyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing / sgo thams
397a6(rgyud 'grel): cad nas ngar zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ sgo'i bsod nams bgyid pa la ni 'jug gi sde pas so so nas ji ltar dad pa bzhin du bris te 'debs su stsal lo// smon lam thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'i 'og tu//
397b1(rgyud 'grel): khar bzod pa gsol zhing slar gshegs par gnas par bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang
397b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang
397b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par ril pa mngon par mikhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'i 'od kyi rgyal
397b4(rgyud 'grel): po dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de/ phyag 'atsal zhing mchod pa dang / mdo dang mthun par smon lam gsol pa dang / cho ga
397b5(rgyud 'grel): mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir/ bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma dgra par gyur pas ma 'tshal ba dang / bag ma mchis pa la sogs
397b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang gis/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa thams cad nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dres pa dang / mchod pa'i dngos po chungs shing ngan la gtsang spras ma phyed pa dang / mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga
398a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du ma lcogs pa la sogs pa 'khrul zhing nongs par gyur pa thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na/ thugs brtse bar mdzad de bzod par bzhes shing /
398a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul yun gnyi su bdag cag lho sgrib pa dang / gnod par me ji myur bar byin gyis brlab du gsol// 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang ring ngam dgung 'di'i bar du bdag cag la sogs pa 'gro ba phongs shing nyam thag pa'i sems can
398a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad cing bka' stsal pa yang / da dung yang bdag cag la thugs brtse bas yang dang yang du gdan 'jim par mdzad par dgongs shing / so so'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pu rnamasu 'gro/
398a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don la gshegs su gsol/ mjug 'dir sngo ba'i tshigs bcad kyang bklag go// rdzogs so// / dbang phyugs dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po lha sras khri srong lde'u btsan gyi sku tshe bsring ba
398a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / dbu rmog brtsan pa dang / chab srid mtho ba dang / las sgrib stang ba dang / tshogs gnyis sbrel pa'i chung du/ de bzhin gshegs po bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas po'i mdo sde'i man ngag/ slob dpon po d+hi satwas
398a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa// / de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i gzungs bklag pa'i cho ga mdo sde las bsdus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun la phyag 'tshalo// tshig
398b1(rgyud 'grel): byed par 'dod pas/ lus legs par bkrus la gos bzung po dri ma med pa bgo zhing // kha zas gtsang ma bza' bar bya/ sems nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i dri ma med par bya ste// dkon mchog gi yon tan dang mdo sde'i phan yon la yid
398b2(rgyud 'grel): chos shing dad pa dang gus pa bskyed/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom/ khyim pa yin na bsnyen gnas kyi khrims gzung / dus bzang po tshes brgyad lta bu la btsam// gnas yid du 'ong ba gtsang mar byas la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mang po
398b3(rgyud 'grel): legs par brgyan po'i nang du spos kyi maN+Dal chen po byas la/ tshon bye 'am me tog gis dgram par bya'o// lugs sku 'am ras bris sam 'jim pa las byas pa yang rung ste/ ring bsrol dang bcas pa bya/ 'khor 'jig rten pa
398b4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'jig rten lus 'das pa'i gdan yang bshama?/ mchod pa ci 'byor pa yang pra shAm ste/ sku gzugasau re re'i spyan sbyar mar mye bdun bdun dang / tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dran bdun bdun bzhag gzhan yong spros dang / me tog dang
398b5(rgyud 'grel): dri dang / b+ha bA shos dang / rol mo'i bye brag dang / rin po che sna bdun dang / bkra shis kyi rjes brgyad dang / bum pa la sogs sta gon bya'o// mdo sde 'di dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs mdo sde zab cing rgya cheb
398b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan nga ci nus kyis bklag/ gzungs kyi cho ga 'di zhig bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bzhi bcu rtsa dgu snyed du brlag par bya'o// de ltar mchod pa bshams pa dang / dge 'dun tshogs nas stan bde ba la 'dug nas
399a1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ci nus su bsgom/ de nas langs nas sems can thams cad kyi don du tshad med pa bzhi sgom zhing byang chub kyi sems yid la bya/ de ltar rang gi nus pa dang / phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
399a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa sras dang bcas pas de ltar byin gyis brlabs par yang bsam/ de nas gnas byin gyis brlab pa ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis
399a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabapa dang / tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par rgyas pa'i
399a4(rgyud 'grel): mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang ngocas pa dang / 'phags pa chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'dzom pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang / mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba 'di rnams
399a5(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can gyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas bri zhing yongasu drug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi zhing gi bgrod pA'i yon tan
399a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lag mo thil ltar mnyam pa tha gru che ba/ yangs pa reg na 'jam zhing bde ba dri ma med cing 'od gsal gtsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri bsung
399b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du bkram pa/ mtha' rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs pa/ gser dang dngul dang mu tig gi phye ma gram bur gdal ba/ ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma 'gying zhing ldem pas khebs par
399b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur cing / chu bya sna tshogs sked snyan pa sgrogs pa/ dga' zhing 'phyo ba lding bas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i mche dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka dag gis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa
399b3(rgyud 'grel): lha'i nor bu dong / mu tig gi rgyun phreng dang / rin po che sbyangs pa/ me tog gi mgo lcogs dang 'brus bu mdzes par chags pas g.yur za zhing ldam pa/ gser gyi dril bu gau yer kha 'khrol ba las dam pa'i chos kyi sgra 'byung
399b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ldan pa cher du sbrengs pos legs par brgyan po'i sa gzhi la/ gzhal med khang chen po rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar ba bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od
399b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po rab tu 'byung ba/ gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnam par phye ba/ mtha' yas pa rnam par gnas pa/ rgyu yongasu ma chad pa/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul 'jig rten lngas 'das pa de'i tha mis
399b6(rgyud 'grel): go 'i rtsab tsu na shin tu rnar dag cing dbang sgyur ba'i rnam par rig po'i mtshan nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin/
400a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa mtha' yas pa rnam par rgyu ba/ chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang bde ba chen pos brtan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad
400a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par thob par byed pa nye bar gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud thams cad yongs su spangs pa/ thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa'i gnas/ dran pa dang blo
400a3(rgyud 'grel): gros dang rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi bzhon pa yin pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i rgyal po yon tan
400a4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la brten pa'i gzhal mang khang chen por gyur pa'i dbus/ pad+ma'i glang na rin po che'i ste ge'i khri'i stan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po da
400a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs po rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gsar bzang dri med rinr-i snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang / de bzhin gA she
400a6(rgyud 'grel): pab mya ngan med mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin
400b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dang 'phags pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba thams cad gdan
400b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzem pa'i bzhug gnas/ 'phags pa so so'i smon lam khyad par can dang / mda' thang dang 'tsham por grub pa/ mdzes pa sha stag 'byung bar gyur cog/ phyi nang kun tu yang chu rigs drang 'tsham par yang lha dang mi'i yo byad
400b3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa zhal zas dang / na bza' dang rgyan dang / rol mo la sogs pa phul du phyin pa sna tshogs phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang / bzang po spyod pa'i smon lamoM las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho thams cad kyis rgyas par
400b4(rgyud 'grel): gang zhing rgyun klubs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ 'phags pa thams cad kyang godran 'dzom nas de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs shing bzhos te longs spyod par gyur cig/ ces lan gsum bzlas la// yang dkon mchog
400b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi bdeni pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongasu rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyis dbyings rnam par dag cing bsam gyis mi
400b6(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig ces lan gsum bzlas// mchod pa'i tshogs byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan drangs te/ pus mo gtsugs ti mau tog blangs/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig
401a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs sgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brji
401a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrubs rgya mtsho'i dbyangs/
401a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi blo bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la sogs pa phyogs
401a4(rgyud 'grel): bcu dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs phra dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad bdag cag la dgongs su gsol
401a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis sleng ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma le dam pa'i chos lhor bcos pa 'ibyung ba na/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyi sa bsgribs pA/ nad sna tsho
401a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rjesu bzung zhing / lha dang / me rnams kyi don dang / phan pa bde ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs
401b1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mang po dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bzang po zhing rlabs che ba/ mthu dang byin gyis brlab dpag tu ma mchis pa mnga' ba la brten te we ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po
401b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyab pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brong gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing / gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlabs
401b3(rgyud 'grel): par tse gnang / da ltar bdag cag gis ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gdul ba'i dbang du 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul bstan kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du de
401b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad ci nga bzhugs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang / sngon gyi smon lam khyad par na las glengs te/ bdag cag

414b6(rgyud 'grel): basprin mo thaM baDU 'od kyi rgyal ba'i mtshon thos te/ yad la dris ning yin bdun brjid du du mo 'ji mchad pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ de byizhin gshegs pa sman gyi tha be DU 'ang kyi rgyal pa ra'i rdzun gyi smon lam khyud kyi/

415a2(rgyud 'grel): du sems can thams cad kyang de 'dra bar gyur cig/ lus kyi 'od zer gyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dpag gis mi long pa lham me/ lha min/ lhang nger gyur cig/ lus nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar phyi nang shin tu
415a3(rgyud 'grel): yongasu dag pa dang / dri ma med la 'od gsal ba dang / kho lags yangs shing gsal ba dang / dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / legs par gnas pa dang / nyi ma dang zla ba pas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rnams kyis legs par
415a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur te/ sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar du skyes pa drag dang / gang dag yang mi'i 'jig rten 'di na mtshan mo mun nag gi
415a5(rgyud 'grel): nang na/ phyogs tha dad par 'gro ba de dag bdag gi 'od kyi phyogs dga' mgur 'gro zhing las rnams byed par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi blo bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i shes rab dang thabs dpag tu med pas// bdag cag

415b4(rgyud 'grel): cad dbang po tshang zhing yan lag yongasu rdzogs por gyur cing / sems can gang dag nang sna tshogs kyis gzir bu/ skyabs meng pa/ mgon med pa/ 'tsheg chas dang sman mi bdog pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/ dbul ba/ sdug bsngal

415b6(rgyud 'grel): kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa bud med kyi dngos po la mi dga' ba bud med kyi skye gnas las thar bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad bud med kyi dngos po las legs par gyur cig/ byang chub
416a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi mthar thug gi bar du skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan par gyur cig/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad bdud kyi zhags pa las yongasu thar par gyur cig/ lta ba tha dad pa mi mthun pa zing zing bas mi mthun sa dag sran te lda sa
