421a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / 'o phyags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / ku bA ra la sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos skyong ba'i lha'i dge ba sten+do tshun po rnams kyis ji
421a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar sngon gdan 'dzom pa chen po'i spyan sngar/ lha'i chags bden par mdong gsol du gsung cig khe nar 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad
421b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa yang thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mngon sum du bgyis te mchod pa bgyiso// yang bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan dang / gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag spyod pa
421b2(rgyud 'grel): der/ bdag cag g.yog dang bcas te mchi bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig 'chang ba dang / klog pa dong / mchod par bgyid pA dang / yi ger 'drir stsol pa der/ bdag cag mthun par lhan cig
421b3(rgyud 'grel): mchis te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa dang / 'dri ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o// grong dang grong khyer
421b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / phyogs kyang yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang sems can thams cad la byas pa ga
421b5(rgyud 'grel): ba la gas te/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// ji ltar bsams pa yid bzhin du 'grub pa
421b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / sems dang lus bde zhing longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyi'o// thams cad du bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag rang gi bro bor ba dang / dam pa ces pa 'di
422a1(rgyud 'grel): dag rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo des rje su dran par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ a b+h+yA ma g+hu ma/ ta ra g+hu/ ma ma g+hu g+hA re/ hwA hU he/ mra mu mra mu/ dzurbu dz+ra dzu re swA hA/ gang lnga la zhib de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnaMm
422a2(rgyud 'grel): dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / rab tu gus par mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ngan song gsum du mi mchi bar rigs par bgyi'o// de ni bla na med pa
422a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las slar mi ldog par 'gyuraro// ji ltar 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ ting
422a4(rgyud 'grel): nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyang thob par 'gyuraro zhes gsungs shing zhal gyis byazhes pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gang mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de
422a5(rgyud 'grel): dag gi don du bdag gis gzungs kyis gsang sngags stsal bar bgyi/ dgongasu gsol/ yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sadros bdun da/ 6/ rdo chen da/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra badz+rI ma hA badz+ri badz+re pA sha d+hA rA Ni/ sa ma
422a6(rgyud 'grel): sasam/ sa man+ta a pra ti ha ta badz+ri/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha man+t+ra me sar+b+ba byA d+hA yaHku ru ku ru/ sar+b+ba ka ni sa ma ya ma nu sma ra b+ha ga bAn/ badz+ra pA Ni/ sar+b+ba A shAM me pa ri pU ra ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la li zhig de
422b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa de'i re ba thams cad bdag gis yongasu bskang bar bgyi'o// don thams cad yongasu bsdu/
422b2(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi'o// gal te des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'drir stsol bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi sku gzugs bdun yang bgyi/ rdo rje 'dzin yang sku gdung dang bcas pa bgyi/
422b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa de dgra la yang ji skad gong du smos pa bzhin du/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnams kyis mchod de bskor bar bgyi// gzung
422b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang gdon par bgyi/ sems can thams cad la yang phan pa'i sems su bgyi/ 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas te/ lan gsum khrus bgyi zhing / chos
422b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad nas brtsams te/ zla ba phyi ma'i bco lnga'i nya'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du rig sngags lan rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ de la bdag gis rmi lam mthong ba stsal bar bgyi/ 'bel ba'i bka' mchid kyang bgyi/ re ba thams
422b6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyang yongasu bskang bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bka' mi 'gyur pa tshad mar gyur pas zhal gyis bzhes pa bzhin du/ deng 'dir yA mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir
423a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs te/ mchod pa bzhes te gdan 'dzom pas mdo sde'i cho ga yongasu rdzogs par bsrung ba'i phrin las mdzad de/ phan yon ji skad bka' sprul pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems
423a2(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad kyis thob par byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi khyad pa rgyas pa'i mdo sogs pa'i gsung rab dam pa'i chos yun ring du rgyas par bgyi ba dang / sgo
423a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nas chos spyod pa rnams la byar chad dang bgegasu gyur pa dang / bdud kyi phyogasu gyur pa thams cad dang / yul phyogs su mi nad dang / phyugs nad gtong ba dang / than pa dang / sed dang ser ba la sogs pas
423a4(rgyud 'grel): lo tog ma rungs par bgyid pa dang / gnod pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa mang po ston cing sems can l-i sdang bar sems pa'i gedon bgrogs rigs tha dad pa yul phyogs 'di na rgyu zhing gnas
423a5(rgyud 'grel): pa tsaM mchis pa thams cad dang / che ge mo la sngon gyi las kyis bdas pa dang / 'phral gyi rkyen las byung ba 'am// yul phyogs dang / pha chen dang / rigs rgyud kyi sri can du gyur pa yang rung ste/ che ge mo'i lus dang / srog
423a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / chu srid dang / dbang phyug dang / 'khor dang / yo byad la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la ci yang rung ba'i sgo nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i gdon bgegs ci mchis pa thams cad gang la gang 'tsham pa'i thabs kyis/
423b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dul zhing kho na dang / gnod pa'i bsams pa 'dor du stsal te/ zhi ba dang / dge ba dang / byams pa'i bsam pa can du 'gyur zhing / sngan chad bkra mi shis pa dang / gnod pa'i sbyor ba ngan pa bgyis pa rnams 'jig cing
423b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dor du stsal/ slan chad kyang gnod pa'i brag ci yang myo bgyed par so so'i rig spyi bro dam po bsgag cing / gdan 'dze me pA'i spyan sder dram tshig chen po stsol ba'i phrin las mdzad par ci gnang / mthu dpal dang ldan
423b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dge bsnyen bcu gnyis la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dzaM 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mchod skyabasu mchi'o// gnad sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rje lnga phyag 'tshalo// mcho do skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi
423b4(rgyud 'grel): sde dpon chen po rgyun 'dzin la phyag 'tsha lo// mchod de skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gzo' 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo// mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung la phyag 'tsha lo//
423b5(rgyud 'grel): mchodro skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas la phyag 'tshalo// mchod do skyab su mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbadz+ra 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo/ mche de skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde
423b6(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po btung 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo// mchod skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po sgra 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo// mchod do sgrub su mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsams 'dzin la phyag
424a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tsham mchod do sgrub su mchi'o// gnad sbyin gyi sde dben chen po kAyo ba 'dzin la phyag 'tshal// mchod de spyanasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen pa rdzogs byed la phyag 'tshalo// mchud do skyabs
424a2(rgyud 'grel): mchi'o// skabs 'dir mchod pa dbul/ mthu dpal dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po re re la g.yog gnod sbyin bdun 'bum bdun 'bum dang bcas pa rnams dgong du gsol/
424a3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar sngon gdan 'dzem pa'i spyan sngar/ lha'i ngag bden pas gsung gcig/ 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i mtshan thos te/ bdag cag la yang
424a4(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// des na bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par ji srid 'tshe'i bar du sangs rgyas la skyab su mchi'o// chos lo skyabasu mchi'o// dge 'dun la skyangasu mchi'o// semasan
424a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du spro bar babya'o// bye brag tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam dgon pa'i gan so gang nA mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang / gang na de bzhin bshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i/
424a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od de'i maHnga ba dang / mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa'i sems can de dag la/ bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ gdon thams cad las yongasu thar par bgyi/ bsams pa thams cad
424b1(rgyud 'grel): yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// zhes zhal gyis bzhes te thugs dam du bzhes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang gi phyir/ khyed de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la byas pa gzo zhing rje su dran la sems
424b2(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs leg so// zhes rje su gnang ba ston pa de bzhin du/ deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir dul zhing zhi ba'i 'khor dang
424b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan par byams pa dang thugs brtse bas mchod pa bzhes shing mdo sde'i cho ga yongasu rdzogs par bskang ste/ phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad
424b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis thob par byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo la sogs pa gsung rab dam pa'i chos yun ring du rgyas par
424b5(rgyud 'grel): bgyi ba dang / sgo thams cad nas chos spyod pa rnams la bar chad dang bgegasu gyur pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs thams cad dang / yul phyogasu mi nad dang phyugs nad gtong ba dang / than pa dang / sad dang ser ba
424b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas lo tog ma rungs par bgyid pa dang / gnod pa dang / mtshan ma ngon pa dang / bkra mo shis pa mang po ston cing / sems can la sdang bar sems pa'i gdon bgegs rigs tha dad pa mang po khas
425a1(rgyud 'grel): dang yul phyogs 'dir rgyu ba mchis so 'tshal dang / cho go mo la sngon gyi las kyis gdas pa 'am/ 'phral gyi rkyen las gyur pa'am/ yul phyogs dang pha tshan dang / rigs rgyud kyi sra can du gyur pa ya/
425a2(rgyud 'grel): rung ste/ che ge mo'i lus dang srog dang chu srid dang dbang phyug dang / 'khor dang yo byad la sogs pa grang yang rung ba la ci yA rung bI sgohA gnod pa bgyid pa'i gdon bgegs ci mchis pa thams cad gang la yang gdul ba'i thab
425a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'dul zhing / kho na dang gnod pa'i bsam pa 'dor du stsal te/ zhi ba dang dge ba dang / byams pa'i bsam pa can du bgyid cing / sngan chad bkra mi shis pa dang / gnod pa'i sbyo ba ngan pa bgyis pa rnams kyang
425a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig cing 'dor du stsal/ slan chad kyang gnod pa'i bgra ci yang mi bgyid par so so'i rigs kyi bro dam pos bsgrag cing gdan 'dzem pa'i spyan ster dam tshig chen po stsal ba'i phrin las mdzad pa ci gnang / re re
425a5(rgyud 'grel): nas mchod pa dbul zhing smon lam gdub rdzogs pa'i skabs 'dir/ gzungs sngags bzlas lnga khrus bya/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzem pa'i spyir mchod pa ci 'byor pa 'bul/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi
425a6(rgyud 'grel): smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde las byung ba bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gis dkyil 'khor 'dir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
425b1(rgyud 'grel): bdun dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de/ phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par can dang mthun par
425b2(rgyud 'grel): na lam btab pa dang / de dag gi sman sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang dag pa li rjes yi rang ba dang / bskal zhing gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa'i stobs dang / de dag gi mthu dpal dang
425b3(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs kyi stobs kyis che ge mo l-i sogs pa'i zhal snga nas/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bsags pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa mnga' ba thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ sku la bsnyun mi mnga' zhing sku tshe ring ba dang /
425b4(rgyud 'grel): dobu rmog brtsan pa dang / chab srid 'byam dar che ba dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' bsnyes par gyur cig/ mthar yang tshogs gnyis yongasu rdzogs nas g.yung drung gi sku
425b5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rgyal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang bsnyes par gyur cig/ cha ba 'og tu gtogs pa'i 'bangs thams cad kyang phyi nang gi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi zhing bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang /
425b6(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po thob par gyur cig/ yul khams thams cad du yang mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / lo nyes pa dang / dgra'i gnod pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i bag ci yang mi 'gyur ba dang / char chu dus
426a1(rgyud 'grel): bab ste lo phyugs 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / bde skyid kyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
426a2(rgyud 'grel): tu skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi zhalnga mthong ste gdams ngag thob nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ khyad par du yang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sgo thams ca
426a3(rgyud 'grel): nus dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ de nas bzod par gsol zhing gshegs su gsol ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun 'khor dang bcas pa dang
426a4(rgyud 'grel): ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa glang na 'jom pa'i spyan sngar che gi mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol bya'i ska byas 'dir/ bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod
426a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dman zhing ma dreg pas ma 'tshal ba dang / bag ma mchis pa'i dbang gis lus ngag yid gsum gyi spyod pa nyon mongs pa dang / 'dres pa dang / mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan pa dang / gtsang sbras ma phyud pa dang //
426a6(rgyud 'grel): mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs pa 'khrul cing nongs pa thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzod pa po zhes shing
426b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phral dang yun du bdag cag gi sgrib par mi 'gyur ba byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / de nas gshegasu gsol ba ni/ khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rje su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas
426b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang slar yang thugs rjes byon par mdzod/ mgon po thugs rjes chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ bdag cag dang sems can gyi don mdzad pa lagus gyis/ so so'i zhing khamasu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'khor dadro bcas pa gshegasu
426b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ rdzogs so// / sa gzhi byin gyis berlabs pa dang / 'di ltar brjod nga / thams cad du ni sa bzhi dag/ gseg ma la sogs med pa dang // lag mo thil ltar mnyam bai DUr+ya'i// rang bzhin
426b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang por gnas gyur cig/ bde ldan 'jig rten bkod pa ltar/ rin chen sa gzhi me tog bcas/ ljon shing chu mtsho ma tshang med// chos sgeg rgya tshan ldan par shog/ 'jig rten 'das pa'i ngag las byung / rin tshon bdun las grub
426b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ tshad med 'od zer 'gyed pa'i gnas// rgyal ba sras bcas bzhugs gyur cig/ gshegs byon skye 'bri med pa'i sku// ji ltar smon bzhin yod pa dag/ dkar po mchod pa'i tshul bzhin duka/ 'jog rten skyabasu gshegs su
426b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol// bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// bdag cag bsod nams skal par ldan// bdag gis phul ba'i mchod yon 'di // bzhes nas bdag la mnyes par mdzod// khyod ni rang bzhin yongs dag par// sreng sogs te
427a1(rgyud 'grel): pa mi mnga' yang // yon bdag sgribs pa sbyang slad du// gtsang ma'i chu yis sku khrus gse/ chos don dag pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ dpal ldan dag par gnas bshams par// ting 'dzin mi g.yo mnyam gzhag pa
427a2(rgyud 'grel): dge bar dgongs pas gdan la bzhugs// gtsang dngas gdon khri yangs pa la// thogs dang dag pa med pa'i sku// mnyam nyid tshul gyis 'dir bzhugs shing // bde bar sbyar ba zhes su gsol// zhes de ltar yon chab dang sku khrus gso/
427a3(rgyud 'grel): gdan dbul/ de'i 'og tu ston pa bdun po 'khor dang bcas la spyi'i phyag byas te// 'di ltar 'gro ba nyon mongs dug gis gzir ba la// thugs rjes dug sel sman mchog bdud rtsi ni// smon lam chen pos grub par gyur pa yis//
427a4(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshalo// las dang nyon mongs dbang gis sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis// gzir ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas spyod tshe thugs rje yis// sdug bsngal zhi byed smon lam sna tshogs bsgrubs mdzad pa'i/
427a5(rgyud 'grel): pabade gshegs bdun po 'khor bca sde la phyag 'tshalo// de nas spyir mchod pa rnam pa lnga 'bul// smon lam gdab rgyun bshags bya'o// de'i 'og tu re re nas mchod pa ni/ mtshan gyis me tog rgyas pas dag pa la// dpe
427a6(rgyud 'grel): byad bzang po'i 'bru chags mdzes pa'i sku// gang gis mthong thos dran pa'i dpal gyur pa'i// ston pa mtshan legs dpal la phyag 'tshalo// rin chen zla dang pad+mas rab brgyan cing // shes bya kun la ma chags thugs mnga'
427b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ rgya mtsho lta bur zab pa'i sku mnga' ba// sgra dbyangs rgyal po khyed la phyag 'tshalo// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar lhang nge ba// nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// dri med gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu'i sku/ gser bzang dri med de la phyag
427b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// mya ngan 'das shing bde ba'i mchog brnyes pa// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gdung ba sel mdzad pa// 'gro drug mgon dang dpal du gyur pa po// mya ngan med mchog dpal la phyag 'tshalo// chos sgra chen pos pha rol rgol ba 'dzom
427b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho lta bur zab pa'i sku mnga' zhing // 'gro ba'i dug gsum ma lus sel mdzad pa// chos sgrags rgya mtsho dbyangs la phyab 'tshal// chos kyi blo gros gting dpag dka' bo'i tshul// rnam dag chos kyi dbyings la rol mdzad de//
427b4(rgyud 'grel): shes bya ma lus mngon sum gzigs pa po// mngon khyan rgyal po de la phyag 'tshalo// 'gro ba'i nad gso mdza pa sman po'i mchog/ bai DUr+ya ltar dang ba'i sku mnga' zhing // sku yi 'od kyi 'gro ba sgrol mdzod pa// sman pa'i rgyal po
427b5(rgyud 'grel): de la phyag 'tsha lo// sman gyi rnam pa 'di dag ni// nad rnams mA lus gsal bya'i phyir// pad+ma gshegs sman gyi bla la 'bul// yon bdag don du bzhi su gsol// thabs mkhas thugs rjes shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs shing //
427b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis mi thub bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa// gser gyi lhun po lta bur mi dzes pa'i sku// shAkya'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshalo// ma rigs mun sel sgron ma'i mchog/ sdug bsngal nad sel sman gyi phul/ dam chos sgron
428a1(rgyud 'grel): ma thams cad la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// ye shes sku yis ngo bo nyid// ngag gi dbang phyug gzugs mdzes ldan// 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag
428a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// 'gro drug 'jig pa brgyad las skyob mdzad cing // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho tsha las sgrol ba'i glu// mya ngan 'das par phyin pa'i ded dpon mchog/ sems dpa' skyabs grol mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams
428a3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyis gsang 'dzin pa// ma rungs 'dul zhing rig sngags 'chang // rdo rje snrums la phyag 'tsha lo// sems dpa' nyi ma snang byed ni// sku mdog dkor ser gangs ri'i gdan// phyag gnyis bdud rtsi'i sa gnon tshul//
428a4(rgyud 'grel): de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul// sems dpa' zla ltar sna du byed ni// sku mdog dkar po pad+ma'i gi dan// phyag gnyis chos 'chang bgrang phreng 'dzin// phyag 'tshal mchod pa dam pa 'bul// 'dod khams 'dam las rab tu 'tshangs//
428a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs khams tshangs pa'i gnas na gzhugs// tshangs tshon rgyal po mi mjed gtso// tshangs chen 'khor dang bcas la 'bul// dbu gsum phyag drug lha min 'dul// kun la khyab cing snyoms par 'jug/ lha yis gnas gsal
428a6(rgyud 'grel): stobs po che// lha chen khyab 'jug mchod pa 'bul// mtho ris lha yis gnas mchog na// mi pham mgon gyi zhal mthong ba// dga' ldan lha yi sras po rnams// yon bdag gus pas mchod pa 'bul// lha min gnyen po lha yi rje/
428b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum mnga' bas dus gsum gyi// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i 'khor gzigs pa// lha dbang brgya byin mchod pa 'bul// lhun po'i rtser gnas lha dbang dang // thabs dang tshul bzhin spyod mdzad pa// lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa yang //
428b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod bzhes yon bdag re skongs mdzod// shes pa'i dad pa chen po che// nga rgyal bsgoms pa'i brag bsnyil te// ston pa'i zhabs 'bring bka' sdong pa// sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas la mchod// shar phyogs dpal ldan rgyal chen
428b3(rgyud 'grel): yul 'khor srung // sku bdog dkar po phyag na pi wang 'dzin// dri za'i 'khor tshogs smin pa'i thugs dam can// de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// lho phyogs dpal ldan rgyal chen 'phags smras po// sku mdog
428b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon po phyag na ral gri bsnams// grul 'bum gdon tshogs smon drug thugs dam bstan// de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bskur mchod pa 'bul// nub phyogs dpal ldan rgyal po mig mi bzang sku mdog dam ri po phyag na zhags
428b5(rgyud 'grel): pre bsnams// klu'i gdon tshogs smon phyir thugs dam bstan// de la phyag 'tshal bstan bkur mchod pa 'bul// byang phyogs dpal ldan rgyal chen rnams thos sras// sku mdog ljang gu phyag na ne'u le bsnams// gnod
428b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gdon tsho gas smin phyir thugs dam can// de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// bde gshegs brtan pa bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen mchog/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rngam pa'i cha lugs cin// gnod sbyi
429a1(rgyud 'grel): sde dpon ji 'jigs la sogs pa// gnod sbyin sde dpon rnams la mchod pa 'bul// de nas gtor ma btang / gzungs rnams mang du bzla spyir mchod pa lnga 'bul/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol bar bya/
429a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing khrus bya'o// bzod pa gsol/ gsheg su gsol// rdzogs so// // de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde bklag cing ngo/
429a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa bdun mchod de/ smon lam gdab pa'i cho ga mdo snga las btus te rim par bklag pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub semos dpa' thams cad kyis
429a4(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yong su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i stobs dang / bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la sogs pa de bzhin
429a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa bdun dang / ston pa bde bar gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas po gang ni 'dzom pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang / mchod pa'i tshogs sbyor ba 'di rnams ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
429a6(rgyud 'grel): pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can gyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi zhing gi bkod pa'i yon lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sa gzhi
429b1(rgyud 'grel): rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ mchod pa phul du phyin pa sna tshogs dang phung po gsum pa'i mad+mo dang / bzang zla smad pa'i smon lam lus 'byung ba rgya mtsho thams cad las kyang/
429b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par gang zhing rgyun klubs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ 'phags pa gdun 'dzom pas kyang / de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs shing bzhes te longs spyod par gyur cig/ de skrod lan gsum bzlas/ yang de'i
429b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes la dkon mchog gsum gyis bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongasu rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rna
429b4(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig ces lan gsum bzlas/ mchod pa'i tshogs bden pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan drang ba/ pus mo gtsugs te me tog blangs thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad
429b5(rgyud 'grel): ces/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyis khams gzhan gyis ma thub pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongasu bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zham 'bring
429b6(rgyud 'grel): ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig dang bcas pa la sogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po rnams kyis slad mAM/
430a1(rgyud 'grel): dus lnga brgya pa thams cad la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos 'byung ba na/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyi bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyi lus gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis ga
430a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can rnams thams cad rje su bzung zhing lnga dang mi rnaMs kyi don dang phan pa drang bde ba'i slad du/ de 'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thabs mkhas pa mkhas pa ming po dang / sngon gyi
430a3(rgyud 'grel): smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bzang zhing brlabs che ba dang / mthu dang byin gyis brlabs dpag tu mchi sA ba mnga' ba la brten te/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po skyobs pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung
430a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tsho gas sbyar ba'i pho brang gro dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlabs par ci go nang / da ltar bdag cag go ston pa sangs rgya
430a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'dus dpal shAkya thub pa gdul bya'i dra bang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mya ngan 'das pa'i tshul bstan kyang 'jig rten gyis khams gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa sna tshogs kyis
430a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing bzhugs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang / sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can las glengs te/ bdag cag rnams mnga' ris kyi gdul bya phyag mtshan du bzhes pa'i nang
430b1(rgyud 'grel): du gtogs te bka' drin thob pa'i 'phro mchis pa tsam la rten te che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi
430b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdun 'dzem pa chen po mdzad de// byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pA dang / dpal phyag na rdo
430b3(rgyud 'grel): rje dang / rgyal ba'i sras po skyabs grol sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon laM khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde bka' stsal pa'i tshe/ gdan 'dzom par
430b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dus te/ mdo sde byin gyi brlabyas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub par thugs bskyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / che ge me la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po skyob pa'i sbed du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan
430b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dren cing mchis na/ mi chod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'dir gshegs gdon 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de/ byin gyis brlabs par ci gnang / ston de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzem pa chen pos bka'
430b6(rgyud 'grel): btang cing so so nas kyang lha'i tshig bden pas 'phags pa mdong gsol du zhal gyis bzhes te/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor rnam bzhi skyong bar mdzad cing zhal gyis bzhes pa'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po
431a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyis sras la sogs pa phyogs skyong ba thams cad kyis kyang che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du
431a2(rgyud 'grel): mgon skyabs dang gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar bu'i pho brang gri dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de/ byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / sngon de bzhin gshegs
431a3(rgyud 'grel): pa gdan 'dzom pa chen po'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'chang ba dang / mchod pa la sogs pa'i sems can de dag phyag mtshan du bzhes shing bsrung bar
431a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyis pa zhes pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dza 'jigs dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gzu' 'dzin dang / gnod
431a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
431a6(rgyud 'grel): spro 'dzin dang / gnod sprin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin dang / gnod sprin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed dang / gnod sprin gyi snga dpon chen po bcu gnyis po
431b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la yang sngon gyi thugs dam bzang po las glengs te/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi
431b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de/ byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / skabs 'dir lha klu spyan drangs te/ phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba dbang dang ldan// thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam
431b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil po che// lnga dang drang srong gshin rje srin po klu// rlung lha gnod sbyin bgegs gza' rgyu skar bcas// de dag so so dbang po'i skur ston pa// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhugaso 'tshal// bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du
431b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan 'dren na// 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol// sa man dzaHde ltar spyan drangs pas thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' lnga byon par bsdam mo// de nas phyag 'tshal ba 'greng phyag bdun ba
431b5(rgyud 'grel): tote/ de bzhin gshegs pa da bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhabs 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcos la
431b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo skyabasu mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po byang chub sems
433a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tsha lo skyabasu mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang dri med rin snang brtul zhugs
433a2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo skyabasu mchi'o// de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya don myed mchog
433a3(rgyud 'grel): dpal byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pos bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tsha lo skyabs mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs
433a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tsha lo skyabasu mtsho'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnaM
433a5(rgyud 'grel): papar rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas kun nas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// skya ba su mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
433a6(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed dang / zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med
433b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tsha lo// skyabasu mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tsha lo skyabasu mchi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
433b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / skyabs grol la sogs pA la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// skabasu mchi'o// lho'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa dam pa'i rmo
433b3(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la sogs te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tsha lo skyab su mchi'o// 'phags pa'i tshogs de dag
433b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la mchod yon dang byug pa/ mo tog dang bdug spos/ mor me dang zhal zas/ rol mo dang sil snyan/ gdugs dang / ba dan la sogs pa dwangos su ci 'byor pa 'di dag dang / phyogs bcu na bdag pos yongasu ma
433b5(rgyud 'grel): bzung ba'i lha dang mi'i rdzas dam pA/ bde ba'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa de thams cad dang / gzungs dang rigs pa'i mthu dang mos pa'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam lus
433b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba/ rgya mtsho thams cad kyis na mkha'i mi thos klas pa// chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste 'bu'o// mchod do// ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang bdag cag gis thog ma ma mchis pa
434a1(rgyud 'grel): nas 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mdor na mi bgyi bar rigs pa'i las ni bgyis// bgyi bar 'os pa'i las ni ma bgyis pa la sogs pa'i
434a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos sdig ci mchis pa thams cad yang dag par 'chags so// dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo'i dge ba mtha' dag gi bsod nams thams cad la rje su yi rang ngo // phyogs bcu'i
434a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul lo// 'jig rten gyi sgron me gang dag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'das
434a4(rgyud 'grel): bar 'jig rten gyi don mdzad cing yun ring du bzhugs par gsol ba 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dzem pa chen po dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams/
434a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can lasna kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nAd sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal
434a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyis gtses po/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rjesu bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi drin dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa
434b1(rgyud 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa rlabs po che ji ltar btab cing byin gyis brlabs pa dang / don de nyid da ltar bdag gi ston pa bcom/
434b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pas ji ltar bka' stsal cing byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / skyabs grol la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
434b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' lung yang dag par sgrub pa dang / so so'i dgongs spyod rgya chen po rdzogs par bskang ba'i slad du/ mdo sde'i don sgrub pa'i phrin las mdzad par 'phags pa'i bka' btags pas/
434b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyis bzhes shing ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la sogs te/ lha'i dge bsnyen chen po thams cad/
434b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mdo sde dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa'i sems can bsrung ba dang / bslab par zhal gyis pa zhes pa la sogs pa sngon 'phags pa rnams kyis ji ltar byin gyis brlabs
434b6(rgyud 'grel): shing bka' stsal pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa de rnams gdan 'dzom par mdzad pa'i pho breng gi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar nas
435a1(rgyud 'grel): gdan 'dzem par na mar mtshan nas brjod de mchod pa dbyul/ bskul ming ston ma gsol te/ bka' dri nod cing mchis na gdan ngom pas sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du mad
435a2(rgyud 'grel): sde'i cho ga yongasu rdzogs par mdzad cing phan yon ji skad 'byung ba'i bka' drin thams cad che ge mo la sogs pa bdag cag gis 'phral du thob par smra pa ra ci gnang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa rnams lnga re rA nas mchod pa
435a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dul zhing smon lam gdab par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po'i mtshan nas brjod de mchod nas smon lam du gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
435a4(rgyud 'grel): dgra bcom pi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo mcho do sgrubasu mchi'o// de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ de
435a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po li phyag 'tsha lo mchod do skyebasu mchi'o// de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa tsi 'byor pa dbul/
435a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa gser zang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa la phyag 'a tsha lo mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// de skad lani bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul// de bzhin gaushegs pa mya
435b1(rgyud 'grel): ngan med mchog dbul la gus par phyag 'tshal lo mchod do sgrubasu mchi'o// de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul// de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la gus par
435b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tsha lo mchod do skabasu mchi'o// de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo//
435b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod do skyab su mchi'o// de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha/
435b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod do skyebasu mchi'o// de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul// ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tsha lo mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa
435b5(rgyud 'grel): ci 'byor pa dbul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'phyogs pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do snrubA su mchi'o// de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul// byung
435b6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyabs grol la phyag 'tsha lo mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// de skad len bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyog
436a1(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// mchod do sgrubasu mchi'o// de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor par / chang pa dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags/
436a2(rgyud 'grel): skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / ku be ra la sogs pa'i chos skyong ba lha'i dge bsnyen thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul// mthu dpal dang ldan pa'i dge
436a3(rgyud 'grel): bobastan dam pa/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu gnyis la 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dzo 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo// mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje la phyag 'che'o// mchod do/
436a4(rgyud 'grel): skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzinA laM phyag 'tsho'o// meched do sgrubasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo// mchod do sgrubasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde
436a5(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po rlung la phyag 'tshalo// mchod do sgrubasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon po gnas bcas la phyag 'tshal mchod skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi ste dpon chen po dbang 'dzin la phyag 'tsha lo// mchid
436a6(rgyud 'grel): do skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo// mcho sgrubasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin la phyog 'che kho mchod do// skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde
436b1(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po bsam 'dzin la phyag 'tsha lo mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo// mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed la phyag 'tshalo//
436b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod do skyabasu mchi'o// skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tsha lo mchod do skyabs/
436b3(rgyud 'grel): mchi'o// de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul// ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pas bdag cag la sogs pa sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyi
436b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgribs pa/ nang sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba/ mya ngan drang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa// phongs par gyur pa thams cad rje su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du de
436b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas par byin gyis brlabs shing / dpal gyi mgur nas yang dag par gsungs nas/ phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa/ rgyas pa bka'
436b6(rgyud 'grel): stsal pa/ 'di ltar nyi zla ni dog sar lhung yang gda'/ ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gnas 'pho yang gda'/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las yal yang gda'/ dog sa ni na mkhar 'gyur/ chab ni zhugasu 'gyur/ zhugs ni chab
437a1(rgyud 'grel): tu 'gyur/ bser ma ni zhags pas gzung du rung bar yang gda'i/ lha dang mi'i ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi kun//
437a2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu spyod pa la yongasu ma dag pa mi mnga' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa lags na/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i don du dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs
437a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba'i tshul bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang / ston pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdan 'dzom pa'i sbyar sngar mchod pa ci 'byor pa bshams te/ mchod nas smon lam du
437a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol pani rngo ci thog pa'i nyams kyis dpags te bgyis pa 'di tsam zhig sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ di yang gdan 'dzom pa chen pos cho ga yongasu rdzogs par bskang ste/ byin
437a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab cing phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi 'phral du thob par mdzad cing stsal bar ci gnang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad
437a6(rgyud 'grel): mar gyur pa/ 'gyur pa mi mnga' ba'i bden pa mngon sum du bstan par ci gnang / spyir mchod pa dbul zhing bsod nams dmigs kyis/ bsngo ba'i smon lam gdab/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar
437b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco/
437b2(rgyud 'grel): ma yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrogs dpal gyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zlo ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po
437b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i do blangs dang
437b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mtshogs gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa smar gyi pra bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyul po dang / stod bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa
437b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pA spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de phyag 'tshalnga pa dang / mchod cing 'phags pa de dag gi smon laM khyad par can dang / bka' lung mthun par smon lem gsol ba dang / gzhon yang
437b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa de dag gi sbyin sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba phul ba dang / bskul zhing gsel ba btib pa l-i sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa'i stobs dang / 'phags pa de dag gi mthu
438a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang / byin gyis brlabs kyis lha'i sras kyi zhal snga nas kyi thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bsags pa'i dngos sdig dang sgrib pa ci mnga' ba thams cad zhu byang bar gyur cing /
438a2(rgyud 'grel): sku la snyun mi mnga' zhing / sku tshe dpag tu med par ring ba dang / dbu rmog btsan pa dang / chab srid 'byam par rgya che zhing 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs po la mnga' brnyes pa
438a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ mthar yang tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i g.yung drung gi sku chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang brnyes par gyur cig/ chab 'og tu gtogs pa'i 'bangs thams cad
438a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang phyi nang gi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhing / byade zhing skyid pa dang / 'phral yun du legs pa'i chos bzang po la gnas par gyur cig/ mnga' ris kyis yul khams thams cad du yang mi nad dang
438a5(rgyud 'grel): phyugs nad dang / lo nyes dang / dgra'i tshogs la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang / bkra ma shis pa'i bag ci yang mi 'byung ba dang / char chu dus sna bra ba ste/ lo phyugs 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / bde skyid kyi
438a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal phun sum tshogs dang ldan par gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos ring du sgo'i bsod nams bgyid pa la mjug gi bsngo be so so nas ji ltar ded pa bzhin du bris te/ 'debasu sprul lo// smon lam thams cad yong su
438b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'og tu gyes kar bzod pa gsol zhing slar gshegs par gnang bar bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi dpal gyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
438b2(rgyud 'grel): rin po che dang / zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal pA dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan
438b3(rgyud 'grel): med mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyings dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi
438b4(rgyud 'grel): bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa spyan drangs nus mtshan nas brjod de/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod dang / mdo dang mthun par smon
438b5(rgyud 'grel): lam gsol ba dang / che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir/ bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma dag par gyur pas ma 'tshal ba dang / bag ma mchi/
438b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis lus dang / ngag dag dang / yid kyi spyod pa thams cad nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dres pa dang / mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan la gtsang spras ma phyed pa dang / mdo las 'byung ba'i
439a1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs pa la sogs pa 'khrul zhing nongs par gyur pa thams cad/ 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na/ thugs brtse bar mdzad de bzod
439a2(rgyud 'grel): par bzhes shing 'phral yun gnyi su bdag cag la sgrib pa dang gnod par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / 'phags pa rnam skyi deng ngam dgung 'di'i bar du bdag cag la sogs pa 'gro ba phongs shing nyam thag pa'i
439a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi phyin pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad cing / bka' stsal pa yang da du yang bdag cag la zugs brtse bas yang dang yang du gdan 'jom par mdzad par dgongs shing / so so'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam
439a4(rgyud 'grel): bAr dag pa rnamasu 'gro ba'i don la gshegs par tsi gAnang / mjug 'dir bsngo ba'i tshogs bcad kyang bklag go/ rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ d+hA ra NI sarba sA d+hA na kra ma dA ya nA ma// bod skad du/ gzungs thams ca
439a5(rgyud 'grel): kye sgrub thabs rim pa gnyis pa zhes bya ga sgra drug zhi khro lha tshogs la// kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te// sany+tsa la sogs don du ni// du ma gzungs kyi sgra'i thabs ni// smr-i dang bye brag ldan tshul gyis// de n+ti nga yis bstan twe bri//
439a6(rgyud 'grel): mos dga' bde ba'i gnas su ni// spyod gnyis ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dkyil 'khor chen po bsham par bya// ras ris mchod pa ba she ga pa / bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te/ snying gar zla dkyil hUM bsams te//
439b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi 'od kyis phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas 'khor bcas mdun du dgug/ bdun po rnam dag rdzogs par bya// de rjes stong pa'i ngang lnga gnas// yaM dang baM dang lAM las ni// rlung mtsho rin chen sa gzhi bsam// de steng bri zhu gzhan
439b2(rgyud 'grel): yas khang // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rnam mdzes pa// 'khor lo pad+ma 'drab brgyad bsam// pe brang dbus kyi lte ba la// rang gi yi dam oM du bsam// de las 'od 'phros las gnyis byas// slar 'dus
439b3(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi po tIr bsam// yang 'phros slar 'dus thim gyur pas// gtso chen pha rol phyin ma de// gser 'od skyil krung 'khor lo dang // me tog po ti mnyam bzhag go// de nas zhi ba'i lha gnas su// baM lasau pad+ma'i gdan du
439b4(rgyud 'grel): bAs ma// khro bo yi nI gnas rnamu su// ma dang a dang paM las ni// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan du bI sam// tso bo'i thugs las 'od zer 'phros// las gnyis byas te lha gnas su// A dang oM dang hri dang a/ dkar sror dmar ljin
439b5(rgyud 'grel): zhi gan su// hUM ni mthing nag 'phros nas su// de dag la yang 'od 'phros pas// las gnyis byas te sbyar 'dus pas// so so'i mtshan mar bsgom par bya// de las kyang ni 'od 'phros pas// slar 'dus de nyid la thim pas//
439b6(rgyud 'grel): so so'i sku ru bsgom bya ste// dbus kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni// ye shes dbang bskur ldan ma dang // rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// rdo rje mi pham so sor 'brang // sdig pa spong bas gdugs dkar po// bdud 'joms sgo
440a1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' sgrub pa ste// kun kyang sku mdog gser 'od la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bdag nyid can// g.yas na ral gri g.yon me tog/ kun kyang de thog zhi 'dzum tsanA// rin chen rgyan klubs bsam par bya//
440a2(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi pad+ma'i lte ba la// gsor mdog shAkya seng ge ste// skyil krung 'khor lo bsnams pa bsam// de yi phyogs kyi 'dub ma la// spyan ras gzigs dang byams pa dang // na mkha'i snying po kun tu bzang // lagu na rdo rje
440a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa'i dpal// sgrib pa sel dang sa yi snying // dkar sa ra mthong ser yang mthing ser// ljang gu sngon po mdog yin no// kun kyang rgyan klubs me tog bsnams// 'dzum bag bzhin rgyas bsgom par bya// lho yi pad+ma'i
440a4(rgyud 'grel): lte bya la// rig pa'i rgyurgyal mo rma bya can// mthing ga zhal gsum phyag drug na// rma bya'i mjug sgro mda'i dang ni// mchog sbyin rnams ni go rims g.yas// rin cher gzhu dang rnga yab rnams// glo rims bzhon du g.yon ni'o//
440a5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rgyun dang gos 'chung ba'o// de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma lA// dang po'i 'dab ma stong chen mo// zhal gcig phyag drug dkar mo ste// ral gri mda' dang mchog sbyin rnams// go rims gzhan du g.yas na'o// zhags
440a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhu dang dgra sta rnams// go rims bzhin du g.yon na'o// gnyis pa so sor 'brang ma ste// zhal bzhi ma la phyag brgyad ma// pad+ma dang rgyan rtse gsum dang // 'dab brgyad dgra sta bcas pa la// ral gri pad+mar bcas pa dang
440b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dung dang bcas pa'o// dang po gnyis g.yas tha ma g.yon// gsum pa bsil tshul mdog dmar po// zhal gcig phyag gzhi'i bdag nyid can// phreng ba mchog sbyin g.yas na'o// rdo rje lcags kyu g.yon na'o// bzhi pa gsang sngags
440b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'dzin ma// ljang gu zhal cig phyag bzhi ma// rdo rje mchog sbyin g.yas na'o// dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na'o// kun kyang sna tshogs rgyan brgyan bsam// de dag par gyi 'dab ma la// yul 'khor bsrung dang 'phags skyes
440b3(rgyud 'grel): po// mig me bzang dang rnam thos sras// dpa' bo yi ni chu lugs la// pi wang ral gri sbrul zhags dang // mchod rten phyag na bsnams pa'o// nub kyi pad+ma'i lta ba la// mgon po bde gshegs tshe dpag med// sku mdog du ma ra/
440b4(rgyud 'grel): po ting 'dzin rgyu// de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la// 'khor los bsgyur rgyal bzang po mchog/ gzi brjid can dang zla ba dang // snyan pa dri med bzung po tog/ bkod pa chen po spyan ras gzigs// mthu chen thob ste dri
440b5(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang // kun kyang dkar ser me tog bsnams// zhi ba 'dzum 'i bag bsam par bya/ byang gi pad+ma'i lci ba la// chos yum dmar ser po ti gsum// me tog sgreng thogs 'dzum bag can// rgyun ldan pa
440b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya// de yi phyogs kyi 'dab mi la// gdugs dkar rnam rgyal gtsug gau no ro// dri ma mong pa'i gtsug tor te// dkar dang sngo sangs dmar ser mdog/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ral gri dang / rin
441a1(rgyud 'grel): chen bsnams/ twe 'dzum bag can// de yi bar gyi 'dab ma la// 'od zer can dang par+N+Na dang / ri khrod lo gyon dpal lung bstan// mthing ga gcig dang gzhan rnams ser// phyag bzhi dur ba ltar sngo gcig/
441a2(rgyud 'grel): de yi phyag mtshan gyur pa ni// mchog sbyin 'bras bu dgra sta bsnams// zhags pa dbyug to g.yon na'o// rI khrod lo gyon dgra sta'o// 'od zer mya ngan med shing bsnams// me tog bsnams pa khro 'dzum bsam// byang
441a3(rgyud 'grel): shar pad+ma'i lte ba la// bde gshegs tsan dan yan lag ser// zhi des tsan dan bsnams par bsam// de yi phyogs kyi 'dab maM la// blo yangs 'brug sgrogs sgribI pa sel// yon tani 'byung gnas 'od dpag med//
441a4(rgyud 'grel): kun nas spos mchog rgyal mtshan rtsal// nga rgyal gnon dang rgya mtsho dbyangs// kun kyang dmar ser zhi tshul la// sa gnon pa yaM phyag rgya'o// shar g+ho pad+ma'i lte ba la// bde bar gshegs pa sgron ma mchog/
441a5(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu 'dzum bag sa gnon pas// da yI phyogs kyi pad+ma la// sems dpo'i 'od chen 'od dpag med// mi pham pa dang 'jam dpal dang // dri ma med dang rdo rje snying // rgyal ba can dang mtshan mo bzang // kun kyang
441a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar ser mo tog 'dzum// lho nub pad+ma'i lte ba la// mkha' lding gser gyi 'dab ma can// rdo rje'i mchu la lus 'bar ba// khro bo 'jigs rung rtsal can lo// rgyan brgyan klu la stan byas bsam/ da yi phyogs
441b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'dab ma la// spras pa rdo rje kun 'bar glog/ 'bar ba'i gzi brjid gnam lcags mchu// dkar dmar ser dang sngon po ste// spyan zan bzhi ni bsam par bya// de yi bar gyi 'dab ma la// khyab 'jug tshangs pa dbang phyug
441b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // drang srong ri byi bsam par bya// nub byang pad+ma'i lte ba la// mgon po spyan ras gzigs yum ni// dkar 'dzum me tog bsnams pa bsam// de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la// spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gcig zhal/
441b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug phyag mo tshan bsnams pa bsam// gzhan gyis mi thub rIn chen phreng // stobs chen dang ni madrangs phyir 'phrog/ kun kyang mdog dkar rin chen phreng // 'khor lo lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// de yi bar gyi
441b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma l-i// gser can dang ni rnam rgyal can// 'gro lding pa dang dbyig dang ldan// ser dang dkar dang mthing ljang ngo // kun kyang khro 'dzum 'khor lo bsnams// bcu drug pa yau 'dab ma li// rnam par gzigs
441b5(rgyud 'grel): dang thams cad skyob// log par dang sil grwa sar thub deng // 'od srungs dang nI mar me mdzad// kun kyang zhi tshu laM sa gnon rgya// yongs grogs dpal dang rin chen zlo/ gi ser bzangs dri med mya ngan med// chos
441b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrags rgya mtsho chos rgya mtsho// bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po ste// kun kyang na mkha'i mdog lha la// sman mchog a ru ra bsnams pa'o// mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od stong 'bar// snang ba mtha' yas de bsam bya// ser sngo dam
442a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mdog yin no// kun kyang ting 'dzin phyag rgya'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsibs la ni// lag na rdo rje rnam 'joms dang // me ltar rmongs byed pa can dang // kun+da kyang mthing ga khra ba'i rgyu// rdo rje bcon bsnam
442a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// gzhon nu bsnod nams rgyal mtshan ni// e Ne'i pags gyon sbrul gyis brgyan// dug gi me tog thogs pa'o// khro bo me yi kha la ni// mthing ya moM dpung lag na thogs// tshogs bdag dkar po lcags kyu bsnams /
442a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyal dbyug pa sngon po dang // gshin rje gshed dang mi g.yo mgo na// d+hA mgrin gzhan gyis mi thub dang // bdud rtsi 'khyil dang khams gsum rgyal// kun kyang khro bo'i tshul can la// mthing ga rdo rje bsnams pa
442a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam// phyogs mchims 'khor lo rtsi bris la'o// hUM ka ra dang stobs po che// tshwa lugs grong dang mthun tshul la// 'khor lo gnyis kyi rtsibs la bsam// rgyal ba khyu mchog 'brog gnas dang // glengs gnas lnga

442a6(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa thogs pa la// khro bo'i gzugs can bsam par bya// rdo rje 'chang ni gtum mo dang // rdo rje khro mo pho nya mo// khro bo rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rig sngags khro bo rgyal ba can// kun kyang mthing ga khri tshulo can//
442b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud // de dag phyag na bsnams par bsam// khro po bar du gcod stong dang // khro bo mi 'jigs sbyin pa ste// dkar ser khyo tshul rdo rje bsnams// de yi phyi yi khyams la ni// gzugs rnams kun ni/
442b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nas// mchin brjod bde gshegs mtha' dag dmigs Thalnga me sgo ba rang bzhin dmigs// de nas phyi yi rim pa ni// 'khor ba'i li tse khra bo la// gza' dgu dang ni rgyu skar ni// nyi shu rtsa brgyad byasam par bya/
442b3(rgyud 'grel): de yi phyi yi khyams la ni/ du ma bzung nas brjod pa yi// gnod sbyin klu la sogs pa yi// mthu chen thams cad dmigs par bya// sgo de rgal ba'i phyi rnams su// sna tshogs gzungs nas brjod pa yis// snying rje'i tshogs rnams
442b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dmigs// gal te bya brag sgrub byed na// tshogs gnyis gdon dang sa bon dang // gang bskyed pa yi sku de rnams// gong dr-i mthun pa'i sku ru bau skyed// de ltar bsdus te bye brag lha// gang 'dod pa ni bskyed par bya// de nas ye
442b5(rgyud 'grel): shes lha tshegs ni// na mkhar bkug skye mchod nas ni// phyag rgyu bzhi yis gnyis med bya// sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab// dri nas phyogs kyi sang ste rgyas kyis// bum pa'i dbang ni bskor bar bsam// de lta bu/
442b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bsgom par bya// da skyes bzlas pa bya y-i na// thun mtshams gtor btang ye shes gshegs// sgrub pa thabs kyi rim pa ste dang po'o// // da ni snying po bsdus pa'i rim pa ni// de ni rgyas par btu bar
443a1(rgyud 'grel): // so so'i gzungs kyi nang nas te// shUka thub yum g+hi snying po ni// yi ge nyung na mu ne yin// lha mo brgyad kyi snying po ni// lha me brgyad kyi gzungs nang nas// ye shes dbang bsgyur rdo rje dbyings// so sor 'brang gsum stong /
443a2(rgyud 'grel): po ni// so so'i gzungs kyis nang nas ni// tha ma'i sarba man tshad yin// gzhan rnams mi btu gzungs na bzhin// sems dpa' 'khor brgyad snying po ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i nang bzhin no// yong na mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi// rlung
443a3(rgyud 'grel): gi gzungs rnams bzhin du'o// rma bya'i yi ni snying po ni// rma bya'i snying po'i nang nas ni/ na ra ya yi sngags yin no// stong chen gyi ni snying po ni// gzungs nA sngags kyi tha ma'o// so sor 'brang ma'i snying po nA// snying po gau sum gyi
443a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags nang nas// rab tu gsang ba'i snying po'o// bsil ba'i tshal gyi snying po ni// gzungs sngags gnyis pa yin par 'dod// gsang sngags gsum pa yin par 'do // tshe dpag med kyi snying po ni// de mdo'i sar+b+ba satwA ri// nga yi

443a6(rgyud 'grel): nang bzhin no// rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po ni// gsang sngags de yi tha ma yi// sarba ta thA mar bcad do// gtsug gi nor bu'i snying po ni// sngags de yi ni tha ma yi// sarba rnam gnyis mar bcad do// gtsug tor dri mede
443b1(rgyud 'grel): snying po ni// sngags de yi ni tha ma yi// sArba rnam gnyis mar bcad do// 'od zer can gyi snying po ni// gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod// par+Na'i snying po de nang bzhin// rI khrod lo gyon snying po ni// tad+ya thA nas bzung nas ni// swA hA dang tho
443b2(rgyud 'grel): yan chad do// dpal lha lung bstan snying po ni// sngags de yI ni gzhung gi ni tA tha mi'i sarba mar bcad// tsan+na da nA yan lag snying po ni// de yi sngags kyi nang nA sa nI// sar+b+ba b+hU ta a ti ta// de ni mA re bcad yin par 'od // bde gtseH/
443b3(rgyud 'grel): bdun gyi snying po ni// khyad par can gyi mdo ji bzhin// nor gyi rgyun gyi snying po ni// sngags de yi ni tha ma ya// oM bzhi po ni yin par 'dod// sgrol ma mchog gi ste yo ni// de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no// mi pham 'jam dpal
443b4(rgyud 'grel): snyid+ya po ni// sgrol ma mchog gi gzungs nang bzhin// dri ma mid pa'i sgying b+h+yo nAM/ d+hI med gzungs sngags tha ma'o// rdo rje snying po de nang bzhin// rgyalnga ba can g+hi snying po ni// gzeng snga dang po yin par 'dod// mtshan mo bza
443b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i snying po ni// gzungs nas sngags kyi tha ma'o// mkha' lding gtso bo'i snying po ni// tshangs pa khang par gzungs mthu yis// sngags rings de yi 'jug gi ni// ta thA ga ta marA bcad do// sbas pa rdo rje kun 'bar klog/
443b6(rgyud 'grel): mchu yi nang nas 'byung bzhin no// 'bar ba gzi brjid snying po ni// mchu yi gzungs sngags tha ma yi// oM daM ri di ri mar bcing yin par 'dod// gnam lcags mchu yi snying po ni// gnam lcags sngags kyi tha
444a1(rgyud 'grel): mi yin// oM di rI di rI mar bcad yin par 'dod // rI byi'i sngags ni de nang bzhin// spyan ras gzigs yAm snying po ni// sarba gnyis po mar bcad yin// bcu gcig zhal gyi snying po nI// de yi gzungs
444a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi nang bzhin no// rin chen phreng ba'i snying po ni// gzungs sngags gnyis pa yin par 'dod// stobs can+da gyi ni snying po ni// gzungs sngag tha ma yin par 'dod// mudrangs phyir 'phrog gi snying po ni// de ya gzungs kyi rang
444a3(rgyud 'grel): na no// gser can gyi ni snying po ni// gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod// rnam rgyal can gyi snying po ni// gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod// 'gro lding pa yi snying po yi// gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dong //
444a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyig dang ldan pa'i snying po yang // de yi gzungs kyi rang bzhin no// bde gshegs rabos bdun snying po ni// sangs rgyas bdun pa'i gzungs nang bzhin// sman blo mched bdun snying po ni// gzungs sngags par ma yin par 'dod//
444a5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'khrugs pa yi snying po ni// las sgrib sbyong ba'i gzungs nang gi/ kaM ka ni ni yin par 'dod// 'od stong 'bar gyi snying po ni// rgyu chen thogs med gzungs nang gi/ mjug gi sngags thung yin par 'dod// snang mtha' yas kyi snying
444a6(rgyud 'grel): po ni/ de yi gzungs sngags tha ma'o// lag na rdo rje'i snying po ni// tad+ya thA nas tha ma'o// rnam par 'joms pa'i snying po ni// de yi sngags kyi gzhug gi ni// na ma sh+tsAN+Da man chad do// me ltar rmongs byed snying po ni// gsang saH/
444b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi nang nas ni// sarba dwe ba nA ga man chad do// be tshon chen po'i snying po ni// gzungs sngags dang po'i nang nas kyang // sarba a tA sa ta na// de ni mar cad yin par 'dod// dug sel gyi ni snying po ni// de dag gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod//
444b2(rgyud 'grel): muM kha la yi snying po ni// gzungs sngags dang po'i nang nas kyang // sa man+da na swa re// de ni mar cang yin par 'dod// tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po ni// de yi gzungs sngags gzhug gri/ tAd+ya thA nas tha me'i bar// khro bo bcu'i snying
444b3(rgyud 'grel): po yang // rang rang gzungs kyi nang bzhin no// yang na bskor ba'i gzungs bzhin no// rnam par 'joms pa'i badz+ra bcu// khro bcu'i sngagasu 'dod pa yin// lag na rdo rje bcu yi ni// snying po gzungs sngags tha mar 'dong // nag
444b4(rgyud 'grel): po chen po'i snying po ni// de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no// lha mo nAg mo'i snying po yang // de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no// rig sngag rgyal ba can nang nas// khro bzhi'i sngags ni btu bar bya// gtum mo yi ni sngags gnyis las//
444b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags tshun 'og ma yin+da par 'dod// rdo rje khro bo'i sngags de nyid// rdo rje pho nya mo yi sngags// mdung rtse gsum pa'i sngags yin no// khro bo lu gu rgyud sngags ni gzungs kyi nang bzhin kho na'o// rig sngags rgyal ba can
444b6(rgyud 'grel): sdigs ni// dza ya dza ye'i sngags yin no// khro bo bar du gcod spong sngags// gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod// khro bo mi 'jogs sbyini sngags ni/ sngags de nyid kyi nang nas kyang // sarba du re shar mar gcad do/
445a1(rgyud 'grel): de dag lha mngon nang nas btu// lha mo mngon nas btu ba ni// gzungs chen po yi snying po ni// gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod // sangs rgyas snying po'i snying po ni// gzungs sngags dang po yin par

446a1(rgyud 'grel): mi btu dre yi rang bzhin no// tha ma tog gi phyag rgya ni// de yi gzungs kyi sngags gzhug gi/ sarba man+da chad yin par 'dod// dra bi rig pa'i rgyalA mo'i sngags// gzungs sngags drang po yin par 'dong // sprin gyi
446a2(rgyud 'grel): gzungs kyi snying po ni// bde sbyin sngags ni yin par 'dod// rlung gi dkyil 'khor snying pa ni// gzungs sngags tha ma'i nang nas kyang // na mo rat+na tra yA ya// daM ni man ched yin par 'dod// uSh+NI ShA la sogs pa'i gzungs
446a3(rgyud 'grel): snying po rang gzhung gsal po yang // de yi gzungs kyang 'ga' zhig mchis// de dag ma btus de ning bzhin// de ltar sna tshogs gzungs nang nas// mkhas pas de ltar btu bar bya// snying po btu ba'i rim pa ste
446a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'o// // da ni rim gnyis mjug bsdus te// gong bzhin sgrub pa'i thabs bsgomasA nas// snying po btu rim bzhin du ni// gtso bo nas kyi 'khor gyi bar// rgyus dang 'bring dang bsdus pa yI//

446a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi cho ga'i gzhung bzhi no// de bzhin las la sbyor bar bya// bye brag tu ni sgrub byed na// bye brag sgrub pa'i thabs bsgoms nas// bye brag snying po bzlas par bya// de nas las la sbyar ba ni// zhi pa rim drug gdon

447a1(rgyud 'grel): grangs ni dpag med ldan// sna tshogs rgyud la brten byas nas// nor bu sgrub thabs rim gnyis 'di// rim chen grags pas mdzad pa gzungs 'dus spyi'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzog so//

447a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur ni// cho ga byed pa'i dus dang ni// rang nyid bstan la 'dug sogs par// kun khyab gzungs cho ga nang nas gsal// dbang bskur du skyi rim lnga bzhin// du ma gzungs kyi 'jug du ni// de yi bya bo'i cho ga spyang ki dkyil 'khor
447a6(rgyud 'grel): bri ba'i snga gong du// gzungs rnams ma lus thams cad kyi// sngags bdus nyungs kar lo btab nas// bum pa rnamasu thugs par bya// bsnyen pa skyel ba'i slob dpon gyis// de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar byi// thig dang rdul tshe
447b1(rgyud 'grel): rim lnga bzhin// de nas rdulnga tshon dgye bya ba// dbus 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris// 'khor lo'i lte bar mthing ka'o// rtsibs rnams ser zhing ma khyud dkar// yang na 'dab brgyad sngo mdzeso// 'dab rtsibs lte ba rnams lnga ni// pad+ma 'dab brgya
447b2(rgyud 'grel): dzes bri// de ste gtso po'i mdog dang bstan// 'khor lo pad+ma'i phyi nyid du// bcu drug 'dab ldan pad+ma ni// ci mdzes pa ru bri brda bya// pany+tsa de ya~M pa nyid du// sum cu rtswa gnyis rtsibs ldan pa// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bri bar bya// lte ba mthing
447b3(rgyud 'grel): ka'i rtsibs rnams ni// ci mdzes par ne bri bur bya// rtsibs mtshan rI nau chen 'bar bA bri// mu khyud dkar po de phyi khyams// sgo sogs rim po lnga paM bzhin// de yi phyi yi rim pa ni// 'khor ba'i mu khyung dgra bo bri// de yi phyi ni khyams su gan
447b4(rgyud 'grel): sgo ni gong dang mthun pa ste// sgo de yi ni phyi rol du// drug cu rtsa bzhi 'dab ldan ni// mtshon sna lnga yis sdig gur bri// rdo rje mi re de bzhi ni bri// de nas lha ni dgod bya ba// sgrub pa'i thabs bzhon dgod pa ra bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni khyim//

447b6(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs te// rang bzhin tshe sku dbyer med kyang // 'gro ba'i don phyir yul gyi sku// yum chen pha rol phyin ma dang // yaMs dbang bskur ldan pa dang // rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// rdo rje mi pham sor 'bring // sdig pa spong ba gdul
448a1(rgyud 'grel): dka' ma// bdud 'joms sgo mtha' sgrub ma ste// de ltar 'gro mgon khyed rnams kyang // rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yi// lus srog par chang gsal ba ltar// dpal dang bsod nams spel ba dang // las ngan sdig pa sgru
448a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir// sprul pa'i pho brang dam pa 'dir// mchod cing spyan 'dren gshegasu gsol// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugasu gsol// de bzhin spel bar bya ba ni// gser 'od shAkya seng+ge dang // spyan ras gzigs dang byams pa dang // na mkha'i snying
448a3(rgyud 'grel): dang kun tu bzang // lag na rdo rje 'dza pa'i dpal// sgrib pa sil dang sa'i snying po// rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya che// steng chen so sor 'byung ma dang // bsil ba'i tshal dang gsang sngags 'dzin// yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes
448a4(rgyud 'grel): po// mig mi bzang dang rnam thos sras// mgon po bad gshegs tshe dpag med// bzang po mchog dang gzi brjid dpal// zla ba snun pa dri med dang // bzang po'i tog dang bkod pa che// spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen thob// chos rnams
448a5(rgyud 'grel): yum dang ni// bdugs dkar rnam rgyal gtsug gi nor// 'od zer can dang par+Na dang // ri khrod lo gyon dpal lung bstan// bde gshegs tsan dan yal ga dang / blo yangs 'brug sgra sgrib pa sel// ston 'byung gnas 'od dpag med// kun
448a6(rgyud 'grel): nas spos mchog rgyal mtshan brtsal// nga rgyal gnon dang rgya ma b+ha bar gshegs pa sgron ma mchog/ sems dpa' 'od chen 'od dpag med// mi pham pa dang 'jam dpal dang // dri ma ming dang rdo rje snying // rgyal ba can dang mtshan/
448b1(rgyud 'grel): mo bzang // mkha' lding gser 'dab rdo rje mchu// sbas pa rdo rje kun 'bar klog/ 'bar ba gzi brjid gnam lcags mchu// khyab 'jug tshangs pa dbang phyug dang // drang srong r-i'i chen po ste// mgron po spyan ras gzigs yum dang // spyan+da ras gzigs
448b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bcu gcig zhal// rin chen phreng dang stobs can dang // mdangs phyir 'phrog dang gser can dang // rnam rgyal can dang 'gro lding dang // stobs can dbyig dang ldan pa ste// rnam par gzigs dang thams cad skyo bo// log dang sel dang gas
448b3(rgyud 'grel): thub dang / 'od srungs dang ni mar mi mdzad// yongs bsgrags dpal dang rin chen zla// gser bzangs dri med mya ngan med// chos grags rgya mtsho tshos rgya mtsho// bai DUr 'od kyi rgyal po ste// mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od stong 'bar/ bang
448b4(rgyud 'grel): bar gshegs pa snang mtha' yas// lag na rdo rje rnam 'joms dang // me ltar rmongs byed be con dang // bsod nams rgyal mtshan ma kha la// dpal ldan tshogs kyi bdag po ste// rnam rgyal du byug pa sngon po dang / gshin rje
448b5(rgyud 'grel): gshed dang mi g.yo mgon// rta mgrin gzhan gyis mi thub dang // bdud rtsi 'khyil dad khams gsum rgyu la// hUM kA ra dang stobs po che// rgyal ba khyu mchog 'brog gnas dang // gang nas lnga rtseni nor bzeng dang // gang bzung dang
448b6(rgyud 'grel): ni grags bzang dang // sa mdzes dang ni phreng mdzes dang // nag po che dang lha mo nag/ rdo rje gtum po rdo rje khro// rdo rje pho nya lu gu rgyud // rig sngags khro bo rgyal ba can// khro bo bar du gcod sbyong dang // khro chen 'bar ba mi 'jigs
449a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin// dzaHhUM baM hoHkun la sbyar// sna tshogs gzungs ni brjod pa yis// bde bar gshegs pa mtha' dag kyang // bdag gi mtshan rnams ma brjod kyang // sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis ni// rang bzhin gnas pa mi
449a2(rgyud 'grel): mnga' yang // kun rdzob tsam du gnas pa ston// zhing khams pho brang la sogs nas// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sbyang ba dang // bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir// sprul pa'i yo brang dam pa 'dir// mchod sbyin spyan 'dren gshe
449a3(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// lha rnams khyams la bzhugasu gsol// bde gshegs mchod dang sgo skyong ba'i// sgo bzhi'i lha mo khyed rnams kyang // spyan 'dren mchod phyir go shwegasu gsol// pho brang gru bzhir gshegasu gsol// sgo ba'i
449a4(rgyud 'grel): nang du gshegasu gsol// sna tshogs gzungs nas brjod pa yi// gza' dang rgyu skar gnod sbyin dang // klu la sogs pa'i mthu chen sogs// spyan 'dren mchod kyis gshegasu gsol// khor yug le tshe gshagasu gsol//
449a5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs gzungs nas brjod pa yis// kha 'bar la sogs snying rje'i tshogs// mchod gto sbyin gyis 'dir shog cig/ de nas phyag rgya 'di skad do// yum chen pha rol phyin ma dang // ye shes dbang bskur dpal ldan ma
449a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// rdo rje mi pham so so 'brang // sdig pa spong ba gdul bka' mo// bdud 'joms sgo mtha' sgrub pa ste// de lta'i 'gro mgon khyed rnams lo// rig pa'i slob dpon pa dang ni// gzungs 'dzin
449b1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma rnams kyi ni// bar chod bgegs rnams bzlog pa dang // rnam smin sdig pa sbyong ba'i phyir// sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshalo// spyan 'dren skabasu smos bzhin du// de bzhin kun la bsgre bar bya// de nas mchod pa 'di skad do//
449b2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa yi ni yon chab 'di// sna tshogs gzungs kyi lha la 'bul// sna tshigs gzungs kyi glog bam la// bklags dang khab tu bzhugs pa dang // rig pa'i slob dpon nga yis ni// sna tshogs gzungs cho ga byas pa yis// maM
449b3(rgyud 'grel): mthun par chod bzlog pa dang // rnam smin sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir// thugs rje'i dbang gis ba zhesu gsol// mchod rdzas gzhan yang de bzhin sbrel// de nas bstod pa 'di srad ngo do// yu mi chen pha rol phyin ma dr-ing // ye shes dbang
449b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur ldan ma dang // rdo rje dbyings kyi dbying phyug mu// dzA rje mi phye ma so sor 'brang // sdig pa spongs pa gdugs dkar ma// bdud 'joms sgo mtha' sgrub paM ste// gzungs 'chang gzungs sngags bdag nyid can// so so rang gi
449b5(rgyud 'grel): gzungs sngags kyis nus po so sor 'dod mi dzud tshe// khyod kyi ljon skal par ni// brjod kyang lad+ya bar mi 'gyur te// yon cha tsam zur gyis bstod// sku mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal ba ste // de nas sbrul bar bya ba ni// spyan
449b6(rgyud 'grel): 'drin skabs kyi mtshan smos bzhin// bde gshegs byi rgod ri bo yi// lho phyogs dge slong stong nyis brgya// lnga bcus yongs bskor ma gaM d+ha'i// ma skyes dgra yis bsnyen bkur tshe// sa g.yos sprin 'dus glog phyung ste/
450a1(rgyud 'grel): yangs pa mi bred sngangs don skrag/ de slad kun tshogs stong chen gsungs// stong chen glegs bam phyag 'tshal bstod// bde gshegs mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal// bzhugs tshe sa ri kun zin nas// sdug bsngal
450a2(rgyud 'grel): nyen pa kun dgas zhus// sangs rgyas gzungs gsungasra rmu bya che// rma bya'i glegs bam phyag 'tshal bstod// bde gshegs lhun zo ma rdo khri na/ sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bzhi dang // nyan thos lta
450a3(rgyud 'grel): bu dbang phyug bskor// sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyiraro// ston pos gsungs po'i so sor 'brang // glegs bam so sor 'brang la stong bde gshegs du ro khrod bsil tshal dang // 'jigs rung skye bar dge slong ni// stong
450a4(rgyud 'grel): dang nyis brgya lnga bcu dang // rgyal tshan bzhi yi 'khor bzhi po// bsrung ba'i slad du yongs zhus pa// ston pas gsungs pa bsil ba'i tshal// glegs bam bsil ba'i tshal la bstod// bde gshegs mnyan yod rgyal
450a5(rgyud 'grel): byed tshul// bzhugs tshe tshangs po sogs rnams kyis// stong gsum bsrung slad yongs zhus pa// cang mi gsung gi tshul gnang ba// gsang sngags rjes 'dzin ston pas gsungs// de'i glegs bam phyag 'tshal bstod
450a6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo brgyad gzungs phyag rdor gyi// 'jam dpal la ni gsungs pa yi// lha mo brgyad gzungs phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan rgyal khab bya rgod kyi// phung rir dge slong stong bzhugs tshe// log na rdo rjes zhus
450b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// kun tshogs rgyal ba can gyi gzungs// rgyal ba can gyi glegs bam bstod// bcom ldan rin chen khang brtsegs nas// sems dpa' sum khri lnga stong dang // dge slong lnga brgya nyi khri stong // bzhugs pa'i
450b2(rgyud 'grel): tshe na bcom ldan gyi// 'byung po skyob phyir gnang ba'i gzungs// rdo rje 'chang gi gsungs pa yi// me ltar rmongs byed gzungs la bstod // bcom ldani rgyal khab 'od ma'i tshal// byA ka lan dkra gnas pA na/
450b3(rgyud 'grel): lha bu tsan dan skyes nas ni// dge slong bcom ldan la zhus pa// de phyir bcom ldan gsungs pa yis// mtshan mo bzang po'i gzungs la bstod// bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab na ni// dge slong lnga brgya nyi khri stong // sems dpa'i
450b4(rgyud 'grel): lha dang thubs cig ste// spyan ras gzigs dang zla 'od dang // tsA nau dan+ta gyi ni yan lag gsungs// tsan dan yan lag phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal// mgon med zas sbyin kun ra na// dge slong nyis /

451a1(rgyud 'grel): brgya sems dpas bskor// bcom ldan gnang zhing sems dpa' ni// kun tu bzang pos gsungs pa yi// spyan ras gzigs yum gzungs la bstod// bcom ldan rdo rje la zhugs te/ lag na rdo rjes byin brlabs te// rdo rje snying
451a2(rgyud 'grel): pos gsungs pa ni// rnam 'joms gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan yul 'phags brag phug bzhugs// lho dbang tshe yi 'du byed 'jigs// bcom ldan de yi don gsungs pa// bar du gcod sbyong gzungs la bstod// bcoMm/
451a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan chos dbye dgon pa na// sems dpa' bye bo khrag khrig dang // 'bum phrag de ma thabs gcig tshe// bcom ldan sems dpa'i 'khor chen lo// skye bo mang la phan phyir gsungs// sangs rgyas snying po'i gzungs la bstod// bcom
451a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan ma gA da yul nas// lus nus 'phags brag phug gshegs bzhugs che// lha dbang der phyin lha min deng // g.yul 'gyed phyir zhus bcom ldan gsungs// mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i gzungs la bstod// bcom ldan skyed tshal
451a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu mtsho'i 'gram// lha yi 'khor skor chos ston tshe// gnas gtsang lha la bka' stsal pa'i// sangs rgyas snying po'i gzungs la bstod// bcom ldan mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal// dge slong brgya stong sems dpa'i tshogs// bskor
451a6(rgyud 'grel): tsho shA ri'i bu la gsungs/ dbang bskur gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan rgyal khab bya rgod kyi// spungs ri'i dge slong brgya stong dang // sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum// dgu bcu rtsa dgu gnas gtsang lhas//
451b1(rgyud 'grel): bskor tshe spyan rwas gzigs gsungs pa'i// kun tu bzang po'i gzungs la bstod// bcom ldan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi// la ba dkar po rdo leb bzhugs// lha dbang lha min las pham nas// bcom ldan 'das la zhus gsungs pa'i// rgyal
451b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gzungs// gzungs de la'ang phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan tsam pa bskos rdzide 'gram// dge slong lnga brgya thabs cig tshe// bcom ldan dge slong rnams la stong // 'chi med rnga sgra phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom
451b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan nyid kyi bka' stsal pa'o// rten 'brel gzungs l-i phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan nyid kyis bka' stsal pa'i// rim bzhi gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan rgya mtsho ma dros na// dge slong lnga brgya thabs
451b4(rgyud 'grel): cig ste// sems dpa' stong dang de nang nas// seng ge rnam rtses brgyan nas gsungs// me tog brtsegs gzungs phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan bram ze yangs dbang gnas// bzhugs tshe bram ze sa dbang zhus//

452a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan dge slong rnams la gsungs// lha mo 'od zer can gzungs bstod // bcom ldan kun dga' bo la gsungs// nyid brgyud tshogs bdag gzungs la bstod// bcom ldan legs par gnas la gsungs// dbyig
452a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i gzungs la bstod // bcom ldan kun dga' bo la gsungs// yi ge drug pa'i gzungs la bstod // bcom ldan nyid gsungs pha rol sgo// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i gzungs la bstod// bcom ldan shAkya bde ldan don// gsungs

452a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag la gsungs pa'i// bu med ston pa'i gzungs la bstod// bcom ldan dge slong rnams la gzungs// nud rnams zhi ba'i gzungs la bstod// bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi// dug sel rig sngags phyag 'chag

452b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal gzungs la bstod// spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa yi// bcu gcig zhal gyi gzungs la bstod// spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa yi// snying rje mi shol gzungs la bstod// bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi// phyir

453b1(rgyud 'grel): can gyi gzungs la bstod// phyag stong spyan stong gsungs pa yi// rgyal chen thogs med gzungs la bstod // bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi// sman bla mched bdun gzungs la bstod// ston pa nyid kyis gsungs pa yi//
